story: .

Our Story

My Name is Ian Lawson and I am a senior mechanical engineer at Oregon State University. For my last year I have decided to live out of my van to save on money. So far it has been a ton of fun and but there is one thing missing. I can't charge my phone at night or plug in any appliances.

I have always been a supporter of green energy and helping the environment in any way I can. Putting a solar kit on the van seemed like a great solution to my power problem and a great way to actualize my passions about green energy. The van would need a panel, battery, inverter, and regulator in order to run independent from the cars components. Rose City Solar, a small company trying to get its start, will be designing and implementing the installation plan.

The Impact

The sun is an infinite source of energy and seems as of yet to be fully realized. Other countries such as china have started putting solar panels on every surface possible. It’s time for Oregon, known for its environmentalists, to go solar. Putting a solar panel on my van will grab people’s attention. If you can put a solar panel on a van you can put a solar panel almost anywhere. As a mechanical engineer and Rose City Solar’s lead installer I will be able to explain the workings of the solar kit to anyone who is interested. Let’s spread the word about solar energy! I can't wait to be living proof of its success.

 

What We Need & What You Get

$10-$20
- photo of Gildevin and Ian in front of the van

$50
- photo of Gildevin and Ian in front of the van
- Associate producer on twitter and blog spot

$80
- photo of Gildevin and Ian in front of the van
- Associate producer on twitter and blog spot
- one window per $80 (limit 2 windows) dollar donation from Steady Hand Painters
(Steady Hand Painters have been painting sash windows in Portland for 7 years)

$200
- Can stove made by Gildevin. Uses thermodynamic principles to burn wood more efficiently and looks sweet!
- photo of Gildevin and Ian in front of the van
- Associate producer on twitter and blog spot
- one window per $80 (limit 2 windows) dollar donation from Steady Hand Painter
(Steady Hand Painter's has been painting sash windows in Portland for 7 years)

$full amount$

All of the above plus....
Put whatever you want on the side of my van
Ideas: your face, your art, your business name, Chuck Norris quotes, etc

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word on Facebook and Twitter! If a lot of people donate even a little I'm positive it will not be hard to reach our goal. Thanks for taking the time.

story:
Short Summary

My Name is Floor Siemons, I've been working with horses and riders for over 20 Years. In this period I've had, and seen some (very) painful accidents. Every year people get injured while riding a horse. The concern of my relatives is that I'll fall of a horse get injured and they can’t find me. I can call them with my cell phone but how do I explain where I am if I’m in the middle of the woods?? To locate a victim outdoors I've thought of a solution.

For myself I like to keep track of my performances while training outdoors I have been using a runners App to log my exercising. The idea is to combine a safety alert with an App to log exercises and routes. More fun for me and less worries that a rider will fall without anyone knowing it. I think a lot of riders (and parents of young riders) wil feel more safe and have better training results and more fun.

I designed this product for equestrian sports but it can be helpful in other outdoor (extreme) sports also.

So help make outdoor riding (and other sports) safer, de rider alarm doesn't make an accident lesspainfull, it doesnt prevent riders from falling, but it will get you home faster.

Status

The tecnical design of this product is ready now it needs to be built.

Costs ofdeveloping:
Device hardware> $ 3000
Developing software & App > $ 5000

If the goal is not achieved the money will stay in this project and we’ll try
to find other sources to complete out plan. Whit enough money ($5000)the App
will be developed separately. Any amount of money will help us to make horseback
riding (outdoors) safer.

Given that this solultion containes a mobile App with a free version and a paid PRO version with more features. The perks will be a percentage of the profit.

Equinovum

I've started the company Equinovum. Besides this safetydevice we're working on severeral innovations to take better care of riders aswell as Horses. We're also developping a video securety system, birth alarms and healt monitors for horses. We plan on launching our first products januari first 2013. We hope this device wil be our first succes!

story:
The Northeast Disables Athletic Association is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization based in Burlington, VT. We have created this campaign to spread the word about a great opportunity for people like you to become a partner in the success of our Vermont Chargers Power Soccer Club. The Vermont Chargers aim to provide participants with quadriplegia, multiple sclerosis, muscular dystrophy, cerebral palsy, head trauma, stroke, spinal cord injury and other disabilities requiring the use of power wheel chairs the opportunity to play for a team and compete in a way that they would not otherwise be able to. The significance of this is that the leadership, teamwork, loyalty, and sportsmanship skills that this sport offers to these athletes are extremely unique and provide irreplaceable experiences in their lives.  

The mission of this campaign is to raise money and awareness for those with disabilities wanting to participate in adapted sports, specifically encouraging participation in power soccer throughout the state of Vermont. All donations will go towards assisting the Vermont Chargers journey in representing Vermont at the United States Power Soccer Association (USPSA) Presidents’ Cup national championship in June. 

For this 35-day campaign we have set a fundraising target of $7,500 to help us achieve our goal of returning to the national championship.  This would help us cover a large portion of the cost of airfare, lodging, registration and other expenses for sending 13 players, coaches and assistants to the USPSA Presidents Cup. Any donation you can provide to help us reach our fundraising goal is greatly appreciated. Your donation will be tax deductible and your contribution will really be making a difference in the lives of athletes with disabilities.  Only through the generous support of the community can we make our goal a reality.

The Chargers were established in 2010 and are members of the United States Power Soccer Association (USPSA). Power soccer is a four-on-four game played on a regulation-size basketball court by power wheelchair users. The Chargers are the only team in Vermont and are currently regarded as a top team in New England. Last season, we traveled to Indianapolis, IN to compete for the national title and captured 4th place amongst teams from around the USA. This was a great finish for the team and it could not be done without the moral and financial support of friends, family and the community.  While we are proud of last year’s finish, we have set our sights even higher for this season and are striving to bring the Presidents Cup to Vermont. Bringing a national title back to Vermont this year will not be possible without the financial support members of the community such as yourselves.

To learn more please check out our website at www.vermontchargers.com and our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/vtchargers    

Thank you for your time and consideration,

The Vermont Chargers

story:
Geta is all about inspiring people.

We believe that every person is important. Everyone plays a role in creation of something, but sometimes it gets hard to see that. In times of doubt we want to inspire and motivate people in the form of wallpapers.

Imagine that your phone will show you a new Quote every day. It will help you stay motivated throughout the day and encourage you to be who you really are.

Imagine your phone showing you breathtaking horizons, reminding you to explore the beauty of this world. And think of your phone with extraordinary illustrations that embolden your vision and make you think bigger.

That's what we are striving for. We want people to get inspired every day.

Join us in this mission to make this world a better place.


About this app

We have spent countless nights brainstorming about this idea. This app is very easy and intuitive to use.

The main thing about this app is that it will automatically change the wallpaper on your phone on a daily basis.


Nevertheless you can always change the wallpaper you don't like just by swiping it away.


You can choose a type of wallpapers to display. No unnecessary complications - just Quotes, Photography and Illustrations.


Every wallpaper is made and submitted to Geta by professional designers, photographers and illustrators. So under every wallpaper you can find the name, description and contact information about the person who made it.


This gives a great opportunity for creative professionals to showcase their work and gain exposure in a way that has never been done before. So you're not just helping us, you're also helping them.

It will be a cross-platform application

Geta will work on android phones & tablets, as well as Windows & iOS computers.


What we've done so far

We have launched our website. It is a place where designers, photographers and illustrators can upload their work to Geta.

We welcome all creative professionals to visit our website and upload your work.

What we need

We have been working on Geta for half a year now, but we need funding to cover our daily expenses.


What you get

We are very eager to motivate and inspire people. So we hope you'll like our perks.
Our most valuable perk is a stencil art made by one of our team members, Bayaraa.


Our goal

Our goal is to reach 21000 $ by 30th of November.
All we need is your help to get this project going.

Other ways in which you can help

  • Spread the word about this app
              

  • Contribute wallpapers and tell your designer-friends

story:
Idea:

My Moto Mod Candidate is probably the most simple and elegant thing that can be attached to a Moto Z.  The existing style shells give a warmth and personality to the Moto Z, but they do not have any functionality.  They are for looks only; and with a platform as versatile as the Moto Z, why would you attach anything to it that does not provide some functionality?  My idea was to integrate wireless charging and infrared emitters in a stylish accessory barely thicker than the existing style shells. 

Next Steps

I am currently working on a prototype, which is nearing completion.  The electronic components have been tested with the phone and work as intended.  The wood housing is nearly complete and soon I will have a working proof-of-concept design that will work through the phone's USB port.  Currently all of the components I have used are off the shelf and commercially available.  I need your help to take this prototype to Motorola and work with them to develop the final version which will connect through the Moto Z's Mod connector, as well as refine and finalize the electronics and materials.

The Impact

In a recent article it was stated that Moto Mods are in use about 10 percent of the time.  This means that 90 percent of the time, it is just a phone, and likely has a style shell attached to it.  If the style shell had function on top of form, it would add utility and convenience over and above what the phone is already capable of.  

January 28 Update

I have updated this campaign to include perks.  There is a wireless charging style shell and a wireless charging style shell with infrared.  I have received feedback indicating there is a demand for both products.  Since this is a candidate in Motorola's Mod the Smartphone Challenge, I need to move on to the next step to make this Mod candidate a reality.  There are a lot of unknowns at this point, but I believe this is a great addition to the Moto Z family and is also very desirable and marketable.  With your help we can make this Mod candidate a reality.

February 1 Update

Second prototype with infrared coming soon, Stay tuned for updates!!!

February 4 Update

Second prototype is operational.  Please see the video at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Inbz9BjV2O0  Thanks to everyone who has contributed, supported, shared or helped get the word out on my campaign.  It has been a great week and I have a lot of people to thank for the success so far.  This prototype is also wired until I can meet with Motorola and finalize the Mod connector, but it is fully functional and is an example of how it works.  

A big thanks to the many websites who published articles on my idea, some listed below:

http://www.androidauthority.com/moto-z-mod-wire...

http://m.gsmarena.com/new_moto_mod_promises_to_...

http://phandroid.com/2017/01/31/moto-z-moto-mod/

http://pocketnow.com/2017/01/31/moto-z-moto-mod...

https://9to5google.com/2017/01/30/moto-mod-wire...

Also, check out the new featured perk for 20% off your choice of style, color and functionality when released.

story:
BATBAND® is an elegant piece of sound technology allowing you to listen to your private soundscape as well as the world that surrounds you. Human-centered design meets technology delivering a high fidelity acoustic experience via an innovative bone conduction system.

 

 

 

The unique principle behind Batband's unparalleled acoustic experience is called Bone Conduction. It consists of harmlessly conducting sound to the inner ear through the bones of the skull. Specifically designed transducers produce acoustic waves that are directly perceived by the cochlea, thus liberating the outer ear. The resulting sound feels deeply enveloping and genuinely different to any other conventional audio experience.

BATBAND® works via bone conduction, consisting of transducers that emit sound waves perceived by your "private" inner ear, thus freeing your "social" outer ear. Sound waves are transmitted at a frequency that can be conducted through the bones of the skull. Your ears remain free, therefore you get to hear twice as much, without compromising on comfort, quality or style.

 

Hold Batband® with your hands and carefully place it around the back of your head. Adjust the position of your Batband® making sure there is a good grip on your head, including the back, and the two ends of the product press on your temples but do not cover your ears.

Two integrated touch sensors allow you to control its main features from your fingertips through a series of intuitive gestures.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Enhance your Batband experience thanks to the free app that will give you access to further features such as personalised settings, checking battery level, equalising music or product registration.

 

 

 

After proof of concept and prototyping in the first half of 2015, we launched a Kickstarter campaign end of 2015 which was a funding landslide. Since then we have been working super intensely with our engineering and manufacturing partners in Shenzhen. Our hardware and UX design, product development and production management teams have been to China on a monthly basis this year to further perfect the Batband® experience and to make sure the product meets our ambitious expectations.

There have been technical challenges along the way which pushed us to think of ingenious solutions supported by many months of engineering fine-tuning and manufacturing preparation. At this point we are pretty confident that all components are being integrated in an optimal way and are proud to present to the Indiegogo community a product that is in pre-production phase.

 

 

 

We are Studio Banana Things, a passionate group of designers, geeks, gentle go-getters, dreamers who love to observe daily life, imagine new worlds and develop fun and functional solutions for people on the go.

story:
Just upload your pictures and videos that you think could be newsworthy through the Gazetta app and go about your day.  An hour later you could find $20, $40 or even $100 deposited to your account.  Gazetta markets your pictures and videos to every local, regional and national news organization in the country.  If it sells to be used in an online news story, you get paid.  The Gazetta app and website will be interactive and allow you to manage your pictures & videos, browse, and follow other current events in your area in real time.  Lets say you hear sirens near your house one night, just check the Gazetta app for current events in your area and find out exactly what is happening.

We need your help in developing the free app and website.  Any contribution helps and will go directly towards development of all the features listed. Please take a minute to donate a small amount and lets start making a difference this year!

 

Our goals:

-Help rebuild our local and regional news sources

-Create credible news media for distribution at affordable rates

-Create jobs across the nation

-Help the public keep up with current events in real time

-Give everyone the chance to bring pressing issues to light in a new way

-Get people paid for their newsworthy pictures and videos, instead of letting the news organizations take them for free

 

How Gazetta can create jobs in your area and more credible news sources in our country:

Nearly 130,000 jobs were lost in the news industry in the past decade.  Countless local and regional newspapers have shutdown because they couldn’t make the shift from print to online.  The news sources in our nation have severely dwindled, limiting the amount of credible information that we receive.  Gazetta can help create jobs all over America for journalists, fact checkers and entire online news businesses by providing low-cost local and regional news media and news leads for online editorial use.

 

Why we need your help:

Simple fact is we can't do this alone, and what would be the fun in that. So we figured what better way to develop the free app and website then let everyone get to be a part of it.  Just a $15 donation from 3000 people would fully fund us!

The goal amount of $45,000 will allow Gazetta to fully develop and launch our mobile app for both iPhone and Android, the custom ecommerce auction website, the Gazetta News website and a social media integration app.  All of the key features and interactivity listed in this write-up will be part of Gazetta's app and website launch.  Below is a breakdown of the costs:

Mobile app (iPhone, Android):.............$6,350

Ecommerce website:.........................$27,000

Gazetta News website:......................$3,000

Social media integration:....................$5,500

Indiegogo and fees:...........................$3,150

                               Total:................$45,000

 

How do I contribute:

It's as easy as this:

1. Click on Contribute Now, or the Perk you want to get.

2. Confirm your Perk.

4. Pay with a debit card, credit card, or your PayPal account.

5. Share the good news with everyone!  

 

How you can support our mission:

- Post our campaign link, www.indiegogo.com/Gazetta,  to your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Blog and any other social site that you have.

- Ask your friends, family, acquaintances, pets, and everyone that you meet to help out, even if it's just a dollar it matters.  

- Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/GazettaNews, follow us on Twitter @gazettanews, keep up with our progress at www.gazettanews.wordpress.com and follow us on Instagram @gazetta. 

 

 

HERES HOW IT WORKS:

Gazetta's free app

Gazetta's free app will allow you to instantly post pictures and videos directly to our ecommerce website for online news producers (i.e. online newspapers) to browse and purchase.  Simply take a picture or video of a local current event, upload it through our app and put the location, subject matter and a short description.

You can edit, delete and track all of your postings and see which of your media have sold and which ones are still current.  You can also browse and rate other postings in your area for up-to-the-second happenings in your city or town.      

 

Gazetta's custom ecommerce website  

The Gazetta website will strive to be in every newsroom in the nation, whether small or large.  And why wouldn't we be, with Gazetta allowing news producers to have an unlimited coverage area at a speed unmatched at their fingertips.  Local, regional and national news producers will be able to browse, search and monitor news leads as they happen and purchase affordable media at the click of a button.        

 

How much you get paid for a sale

You will receive 50% of the sales price for every one of your postings that is purchased.  The standard pricing for pictures on Gazetta will be $40 and videos will be $80, which means your will receive $20 for a picture and $40 for a video that is sold through Gazetta.  However, every posting has the potential to sell for hundreds of dollars through our Exclusive Rights Bidding system.  You want to earn a higher percentage of the sales price; we offer that too through our Level Up tier system.  See them both explained below.

   

Key features  --> (You're gonna like this)

Exclusive Rights Bidding (ERB)

During the first hour that your picture or video is posted news producers can bid on the right to use it exclusively.  Bids start at double the normal price; $80 for a picture and $160 for a video.  If it doesn’t sell within the first hour it reverts to the standard price of $40 for a picture and $80 for a video, and can still be purchased multiple times.  

 

Level Up

Gazetta rewards those who work hard with our Level Up system.  The criteria are based upon total sales amount and content ratings for a one-month period.  If you meet the criteria to Level Up you will receive the bonuses associated with your new level for a 6-month period.  Or you can get the one-time offered Perks listed here and Level Up now for life!!  The levels are broken into three categories:

Newbie:

The base level where all Gazetta users start.  You get 50% of the sales price of every one of your postings that sells.  

Pro: 

The second level is attainable after $120 of total sales and a content rating in good standing during a one-month period.  That’s just 1 of your pictures and 1 video selling, or one really good picture/video selling in ERB.  You will get 60% of the sales price of every one of your postings that sells. You will also be listed as a Pro on all of your postings, which will be visible on the website and make your postings stand out from the rest.

Legendary: 

The top level is attainable after $240 of total sales and a content rating in good standing during a one-month period.  That’s 2 pictures and 2 videos selling, or one really good picture/video selling in ERB.  You will get 70% of the sales price of every one of your postings that sells.  All of your postings will automatically be listed atop the page in a special section where only Legends belong. 

  

NewsWire

The NewsWire will act as a constant feed for news leads and happenings in any area or region that you specify.  Lets say that you want to see what is happening in San Diego County on a second by second basis, Gazetta's NewsWire will provide the scrolling feed that displays the description of every picture and video being posted to our site with a location in San Diego County.  We will do so in a concise, interactive and easy to read manner.  This service will be available by monthly subscription with an affordable pricing structure dependent upon the size of area you wish to monitor.    

 

Gazetta News

What else would we do with all this information but spread the news.  As Gazetta's user base grows we will be able to hire on professional journalists, fact checkers, editors, etc. and provide credible local, regional and national news online.  

Gazetta News will be different than your average online newspaper; we will have an unlimited news coverage area with in-depth local, regional and national current events as they happen.  Also you will be able to customize your Gazetta News homepage to only see the locations or subject matter you wish to read about.   

 

What is a Newsworthy picture or video:

Weather

Anything from a hurricane to a sunny day at the beach

 

Local events

The local farmers market, to charity drives, to city events

 

Local Sports

The local football team to the pros

 

Celebrities

Whether its small town celebrities or high profile ones

 

Right place at the right time

Those things that you can't believe you caught on camera

 

Pressing issues

Issues that need to be addressed can get a national audience at Gazetta 

 

 

Meet the developers

App Development

The mobile app development will be headed by Sanjiv Prabahakaran, President of Bytes Inc.  

Business:

Bytes Inc., established in 2002

Creative software development

 

Skills:

25+ years experience in project management

30+ years experience in mobile and tablet application design and development

50+ years experience in quality assurance and testing

100+ years experience in enterprise custom application architecture and database design 

Website Development

The ecommerce website development will be headed by Steve Kozyk, Founder & CEO of ITegrity Web Technologies.

Business:

ITegrity Web Technologies, established in 2005

Custom website and software design and development

 

Skills:

SEO web development services

Custom software and web application design

Online learning development

Streamline business processes for greater efficiency

Clients include: CONNECT, Geeks.com, MIT Enterprise Forum

 

When is Gazetta expected to launch:    

After we meet our goal Gazetta is expecting to launch the Beta version between April and May of this year, only 4-5 months away!  How can you get the Beta version, the only way is to get one of our awesome Perks here from $35 and up.  

 

What if we come in under our $45,000 goal:

If for some terrible reason we come in under the $45,000 goal, Gazetta has worked it out with our developers so that we can develop and launch our app and website in multiple phases.  This will give you piece of mind that your money will go strictly towards the development even if the entire goal is not reached.  Then, when more funds become available, the additional customized functions and interactivity can be added and launched.

 

 

Keep it going!

Help spread the word about Gazetta to all your friends and family so we can spread the news starting this year.  Every dollar counts!

How to further help:

-Ask to be a Gazetta Campaign Manager by emailing us at kyle@gazettanews.com and get a Campaign Managers packet to help you spread the word

 

Thank you for your contribution and helping make this happen!

Just upload your pictures and videos that you think could be newsworthy through the Gazetta app and go about your day.  An hour later you could find $20, $40 or even $100 deposited to your account.  Gazetta markets your pictures and videos to every local, regional and national news organization in the country.  If it sells to be used in an online news story, you get paid.  The Gazetta app and website will be interactive and allow you to manage your pictures & videos, browse, and follow other current events in your area in real time.  Lets say you hear sirens near your house one night, just check the Gazetta app for current events in your area and find out exactly what is happening.
We need your help in developing the free app and website.  Any contribution helps and will go directly towards development of all the features listed. Please take a minute to donate a small amount and lets start making a difference this year!

-Help rebuild our local and regional news sources
-Create credible news media for distribution at affordable rates
-Create jobs across the nation
-Help the public keep up with current events in real time
-Give everyone the chance to bring pressing issues to light in a new way
-Get people paid for their newsworthy pictures and videos, instead of letting the news organizations take them for free
 
How Gazetta can create jobs in your area and more credible news sources in our country:
Nearly 130,000 jobs were lost in the news industry in the past decade.  Countless local and regional newspapers have shutdown because they couldn’t make the shift from print to online.  The news sources in our nation have severely dwindled, limiting the amount of credible information that we receive.  Gazetta can help create jobs all over America for journalists, fact checkers and entire online news businesses by providing low-cost local and regional news media and news leads for online editorial use.

story:
The Solarie Technologie Charging Station is an off-grid portable, compact and easy-to-use SOLAR powered alternative to the traditional gas generator. Our team is real and serious about getting it into our neighborhoods in times of disaster. 

Solar Power is the 21st Century Power!

The Story

Climate change is happening.  Natural disasters are consistently reported across the United States.  They are occurring at an increasing rate causing power outages nationwide.  These disasters combined with aging infrastructures call for change in the way we obtain our electricity.

Why Solar Power?

The traditional gas generator is the leading cause of carbon monoxide deaths in the U.S.  Gas is expensive and a hassle to get especially in a disaster.

Solar power is clean, safe and free.  To get electricity from our Charging Station, all you need to do is roll it into a patch of sunshine!

Be a part of the Solar Revolution. 

It is up to us to become RESILIENT in these changing times.  With YOUR support and our team of experts, our Charging Station will reconnect communications, restart daily functions and light the darkness turning a situation from crisis to relief. Please help us make this happen before another huge wave of natural disasters strike. 

Our goal is to equip disaster relief organizations with these Charging Stations to provide electricity immediately to those left in the wake of a disaster. Your neighborhood could be next, help us prepare now.

The Solarie Charging Station

Currently we have 2 versions of our prototype:

We have done extensive research since these prototypes were built and have discovered where our improvements can be made in the next models to make them even better than before!



Our new version specs:

·  100 Watt Polycrystalline Solar Module

·  Converts to functional table

·  Internal Shelf for Charging & Storage

·  Optimal Solar Angle

·  All-in-One Rollable Design

·  Back-lit Charge Meter

·  Wind-protected ballasted design

·  Telescoping Handle

·  Silent, No Toxic Fumes

·  56 or 104 Amp Hour Battery

·  300 Watt AC Inverter

·  Removable Panel with extension cable

·  Trickle charging for inside storage

·  Lockable with chain or D-Lock

·  Input jack for easy module removal

·  4 AC Outlets (External and Internal)

·  2 DC Outlets

·  4 USB Outlets

·  40 + hours of LED lights

·  Accessories: LED lights, 7 USB power squid, rapid quick charger, solar skin to protect panel from sharp objects, trickle charger and extension cable for dismounted use of solar panel

Let’s harness the magic of solar power and together make an impactful difference!

Rewards:


Why we need your help and what we will do with your contribution:

We are in our final stage of product development. We need to buy more parts to build several demonstration samples and ship them out to the field with relief organizations (American Red Cross, Salvation Army, emergency management) for field testing. We have approval for testing with the American Red Cross at the end of September. From the feedback we will redesign and build a better prototype for their needs.  With the final prototype,  we'll get our very costly engineering validation (UL certification). Finally, legal fees will need to be covered to get us to market.  

Naming Contest!!!

People are always throwing ideas to us to name our solar Charging Station but we wanted to reserve this privilege and fun for you.  As soon as you become a contributor, we'll send you an email. We’d love to hear your ideas! For it to be a viable candidate, there can’t be any other solar products that have the same name. We’ll take the top 20 ideas and send out a survey to all contributors to get a vote for the final five. Make your mark on the solar revolution. The final 5 will all receive a surprise perk  at  the $200 contribution level. 

Our Team

Our team and advisors are people who are passionate about clean energy (75+ years of solar industry experience combined) including solar pioneer, Scott Carlson (former VP Real Goods Solar), Jim Krieg (designer of largest solar carports in the US, SunWize) and Professor Robert Morris (Professor Emeritus State University of New York). 


Risks and challenges:

We have worked around the clock and sweated in our body weight, but here are a few things we see as risks:

Manufacturing:

Designed and devoted to manufacturing in the United States, creating the Solarie Technologie Charging Station is expensive and requires the expertise of a team of people to get it right including field testing with disaster relief organizations and Underwriter’s Laboratory certification. 

Product Adjustments:

As we call up disaster victims and those involved with the emergency relief process, we will make some  adjustments to improve the final product.  These changes are to accommodate the needs of our users as they become apparent to us.  We will let you know of the changes and how it will benefit the users in the wake of a disaster.

Fulfillment:

There are circumstances beyond our control that could cause a delay.  These circumstances could include UL validation, a machine breaking down, faulty equipment or a shipment getting lost.


THANK YOU! 

SOLARIETECH.COM

FAQs:

How long does a solar panel last? The solar panel has a performance warranty for 25 years, but most quality solar panels will continue to perform for 40+ years.

How much does it weigh? The 56Ah unit weighs approx. 77 lbs., the 104Ah unit weighs approx. 100.5 lbs. This weight is easily rolled around with its wheels and telescoping handle. 

Can it be used indoors? Yes, it can. 

Can many devices can be charged at once? There are 10 outlets total. Each power squid can split 1 USB port into 7 separate USB outlets. 

Is it weather-proof? The solar panel in it's table form can protect the electronics and any devices inside the charging unit (rain and shine).

How do I purchase one? The Charging Station is intended to be sold to disaster and community organizations and will available in 2015.

What are the dimensions? It is approximately 2'H  x 2'W x 3' L (think  half the length of a coffee table). It can fit into the back row of an average car.

PERKS

Untouched

One side sanded and wood burned

             

                                                                                                                                    FAQ

What is delivery time for standard shipping (without tracking number)?       
Delivery time for standard shipping is 5-12 days for Europe, 8-12 days for USA, 6-10 days for Asia and Russia, 8-12 days for south America, 8-12 days for Africa and Australia.

What is delivery time for priority shipping (with tracking number)?                           Delivery time for priority shipping is 3-6 days for Europe, 4-7 days for USA, 4-6 days for Asia and Russia, 4-7 days for south America, 4-7 days for Africa and Australia.
If you want priority shipping please, do not forget to add $5.

When will you ship Timber USB?                                                                                                 We will ship it as soon as we can, We will update you almost every day how things are going. Our deadline to ship all Timbers is  30th January. 
Our plan is to create and ship Timber USB 5 days after you order. 

Can you ship Timber USB before Christmas, so I can give it to my friend as a present?                                                                                                                                                   Yes, we can, but please let us now that it is a Christmas present, and please add $5 for Priority shipping, because it is faster and you will also receive tracking number so you will know where the "present" is.

How can I contact you?                                                                                                   You can send us email to our email address: info@timberusb.com or add us on facebook, twitter, google+ or pinterest.

story:
Carrying two phones is not convenient! It is not fashionable or stylish; it costs a lot and is a waste of space.That's why we created PIECE!! PIECE is the future of Dual SIM technology. It is a tiny companion device that holds any GSM, EGSM, DCS, or PCS card, allowing you to add an extra number to your existing smart device via bluetooth. It is designed to fit in your wallet, front pocket, or behind your phone easily. PIECE is so small that it is only the size of a CREDIT CARD! That's why we like to call it, "The Next Small Thing"

The design of PIECE is simple and match your phone nicely.

It designed to be super slim, and easily fit in your wallet.

Long lasting battery which can provide up to 150 hours stand by time, so you only have to charge PIECE once a while.

Insert you working number in PIECE, and start making phone calls and text messages. Enjoy your day with only one phone.

 PIECE is compatible with almost all of the IOS device via Bluetooth.

 iOS and Android Compatible - With the stretch goal reached! PIECE is now smart device friendly

「PIECE」--iPod touchにも対応 

This credit card-sized Bluetooth device gives your phone a second number

 

The PIECE is an innovative and multi functional SIM adapter that is the same size as a credit card

 아이팟 터치를 전화기로 바꿔보자

 香港團隊設計！PIECE SIM 卡轉插器可將 iPad 及 iPod touch 變成智能手機

 A special iOS app lets you manage the Piece SIM, turning your iPhone in a dual SIM device.

 

 Вы можете вставить в Piece любую SIM-карту и подключить его к телефону под управлением iOS или Android по беспроводному соединению Bluetooth. 

Now you can have two number active at the same time. Simply put your other number into PIECE and using Bluetooth connect to your phone. Both numbers can now be used on your one and only phone.

Matching your phone in style! We build 2 standard colors for you to match your phone, so you can wear PIECE with style and become a conversation starter with your friends

Not just a SIM card adapter, PIECE is also a security alert for your wallet. If you and PIECE are separated by more than 10m (30feet), both your phone and PIECE will ring to prevent it from being lost or stolen

Can't find your wallet in your room or in a car? No worries, we got you covered! By using the PIECE app you can make PIECE ring. From now on finding your wallet is super simple.

Likewise, by using the function key on the edge of PIECE, you can make your phone ring so it will always be easier to find.

It even works with your iPod Touch

With PIECE, you can even turn your non-cellular smart device into your cell phone. Simply download the PIECE app, now your iPod can be used as a smartphone!

Of course! We have iPad users in mind

If you only want to carry your iPad on the go, before PIECE you would be unable to make phone calls. With PIECE we solve this problem! Download the app and your iPad can also turn into your smartphone!

When we designed PIECE, we only had one thing on our mind - creating the "next small thing" for user experience. We were challenged with designing a double Sim solution for a smart phone while keeping a VERY compact size. The process was amazing and our final product makes us proud! From technologies to research to batteries, designing PIECE has been a journey. We spent months choosing suitable materials for making a thin, lightweight product. With your help, we hope to bring PIECE to life in the very near future.

 

Dennis Wong

Co-founder and Serial entrepreneur whose products are used by over 8 million users. Previously, decades in sales and marketing.

Alex Chan

Software Engineer, MSc in Computer Science at Waterloo University. Years of experience in software design. Experienced in PCB prototyping and implementing embedded software.

Gray Leung

Maker and designer. 25 years experience in high-quality and functional home-ware and gadget. Bound by strong aesthetics and visionary views of design, he has created and brought high quality products to the market. He interprets and develops the products into modern design classics for your life and home. 

We need your help to get this product into manufacturing. We are looking for people who care about convenience without compromise. People who want a product that doesn’t limit where and how you carry it. Your support will help us cover the costs of our first production run. If you can, help us spread the word!

Special Thank You

Thank you to our amazing producers Framework Creative  help our finish all the art designs and video.

Thank you to our wonderful advisers CARBON help us finish the industry design of PIECE.

Thank you those excellent creators who gave us advise for this project, Monolith Studio Inc,Simon Morris, Jeremy Smith, The Hamill Family, Tomas Eriksson, BetterBack, SprintRay,Zivix and Kevin Bates.

Thank you to all of our friends we met in this project, Thank you to all of your inspiring ideas, we can not finish and launch PIECE without your help. 

We have worked extremely hard over the last months to deliver a product you will love and we can be proud of. As this is our second time launching a product on Kickstarter, issues should also be minimal.

The Main Challenges Ahead:

ENGINEERING

Creating PIECE requires engineering a complex system. To make sure we get this right, we have assembled an experienced team of engineers and designers. We have already built two generations of prototypes. Currently, we are producing the first batch to test with users.

MASS PRODUCTION

Taking prototypes to mass production involves sophisticated logistics and relationships with suppliers. To minimize these risks, we have been negotiating with suppliers (including backup suppliers), testing component quality, and building a team that can execute on our promises. Our plans are nearly in place, and we require the resources to ensure we achieve this.

story:
Emo-Active

(version francaise disponible via l'onglet Mises a Jours)

Emo-Active helps you control domotic devices by thoughts only.

It aims to develop an accessibility system to be used on smartphones (iPhone, Android).

Its intended goal is to provide people with physical limitations better computer control, as well as enhanced socialization capabilities.

The proposed system is based upon EEG acquisition, using commercially available components. 

The Problem

People with heavy physical disabilities face severe problems due to the lack of possibilities for socialization. As our world evolves, new technologies become increasingly part of the basic ways that social and professional living is accomplished. The evolution of those technologies makes the world more complicated in terms of accessibility. The lack of accessibility segregates disabled people from the community.

People with locked-in syndrome and people with severe motor disablement constitute a small part of the public concern for accessibility. The reduction of certain physical capabilities, such as color-blindness, deafness, blindness have been addressed by the traditional use of the technological environment, and have been well covered by accessibility solutions like Lynx, Jaws, and of course well designed HTML and CSS coding.

The current accessibility solutions available to people with severe physical disabilities share common characteristics: they are expensive, use some kind of code (such as Morse code), and have to be custom fitted in most cases. Another challenge the target group faces is the lack of socialization. When an individual has limited abilities to communicate thoughts and emotions, the absence of positive socialization may be detrimental to those suffering the disability.

The Solution

The purpose of the project is to increase the socialization of people having difficulties using their hands, or unable to use other body language to convey emotions. More specifically the project is designed to better assist those with quadriplegia, cerebral palsy, locked-in syndrome, and similar disabilities.

Such an enhanced socialization may be achieved by two means:

First, by giving system users explicit access to the technological services common to the non-disabled, especially environment control such as lighting and climatisation, television and on-demand media.

Second, by improving the communication between the user and their dearest, with real-time representation of a user’s emotions.

The Emo-Activ system is designed to use standard computer resources offering virtual independence from disabilities affecting individual users.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • We ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Words have the power to change the world, remember that you can share our request by publishing our link on your personal page and your social network.

Where does the money go

- Indigogo Fees

- $5,000 Certificates Fees

- $7,000 T-Shirt Fees

- $15,000 App Development Fees

- $15,000 Domotic Communication Devices Fees

- $50,000 Acquisition Helmet Fees

- $8,000 Promotions and Competition Prizes

PS: if we don't get to our goal, we will use the money to pay the supplies needed for the perks bought and use the remaining amount to pay our developer (+ competition prize).

Conclusion

If the simple mechanism of point and click can be implemented with ease of use for the user, almost anything can be accomplished. With the addition of a virtual computer keyboard, the accomplishments of the able-bodied may become attainable for those with disabilities with only minimal differences in performance. Dreaming further, via domotic improvements, a disabled person may become virtually enabled.

Interestingly, the specification following ISO 9241 inspired considerations of exploratory use of the system in multiplayer video games. Since two helmets may be used on a single computer, the possibility exists that two users, whether disabled or not, may together cooperatively play Pong (a two-dimensional tennis sports game). Incidentally, the scenarios definitions showed how the system could be integrated in the medical environment by collecting medical information about the user during operation hours.

story:
We're almost there! 

For all of you who have been waiting on the sidelines

Maybe you are a little skeptical....  

Check out the video below, posted by an objective third party who knows about knives. 





Dull knives take the joy out of cooking.

We've all been there:  It's time to chop the vegetables for a home cooked meal.  You reach for your knife and begin to slice.  To your dismay, the knife is dull, and your enjoyment of the moment fades with it--all because knives get dull. 

We buy knives that get dull because, until now, there hasn't been an alternative.

We have been forced to buy and use knives that are sharp when new, but which become dull in a matter of months--even when they have not been used.  Over time, knives microscopically corrode, dulling the edge, and there has been no alternative. Until now.

VMatter Cutlery is introducing the first amorphous alloy blade to the knife market. James Kang, VMatter's CEO, has been working toward bringing VMatter (amorphous alloy) to the world since he first experienced it in a lab at Caltech over twenty years ago. However, when one of his employees told him that the knife he had fashioned out of VMatter five years prior had never gotten dull, James thought about the properties of VMatter that made this possible, and the idea for VMatter cutlery was born.

The knife that started it all--The first kitchen knife made from VMatter

This is a photo of the actual VMatter knife that was used on a daily basis for more than five years, never losing its edge, corrosion free, and virtually no wear.

Our Lifetime sharpness guarantee is made possible by VMatter’s building blocks of strength, 2 ½ times stronger and nearly 3 ½ times more elastic than steel, and guaranteed to be corrosion proof.


Why VMatter knives are superior.

Why do steel knives get dull?  Steel knifes can get dull mainly in two ways, both through actual use and from corrosion.  The edge of a steel knife is microscopically thin. Contrary to the popular notion that knives become dull because the edge wears off, what actually happens is that the edge folds over onto itself in the food-cutting process. In fact, microscopic pieces of the the knife edge can even break off.  The other way steel knives get dull is through corrosion.  Again, this happens at a microscopic level, so it is usually not seen.

VMatter knives don't suffer from these limitations.  VMatter is so elastic that the knife edge never folds over in normal use.  Since VMatter is a metallic glass, it doesn't corrode, whether sitting in a drawer, knife block, or even being washed in a dishwasher.

Some people are concerned that having a sharp knife is unsafe.  Actually, the opposite is true.  Besides being a pleasure to use because it does what you intend it to do, a sharp knife is easier to control and cuts where you want it to cut.  A dull knife often requires more effort and can move or slip, possibly resulting in injury.

The spider graph below shows the performance of a VMatter knife compared to the performance of widely used, high quality, "competitive" knives along the five most important performance characteristics.


Watch as executive chef Debra Sims uses the VMatter 8" chef knife in her work and discusses its performance compared to other knives that she has used.



Here Debra answers questions about the knife and gives a great endorsement!



See the picture below of a highly magnified steel knife-edge.  The surface is extremely rough and porous, a perfect breeding ground for bacteria. Couple this with a wood cutting board or a wooden knife block and the potential for cross contamination and germ growth is multiplied tenfold.

Because VMatter knives are composed of a metallic glass, they resist the adhesion of bacteria up to four times better than steel, thereby providing the healthiest bacteria-resistant surface of all metals. Of all known materials, glass is the best surface to minimize the growth of bacteria.



Reaching our funding goal will allow us to produce a set of four knives:  An 8" chef knife, a 7" santoku knife, an 8" slicing knife, and a 4" paring knife.

All of our knives will be offered with a choice of stabilized hardwood or synthetic handles. We would like to add steak knives to our product set which will be possible if we are able to exceed our funding goal.


“We shall send to the moon 240 thousand miles away from the control station in Houston, a giant rocket more than three hundred feet tall the length of this football field made of NEW METAL ALLOYS some of which have not yet been invented, capable of standing heat and stresses several time more than have ever been experienced, fitted together with a  precision better than the finest watch.”

President John F. Kennedy, September 12, 1962

In 1962 President JFK challenged the scientific community with the audacious goal of putting a man on the moon. The discovery of the family of amorphous alloys of which VMatter is part was a direct result of that challenge. The VMatter alloy has been tested extensively and proven in commercial applications over the past two decades by several of the world’s great companies. Amorphous alloy technology is used in oil production, as well as automotive, electronics, and luxury brand manufacturing to improve the durability and performance of their products. This technology is now available in knives that will redefine performance in the kitchen.

The ability of VMatter Cutlery to maintain its ultra sharp edge is derived in part from the dense atomic structure of our alloy. When coupled with unsurpassed balance and feel, our knives take the lead in competing with both high carbon and stainless steel products on the market today.  Visit our website at www.VMatter.com for an in-depth treatment of technology.

This video demonstrates the fascinating elastic properties of metallic glass that make our knives unprecedented durability possible.


To take VMatter Cutlery to the next level and bring these revolutionary knives to market, our indiegogo campaign needs your support.  We need capital to purchase bulk raw VMatter alloy, purchase multiple molds, and invest in the equipment necessary to scale up our production capacity.  With support beyond our funding goal, we will be able to expand our product line even further.

We have already invested in a mold to manufacture the 8" Chef's Knife. To offer a complete a set of the four most commonly used kitchen knives, we need to make a mold for knives in each of the other three sizes shown in the product set.

We also need to buy raw VMatter alloy which is twenty times more expensive than steel.

By supporting our indiegogo campaign you become part of the VMatter team and help us develop a complete line of the best knives in the world. This is one of those rare moments in history when a transformational material comes along and changes the way we live.


We look forward to your participation in our indiegogo campaign, and encourage you to visit www.VMatter.com for more detailed information about our advanced technology. And of course we hope you are excited about being one of the first people in the world to receive your pure amorphous VMatter knife or knife set.

As an added incentive, the contribution amount of each perk (excluding Founders) on average represents a 25% discount to our proposed retail pricing.

By supporting our indiegogo campaign you become part of the VMatter team and help us build a complete line of the best knives in the world. This is one of those rare moments in history when a transformational material comes along and changes the way we live.

The knife that started it all--The first kitchen knife made from VMatter
This is a photo of the actual VMatter knife that was used on a daily basis for more than five years, never losing its edge, corrosion free, and 
virtually no wear.
Our Lifetime sharpness guarantee is made possible by VMatter’s building blocks of strength, 2 ½ times stronger and nearly 3 ½
 times more elastic than steel, and guaranteed to be corrosion proof.



Why VMatter knives are superior.
Why do steel knives get dull?  Steel knifes can get dull mainly in two ways, both through actual use and from corrosion.  The edge of a
steel knife is microscopically thin. Contrary to the popular notion that knives become dull because the edge wears off, what actually happens is that the edge folds over onto itself in the food-cutting process. In fact, microscopic pieces of the the knife edge can even break off.  The other way steel knives get dull is through corrosion.  Again, this happens at a microscopic level, so it is usually not seen.

VMatter knives don't suffer from these limitations.  VMatter is so elastic that the knife edge never folds over in normal use.  Since VMatter is a metallic glass, it doesn't corrode, whether sitting in a drawer, knife block, or even being washed in a dishwasher.

Some people are concerned that having a sharp knife is unsafe.  Actually, the opposite is true.  Besides being a pleasure to
use because it does what you intend it to do, a sharp knife is easier to control and cuts where you want it to cut.  A dull knife often requires more effort and can move or slip, possibly resulting in injury.

The spider graph below shows the performance of a VMatter knife 
compared to the performance of widely used, high quality, "competitive" 
knives along the five most important performance characteristics.

Watch as executive chef Debra Sims uses the VMatter 8" chef knife in her work and discusses its performance compared to other knives that she has used.

Here Debra answers questions about the knife and gives a great endorsement!See the picture below of a highly magnified steel knife-edge.  The surface is extremely rough and porous, a perfect breeding ground for bacteria. Couple this with a wood cutting board or a wooden knife block and the potential for cross contamination and germ growth is multiplied tenfold.
Because VMatter knives are composed of a metallic glass, they resist the adhesion of bacteria up to four times better than steel, thereby providing the healthiest bacteria-resistant surface of all metals. Of all known materials, glass is the best surface to minimize the growth of bacteria.



Reaching our funding goal will allow us to produce a set of four knives:  An 8" chef knife, a 7" santoku knife, an 8" slicing knife, and a 4" paring knife.



All of our knives will be offered with a choice of stabilized hardwood or synthetic handles. We would like to add steak knives to our product set which will be possible if we are able to exceed our funding goal.



“We shall send to the moon 240 thousand miles away from the control station in Houston, a giant rocket more than three hundred feet tall the length of this football field made of NEW METAL ALLOYS some of which have not yet been invented, capable of standing heat and stresses several time more than have ever been experienced, fitted together with a  precision better than the finest watch.”

President John F. Kennedy, September 12, 1962
In 1962 President JFK challenged the scientific community with the audacious goal of putting a man on the moon. The discovery of the family of amorphous alloys of which VMatter is part was a direct result of that challenge. The VMatter alloy has been tested extensively and proven in commercial applications over the past two decades by several of the world’s great companies. Amorphous alloy technology is used in oil production, as well as automotive, electronics, and luxury brand manufacturing to improve the durability and performance of their products. This technology is now available in knives that will redefine performance in the kitchen.
The ability of VMatter Cutlery to maintain its ultra sharp edge is derived in part from the dense atomic structure of our alloy. When coupled with unsurpassed balance and feel, our knives take the lead in competing with both high carbon and stainless steel products on the market today.  Visit our website at www.VMatter.com for an in-depth treatment of technology.

This video demonstrates the fascinating elastic properties of metallic glass that make our knives unprecedented durability possible.





To take VMatter Cutlery to the next level and bring these revolutionary knives to market, our indiegogo campaign needs your support.  We need capital to purchase bulk raw VMatter alloy, purchase multiple molds, and invest in the equipment necessary to scale up our production capacity.  With support beyond our funding goal, we will be able to expand our product line even further.
We have already invested in a mold to manufacture the 8" Chef's Knife. To offer a complete a set of the four most commonly used kitchen knives, we need to make a mold for knives in each of the other three sizes shown in the product set.
We also need to buy raw VMatter alloy which is twenty times more expensive than steel.
By supporting our indiegogo campaign you become part of the VMatter team and help us develop a complete line of the best knives in the world. This is one of those rare moments in history when a transformational material comes along and changes the way we live.




We look forward to your participation in our indiegogo campaign, and encourage you to visit www.VMatter.com for more detailed information about our advanced technology. And of 
course we hope you are excited about being one of the first people in 
the world to receive your pure amorphous VMatter knife or knife set.
As an added incentive, the contribution amount of each perk (excluding Founders) on average represents a 25% discount to our proposed retail pricing.
By supporting our indiegogo campaign you become part of the VMatter team and help us build a complete line of the best knives in the world. This is one of those rare moments in history when a transformational material comes along and changes the way we live.

story:
Patent Pending | Challenge Rx is NOT affiliated with CrossFit, Inc.

Challenge Rx is: 

  • A FREE workout programming and tracking software with advanced workout metrics to track athlete power output.
  • To interpret these metrics into actionable information we have enlisted the help of Mobility WOD coach Andrew Killion.
  • There is also a competitive interface in Challenge Rx where CrossFit Level 1 Trainers with Crossfit Judges course credentials earn $5 for every workout video they judge.
  • Challenge Rx will also host competitions which are based around a charitable cause where 100% of the purse will be passed through to a specific organization.

For our competitive interface, we level the playing field by using a power output formula for athlete skill level assessment which will only allow athletes with similar power output to compete against each other!  The days of being shorter, taller, or skinnier being EXCUSES for sucking at burpees etc… are gone.  Our proprietary physics formula takes height, weight, leg length, arm length into account in the calculation.

                                         Feel free to email questions to: 

                                            Info@ChallengeRx.com




                                 

Would you Prefer to compete against Athletes on the same skill level as you?

Contribute at an Athlete level!

Competition is great but sometimes the playing field isn't as level as we'd like it to be. Through our advanced yet universal performance calculation the benefit of competition can best be seen when each athlete feels they have a chance to win! Challenge RX has special built in formulas that are used to categorize each athlete so you will compete against athletes with similar abilities and better yet, we cap the number of participants in each workout so the maximum number of people you will be competing against is 100 athletes ranked with the same performance class (similar ability) as you. When it comes time to compete, each athlete will know that if they really push themselves they have the ability to win and EARN CASH for competing!

How are athletes grouped to compete against each other?

Physics is a part of every day life. We decided to take simple physics and apply it to athletes completing workouts to determine the amount of power an athlete generates during a workout.  The athletes with similar power outputs are then grouped together so they can perform in challenges against each other!  

Power is calculated by taking the amount of work completed over a period of time. 

Simple!



Or the same Sports Bra Danielle Sidell wore at the 2014 Great Lakes Invitational!



Level 1 Trainers with CF Judges Course:


Challenge Rx will PAY YOU $5 for EVERY video you judge! 

We will only be offering a limited number of Priority positions. Judges that hold a Priority  judging position will always be the first to be delivered videos to be judged. As soon as you finish judging one video you will be the first to get new videos delivered to your judging queue. 

The key to successfully handle all video submissions in a timely manner is to let the masses of the CrossFit community judge them. However, we understand that not everyone has the ability to properly judge the technical movements that occur in these workouts. Because of this, we have limited judging positions to ONLY athletes that are a CrossFit Level 1 trainer and have ALSO passed the judging course offered on CrossFit.com. 

  • If you know that you will have your CrossFit Level 1 and Judging Certificates by the time our app is launched, SECURE YOUR JUDGING PRIORITY POSITION BY PURCHASING A PRIORITY SPOT TODAY! Please note, before we can activate your judging position we will validate your claimed credentials at application launch (~April 2014).



The time spent judging videos on Challenge Rx will be recorded and maintained in the event that the information will ever be needed by the judge.


CrossFit Boxes get Free WOD Management and Performance Tracking

Contribute at a Box level!

We want to make it easier for boxes to manage WODs and track their athletes performance while making it affordable to do so. What is more affordable than FREE? Boxes can use our system simply by registering on our site as a box and then encourage each of your athletes to register also. You and your athletes will enjoy better WOD management, athlete performance tracking, and built in WOD programming! 

In return, each month we ask that you encourage your athletes to participate in at least one Box Challenge! A minimal fee provides your athletes the opportunity to compete against boxes all over the country and see how you rank against each box that accepts the Challenge! Better yet, if you are one of the top ranked boxes your box will win CASH for your athlete's performance.  

Encouraging your athletes to compete in Box Challenges will allow you to see how your Box compares to other boxes around the country. Your athletes will be working together to help earn money for their box that could be used to buy equipment to allow better training for the athlete. 

And...You can't beat FREE. Challenge Rx will be able to be adopted by ANY box that wants to use it, free of charge. Starting and Running a box can be difficult and very stressful. Box owners don't need another expense to worry about. 

It's time to move from this:


To this (For FREE!):


We're partnering with MWOD coach Andrew Killion!


Andrew currently programs and coaches both teams and individuals across the country with both CrossFit Games aspirations and regular health and fitness aims. Since making MWOD the foundation of his coaching, no athlete he coaches has failed to improve their standings in CrossFit Games qualification process. Andrew will be providing Challenge RX with video coaching of each movement in our daily provided WODs and will detail key points about each movement that will help athletes to perform the movements in a more efficient and effective manner. We are excited to have Andrew as part of our team and are confident that his coaching excellence will benefit the Challenge RX athletes.


 Enjoy free, top of the line, programming that you can use, or you can create your own programming. Our application can be used directly on a laptop, desktop, or large screen TV mounted or positioned in your Box. Display WODs in style and allow your athletes to see how they are progressing day after day, WOD after WOD. 



Challenge Rx takes competition to a new level with the introduction of skill based competition limiting the size of competition groups, paid certified judging positions, WOD management and athlete performance tracking allowing boxes to have a great way to manage WODs and track their athlete's performance. Now everyone can feel like they have a chance to win. For some, Challenge Rx can be used as a method to replace or supplement income. The potential for earnings with the Judging role of the application allows athletes the ability to make an income that could be significant enough to completely replace their current income. 

  • Potential hourly incomes of up to $60/hour can be equivalent to almost $125,000 per year just for judging videos
  • Athletes have a real ability to win every workout they compete in
  • Boxes have the ability to take better care of their athletes and make money for their box
  • Charities will benefit from our high charitable integration



Get rewards for spreading the word.

Indiegogo has some awesome tools that let us (and also you we think)  know how much your referrals have contributed to our campaign (Look in your Indiegogo account menu, under My Contribution -> My Impact)

These are registered every time you share our campaign using the share buttons on the campaign page underneath the video, while being logged in, and people use those links to come here and contribute. By sharing this way, everyone with an Indiegogo account gets perk credit for Challenge Rx worth 5% of your referrals' total contribution.

For instance: If your referrals have contributed 100 USD total you get 5 USD perk credit to use for Challenge Rx challenges.

If your referrals contribute to our campaign 1000 USD total, you get  50 USD perk credit for Challenge Rx, and so on.

Remember, it's the community that keeps us moving forward!


Thank You!


Check out some other images of Challenge Rx in action:

story:
I am a paraguayan, +10 year passionate programmer. About 1 year ago I left my job to seek to work on things I can be more passionate about and I am doing great since then, the challenge is to find work I can truly enjoy.

I started this fundraise because in doing this library I will be working on something I am truly passionate about and I know  I can provide a high quality project to the open source community by working fulltime in the open in a library to control GSM modems.

I am a Java expert and I am very confident in .NET C# and so I want to build a library in both languages with a deadly simple API. Expect no buggy unstable software, no surprise-API, no nonsense docs.

If you help me to reach my goal you will be incredibly awesome! and you will prove to yourself and to the open source community that a great open source project doesn't need to start free.

You also will get this perks:

  • Have an open source library to control GSM Modems to send/receive SMS and dial USSD codes. The source code will be hosted on GitHub. It will have the MIT licence.
  • A GSM Desktop Software that you can use as a marketing tool to send bulk text messages to a defined list of contacts. The messages can be static or personalized for each contact. The software will allow you to backup the contacts and text messages of your simcard.
  • A GSM Modem Server that will expose through RESTful interface the capabilities of the modem to easy send/receive SMS from virtually any language.

The desktop software and gsm modem server will not be open sourced projects but I will grant you a lifetime licence to use them and personal wholehearted support, I can even skype you if you want :)

The funds will ensure I can work fulltime for about 8 months on this project. I will eat a lot of pizza and drink good coffee. I can confidently say that within 3 months you will have a working and stable version of the library in one language. Then about 1 month more I will use to port the library to the other language. Next I will work on the server and desktop softwares and keep polishing the library. 

In the end you will have a fully unit tested library easily extendable to accommodate the small singularities of non fully standard GSM modems. You will also have good documentation of all features and examples of how to use each and every feature of the library.

If I don't reach my funds goal, I will still work on the library but depending on my budget it might take longer to complete. You can find more background on why I am doing this in my blog. You can also read my boring resume.

Please don't hesitate contacting me if want any more details at hofmanndavid@gmail.com.

Here is a a little taste of the API I want to have ASAP:

story:
Short Summary

Our goal is to support what we call the missing 3.4 billion people who will start using smartphones in the next 5 years and will not have access to PCs. These people will be coming from the developing world.   We believe western developers have missed this opportunity - probably because it's hard to make money in the developing world at the moment.  But its the huge number of an extra 3.4B which is motivating us - you don't have to make much from 1 user if you have billions of users - this is our dream.

We have some history in this area.  We developed a product call EyeMags which has been live since 2007 - this is the heart of the app building technology used by Appies - our apps run on all phones even cheap $20 phones with small screens.  This service had a significant take up in India and Indonesia but relied on the app creator having a PC.  It was the realisation that these users needed to be able to create Apps from the phone that motivated us to create Appies.  We also have a history in app development.  We created the first Flash based smartphone apps in 2005 which won awards for its innovative UI and at the time was adopted by the BBC as their news and weather app - it even did push notifications before Apple "invented" them 3 years later.  We've continued with our interest in creating beautiful gesture driven UIs and Appies uses these features.  Appies runs on iOS and Android only, but increasingly the domination of Android as the smartphone of choice in the developing world will (hopefully) bring us the 3.4B users we seek.  Also the viral distribution feature that the apps created and shared run on all phones will mean we get adopted as quickly as technically possible. 


What We Need & What You Get

The first version of Appies is complete as alpha/beta test download from both Google Play and iTunes Appstore.   For iTunes you need to have iOS8 and for now we'd recommend Android 4.2 or above only.

So what do we want from you and what do you get out of it:

  • We want you to tell us if we've missed something from the app and if indeed the app works on all versions of phone and in all circumstances.
  • It sounds big headed I know, but we really believe we are creating something big here and you can be part of that effort from the beginning.  Your name will appear in the founding users section of our Facebook page and if indeed we do make it big you will be able to say you were part of it and helped create it - if you contribute to it it will become your product which you can be proud of.
  • We're not trying to get huge amounts of money; we are trying to get huge numbers of users.  You will be part of the initial founding users who will be ambassadors for the app creating the seeds for the viral worldwide campaign. We will use the money to help in the marketing for the app worldwide.

The Impact

In the developing world today content creation is only for the rich few who have PCs.  We want Appies to take its part in allowing billions of ordinary people create content for the Internet.  In these countries content consumption will be 99% on phones and content creation will increasingly be from the phone itself - we want Appies to be at the center of this fundamental change.  For this reason the App will be free and users will get an allocation of apps free per month (initially this will be 10 but this will reduce this with time) so as many people as possible get free usage.  We will then charge small amounts for additional apps in order to fund the service.

Risks & Challenges

There are risks and challenges to this work.  Google and Apple are the gatekeepers to the App stores.  They could ban us if we contravene their rules.  We don't believe we do and indeed the beta App has passed Apple's App review in order to get published as a beta app for TestFlight.  This does not guarantee the app as it is will get published though and this remains a risk.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute to this at the moment tell you friends about us and see if we can get the viral campaign going.  Remember the Indiegogo share tools.

 There are risks and challenges to this work.  Google and Apple are the gatekeepers to the App stores.  They could ban us if we contravene their rules.  We don't believe we do and indeed the beta App has passed Apple's App review in order to get published as a beta app for TestFlight.  This does not guarantee the app as it is will get published though and this remains a risk.
Other Ways You Can Help
 Even if you cannot contribute to this at the moment tell you friends about us and see if we can get the viral campaign going.  Remember the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
A revolutionary power bank with built-in Bluetooth speaker, wireless Charger and phone mount, allowing you to stream your music anytime, in anywhere. 

Power Bank | Bluetooth Speaker | Wireless Charger | Phone Mount

The  Magic Box adopt Samsung battery core 6000mAh capacity,  the battery life can be recycled 600 times,  and still can reach more than 85%, have a long life.

 

With the intelligent chip management,  the  Magic Box has over-current, over-voltage, over-temperature, over-power, under-voltage, short-circuit, over-charge and other protections. 

 

Ditch the cord. Stay Charged at any time, anywhere.

The Magic Box enables you to ditch power cords and cables, whether you’re at home or on the go. While other chargers must be plugged into a power source, the Magic Box is the first rechargeable, fully-mobile wireless charger.

Wireless charger with phone holder

 

Using a unique digital signal processor, and customized ultra slim dynamic speaker, we eliminated every bit of wasted space and shrink the speaker down to a compact dimension without giving up high performance audio fidelity.

You can easily send high-end audio from your phone, tablet, or computer to the speaker with built-in Bluetooth 5.0, faster transfer times and shorter response times. Have a high quality surround sound.

 

We made a big effort to support both the latest and greatest platforms, such as Apple Airplay and Google Cast, to maximize your connectivity options. Whatever you listen to with your Spotify or Pandora account, you can easy have it on Magic speaker.

 

The frequency response of Magic Box speaker is “flat”, which means it reproduces sound accurately and allows you to hear the music as it was recorded. 

 

 Magic Box is designed to go wherever you go. And it's as durable as it is portable, with an  acrylic  body that delivers a quality and luxurious feel.   

 

Turning on the wireless charging panel can be used as a phone holder. By adjusting the angle of the panel, it can be used for almost all types of mobile phones, which is convenient for all daily life. 

Charge your phone, watch videos, listen to music  anytime, anywhere.

 

Save your time and let you stop waiting. 

 

Battery model: 18650  

Capacity: 6500mAh 

Bluetooth: V5.0+EDR  

Input: 5V/2.4A  

 Range: ≤10M  

 Wireless Charging Output: 0.5A-1.0A 

 Frequency: 20HZ-20KHZ 

Power Bank output: 2.1A  

 Bluetooth protocol: HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP
