story:
We Need Your Help to Change the World

Our team is lead by serial entrepreneurs who have started and built successful software and internet businesses over the years. In our latest venture, we have worked extremely hard over the last 2 years and personally invested over $100,000 of our own money and lots of blood, sweat and tears (well, maybe not the blood) to develop a radical, revolutionary social media app called PositiveTALK for Facebook and Twitter that we believe can CHANGE THE WORLD - now we need your support to launch PositiveTALK for Facebook and Twitter and help dramatically improve the lives of millions of people around the world!

 

Please Support Our Mission

The mission of PositiveTALK is to change the world in a positive way by operating the world’s first “social sentiment network”, connecting millions of people to positive friends, companies and brands on Facebook, Twitter and other leading social  networks. To achieve our mission, PositiveTALK develops and markets unique “big data” social sentiment apps for web and mobile devices that connect positive people together on leading social networks to help transform their lives.

 

The Massive Problem We Are Solving

Negativity is a massive and growing problem today that affects BILLIONS of people, companies and brands worldwide. Studies indicate that the average person has over 60,000+ thoughts per day and the majority of these thoughts are NEGATIVE and REPETITIVE (80+% repetitive). In addition, the strong “negative bias” by the media for many years, combined with the explosive growth of the Internet, mobile devices and social networks has led to more that a 10x increase in the number of negative messages we and our family and friends are exposed to on a daily basis.

This rapid increase in negative thoughts, comments and online messages are having a dramatic negative effect on people’s lives, leading to increasing levels of social unrest, negative feelings, negative emotions, unhappiness, poor health, lack of wealth, and unfulfilling personal and business relationships.

PositiveTALK was developed to specifically address this massive and growing global problem. PositiveTALK is supported by the latest scientific research that indicates that increasing the level of “positive sentiment” can have a significant POSITIVE IMPACT on a person’s health, wealth, relationships and happiness, and improve a person’s self esteem, relationships and influence with friends, family, co-workers and customers.

 

PositiveTALK Headlines Page

PositiveTALK Headlines - check out the positive or negative sentiment of your Facebook and Twitter posts and tweets, engage your friends and COMMENT, LIKE, SHARE, FAV, REPLY and RETWEET your favorite posts

 

Benefits of Using PositiveTALK Daily

  • Increase your positive thoughts, feelings and emotions
  • Improve your brain’s learning, memory and creativity ability
  • Improve your health, happiness and positive energy
  • Increase your income and wealth
  • Improve your sex life
  • Increase your online influence and social network
  • Improve your personal & business relationships
  • Improve your "lifestyle" and "quality of life"
  • Improve your "employability"
  • Help other people improve their lives

 

PositiveTALK Profile Page

Review your PositiveTALK Profile Page, including your daily PT Score, Positivity Ratio, PositivePOINTS and see daily changes in your positivity graph over the last 30 days

 

PositiveTALK Friends Ranking

See the PT Scores and Rankings change daily for all your friends on Facebook and people you follow on Twitter

 

How Far Along is the Project Right Now?

Over the last 2 years, our team of software engineers have been developing the backend software integrated with both Facebook and Twitter and developing the front-end web app as well. We began beta testing the PositiveTALK web app in October 2012 and our beta users really love this revolutionary app, and we are ready to launch the app in production in the next 30 days to a potential audience of over 1 billion active users on Facebook and Twitter.

This is where your help comes in...your support will allow us to move PositiveTALK into production, including hosting the backend PositiveTALK servers on Amazon's AWS cloud server environment, which will allow us to run the app in a high performance, scaleable, redundant cloud server environment that can scale to support millions of users.

 

PositiveTALK Top Friends Graph

Check out your Top 50 Friends graph on Facebook and Twitter - you become who you associate with, so CHOOSE to engage with Positive People!

 

PositiveTALK Friends Profile and Headlines

Click on the names of friends on Facebook or people you follow on Twitter to see their latest PT Score, headlines and other information and COMMENT, LIKE SHARE, FAVORITE, REPLY or RETWEET their posts

 

PositiveTALK PictureQUOTES

Access inspirational PositiveTALK PictureQUOTES as well as over 1 million premium images from Getty Images to post on Facebook and Twitter

 

PositiveTALK Friends Compare Graph

Compare your PT Score to any of your friends on Facebook and people you follow on Twitter...and share your PT Score with your friends!

 

PositiveTALK Famous Quotes

Discover and post great positive and inspirational quotes (and pictures) on Facebook and Twitter, and search the PositiveTALK database of over 200,000 positive quotes from over 23,000 famous authors

 

PositiveTALK Mobile App Profile

Soon after launching PositiveTALK for the web, we will also launch our PositiveTALK mobile app for iPhone and iPad as well.

 

PositiveTALK Mobile PictureQUOTES

Enjoy PositiveTALK features and content soon on iPhone and iPad as well, including PictureQUOTES, access to over 1 million premium images from Getty Images and search over 250,000 quotes from over 23,000 famous authors to post on Facebook and Twitter

 

How Will My Contribution Be Spent?

We will put your contribution toward the final development, production and marketing costs needed to launch PositiveTALK, as well as the initial setup and hosting costs on Amazon AWS.

 

I'm In! I'm 100% Supportive of This Campaign But Can't Make A Financial Contribution. How Can I Help?

Sharing our campaign with your friends, family and colleagues on social media like Facebook and Twitter is a great way to help our cause, is much appreciated and is an important contribution in helping us reach our goal!

The more people we can reach with our campaign pitch, the better our chances of making this a reality and helping make the world a more positive place for millions of people and their families!

Let us make it easy for you! Want to share our campaign but not sure what to say in the post? Copy and paste one of these posts with our campaign link to your social media connections (Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+...) to let people know about your support for our project and to help build our community. Or you can tell them the story of what PositiveTALK means to you and why you'd like to see this project take off.

For Facebook, Google+

I am supporting PositiveTALK because I want my friends and I to become more positive and make the world a more positive place.  If you do too, check out this link and join us! http://bit.ly/TuBW15

For Twitter:

I am supporting PositiveTALK because I want to make the world a more positive place. Check out this link and join us! http://bit.ly/TuBW15

story:
Overview and Introduction

This laser is more than just a "scuba-laser" it is solid, ruggedized and ready for extreme environments.  It is designed to handle extreme dust, heavy vibration and shock and even can survive at vacuum pressure (i.e. Mars, Low Earth Orbit).  We have a passion for lasers and are in the early stages of creating a business dedicated to low cost rugged lasers for consumers and industry.

This effort is preliminary production run to build quantity of 100 laser modules.  This is the build to determine market viability of the product and prove out the product design before committing to a quantity of 1000 initial production lot build.  We will be making 50 available to funders and using another 40 to market to dive shops in the Dallas area and around the USA for retail sale.  We will be doing more testing of the last 10 to find any enhancements or improvements we can implement for the 1000 build in 2013.

 

Team

Our engineering team is highlighted by our lead mechanical engineer, Eric, and our lead physicist, John.  Eric spent 15 years in the military/aerospace field designing flight ready lasers, infrared cameras and underwater devices.  Our lead laser physicist has over 30 years of experience in design of military lasers and other products, has 8 patents and holds a PhD in atmospheric physics.

Technical Details

The GL-012 Scuba-Laser is a 5mW 532nm green laser.  Our product is made in U.S.A., uses a standard CR123A battery similar to many of today's digital cameras and commercial night vision systems. 

Features:

  • Barrel is .93" diameter
  • Front End .99" diameter
  • Length 4.5"
  • 5mW output power, Class IIIa
  • Green, 532nm wavelength
  • Aluminum housing w/ anodized finish
  • Shock Resistant
  • Operating Temp 10 C to 55 C
  • Storage Temp -10 C to 65 C
  • Passed 8 consecutive 6' drop shock tests
  • Passed Vibration Testing
  • Design to be non-toxic to the environment
  • Target Depth, 300 meters

The laser is knob activated instead of the normal push-button found on lasers.  The knob at the back end is designed to be able to be grasped when using scuba gloves, or other gloves.  The knob also provides operation at depth without activation due to pressure.

Laser Warning

This is a Class IIIa laser, (< 5mW).  It is still dangerous to point directly in someones eye(s).  Lasers in this class are dangerous in combination with optical instruments.  Direct contact with the eye for over two minutes may cause serious damage to the retina.  The device is required to come with a permanent warning label IAW FDA regulations.

 

Fabrication and Prototypes

We have made five prototypes machined on our own lathe.  Two of the prototypes are currently in the hands of divers for testing.  

Our prototypes were built in Dallas Texas.  The production machined parts will be built in a USA owned and operating machine shop. We will build and assemble the first 100 units in Dallas TX.  The full production runs will all be built in the USA.  We are dedicated to keeping manufacturing and assembly of our products in the USA. We are planning to build 1000 units in early 2013.


 

 

Prototypes and Environmental Tests

We have passed the following tests:

  • 3 meter Depth for 1 week
  • 5 minutes at 15 meters
  • 8 consecutive 6 foot drops onto concrete
  • Vibration Testing
  • -10 to + 65 C Storage Temp
  • 10 C to + 55 C Operational Temperature

 

How Funds will be used & What You Get

The funds raised will go towards paying for the machined aluminum parts, the optics and all other hardware and laser components.  The funding would also cover costs for assembly fixtures and test equipment for depth testing and laser output energy testing for FDA approval.  

Additionally, if enough money is raised, we will need to print instruction manuals, buy shipping material and print product datasheets to go with the product. 

If we go beyond our goal, we will be donating a portion to some of our selected charities.  Our charities have been reviewed to ensure they are respectable and have high ratings with the Better Business Bureau and other charity review websites.

PERKS

Some of the funding is used for perks.  We have picked some perks related to optics which we think are kind of cool.  We are also offering a few other perks and the laser itself at a low introductory cost.  The MSRP will be $137, but we are offering it here for the intro price of $89.

For our lower level funding we will have a portion of your funds go to one of our selected charities to help protect the oceans, rivers and their inhabitants.


LED Keychain Flashlight $20 (500 available)

w/ LED, keyring and scuba laser logo

 

 

Scuba Laser T-shirt  $35 (1000 available)

Medium, Large, XL, specify with your donation

White short sleeve with this logo

 

Ruggedized LED keychain flashlight, $40  (200 available)

  • Anodized Aluminum
  • Submersible to 2 feet
  • 12 Lumen LED
  • Runs on 1xAAA (Not Included)
  • Dimensions: Diameter: .57" (14.5mm) X Length: 2.87" (73mm)

 

Scuba-Laser -- $89  you get Qty of 1 of the laser  (50 available)

For $89, you get the Laser - GL-012, Green Laser (USA Only due to Govt restrictions)   

Gold Club -- $500  (100 available)

You get all perks and more.  This is for motivated backers that are international where we cannot ship the laser.

Platinum Club -- $750  (5 available)

You get the scuba-laser! Plus all other perks and more.

The Impact

Your contribution will help us launch our first rugged submersible laser product.  But this will only be  the first!  Your funding will set us on a path of creating more laser products as well as get us started on building or business to grow into other applications.  We are currently seeking a patent on a non-invasive flow monitor that can be used for a variety of applications including medical, manufacturing, water treatment, MEMS and a variety of other industries.

Throughout our careers our team has succesfully put a wide variety of ruggedized electronics and lasers into service and the 5 prototypes we have already built make us confident that this laser will be an excellent product and a success.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, but want to help us by spreading the word, please share our campaign with people you think might be interested.  You can also link to our page on your social networks pages or websites.  Ask people you know to forward our info to people they know that like Scuba Diving or people that just like lasers.  

 

Our Scuba Laser page:  http;//www.scuba-laser.com

Our Company website:  http://www.spqrtech.com

Our Twitter page: http://www.twitter.com/scubalaser

Our Facebook page: SPQR Tech on Facebook

Eric's personal Twitter account on Optomechanical Design:

http://www.twitter.com/optomechanic

 

If you have questions or just want to talk about lasers email us:

info@scuba-laser.com


GL-012,  Scuba-Laser, Ruggedized Submersible Laser Manufactured in U.S.A.

  • CR123A battery.
  • 5mW 
  • 532nm, Green
  • Target Depth 300m .  
  • Overall Size:  1" Dia x 4"
  • Aluminum Alloy w/ Anodize Finish

 


I like the laser but I don't scuba-dive!?!

So, Scuba-Lasers aren't just for scuba diving anymore.  You can use it for anything you need a ruggedized lase.  Any application that requires a laser which will not leak when dropped in a puddle, exposed to rain, dunked in a tank or whatever other adventure in life will expose it to water, liquids, vibration or shock.  This laser can take quite a beating, so if you are need a laser for an application where it will potentially experience a rough ride, be exposed to shock or occasionally dropped whether accidentally or on purpose then this laser may fit your needs.


Here are some other ideas:

  • Spelunking
  • Snorkeling
  • Tour Guide for Snorkeling or Scuba
  • Underwater Signaling for a team of divers
  • Low level light flashlight
  • Laser Designator
  • Astronomy
  • Industrial Locations
  • Underwater Recreation
  • Signaling or pointing

 

 

 

Image from our CAD model

Charities related to helping the oceans, rivers and lakes and their inhabitants

Amazon Conservation Association  http://amazonconservation.org

Amazon Conservation Team  www.amazonteam.org

Alliance for the Great Lakes  www.greatlakes.org

 
Oceana North America    oceana.org
　
Woods Hole Oceanagraphic Institue  www.whoi.edu
 
Seacology  www.seacology.org
 
Montery Bay Aquarium  www.montereybayaquarium.org
　

Ocean Conservancy http://www.oceanconservancy.org 

 

Charities reviewed using

BBB, Charity Navigator and Guidestar

LED Keychain Flashlight $20 (500 available)
w/ LED, keyring and scuba laser logo
 

 
Scuba Laser T-shirt  $35 (1000 available)
Medium, Large, XL, specify with your donation
White short sleeve with this logo

 
Ruggedized LED keychain flashlight, $40  (200 available)

Anodized Aluminum
Submersible to 2 feet
12 Lumen LED
Runs on 1xAAA (Not Included)
Dimensions: Diameter: .57" (14.5mm) X Length: 2.87" (73mm)


 
Scuba-Laser -- $89  you get Qty of 1 of the laser  (50 available)
For $89, you get the Laser - GL-012, Green Laser (USA Only due to Govt restrictions)   
Gold Club -- $500  (100 available)
You get all perks and more.  This is for motivated backers that are international where we cannot ship the laser.
Platinum Club -- $750  (5 available)
 You get the scuba-laser! Plus all other perks and more.
The Impact


Your contribution will help us launch our first rugged submersible laser product.  But this will only be  the first!  Your funding will set us on a path of creating more laser products as well as get us started on building or business to grow into other applications.  We are currently seeking a patent on a non-invasive flow monitor that can be used for a variety of applications including medical, manufacturing, water treatment, MEMS and a variety of other industries.
Throughout our careers our team has succesfully put a wide variety of ruggedized electronics and lasers into service and the 5 prototypes we have already built make us confident that this laser will be an excellent product and a success.


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't donate, but want to help us by spreading the word, please share our campaign with people you think might be interested.  You can also link to our page on your social networks pages or websites.  Ask people you know to forward our info to people they know that like Scuba Diving or people that just like lasers.  
 
Our Scuba Laser page:  http;//www.scuba-laser.com
Our Company website:  http://www.spqrtech.com
Our Twitter page: http://www.twitter.com/scubalaser
Our Facebook page: SPQR Tech on Facebook
Eric's personal Twitter account on Optomechanical Design:
http://www.twitter.com/optomechanic
 
If you have questions or just want to talk about lasers email us:
info@scuba-laser.com
GL-012,  Scuba-Laser, Ruggedized Submersible Laser Manufactured in U.S.A.

CR123A battery.
5mW 
532nm, Green
Target Depth 300m .  
Overall Size:  1" Dia x 4"
Aluminum Alloy w/ Anodize Finish

 

I like the laser but I don't scuba-dive!?!
So, Scuba-Lasers aren't just for scuba diving anymore.  You can use it for anything you need a ruggedized lase.  Any application that requires a laser which will not leak when dropped in a puddle, exposed to rain, dunked in a tank or whatever other adventure in life will expose it to water, liquids, vibration or shock.  This laser can take quite a beating, so if you are need a laser for an application where it will potentially experience a rough ride, be exposed to shock or occasionally dropped whether accidentally or on purpose then this laser may fit your needs.
Here are some other ideas:

Spelunking
Snorkeling
Tour Guide for Snorkeling or Scuba
Underwater Signaling for a team of divers
Low level light flashlight
Laser Designator
Astronomy
Industrial Locations
Underwater Recreation
Signaling or pointing

story:
For any engquiry, Come and visit our website:
www.atomtime-watches.com

Thank You All.

So unfortunatly we dont think we will reach our goal... That being said, we will keep on with the production and ship all the watches to our awsome founders, who have been really supportive!.
Thank you all for being part of it!

Who Are We?

Our brand AtomTime Swiss Watches concept started in Switzerland in 2011, the splendid debut of our i-Atomic watches in 2013 marked the birth of the King of Accuracy. Our high-end technology makes it possible for everyone in every corner of the world to have time accurate to within milliseconds.

Press Kit + HD Pictures

Recent article publication

  

  

 

About Our Products - the i-Atomic watch

Our i-Atomic watch incorporates two advanced and self-developed technologies: an intelligent microchip which can adjust the watch movement according to the environment change; and a photo sensor system which can recognize the flashing frequency of the screen and the exact moment to synchronize the watch. 

 

Combine & Create your style!

Inspired by Fans.

Choose from the 4 Element watch selection a Silicon bad, plated bezel and Dial. Make it yours! The freestyle watches are limited to 50, Hurry if you want one. (Contact us directly via email support@atomtime-watch.com or Facebook and we will post a picture of your style watch!)

Element and day/night iAtomic Watches

Element watches:

The development of our element watches is inspired by four elements in the universe, conveying the meaning that we are all connected together by wearing our watches just like these elements coexist and maintain in harmony.

Air, Earth, Water and Fire Elements

Day and Night watches:

The “Day and Night” concept literally reflects itself on the color. White stands for the Day watch, and black for the Night one. Not only do the Day and Night uni-sex watches convey the meaning of eliminating gender discrimination, but also they symbolize the treasured feelings we harbor day and night towards our loved ones.

It has left our mind in open imagination about the things we might genuinely care about day and night. It might lead us to the sacred vow of loving our wife or husband day and night. It would probably remind us of the sweet memories we have with our boyfriend or girlfriend day and night. And it can also be the friendship we cherish back when we were still in university. Day and night, this watch presents the most accurate time. Day and night, we move on from the past, carrying with important memories, happiness or sorrow. It would be cool to have a watch like this on our wrist to help us catch up with time and help us remember the things and people we care about.

 

 

The element and day/night watch Features

  • Synchronize watch’s time. Watch can receive accurate standard time signal from Internet Time Server through provided Time synchronization software and app, and correct the watch time running deviation.

  • Automatic calendar adjustment (2013-2099) (year/month/date/hour/minute/second/day)

  • Measuring Units: Milliseconds

  • 12 / 24 hour format options

  • Day light saving time on/off

  • Second time zone

  • 2 separate alarms in 2 time zones

  • Hourly chime

  • Stopwatch: maximum range: 23h59m59s

  • EL backlight

  • 1 year International warranty

 

Tech specs

  • CMOS Microchip

  • Milliseconds accuracy at synchronization.

  • Battery life: up to 5 years

  • Operating temperature: 0 Celsius ~50 Celsius

  • Water resistance: 10ATM =100 meters
  • Measuring Units: Milliseconds
  • OS Compliant : iOS, Andoid, Windows mobile

  • Element watches dimensions (LxWxH) : 52.5x44.0x17.5mm

  • Day/Night watches dimensions (LxWxH) : 44.0x44.0x12.6mm

How does the watch work?

The i-Atomic watch concept relies on 2 technologies, a photo synchronizing system and a self-synchronizing microchip. And they are both SELF-DEVELOPED!

 

Steps involved to complete the synchronization:

1. Open the free App/Software

2. Place the watch in front of your mobile device (iOS, Android, Windows mobile) or computer screen.

3. The watch finally confirms the synchronization by a sound notification, displaying the most accurate time, a Microsecond accurate to within millisecond.

The best part of this is that YOU synchornize your watch while wearing it and walking. 

No wifi, no bluetooth, no cable, no RF, no charging… But it offers you very accrurate time.

The app/software Time Calibrator

The Atomtime App/Software has been specifically designed to deliver the most accurate time information to all people in cities around the globe. Once the App is downloaded on the mobile device/computer, it connects automatically to the atomic clock server in Switzerland to display the exact local time and date. Through the quantum technology the information travels in speed of light from the NTP server to the AtomTime watches.

Available on iOS, Android and Windows. ( APP)

 

Software ( Windows/MAC)

Why did we start this project?

We believe many of you have encountered accuracy problems with your watch as it was not as accurate as your Phone or Pad. As time goes by, we’ve become used to trusting our phone over our watch whenever we needed to check time. Disappointed at the quality of the usual watch concerning its accuracy control, our team got inspired to come up with an idea which was to design a simply accurate watch!

Hence, the project was started, aiming to develop the accurate watch. Our motivation was fuelled by the joy of seeing everyone rely on his watch for the precise time instead of the phones. 

Years of research and development are both time-consuming and costly, which was not a problem because it is a project which we are heart over heals passionate about. Nevertheless, we wish to engage more people in this project as we know your participation will make a bigger difference!

Life is changing within a blink, making every second valuable. With a little generous help from you, we can make it possible to catch as well as control every second of your life!  Fund this project! Fund every precise second of your life! And we won’t forget to send you a cool watch!

 What we need

We are hoping to raise 50,000 USD in order to be able to:

-          Start production

-          Promote campaign

-          Make the watches available worldwide

Together we can make every second valuable and measurable!

Project Plan

Project plan Indiegogo

Flexible funding

2013

May

Exclusive for fans inside views of the process and development of the new Analogue synchronizing  watch

 

 

X

 X

 

  

 

Other ways you can help

We have been dedicated to the development of the i-Atomic watches for a long time to make it so far. Even if you are unable to make donations, you can still help us move forward for future improvement. Your opinion is highly valued! Please help us by:

- Joining us on your social network and tell us what you like about the watch and why you like it.

- Sharing the info with your friends and beloved ones.

- Spreading the word

With our leading-edge technology, more and more people will have the power to change their life by catching every precious second! Every minute of every day, you will have the most accurate time on your wrist. By being in perfect time control, your confidence and ambition will be fulfilled, along with the joy of having everything in order inside you.

AtomTime excels in making accurate watches. More and more people will have the power the gain control over time if you care enough to click "CONTRIBUTE". Help us realize the dream of valuing every second of life! And we will help you become a master of time! To know more about us, please visit us on:

1. Facebook like us @ AtomTime Swiss Watches

2. Twitter follow us @ AtomTimewatch

3. Google+ follows us @ AtomTime Swiss Watches

4. Pinterest check our pictures @ AtomTimewatch

Gallery

 

FAQ

1. What does AtomTime means?

The name AtomTime is derived from the so called atomic clock, which represents the most accurate timepiece on earth.

2. Why should I buy an i-Atomic watch?

  • accurate watch  – BEST substitution for a Radio Controlled watch

The online synchronizing system makes it possible to display accurate time to within milliseconds anytime anywhere, breaking completely away from the geographical limitations encountered by the Radio Controlled watches. Each synchronization brings the accuracy within one millisecond. No transmitters, no signals, no wifi, no bluetooth, no RFID needed.

  •  It is a SMART Watch

The embedded intelligent microchip can adapt to the environment change and automatically adjust the watch movement, eventually reducing the time error to 1 second compared to the 15-second time error of a normal watch.

  • Simplicity

It is as simple as facing the atomic watch to a smart phone or a computer for few seconds in order to complete the synchronization.

  • it can be brought and used anywhere

If you fly among different time zones, the AtomTime atomic watch is a better companion which can easily track down the accurate local time. No longer being late. No more missing a plane.

  • not afraid of water

The water resistant ability of an AtomTime atomic watch is 10ATM. As a majestic-looking watch representing men’s masculinity or women’s independence, it is capable of handling some extra toughness.

  • long battery life

Without consuming any power on signal-searching, the lithium battery of an AtomTime atomic watch enjoys a long and trouble-free life expectancy of 3 to 5 years.

 

3.      How to synchronise your i-Atomic watch?

 Three main steps to activate the i-Atomic watch are described by:

a. Starting the App/Software

b. Placing the watch in front of the mobile device/Computer screen press calibrate button; the screen flashes

c. The watch finally confirms the synchronization by a sound notification, displaying time accuracy of milliseconds.

 

4. If I travel overseas, can I use my watch?

Yes. You can use our watch wherever you are. As long as a mobile device or computer is available to you, you can get the most accurate local time through Internet servers. Even if you temporarily have no access to Internet, the watch will still synchronize itself to the Internet time. In this case, the watch will still be accurate, but without the guarantee of the accuracy up to one millisecond.

 

5. Do I need to adjust the date and month of my watch?

No. The watch adjusts itself automatically when it synchronizes with online servers. Even in a leap year, the watch can adjust itself properly.

 

6. Is there an analogue version available?

Not yet, we currently working on the Analogue version of i-Atomic watches, please Stay up to date with our progress: sign up: @ www.atomtime-watches.com

 

7. Can you help me understand the water resistance and ATM?

1 ATM:  10 Meters  or 33 Feet

A watch with this resistance level is protected against accidental exposure to water; for example, splashes, perspiration or accidental immersion. It should not be exposed to any water pressure.

3 ATM: 30 Meters or 100 Feet

This level will easily withstand splashes or brief immersion in water, or getting caught in the rain. However, it is not sufficiently resistant for swimming or bathing.

5 ATM : 50 Meters or 165 Feet

A watch with this level of resistance is wearable around household sinks, while playing sports and while swimming in shallow water. Do not wear it while bathing, snorkelling or scuba diving.

10 ATM : 100 Meters or 330 Feet

This level of water resistance will allow a watch to be worn around household sinks, while playing sports and while swimming or poolside diving. Do not wear it while scuba diving

Water resistance is tested in measurements of atmosphere (ATM). Each ATM denotes 10 meters of static water pressure. All our i-Atomic watches have 100 water-resistant ability.

8. Can I customize my iAtomic Watch?

With the added perk now you can choose and create your own iAtomic watch, choose from 4 Sillicone bands, 4 plated bezel, 4 dial colours.  Limited version and offered only on indiegogo.

story:
WATCH THE VIDEO BEFORE READING - YOU WILL UNDERSTAND EVERYTHING MY CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT...PEACE!!

 

Short Summary

 My name is Steve Archambault and I am from Victoria BC Canada.  I work at a private golf course on the grounds crew. I came up with an invention around 2 plus yrs ago...an innovation to the aluminum beverage can.  I came to realize soon into my research and development just how the beverage industry can change the world. 

  I dont believe the world needs anymore wealthy people.  The world needs more people that care about the one thing we all share...EARTH. The direction we are going it will not matter how much money you have in the bank and the wealth you have gained if there is no planet left.  That is why I plan on donating majority of my royalties to charity and once Ive established myself I plan on donating 100% of my royalties from my invention to charity.

  I am in the process of establishing a foundation called Uniting the World Foundation and through my invention and the app i am developing i have the potential to do just that....UNITE the WORLD.

The app that I am developing is what will make my invention and foundation completely interactive. It has several cool features such as being a platform for the users of the app to actually be part of the foundation and being invoved in the decision making and voting process.  The app isnt a game but more like a tool but at the same time making it fun for the user.  It offers solutions to making more ethical choices in your day to day life and also ways to reduce your carbon foot print.

  Not only that but it also creates a platform for ethical companies who meet the criteria to actually call themselves ethical to be featured on the app allowing the user/consumer to make the most ethical choice when purchasing a product. 

 Thats just the tip of the iceberg.  There are many more features and I could type for hours getting into every detail about the app but this summary gives you an idea as to what this app will do.  Its meant to empower you giving you control as to how the money the foundation generates from MY royalties from my invention is dispersed.

 Its all about transparency and I will have the most transparent organization on the planet.

This campaign is important to me because I feel we wont leave anything left for future generations with the direction we are heading.  We need solutions to address the most pressing issues we are faced with globally. Your contribution how ever small or large it may be will help in creating one of the worlds largest organizations.  An organization which YOU the user will be in control of and you the contributer made possible. 

 The possibilities will be endless and once the game starts it will go on forever.  The big opportunity for all the contributors is they will have built a legacy for themselves and thats possible because of 1 fact....YOU built it.  To say you all are part in building this amazing project is something you can look back on and say we changed the world! There is no limit as to how big this can be...its up to you and thats because its all of you making it happen. I posted a youtube vid of a kick ass band June Fiasco and the song i posted pretty much sums it up. " I think it's time I shed this skin, I've spent my whole life living in, This twisted self-inflicted suffering - Andrew Spark of the June Fiasco" To me thats a really profound line and thats the reality we are living...twisted self inflicted suffering. 

  This campaign has almost reached the half way point and I have a LONG way to go to reach my goal. With the help of social media we can make it happen sooner.  Lets spread the word and get this viral.  A different world is possible people and this app WILL change your life and the world.  No need to fight the existing reality when all we have to do is create a new one which makes the old one obsolete. You can either play or sit and wach from the sidelines. Either way its going to happen its just a matter if you want to play or not...Peace!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 I am looking for $390000.00 and what that money is for is to finish the app and kickstart the foundation so that we can have projects for the users of the app to vote on.

The app cost is a little under $200000.00 and the remainder of the money goes into the foundation.  If I dont reach the goal I set out to reach will either go into the develpment of the app or to charity. 

 People dont realize that the game started when I started this campaign.  Everything that my app and foundion is about is that its meant to empower you.  Your contribution is going towards building a better world. We need solutions to fix the problems we are faced with globally.  The hole we are digging ourselves is getting deeper and soon we wont be able to dig our way out of the mess we are creating.  What we are doing is digging our own grave. 

  I know that most of you have a hard time wanting to face reality.  Trust me Ive been there.  The reality is we as humans have done all the damage casued to this planet. Its obvious we cant rely on any of the systems that are in place.  We all work hard and a large portion of the money we make goes to tax.  What is sad is that the money isnt really benefitting us.  Its being used to fund wars and bailing out failing companies as well as funding insane projects like super prisons and the war on terror and the war on drugs. 

 I am willing to give up my royalties to go to charity from my tab invention and app to help build a better future for the next generations.  The world doesnt need any more wealthy people...the world needs to get healthy. 

  So here is an opportunity to get involved and be proactive with out having to do much of anything.  I am giving up virtually all the money generated from both the tab and app and allowing the users of the app to be in control of the foundation.  YOU control how the money is spent as to what charities, projects and campaigns the money will go to. 

There are incentives starting with this campaign.  We have several trips for 2 to come to Victoria BC Canada for 4 days/3nights and be part of the launch of everything, your name put in the app, your name immortalized in the foundation, your name in the documentary that is being done on me, my tab, foundation and app.  If you submit a project and it gets voted in the one that submitted it gets to be one of the project managers and also will have a memorial plaque with your name on it.  I dont want any recognition.  Like i said before I am all about empowering people and I want regular people to be recognized. 

  This is the home stretch people and I want to thank the 7 contributors who have made contributions so far. We have a long way to go to reach our goal.  Do you want to sit on the sidelines and watch or do you want to play.  The game has begun...we can make this happen in days with the power of social media.  The reality is i only need 80000 people at 5 dollars a person....5 BUCKS!  For 5 BUCKS you get a chance to win a trip for 2 to victoria, your name immortalized in the app, foundation and documentary.  Not only that...you just became part of the change.  Those 7 people that have made contributions are part of the change....dont you want to be part of the change as well??

 

The Impact

Why my project is valuable to you the contributor as well as the world is that I am not driven by wealth.  We are destroying the one thing we all share...earth.  What are we leaving behind for future generations other than a huge mess but how will they fix our mess when we have taken everything from them. Our systems are failing.  Our education system is failing our children, our healthcare system is failing the sick, our governments are failing majority of the world and we are stuck watching our planet being destroyed with are hands tied and our voices being ignored.  If there is something you want to believe in its my invention, my foundation and my app. Like I said I am not in it for the wealth which is why i am donating majority if not all my royalties generated from my invention and app to charity.  Its not about me....its about the planet and the future of this planet. Without this planet we will have nothing.  Im trying to allow you the contributor and user to be part of the solution and be part of the change without having to change....and thats the coolest thing about what i am doing - allowing the world to be part of the change without having to change.   

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant donate thats okay....please share this campaign on Facebook, twitter, pinterest or any social media platform possible.  You can checkout my website www.unitingtheworldfoundation.org and also add me on facebook ( Steve Archambault ) and if you have twitter follow me @Arch_Steve  and keep up to date on how things are progressing.
story_txt:
WATCH THE VIDEO BEFORE READING - YOU WILL UNDERSTAND EVERYTHING MY CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT...PEACE!!
 
Short Summary
 My name is Steve Archambault and I am from Victoria BC Canada.  I work at a private golf course on the grounds crew. I came up with an invention around 2 plus yrs ago...an innovation to the aluminum beverage can.  I came to realize soon into my research and development just how the beverage industry can change the world. 
  I dont believe the world needs anymore wealthy people.  The world needs more people that care about the one thing we all share...EARTH. The direction we are going it will not matter how much money you have in the bank and the wealth you have gained if there is no planet left.  That is why I plan on donating majority of my royalties to charity and once Ive established myself I plan on donating 100% of my royalties from my invention to charity.
  I am in the process of establishing a foundation called Uniting the World Foundation and through my invention and the app i am developing i have the potential to do just that....UNITE the WORLD.
The app that I am developing is what will make my invention and foundation completely interactive. It has several cool features such as being a platform for the users of the app to actually be part of the foundation and being invoved in the decision making and voting process.  The app isnt a game but more like a tool but at the same time making it fun for the user.  It offers solutions to making more ethical choices in your day to day life and also ways to reduce your carbon foot print.
  Not only that but it also creates a platform for ethical companies who meet the criteria to actually call themselves ethical to be featured on the app allowing the user/consumer to make the most ethical choice when purchasing a product. 
 Thats just the tip of the iceberg.  There are many more features and I could type for hours getting into every detail about the app but this summary gives you an idea as to what this app will do.  Its meant to empower you giving you control as to how the money the foundation generates from MY royalties from my invention is dispersed.
 Its all about transparency and I will have the most transparent organization on the planet.

story:
News and updates

  • The white version arrived


The Goal and the stretch goal
  • We need at least $30,000 to get a lower production cost at the factory.
  • By reaching the stretch goal of $50,000, we can release a MIDI music player application for iPhone for free. This app will turn your digital piano into a jukebox as seen in the video.

                                     


Schedule

We have developed for eight months and we need more three months to deliver the mi.1 to you.

The Perks

Please choose one from below.

*The white and translucent versions of mi.1 are limited to the indiegogo campaign.

*We will start selling the mi.1 for $45 from September only in black.

*Shipping fee to US, Canada, Japan is included. To European countries, add $5.

*Delivery will start by the end of August.  For European countries by the end of September.


T-shirts



*The T-shirt bundled to the mi.1 is Blue one. If you would like to get a Light Brown one, please select the "Light Brown T-shirt" perk.

*The T-shirt is a very limited design and print to the indiegogo campaign.


Delivery area 

We can deliver the mi.1 IndieGoGo model to US, Canada and Japan, and European countries.  Please add $5 to ship Europe.

For other countries not listed, kindly contact us so that we can make arrangements for manufacturing model.


Prototyping History

We have been developing for last 8 months and made 3 prototyping (including the first which has a coin-cell battery). 

We are using 2nd prototyping for the PV of mi.1.


Development History


The 3rd becomes more compact and slimmer than the 2nd. 

2nd(left) and 3rd(right) prototyping

And the last prototyping is molded like a connector of MIDI cable, not a box made of several ABS parts with screws.

Final design (CG)


Who we are

We are QUICCO SOUND, a startup "Maker" of digital musical instruments, and accessory products for them.

MAKOTO HIROI, CEO had previously worked at YAMAHA for 23 years mainly as a DSP effect engineer and MIDI Sequencer engineer,  developed MU80/MU50, QY700, QY70, RM1x, RS7000 etc. In addition, he was a member of the development team of Neiro and C.24 at MISELU.

TAKESHI ANDO, CTO has worked at YAMAHA for 19 years as a mechanical engineer of digital musical instruments and professional mixers, and developed UW500,S08, MOTIF, CP1/5/50 etc.


Risks and Challenges

We expect digital pianos connected to mi.1 have a circuit which complies with "MIDI 1.0 Specification". If the pianos don't have an equivalent circuit with a reference design in the document, they may not work with mi.1. We have not encountered such kind of problem yet, but we will share informations on our web site if we can find a piano which does not work with mi.1.


FAQ

Q. I'm wondering that does it work well with apple new bluetooth over midi feature that announced in WWDC14 ?

Yes, We are planing to support Apple BLE MIDI. After Apple release the BLE MIDI specification, we will update mi.1 firmware to adapt it shortly.

story:
Wokamon is all about making walking fun.

The Wokamon iPhone app combines the function of a pedometer with the engagement of a virtual pet. Every single step you take helps feed and nurture your little Wokamon virtual pet. The more active a user is, the more their Wokamons grow and thrive.

Wokamons are special. They can make happiness from human's spent energy. So the more you walk the happier they make you.

Noodum who?

Noodum are an awesome twosome. Mars (The Developer) and Okayboss (The Designer) met in a digital agency years ago, working on a bunch of interactive projects and campaigns winning a few awards along the way.

Some facts

  • We used to live a couple minutes away from each other. Now it's a couple hours time difference between Shanghai & Sydney. (We work via emails and weekly Skype sessions)
  • The name Noodum is taken from our cats. NOOdle the white short hair in Sydney, and DUMdum the ginger tom cat in Shanghai.
  • Our official food is fried chicken. It's no wonder we need to walk off the calories :) 


How does it work?


1 WALK - Take your wokamon everywhere you go. Simply activate the app and go! Every step you take is recorded with our nifty pedometer.

2 GROW - As you walk, you'll burn calories. Wokamons feed on your calories. Watch as they change shape as they get bigger. 

3 PLAY - You can also play with your Wokamon to wake them up and get more crystals.  Spend crystals to buy tools and unlock new Wokamon species.

4 COLLECT - Add more and more Wokamons to your collection. You'll need to walk more to unlock all of them.

5 SHARE - Show your friends your progess and see what they've been up to. We want everyone to walk more and collect all Wokamons. 

Why should I play Wokamon?

We need to give Wokamons a home! This is the story right here.... 

  • Walking is easy. Why not make it more fun?
  • We're living increasingly sedentary lifestyles, and we think our little app is a great way to promote a healthier lifestyle, for adults and kids alike :) 
  • The combination of gamification plus a running goal and narrative means there is continued engagement for a long period of time.
  • Moving forward, we want to add more and more characters to appeal to every body.
  • We want to build a community of active users working together to achieve in-game goals while they're working off the calories. Exercise is better together.
  • Ultimately - we want people to walk more. We want them to choose a bit of physical activity over being a couch potato or taking the car when it'd be much more fun and healthy to walk a few blocks. Let's make this happen!

Where We're At & What We Need 

We're a fair way along the development process. The core iOS development is 50% done and the demo is playable on the device using GPS.  

 


But there's still work that needs doing... 


We already have a working prototype with most functionality designed and built. Admittedly it's a bit rough around the edges and needs a bit of a push for that final stage of completion and polish.

While we'll mostly be putting our own hours into this, we do need some outside help, and we don't believe unpaid work delivers the best results.

Here's what we need -

  • UI Design for remaining screens. This will be handled inhouse by our designer.
  • Character designs - Wokamons are what make this pedometer interesting and engaging. We alreayd have a handful made up but really need more to keep up interest and reward people for walking.
  • Animation - What's a Wokamon if it doesn't move? We need talented animators to bring them to life.
  • Motion design - As the videos in this campaign shows, motion design isn't our forte. To bring maximum impact to all our video work, we need to hire a talented person to work with our animators and bring the story to life.
  • Marketing & Promotion - we need a bit of a budget to get the word out and let people know that the Wokamons are coming!

 

What Do You Get?

We've lined up some great perks for our generous backers! Check out the sidebar on the right for more details.

 

Stretching Goals

The more you give, the more awesome we can make it.

$6000

Include 2 more Wokamons in the initial release (a total of 7)

$7500

An login/register system for every user where user can download future monsters

$8800

An android home for Wokamon

$11000

A crowd voting website where everyone can pick his/her favourite Wokamon design from a group of selected illustrators.

THANK YOU for being awesome and helping us make this happen!

story:
Redefining The Tablet

The Unity is a game-changing device that redefines the tablet. Designed in Australia Unity delivers unrivalled features and performance.

  • 10.1 inch widescreen tablet with high definition display
  • Android and Linux dual operating systems allows you to run in tablet mode or desktop mode or both
  • Connect keyboard, mouse and monitor for a true desktop experience
  • Built-in enterprise grade PBX phone system
  • Bluetooth handset for mobile and VoIP calls


Elegant User Interface

Just like the Unity device we've created a beautiful user interface that allows users easy access to all your applications and data. It's simple and it's fast.

  • Android KitKat 4.4.2
  • Minimalist & user friendly layout for fast launching apps
  • Full widget and live wallpaper support
  • Ready to use out of the box
  • Smart drawers store your apps making them easy to find
  • Auto application sorting and categorisation
  • Rich library of colours and transitions for full customisation


Enterprise Grade PBX Functionality

Exclusive to Unity is our custom call management software which offers all users access to enterprise grade internet voice calls and sophisticated call management.

  • Live call presence, chat, calendar and contacts
  • Simple call forwarding and transfer
  • Call conferencing, park and hold
  • Video calls
  • Fax support


A Docking Station Like No Other

When docked the Unity offers the user a full desktop experience by connecting a monitor, keyboard and mouse. Running all the traditional business applications, there is no compromise on user experience or performance.

  • Connect your monitor via HDMI and run a complete Linux desktop
  • Connect keyboard and mouse via USB
  • Ethernet port to connect to your network 


Technical Specifications

A powerful tablet coupled with an intelligent docking station producing unrivalled performance

  • Quad Core Processor
  • 2GB Ram
  • 32 GB Storage
  • 10.1 Inch High Definition Display
  • 16:9 Widescreen
  • 5 Point Capacitive Touch Screen
  • 3G Connectivity
  • WiFi N Standard
  • Bluetooth 4
  • 5MP Dual Facing Camera
  • Ethernet Port
  • 3 USB Ports
  • HDMI Port
  • Dula Desktop & Tablet Operating Modes
  • Auto Provisioning & Setup
  • Call Management Software


Your Opportunity

  • We're giving you a chance to secure the first available Unity devices and lock in big discounts at the same time. We have a number of perks options available for only 30 days. 
  • The Unity will be ready to ship in July 2014.
  • Recommended retail price for the Unity will be $995.00
story_txt:
Redefining The Tablet
The Unity is a game-changing device that redefines the tablet. Designed in Australia Unity delivers unrivalled features and performance.

10.1 inch widescreen tablet with high definition display


Android and Linux dual operating systems allows you to run in tablet mode or desktop mode or both


Connect keyboard, mouse and monitor for a true desktop experience


Built-in enterprise grade PBX phone system


Bluetooth handset for mobile and VoIP calls

Elegant User InterfaceJust like the Unity device we've created a beautiful user interface that allows users easy access to all your applications and data. It's simple and it's fast.

Android KitKat 4.4.2


Minimalist & user friendly layout for fast launching apps


Full widget and live wallpaper support


Ready to use out of the box


Smart drawers store your apps making them easy to find


Auto application sorting and categorisation


Rich library of colours and transitions for full customisation

Enterprise Grade PBX FunctionalityExclusive to Unity is our custom call management software which offers all users access to enterprise grade internet voice calls and sophisticated call management.

Live call presence, chat, calendar and contacts


Simple call forwarding and transfer


Call conferencing, park and hold


Video calls


Fax support

A Docking Station Like No OtherWhen docked the Unity offers the user a full desktop experience by connecting a monitor, keyboard and mouse. Running all the traditional business applications, there is no compromise on user experience or performance.

Connect your monitor via HDMI and run a complete Linux desktop

Connect keyboard and mouse via USB

Ethernet port to connect to your network 

Technical SpecificationsA powerful tablet coupled with an intelligent docking station producing unrivalled performance

Quad Core Processor


2GB Ram

32 GB Storage
10.1 Inch High Definition Display
16:9 Widescreen
5 Point Capacitive Touch Screen
3G Connectivity
WiFi N Standard
Bluetooth 4
5MP Dual Facing Camera
Ethernet Port
3 USB Ports
HDMI Port
Dula Desktop & Tablet Operating Modes
Auto Provisioning & Setup
Call Management Software
Your Opportunity

We're giving you a chance to secure the first available Unity devices and lock in big discounts at the same time. We have a number of perks options available for only 30 days. 


The Unity will be ready to ship in July 2014.


Recommended retail price for the Unity will be $995.00

story:
Concept

When I was thinking of proposals for the Google Glass Explorer contest, I wanted to find one that could help people by using the unique features of this new augmented-reality technology. Eventually, I remembered a project that some fellow students did during a robotics class that I took in graduate school. It used eye-tracking technology to remotely control the motors on a vehicle. After confirming that Google planned to embed eye-tracking technology in their new product, I realized that Google Glass could be used to make this idea a viable solution for persons with disabilities, such as quadriplegics.

 

Support from United Cerebral Palsy

"For more than 60 years, United Cerebral Palsy has worked to ensure the inclusion of individuals with disabilities in every facet of society. This includes the freedom to travel independently with as few barriers as possible. UCP is excited about Steve McHugh’s efforts to create the first ever eye-controlled wheelchair powered with Google Glass.

UCP and its nearly 100 affiliates throughout the United States and several countries have a mission to advance the independence, productivity and full citizenship of people with a spectrum of disabilities by providing services and support to more than 176,000 children and adults every day. More than 65% of people served by UCP have disabilities other than cerebral palsy, including Down Syndrome, Autism Spectrum Disorder, physical disabilities and traumatic brain injury (TBI).

The Life Labs initiative at UCP is dedicated to identifying, developing, and supporting ideas that will make a difference for people living with disabilities. Through dynamic collaborations with individuals, businesses, and communities, Life Labs works to bring innovative ideas to life."

 

Technology

The patent Google issued for eye-tracking technology as part of their Google Glass product (US 8,235,529) indicates there will be rather precise tracking of the right eye’s movement relative to objects presented in the user’s line of sight. With this level of precision, users will be able to seamlessly use subtle eye motions to select controls that change the speed and direction of the chair by staring at a particular button for a determined period of time just long enough for the app to distinguish between a casual glance and a deliberate action. Being able to rely on subtle eye motions for button-like control will also allow the app to track for more extreme eye movements to provide system overrides, such as an emergency stop.

 

User-Interface

The User Interface prototype seen above roughly proposes how a user would interact with the controls. The card in the upper right is used to control the speed of the wheelchair. I am working with a User Interface designer to iterate on the layout, and many of the design choices will need to be reconsidered when we're given access to the standard interface elements provided in the Glass GUI Library. The basic functionality in the image of the User Interface are from buttons which allow the user to increase and decrease the speed of the wheelchair, or to stop it altogether. Other screens would allow the user to direct the movement of the chair. All screens will show a battery indicator such as that seen in the bottom left and a status bar like the one on the bottom right showing speed and/or the current selected action. The speed indicator also shows whether the wheelchair is accelerating, decelerating or staying constant. Additionally, I would like the app to provide the user with an overlay of obstacle and path detection. The machine should be able to detect potential obstacles in the path such as potholes or objects in the way and alert the user.

 

This Campaign

For this campaign, specifically, I am raising funds to buy the hardware necessary to build the Google Glass app and a small prototype demonstrating that the app can be used to control a wheelchair.  The focus of this proposal is laid out specifically in the Costs section and really only covers the needs for writing a fully-featured eye-control application and proof-of-concept.  Once I have completed this stage, I will be in the position to seek funding for setting up manufacturing of app-enabled wheelchairs and devices for adding necessary functionality to existing wheelchairs.

 

Accolades

Interest in the project is already high. After posting my Google Glass Explorer contest proposal on Google+, the idea was liked and shared by many people on Google+, Facebook and Twitter. One tweet even got the attention of a reporter for BostInno who later conducted an interview with me for his publication. The article was then picked up by Popular Science and various aggregator sites, such as HackerNews. The response has been overwhelmingly positive.

 

Costs

The upfront costs to get started on this project are the motivating factor for this IndieGoGo proposal. Members of the Google Glass Explorer program are required to purchase Google Glass for $1500. Additionally, I will need an Android phone ($300) to interface with Glass that I can freely hack without worrying about temporarily breaking my primary phone. This Android phone will also need a data plan to be usable during field testing. The cheapest viable option I've found is $45/mo from Straight Talk. In addition to those setup costs, there are also the costs of the prototyping hardware to allow communication between Glass and the wheelchair motors which will be around $160. That brings the approximate prototyping costs to:

$1500 + $300 + ($45/mo * 12 months) + $160 = $2500

There will of course also be costs incurred from bringing the prototype to market, but at the point that I have a working prototype I will be able to explore a more expansive fundraising campaign.

 

Rewards

For donations of $25 or more, I will include one copy of the wheelchair control UI Android App. This will be received by downloading the App from the Google Play store after I have added your Google Play username to a list of customers who can download the App for free.

 

Risks and challenges

I am a professional Software Engineer and I have a Masters in Mechanical Engineering with a focus in Robotics, so I have experience in solving the types of challenges that will be encountered in developing the hardware and software to allow users to control a wheelchair with Google Glass. In addition to the challenges inherent to developing a new software package, this project will require extensive user testing to ensure a successful product. Using eye-tracking as the primary form of user input is a novel concept so there is limited literature on what standards should be followed to ensure a safe and successful experience. For instance, it will be important to perform field tests with potential users to find the ideal timing threshold for distinguishing between idle eye movement and deliberate action, while not affecting a seamless flow between different controls. Additionally, it will be important to determine which eye motion will be intuitive enough for a user to easily perform it in an emergency, to perform a safe and quick shutdown of the chair, while also being unique enough such that a user wouldn't accidentally send this override signal. To overcome these usability challenges I'm working directly with a user experience designer who can effectively perform these tests with my software.

 

Biography

After getting my Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering from Worcester Polytechnic University, I focused heavily in Robotics while receiving my Masters of Science in Mechanical Engineering from Tufts University. Finding a passion for the intersection of Mechanical and and Computer Engineering during my studies, I sought a position at IMDEA in Madrid, Spain writing software that modeled the electrical properties of brain neurons undergoing mechanical stress. I then returned to the United States to pursue a career as a Software Engineer at Wayfair while continuing to play with Robotics on the side. I'm extremely excited about benefits wearable computing will have in health care and can't wait to starting working on a project that will provide people with access to mobility they may have not had before.  You can read more at my LinkedIn profile.

story:
Short Summary

SMART NAPKIN HOLDER – CHARGE YOUR MOBILE PHONE ANYWHERE As it's well known and accepted, nobody loves low batteries... Battery Low Issue is very risky when your phone (or Smart Phone) is required in some cases.

Smart Napkin Holder lets you charge your mobile devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Samsung Galaxy Phones and other Smart Phones) in restaurants, cafes, bars, night clubs and even in your garden.

If you are on the other side of the table, do not worry ! You can also charge your phone via roller featured USBs even you are not close to Smart Napkin Holder.

Imagine that you went to a restaurant, a cafe or to a bar and the battery on your smart phone is about to die... Don't panic ! Smart Napkin Holder is there... and just enjoy your meal while your smart phone is charged... And do not forget to use a napkin after your meal or drink :)


Restaurants, Cafes, Bars and Night Clubs ! Everybody will choose you from now on cause your facility will be different than the other by means of Smart Napkin Holder.

Smart Napkin Holder is a product designed and developed a group of people and they call themselves Min2Tech. For further information please visit www.min2tech.com

If reached $200,000 funding goal, waiter call and check please buttons will be added on Smart Napkin Holder.


Highlights

    • Internal and Rechargeable Battery

    • Compatible with iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch and Samsung Galaxy and other Phones

    • Charge via Roller Cable

    • Battery Indicator

    • Suction Cup Under the Case

Technical Specs

  • Power Source: Rechargeable Battery

  • No requirement for AC

  • Color Options

  • Covering Option

  • Custom Logo Insert


Charge your Smart Phone While Enjoying Your Meal...

Smart Napkin Holder needs $112,000 fundings and afterwards will be public in a short time. We are working on Smart Napkin Holder prototype and with your support, we are sure that we'll succeed. For the production more & more, Smart Napkin Holder needs to be funded. If reached $200,000 funding goal, waiter call and check please buttons will be added on Smart Napkin Holder.

The design and color of Smart Napkin Holder can be customized according to suggestions of restaurant, cafe, bar, night clubs and even in your garden at home.


The Impact

Smart Napkin Holder is different and best of breed as it can be used at any restaurant, cafe, bar and night club. You can charge your smart mobile devices while sitting and enjoying your meal or drink.

Other Ways You Can Help -

Feel Free to Help :)

We know and as Indiegogo states that some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help... So please let your collegues and friends know about our Smart Napkin Holder campaign and please share our tools. And Charge Your Phone ! Thanks for all your supports.

story:
Track invaluables – like your child


Track valuables – like your wallet

Has this scenario happened to you more times than you care to admit?

You have just left the store and you reach into your pocket or purse and realize that your wallet is missing. As panic sets in, you rush back to the shop hoping for the best. Now, think about if that was your kid you accidentally left behind.

BTrace helps prevent crises like this by tracking your invaluables – 24/7. 

The BTrace early warning system alerts you in real time the minute something or someone is out of comfortable range and directs you to it.


How BTrace works?

Simply attach the quarter-sized battery-powered BTrace tags to the things that are important to you and the app immediately knows where they are. You can tailor the alert range, and if something (or someone) goes beyond that safe range, BTrace automatically notifies you. At any point, you can view where the item is right from your smartphone.



What’s unique about BTrace?

►  Tracks items to prevent loss or theft 

►  Directs you to the lost or stolen item

►  Works indoors and outdoors

►  Tracks short and long ranges

►  Can connect and track multiple tags on the BTrace app

►  Does not require a monthly subscription – app is free



BTrace features

►  Plug and play – works right out of the box

►  Easy to configure 

►  Set the range of each item

►  Get automatic, personalized tracking alerts to your smartphone

►  Set tag to emit sounds, vibrate and/or light up to notify the wearer 

►  Highly intuitive customizable user interface with tailorable tracker icons

►  Over-the-air (OTA) downloads enable tag updates and feature upgrades

►  Very low power consumption – battery charge last for months  

►  Advanced features such as personalized skin options

 

How can you use BTrace?

► Alert yourself immediately if you have forgotten a child in the car

► View which direction your stolen bike is going in

►  Find items that mysteriously disappear in your house – like the TV remote that         ended up in your toddler's toy chest 

►  Remind yourself where you parked your car at the mall

►  Catch your dog before he romps out of bounds at the park



About the BTrace Team 

BTrace is the joint initiative of 2 entrepreneurs with extensive experience in computer hardware, software, app and web development. 

Yehoram Dehan is Co-CEO and Co-Founder of COMRAX, with expertise in hardware and software design and development.

Ori Tamari is a career entrepreneur, who has launched and advised a variety of consumer product and technology companies. 

This partnership brings together all the know-how necessary to successfully launch this initiative worldwide.


BTrace technology

The BTrace tag hardware includes:

► Motion sensors such as an accelerometer, gyroscope, compass, receivers and a 

      microprocessor 

►  Bluetooth smart protocol that works with Android or iOS devices (Android 4.4+,         iPhone 4s+) 

►  Multiple MEMS sensors to support iBeacon and indoor "GPS” functionality

►  Low-power design that extends usage duration 

► The BTrace algorithm that collects and processes tag sensor data to calculate           position


Status

The BTrace prototype has been up and running for over 3 months.

The plan is to launch the product for Android and iPhone devices in June 2015. Indiegogo investors get early delivery of the product before large-scale production and distribution.

What your funding will go to

We are looking to raise $95,000 to do the following:

►  Complete BTrace product development

►  Move to full-scale production

►  Develop next-release product features


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Even if you can’t contribute, you can make some noise on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BTraceinsight

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BTraceApp

LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/company/btrace

Check out our website: http://www.btrace.com/

Keep your most important possessions always within a smartphone's reach! 

BTrace them today!
