story:
Ready to ship immediately following the campaign!



Ever find it too difficult to leave your cozy bed just to turn off your lights? Do you have a light switch at a hard to reach place? Or do you simply wish you can make things happen just with the sound of your voice?

We believe that connected devices are meant to make your life better and easier, that's why we created the Nanoleaf Smarter Kit - smart lighting you can control using Siri.

The Nanoleaf Smarter Kit is the smartest decision you'll ever make about going smart.






Best Buy Canada would like to help us promote our Nanoleaf Smarter Kit beyond the Indiegogo Campaign! The Smarter Kit will become available at Best Buy stores after the campaign at full retail price. 


The Nanoleaf Smarter Kit includes the following:

  • One dodecahedron-inspired Nanoleaf Smart Hub (Supports up to 32 bulbs)
  • Two exquisitely-engineered Nanoleaf Smart Ivy Light Bulbs


This perfect fusion of form and function sets the stage to an exciting future of light.




The voice commands can be given without unlocking the phone, just like how you would normally use Siri. 

Phrases you can say to Siri:

  • “Turn on the lights” or “Turn off the lights.”
  • “Dim the lights” or “Set the brightness to 50%.”
  • “Turn on the upstairs lights.”
  • “Turn off Chloe’s light.”
  • “Turn down the kitchen lights”
  • “Dim the lights in the dining room to 50%.”
  • “Make the living room lights the brightest.”
  • “Lights On” or “Lights Off" 


Through the Nanoleaf Smarter app, you can easily name bulbs, assign bulbs to rooms, and create scenes. The Nanoleaf light bulbs can be dimmed down to as low as 1% and turned up 100% to a crisp illumination equivalent to a 60W incandescent bulb.

Let your creativity run wild with the naming of rooms and scenes!

  • "Hustle time!" – Turns the lights in the bedroom to 100% to wake you up and get you ready for a fresh new day. 
  • "Honey, I'm Home" – Turns the lights on to 50% for a warm and relaxing "welcome home" ambiance.
  • "Snuggle Puddle" – Dims down the lights to a romantic 5%.
  • "Siri, Netflix and Chill" - set the lights to 1%, just enough to see what's good. 



Designed to reach the far corners of your house

Our products have been tested to 50 meters so it will be able to reach the far corners of your home... unless you live in the Playboy mansion. 





We packed a lot of intelligence into this little dodecahedron. We use the Zigbee Protocol to communicate with our lights. Unlike Bluetooth, you don't need to be in the same room to control your lights and Zigbee is much more energy efficient than Wifi. 

By using a Hub, we can build intelligence and automation into it, creating the foundation of your smarter experience. 



For the moments when you don't want to talk

You can also use the Nanoleaf app to control your lights by scenes, rooms or individual bulbs. 




Future-Proof - Technology that Grows with Time

Through our selection of software protocols and materials, we have designed the entire product offering to last for decades.
  1. Freedom to use other light bulbs and apps: We do not want to limit your freedom to select which products to buy or apps to use. We use the Zigbee protocol to communicate between the hub and the lamp, and we have tested with the other light bulbs (such as Philips Hue & GE Link) to ensure they work as well. You can also use any HomeKit compatible iOS app to talk with our hub. 
  2. The software on our hub can receive regular updates: Just like the apps on your smartphone, or the software on your computer, the software on the hub can be updated just by being connected to Internet. Therefore, as protocol changes or we have created new functionality, we will add that to the hub without any additional cost. This includes Android compatibility. In 2016 we will update the software on the hub to support Android control, at no additional cost.
  3. The LEDs in the lamp will shine vibrantly for decades: For normal usage at home, the LED bulbs can last up to 30 years. We accomplish this through our use of the best LED technology and patented bulb design that ensures longevity.



Bonus Function: Uniquely dimmable without a dimmer switch! 

You can also use your regular light switch to dim your lights. 

With a double click of your light switch (OFF-ON), the light will start to dim and double click again to set the desired brightness. Similar to our previous product, the Nanoleaf Bloom. See below for an instructional video:



Nanoleaf Bloom Instructional Video - Nanoleaf Smart Ivy includes this functionality in addition to the ability to work with Siri. 





Easy 3-Step Installation:

Step 1. Screw in your lights

Step 2. Plug in the hub to your router

Step 3. Download the app on your iPhone or iPad and follow the instructions. 

*Android support coming in early-2016. It will be as a software update to the hub, which we can do remotely as long as the hub is connected to the Internet. No additional cost, no additional hardware needed. Booyah, that's the beauty of connected hardware!




Nanoleaf Designer Pendant - $30 value












Nanoleaf is a group of fun intelligent thinkers, believers, introverts, extroverts, creatives, and doers. We come from diverse backgrounds, and have vastly different career and life experiences. We are a family of different personalities with different ideas, driven by a common passion – to make cool looking stuff that would do our planet some good, essentially, stuff that we can feel good about making, and that people can feel good about using. We want to make the world a better place. That means creatively working towards a healthier environment and happier people. We are a global team of about 30 people, with offices spanning across two continents. We work hard and play hard together. 

After all, changing the world is not so out of reach when you have the right group of people working together.


The Founders







The risks of the Nanoleaf Smarter Kit campaign are small. All production moulds and manufacturing capabilities and certifications are already complete. Both embedded and iOS app software have undergone quality control and beta testing. With confidence, we will be able to build and fullfil the products shortly after the campaign ends. As always with combined software and hardware design, there is a possibility of bugs and minor defects. Thanks to the ability to update the firmware on the Nanoleaf Smart Hub remotely, we are able to update the firmware to fix bugs that are discovered after product release. 

Our goal is to have the reward to you in December 2015. If the number of backers become very large, some of the orders may take an additional month to fulfil. Early orders are given priority if this situation were to occur.



How do I set up the Nanoleaf Smarter Kit? 

It’s easy! All you have to do is plug the Hub into your router, screw the Smart Ivy bulbs into your desired fixture and follow the setup guidelines within the app. Then you can start setting up the fun stuff like scenes and individual names. 

Does the Smarter Kit work with Android? 

The Smarter Kit currently works with iOS. We are developing Android compatibility for the Smarter Kit, with an app set to be released in early 2016. 

Does it come in a Bayonet base? 

No, the Smarter Kit comes in the E26 and E27 Edison screw base. The E26 base is meant for North America, Central America, Taiwan and Japan. The E27 base is suitable for the rest of the world. 

Is the Nanoleaf Ivy color changing? 

This is something we’re developing. The Smart Gem (a smart connected version of our Nanoleaf Gem) will be color temperature adjustable. This means you can adjust the bulb from 6000K (bright daylight quality) to 2700K (warm comfortable glow like an incandescent). The Smart Gem will be released in early 2016.

What do you mean by special dimming functionality? 

The Smart Ivy has the same special dimming function as the Nanoleaf Bloom. This means you can dim the bulb using any regular on/off light switch in four easy steps:

  1. Flick switch ON to turn on bulb
  2. Wait for bulb to reach full brightness, takes 3-4 seconds
  3. Flick switch OFF+ON to start dimming*
  4. Flick switch OFF+ON again to set brightness level*

*flicking switch OFF+ON needs to be very quick motion in order to initiate/set dimming

For more information please visit the Nanoleaf Bloom page on our website http://nanoleaf.me/products/origami-series/nanoleaf-bloom/

What is the power draw from the light switch when the bulb is off and on standby mode? 

The power draw would be 0.5W and in one year this will cost the user a whopping total of $0.50!

Can I place the Hub in one room and control the light bulbs in another room? 

Definitely! The light bulbs can be controlled from a distance of up to 50 meters. This can vary depending on the setting and objects between the bulb and hub.   

How many bulbs can one Hub control? 

The Nanoleaf Hub can control up to 32 light bulbs. 

What are rooms?

The Rooms feature allows you to manage your bulbs according to your home layout. You can organize your lights based on which room they’re in. For example, the smart lights that are physically in your bedroom can be assigned to your Bedroom in the app for instant on/off and dimming when you say “turn on my bedroom lights."

What are scenes?

The Scenes feature lets you create specific dimness/brightness levels based on different times of days or occasions. For example, you can create a custom scene called “Movie Night” where all of the lights in your home turn off except for in the living room where the lights will be set at 50%. 

Can I use the Nanoleaf Hub with other smart light bulbs?

Yes, our Hub is compatible with other Zigbee-enabled light bulbs. This includes smart bulbs like Philips Hue, Osram Lightify, GE Link and Cree Connected.

How do I download the app? 

Head over to the AppStore on your iOS device and type in Nanoleaf.

Does Smarter Kit work in my country?

The Nanoleaf Smarter Kit works anywhere your iPhone works. Just make sure that when you complete your survey at the end of the campaign, you choose the right bulb base depending on your location.
story_txt:
Ready to ship immediately following the campaign!
Ever find it too difficult to leave your cozy bed just to turn off your lights? Do you have a light switch at a hard to reach place? Or do you simply wish you can make things happen just with the sound of your voice?

We believe that connected devices are meant to make your life better and easier, that's why we created the Nanoleaf Smarter Kit - smart lighting you can control using Siri.

The Nanoleaf Smarter Kit is the smartest decision you'll ever make about going smart.

















Best Buy Canada would like to help us promote our Nanoleaf Smarter Kit beyond the Indiegogo Campaign! The Smarter Kit will become available at Best Buy stores after the campaign at full retail price. 



The Nanoleaf Smarter Kit includes the following:


One dodecahedron-inspired Nanoleaf Smart Hub (Supports up to 32 bulbs)
Two exquisitely-engineered Nanoleaf Smart Ivy Light Bulbs




This perfect fusion of form and function sets the stage to an exciting future of light.









The voice commands can be given without unlocking the phone, just like how you would normally use Siri. 
Phrases you can say to Siri:




“Turn on the lights” or “Turn off the lights.”


“Dim the lights” or “Set the brightness to 50%.”


“Turn on the upstairs lights.”


“Turn off Chloe’s light.”


“Turn down the kitchen lights”


“Dim the lights in the dining room to 50%.”

“Make the living room lights the brightest.”

“Lights On” or “Lights Off" 








Through the Nanoleaf Smarter app, you can easily name bulbs, assign bulbs to rooms, and create scenes. The Nanoleaf light bulbs can be dimmed down to as low as 1% and turned up 100% to a crisp illumination equivalent to a 60W incandescent bulb.

story:
Cool and Smart Battery Case

Noshi's iPhone 6(S) battery case with smart function, the LED will be reminder you if have a missed call or new notfications, it's auto charging when your iPhone battery is low power. 

Smart Functions

You can control following functions via App:

  • Missed call LED flicker.
  • Auto charging when your iPhone‘s battery was under the setting value.
  • No button on the case, use App control iPhone charging.
  • No LED indicate, App shown real battery case power.

Blue: 

•Pulses in multi-color blue while the device is turning On or Off. 
•Blinks blue for a missed call, message, or other notification. 

Red: 
• Glows red when the device is connected to a charger and is charging. 
• Blinks red when the battery is low.

Green: 
• Glows green when the device is connected to a charger and the battery is fully charged. 

NOTE: LED will light up only when the screen is off. 



2.0x Battery Life (200%)

Each battery stores 2500 mAh, which is more than 1.0x the size of the iPhone 6 internal battery. This mean with NSCharge installed, you have 2.0 times more battery than a regular iPhone. This gives you over two days of regular phone usage. What will you do when you never need to worry about battery life?


Specification

  • Drop Protection
  • Extra 2500mAH battery for 2.0x battery life
  • Auto-Stop Charge and Rapid Recharge technology
  • Smart App Control
  • Missed Call Alert
  • Bluetooth 4.0 LE
  • Dimensions:  144.4(L) x 69.4(W) x 12.0(H) mm
  • Color: Black/White


  • Slim, sleek profile follows iPhone’s precision lines
  • Compatible with your existing Lightning cable.

Color

Two color options are already set: Arctic White and Charcoal Gray.


How does it work?

NSCharge connects by Bluetooth to your iPhone. Setting up NSCharge is as easy as downloading the app onto your phone. All software updates are wirelessly transmitted to your case.


Rewards

All early Indiegogo backers only $59.
$59 - One black/white Norshi battery case for iPhone6/6S.
$115 - Two black/white Norshi battery case for iPhone6/6S.
$169 - Three black/white Norshi battery case for iPhone6/6S.
$269 - Five black/white Norshi battery case for iPhone6/6S.
$499 - Ten black/white Norshi battery case for iPhone6/6S.
Add $10 for shipping in the US. $15 for Canada, and $20 for everywhere else.


Timeline

 This is how we’ve got to where we are today and our future plans:
Sep.2015: Idea is Born
Oct. 2015: Functional Prototypes
Nov. 2015: Engineer Working Sample 
Dec. 2015: Hardware and Software Devlopment, Debug and Test
Jan. - Feb. 2016: Indiegogo Campaigns, Tooling Begins
Mar. 2016: Preproduction
Apr. 2016: Ship to Backers

About Us

Norshi Company was founded in 2013, we're always working smart watch and power bank. This is our 1st Indiegogo project, we believe that our experience in smart watch to give customers better users experiment.

We are now 120% working on final test to have all of you this great product. Trust us, you won't disappointed.



Other Ways You Can Help Us

If NSCharge is not suitable for you, maybe you have family and friends who can make a good use of it? Please share on your Facebook or tweet on Twitter, every share is appreciated!  You can share through links at the top of this page.  You will be helping them avoid getting frustrated again when the tangled earphone and running out of  power! Thanks a lot.

story:
Sports Stereo Waterproof Wireless Earphones

            

            

            

            

            

 

 

Bluetooth test takes us to over 30metres!

check it out yourself in the video below

                                                           
 

             

 

We've gone for SIMPLICITY and PRACTICALITY in our lightweight, WATERPROOF wireless earphones

             

 

3 colour variations

Black cable & blue earpiece

White cable & blue earpiece

Blue cable & blue earpiece

 

                     

                 

             

          

       

Specifications:

Sport stereo waterproof earphones

Bluetooth Version 4.1  -  Micro USB Charging port  -  Operating range up to 30 feet (10 metres)

Talk time: 6.5 hours. -  Play time: 6 hours. -  Standby time: 250 hours

Battery capacity: 50mAh*2  -  Multi connect technology

 

         

     

We've launched many successful Indiegogo campaigns, the last one was the fasted campaign to deliver EVER (literally sent out perks on day 1) so you can support us with confidence :) Production has started and deliveries are expected to begin in September.

story:
Meet the Solartab® C

The world’s first solar charger with USB-C

USB-C is a future proof, reversible and high power connection that works both as power input and output. Always charge your mobile devices and the Solartab® C itself at maximum speed. 

Including USB-C devices like Google Pixel, Nexus 5x and 6P,  HTC 10, LG G5, OnePlus 2 and 3 and even the Macbook. As well as all your regular USB devices, like the iPhone 6s.

 

 

The Solartab C at a glance

 

Charge day or night. Over and over.

Thanks to the Solartab C's 9,000 mAh internal battery, you can keep charging your mobile devices several times after the sun goes down! 

 

IntelliSun™ Technology

The Solartab® C now features our new proprietary charging technology. Making both charging your devices, and the internal 9,000 mAh battery, quicker and safer than ever before.

And we have included Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 technology on all the charging ports, making your devices charge at the fastest rate possible.

 

Waterproof

The Solartab® C is waterproof with IP67 certification. No need to worry about rain or spills when using your Solartab® C. It’s always ready, wherever you are.

Bring your Solartab® C to the beach, forest, hiking and more! Never worry about your endless power source, even if it starts pouring down.

 

Powerful, slim and portable

We have managed to package a super efficient 6.5W solar panel and 9,000 mAh battery into an extremely portable package. So you can bring the Solartab® C with you everywhere.

 

And it can even charge your Macbook


 

A unique cover

The Solartab C's cover gives it a stunning look, and protects the solar panel.

The cover also works as a stand, so you can angle the panel in different positions.

Find the right angle for maximum exposure to sunlight, plug in your device, and the Solartab C will automatically start charging it at the maximum possible rate!

 

Our premium quality

The Solartab C features the same premium quality and beautiful build as our first product, the Solartab One.

Which was loved by the press, and called the “solar-powered phone charger that actually works” (Rachel A, Popular Mechanics), "the perfect tablet companion” (Derek M, Treehugger) and simply the “best solution for using solar energy to charge your gear” (Chuck L T, The Mac Observer).

 

You can even charge your Solartab C the old way

Solartab C comes with a handy wall charger, so if you ever need to, you can also charge it from a wall outlet. Always have 9,000 mAh of built-in extra power on the go, even if the sun is hiding.

 

Technical Specifications
 

  

USB-C

  • A solar revolution: The Solartab C is the world’s first solar charger with USB-C port
  • Supports Quick Charge 3.0 5V/3A input and output. A reversible, high-power connection that can give power both ways.
  • Compatible with Google Pixel, Nexus 5x and 6P, HTC 10, LG G5, OnePlus 2 and 3 and all upcoming USB C smartphones and tablets.
  • Compatible with MacBook.

 

Thin, light and portable

  • Solartab® C is super light: only 280 g
  • Slim and thin: only 7.5 mm
  • Extremely portable when folded together, easily slips into your bag

 

Powerful and durable solar panel

  • 6.5W solar panel with IntelliSun™ charging technology
  • Super durable yet light solar panel thanks to our Gleam™ coating technology

 

Quick & light internal battery

  • 9,000 mAh LiPO battery
  • Charges quickly from the sun
  • Heat shielded for safety and durability in high temperatures. Long lasting.

 

Waterproof

  • The Solartab® C is waterproof
  • IP67 verified
  • Bring your Solartab® C to the beach, forest, hiking etc

 

Dual USB ports

  • Dual 2.4A USB ports with Quick Charge 3.0 technology, that ensures all phones and tablets are charged at maximum speed.
  • IntelliSun ™ discovers your device’s charging protocol to provide the fastest possible charging speed for any device.

 

Safe and Dependable

  • Solartab® C’s IntelliSun™ technology includes surge protection, short circuit prevention and advanced safety features keep you and your devices safe.
  • The Solartab® C detects when it’s not in use and hibernates. So there’s always power, even if you haven’t used your Solartab® C in a while.

 

Follow us

Always stay up to date with the Solartab team's latest updates on social media, and pick up some daily news from the world of solar power and the green energy revolution!

• WEBSITE: http://mysolartab.com

• TWITTER: https://twitter.com/solartab

• FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/solartab

• GOOGLE PLUS: http://plus.google.com/+Mysolartab

• INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/solartab

• PINTEREST: http://www.pinterest.com/solartab/
 

------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Q: Do you offer a referral system for this campaign?

A: Yes, we do. First, get at least one Solartab® C on our Indiegogo campaign. Then, get 4 friends to contribute to our campaign too, and you will be refunded on one Solartab® C! Here's how:

1. Log into Indiegogo (NOTE: you must be logged in!) and go to the Solartab® C campaign page.

2. Click the Twitter or Facebook icons to share the campaign via social media OR, click the “link” icon to copy your own personal link to share by email, messages or any other private communication with your friends.

3. Your link is personal and can be traced back to YOU. When someone clicks through to the page via your link and contributes to the campaign, Indiegogo’s system will automatically credit you as the referrer.

4. If four of your friends have contributed to the campaign through your link, you will get your total pledge amount for one (1) Solartab® C (including any shipping costs) back from us.

 

Q: Can I order the Solartab® C even though i do not live in US?

A: Yes, we ship the Solartab® C worldwide.

 

Q: What are the shipping costs for the Solartab C?

A: Shipping is free in the United States. For every other country, we add $10 for shipping.

 

Q: How long does it take to charge my iPad with the Solartab® C?

A: For a full charge, it will take about 3.5 hours for the iPad Air 2 and 4 hours for the iPad Pro 9.7.

 

Q: How long does it take to charge up the Solartab®​ C's internal battery using the 6.5W solar panel?

A: Charging the Solartab® C from 5% power to full by solar power only takes about 6 hours.

 

Q: How long does it take to charge up the Solartab®​ C's internal battery using the USB-C wall charger?

A: Charging the Solartab® C's battery from empty to full takes a bit less than 3 hours using the supplied high power USB-C wall charger. 

 

Q: What kind of USB-C cable is supplied with the Solartab® C?

A: The Solartab® C comes with a very high quality USB-C to USB-C cable supporting the USB 3.1 Gen 2 standard. The cable has the ability to deliver 100 watts of power and supports data transfer rates up to 10 Gbps. And is of course fully reversible. This means it’s also ideal for charging laptops like your new Apple MacBook® Pro (2016), Apple Macbook® or Google Chromebook™, as well as all your other USB-C devices.

 

Q: When is Solartab C expected to ship?

A: Solartab C is expected to ship from December. We have already placed the order for the first batch of Solartab® C for Indiegogo backers with our manufacturer.

 

Q: My order number is 0. Should I be worried?

A: No need for concern. Before the campaign ends, the number is "0". After the campaign ends, every contribution is assigned a proper order ID for shipping of perks.

Always charge your mobile devices and the Solartab® C itself at maximum speed. Including USB-C devices like Google Pixel, Nexus 5x and 6P,  HTC 10, LG G5, OnePlus 2 and 3 and even the Macbook. As well as all your regular USB devices, like the iPhone 6s.  The Solartab C at a glance Charge day or night. Over and over.Thanks to the Solartab C's 9,000 mAh internal battery, you can keep charging your mobile devices several times after the sun goes down!  IntelliSun™ TechnologyThe Solartab® C now features our new proprietary charging technology. Making both charging your devices, and the internal 9,000 mAh battery, quicker and safer than ever before.And we have included Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 technology on all the charging ports, making your devices charge at the fastest rate possible. WaterproofThe Solartab® C is waterproof with IP67 certification. No need to worry about rain or spills when using your Solartab® C. It’s always ready, wherever you are.Bring your Solartab® C to the beach, forest, hiking and more! So you can bring the Solartab® C with you everywhere. And it can even charge your Macbook
 A unique coverThe Solartab C's cover gives it a stunning look, and protects the solar panel.The cover also works as a stand, so you can angle the panel in different positions.Find the right angle for maximum exposure to sunlight, plug in your device, and the Solartab C will automatically start charging it at the maximum possible rate! Our premium qualityThe Solartab C features the same premium quality and beautiful build as our first product, the Solartab One.Which was loved by the press, and called the “solar-powered phone charger that actually works” (Rachel A, Popular Mechanics), "the perfect tablet companion” (Derek M, Treehugger) and simply the “best solution for using solar energy to charge your gear” (Chuck L T, The Mac Observer). You can even charge your Solartab C the old waySolartab C comes with a handy wall charger, so if you ever need to, you can also charge it from a wall outlet. Why don't you think that can be 3D printer output from 3DCG-data that exists large amounts in the internet?

For example, Is able to an automatic convert to a simple algorithm processing of these?

I explore that way. At last I have developed a prototype.

My testbed program explanation video is here.

story:
Everyday, we come across battery issues. Although there are numerous solutions around us, none of them seems perfect.

Power Bank:

  • Too HEAVY 
  • Too BIG
  • NOT PORTABLE for small purse
  • Always FORGET RECHARGING!

Standard Charging Cable: 

  • Not durable 
  • HARD to find power outlets!

OK, I admit sometimes I feel safer bringing my laptop on the go.

But think about the power sources around us all the time! What if there is a way for our devices to connect with each other and share their battery lives? -- What a great way to save our phones on the verge of dying!

Finally, we've got you a perfect solution - AnyLink™, making any device as a power source, is the ONLY CHARGING CABLE YOU EVER NEED!

A Magic Combination of Standard Cable and OTG Cable

You have to carry charging cables either in your work life or your social life. 

What if suddenly this charging cable can be turned into an OTG cable!

(OTG is short for On The Go and USB OTG, is a specification that allows USB devices such as mobile phone or tablet to act as a host device, enabling other devices to be connected to get charged and swap stuff.)

Looks like magic, right? The coolest part is that when your friends think you only have standard charging cable and are worried about finding power outlets, you suddenly turn your phones/tablets into power sources!

AnyLink™ - LINK Almost ANY Devices

With one end of MicroUSB/Lightning switchable adapter, and the other end of revolutionary USB-A design that includes a hidden MicroUSB, AnyLink can link almost any two devices!

Ultimately, AnyLink will become the only charging cable you ever need. With it, nobody needs to be worried about battery issues anymore!

Transfer Files Between Your Phones/Tablets

Even better, AnyLink not only shares battery life, but also links social life! It can transfer files/images between phones/tablets in a lightning speed! You can even instant-view full-size images on another device without transferring!

USB-C support

AnyLink Ultimate supports all USB-C devices, including: USB-C mobile phones like Nexus 5X and 6P, USB-C tablets like Nokia N1 and HP Pro 608, USB-C laptop like the New MacBook and Chromebook Pixel. Since all the USB-C devices support OTG technology, you can literally have AnyLink connect any two USB-C devices to charge and transfer data. 

Please check out our new demos at the "Demos of Features in Action" section and take a look at the amazing features of AnyLink Ultimate.

TIP: The USB-C adapter can be on either side of the cable or both!

Turn Your Phone into Computer

With Micro to USB-A Female adapter (free for all Family and Love combo backers, $4 each unit for all Basic, Stylish and Friends combo backers), which is specifically designed for AnyLink, you can turn your phone/tablet into computer, connecting even more devices, like keyboard, mouse, flash drives, external hard drives, camera (incl. DSLR), printer, joystick... literally any USB devices!

View and transfer photos from flash drives, video backup and movie streaming from external hard drives. All in one AnyLink!

Tangle-free and Extra Durable Nylon Makes Life Easier

Covered in braided nylon fabric, AnyLink is tangle-free and durable! No worries about wearing out your cables!

Carry one with you, and share AnyLink with your friends and family. Life couldn't be better!:)

Extend Standard USB Cable into OTG Cable

Fold OTG Cable Back to Standard Cable

Connect Phone (IOS Device) to Computer

Share Battery Life with People You Love

Charge Your Phone/Smart Watch from Tablet's High-capacity Battery On The Go

Remember Friends are Always There for You, And You Can Share Happy Moments with Them in a Lightning Speed

OTG cable has risen to the surface in recent years. It is a incredible product, however becomes useless whenever you don't have a second phone/tablet around. More commonly, we need a standard charing cable to connect our devices to computer or wall charger. So we thought, why not combine the two cables into one multi-functional cable! In this way, people will no long be worried about battery issues since they can always find a power source nearby. That is how the idea of AnyLink came into being.

Our mission is to help people lead a real simple and convenient life, being free of nuisances. We believe in the power of great products and aim to achieve the goal by creating them.

We have spent hundred of days trying to figure out how to incorporate MicroUSB into standard USB-A connector.  It's challenging since it requires very precise engineering in such a small space with a telescopic joint. With tons of failure and efforts, we've finally made the perfect embedded USB connector that can be transformed into MicroUSB. 

Our final prototypes have been well tested and work super great! Our manufacturer is ready to go. We need your support to help this product bring more convenience to people's life. Every dollar pledged will go towards manufacturing, quality assurance, packaging and shipping.

Free Gift -- Turn Your Phone into Computer

The technical issues have already been solved and our prototypes are working great. 

We are collaborating with one of the most prestigious Apple certified cable manufacturers in China. The quality of AnyLink will be super high-end. We have thought about providing more color choices to backers, but for now we'd rather keep it two colors to ensure March delivery.

Although OTG technology is widely adopted, there are still several old models that don't support it. Please make sure your phone or tablet support OTG technology (Google your phone model with "OTG") before you back this project. But it only matters the USB-A+MicroUSB end (power source side), for the Lightning+MicroUSB end (power output side), it is compatible with any phone/tablet with standard Lightning or MicroUSB.

Thanks for all your support! We are committed to making the best product for everyone. Hope you will enjoy it!

FAQs

Is the Lightning plug Apple MFi Certified?

Yes.

Does it have iPhone to iPhone support?

Because iOS devices don't support OTG output, you cannot use iPhone's battery to charge other devices.
But you can charge, transfer/view the photos on your iPhone from Android/USB-C devices. 
Furthermore, even when you don't have any Android/USB-C devices, AnyLink can still be used as standard charging cable for your iOS devices. It's MFI certified, tangle-free and durable! 

Is extra software needed to share (pictures were shown in the video) from device to device once they are connected?

No extra software needed. To view/import photos, just using the Android system default Camera Importer is enough. But if you want to transfer other files, you could use 3rd party file management software.

Free Gift -- Turn Your Phone into Computer

Feature comparison

Why we are different from other similar products?
After we originally launched the project at Nov 11th at Kickstarter, there have been several similar projects coming out in Kickstarter and Indiegogo. We want to reclaim that we are the FIRST creator of this idea on crowdfunding platforms, and the only authorized, MFI certified maker of this concept. 
How important is Apple MFI?

First, you will get this annoying notification all the time for non-MFI cables:


Second, non-MFI cables will be just like how Apple described: "not work reliably". It has a very high failure rate. There are tons of articles on Internet about non-MFI and MFI cables. CNET journalist Rick Broida wrote: "One day, it's working just fine. Plug it in, iPhone charges, unplug it. The next day, or even later that day, I come back, and nothing. Dead. And no amount of wiggling or re-plugging makes any difference. It's like the cable reached its expiration date. There's no sign of fraying or any other physical issue; it just flat-out quits working." Please check out full article on CNET: Why I'm done buying cheap Lightning cablesThird, MFI isn't just a certificate. There are thousands of cable manufacturers worldwide. Only the high-end manufacturers can pass through Apple's very strict MFI process. MFI manufacturers ain't allowed to produce any non-MFI cables, otherwise, their certificate will be suspended by Apple. So in other words, MFI certificate stands for high quality, to match the bar of Apple's own product lines, iPhone, iPad etc. We believe that the highest product quality is the greatest foundation of a genius design. AnyLink will be produced by high-end MFI manufacturer and everything in the package will be in high quality, high durability and great user experience. 









Risks and challengesThe technical issues have already been solved and our prototypes are working great. 
We are collaborating with one of the most prestigious Apple certified cable manufacturers in China. The quality of AnyLink will be super high-end. We have thought about providing more color choices to backers, but for now we'd rather keep it two colors to ensure March delivery.

It's MFI certified, tangle-free and durable!

No extra software needed. To view/import photos, just using the Android system default Camera Importer is enough. But if you want to transfer other files, you could use 3rd party file management software.

story:
Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency.


We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.


Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work?

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 1500 mA.

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 1500mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G.

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps


Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!


What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE

Perks
story_txt:
Small, stylish wearable device that fits in
your pocket. Pull it out when your other
devices need saving in any emergency.

We are living in the time of technology
that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become
essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile
electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication. 

Jiffy
helps your devices when they run out of juice.
When the battery runs out devices and
gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.
Jiffy
is an eco-charger that truly offers freedom and
unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and
gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent
of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless
advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new
adventures even to the ends of the world.THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last
call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last
text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to
charge your device nearby.
TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices
and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the
weather, or temperature outside.

Imagine a scenario of being lost in the
woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only
by Jiffy!
PRIORITY- compared to other methods of
charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical
reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests
unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look
for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will
charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that
can be charged through USB.


Charge while on any type of transportation:
train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme
mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera,
or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without
communication. 

We all know how problematic it is to find
an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations
when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural
phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the
internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED
light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can
be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most
needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge
any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that
needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy
work? Jiffy represents a USB charger that
mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the
atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous
micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex
mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy
which is transmitted to the micro generators.
The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that
support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 1500 mA.For the people that are less technical,
Jiffy with the 1500mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens
that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are
navigating the internet through 3G. Technical info about the prototype:Behind the micro generator is mounted a
controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V

a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current
fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic
energy.

story:
Opening Video Credits
Director: Michael Fetner
Music: Imagine Dragons, "I Bet My Life"

THIS CAMPAIGN ENDED MAY 11th. Please DO NOT contribute as you will be charged immediately. Please visit wavcatcher.com for future updates. Thank you!

WavCatcher™ Signal Smartphone Case

 Hi! I'm Pete Peng, the founder of Farfield, a communications developer specializing in advanced antenna and phased array solutions. The picture above shows our recent breakthrough, a working field tested iPhone 6 case prototype that truly improves cellular and WiFi signal reception. What we need now is your help to turn our iPhone 5/5s and 6 prototypes into market ready form factors as illustrated in the picture below.



The Plan



Our Story

Go farther. That’s the story of my father, Dr. Sheng Y. Peng. He is credited as an inventor on over 20 patents and patent pendings. He is a pioneer and among the elite in the fields of advanced antenna and phased array technologies. And it is his magnum opus that WavCatcher™ is built upon.

My father emigrated to the USA and earned here both his Master’s degree and his Ph.D. in Aeronomy (atmospheric physics). During these early years, he developed a reputation for solving problems associated with communications systems in the Defense and Aerospace sectors. Many of his solutions are still used to this day in service of our country.

Fast forward to now. My father's new invention is the ultimate MIMO broadband solution and covers any frequency of interest in a small form factor. This makes it a perfect fit to help cure the "can you hear me now?" disease that plagues everyone. As end users, we are limited to the confine of our carrier's infrastructure. What if we could change that on our end?

After extensive lab testing and field testing across highways and remote areas, we successfully demonstrated our working prototypes to established retailers. However, they require vetting the FINAL case design and packaging before committing to a purchase.

Our problem though is that our resources are tied up in a custom base station antenna project for a Tier One carrier. This is the reason we need at least $100,000 to complete the final form factor design and packaging necessary to satisfy the retailers and go to mass production.

Releasing WavCatcher™ into the market allows you, the end user, to expand your personal connectivity. My father believes that a connected world is a safer world. All his life, he has gone farther with the purpose of doing good. So this is where we are, at the climax of his story. Will you help us all go farther?



The Demo


This is a short clip demonstrating our iPhone 6 case prototype. The signal increase is real and not simulated. The name of the carrier has been blurred, because our Signal case is engineered to work on any cellular and WiFi network that follows established frequency protocols.

Everyone's Problem

If your carrier does not have a tower near you, there's not much you can do to get better reception without enhanced assistance.

A cell phone tower with base station antennas is like a light house, and you are the wayward boat with a lantern (phone). Each base station antenna directs a ray of energy that must enter into your phone's coverage area, which by nature is not a sphere and typically poor. So the light house's narrow beam must connect with the glow emitted by your lantern. If there is no intersection, there is no coverage.



A Few Myths

Now let's debunk a few myths about connectivity and why, despite a couple sporadic claims, a successful real world solution has yet to be engineered for the smartphone.

1.  If Power + Antenna = Connectivity, then an amplified solution would be awesome. Not exactly. Your phone's system has a power regulator to safeguard you per FCC requirements. Amplified/boosted solutions, especially those near you, must be cleared as safe. And these solutions are costly, too big and/or have too much power to be designed safely into a smartphone case form factor.

Regarding the antenna part of the equation, the larger the antenna, the farther your reach. Your phone is designed to be cool, so the antennas (and there are many) inside are small. Even worse, most are confined around electronics and metal, and that creates scattering and interference. Hence, the onus of connectivity, and the end user experience, falls upon your wireless provider.

WavCatcher™ addresses this by giving your phone bigger ears. Our case is essentially a super antenna that captures the phone's energy and re-radiates it to provide your phone the most optimal coverage pattern. The measured data below details this pattern with a Peak Gain is 4+dBi. It is of our base antenna element in free space at Port 1. The testing was certified by MET Laboratories, Inc.

 2.  An Antenna's frequency band must match what the carrier's cell tower is broadcasting. So you just can't stick something on your phone and claim to improve signal reception. The antennas in your phone are inherently narrowband which means they cover a specific frequency pipeline.

The problem is that narrowband antennas can be sensitive to detuning. Remember Antenna Gate for the iPhone 4? The end user's hand shifted the phone's frequency which induced loss of connectivity. The bumper add-on was a loading solution to minimize the detuning from the frequency shift.

Since WavCatcher™ is a broadband and frequency diverse solution, we essentially eliminate detuning issues. For instance in the data below, the measured Return Loss is well below -15dB for the ultra broadband frequency range of 1.7 GHz to 2.9 GHz, and the measured Smith Chart Data is right at the center of the chart. If you'd like to understand more about why this matters, please check out Antenna-Theory.com from Dr. Bevelacqua of Google. It's excellent for the layperson.

3.  Signal Strength does not equal signal reception and quality. Your bars are similar to a fuel gauge. It's not a precise measurement. Every phone has a signal strength meter which defines a bar by dB. Translation: -70dB to -120dB roughly equate to 5 bars to 1 bar. And that doesn't include what you are connected to. LTE, 4G, 3G, 1x, etc. are examples of data speed standards listed from fast to slow. You would rather have -110dB LTE (1-2 bars) than -80dB 3G (4-5 bars). And even if you don't move, these metrics can fluctuate based upon user traffic (think rush hour) and atmospheric conditions.

If you'd like to see your iPhone's metrics, go to your dial pad and enter: *3001#12345#* then hit send. You will see on the top left the numeric value where the bars used to be. Anyway, simply doubling your phone's signal strength, a 3dB improvement, is less than a bar. A 10dB improvement is 10 times the signal strength, and that's roughly one bar.

(iPhone 6 Teardown, courtesy of iFixit, Step 14)



Location Matters

It starts with location. For example, were you aware that the primary cellular antennas in the iPhone 5/5s and 6 are positioned at the bottom of your phone? Knowing the location of the antenna hot spots allows us to design the necessary footprint for improved cellular and WiFi signal reception. Since we are not replacing the iPhone's existing narrowband antennas nor can we directly plug our MIMO antenna directly into its antenna ports, a WavCatcher™ case is created by the synergy of the following building blocks.

1.  Technology - Broadband Printed Circuit MIMO Antenna Element
2.  Engineering - Integration of "Hot Spots" for Unique Inductive Coupling
3.  Materials - The Right Dielectric for RF Performance AND Protection

Every model phone has different form factor designs and engineering. So every model requires a unique WavCatcher™ design. Increased signal reception requires optimal 3-Dimensional spatial coverage. Anything else, such as a directional beam to expand your range is not efficient because your smartphone is pinged by a radius of available towers and searches for the best performing radio. Therefore, you can't aim your phone since its position will always vary at different angles depending on where it is or how you are using it.



Summary

We created WavCatcher™ as the first in a line of wireless products designed to make a difference; in this case, to help us stay in touch and stay safe. Our first end user solution gives us the ability to go farther. It isn't the end all but is the first step in breaking down forced limitations.

We also understand it's about teamwork. Not only do we need your help to see this through, your feedback will help us improve future WavCatcher™ models. That's how it worked for the first iPhone, which barely had any apps following its release. And now we're at the iPhone 6 and 6 Plus in a mobile driven world. Although we've come a long way, we still have so much farther to go.

story:
ABOUT BUSK IT

Hi! My name is Mina Alali. You may know me from my music - I’m a pop singer/songwriter, and music producer. Being an artist, I know the struggle of trying to make money from music, which is why I’m creating a revolutionary app that will digitalize the concept of busking, when a street musician or an artist plays for money. The app is called Busk-It, and it will launch in Fall 2020.

Here’s how it works: any artist or musician is able to live-stream to music lovers across the world. It’s just like busking on the street, but now online, accessible anytime and anywhere, whether it’s from home, at a practice session, or even during a public performance.  These are exclusive performances only available on the app.

For music lovers, this is truly live music at your fingertips. You’ll be able to choose your favorite genres of music, and artists performing those genres will show up on your app. If you become a fan of an artist and you like their music, you can support them through donations.  They need your help to be known and thrive.

For every musician who becomes discovered and is able to make a living, there are thousands of equally talented musicians who go unnoticed. By using Busk It, your dollar goes towards these musicians, and their ability to continue doing what they love. You are contributing towards a new and easy way for artists to reach global audiences and generate income. 

Busk It is an application, created by an artist and musician, for artists and musicians. 

WHY I NEED YOUR HELP

I have self-funded the development of the app, but there will be ongoing administrative costs to continue fixing small bugs in the software, as well as making sure we have the appropriate legal and corporate structure to protect artists who are using the app.

If you have the means at this time, your donation, no matter how small, would be immensely appreciated by my team and I. It will go directly towards protecting those who will be using and benefiting from what this app has to offer. If you cannot support financially, a 5-second share would also mean the world! Thank you so much, and I can’t wait to get this app in your hands.

$25: Bumper/Laptop Sticker: “I Was a Mini Angel Investor for Busk It”

$50: Personalized Thank You Note from CEO

$100: Lifetime Recognition on Busk It Website as an Angel Investor

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this. If you wish to learn more and/or be among the first to know when Busk It launches, follow us @officialbuskit on Instagram and/or submit your email to the mailing list on officialbuskit.com. Thank you again, and stay safe.

story:
Who?

Stan, also known as Alistair Loveless, and his lady-friend Jen are two of the most talented, hard working people I've ever met. They recently moved to Milwaukee to further their careers, and this burglary is a major setback. If you've ever been to Club Inferno, you've benefited from Stan's live VJ sets and the events they've created - like Lube-Ra-Dora and Meat Market. They also help promote and capture other peoples' shindigs, including the Glitter to Gore competition shared above.

Why?

Stan and Jen are two of my favorite people. Not only are they good friends, but they're also great at what they do - and need the proper tools to thrive, let alone survive. When their apartment was burglarized, Stan's work laptop was stolen. That MacBook was essentially his livelihood. Whether developing new techniques, designing, mapping visuals or creating instructional tools - a computer is necessary for him to continue as a professional. They deserve so much, and ask for nothing - so here we are.

How?

Please help by donating! Any size contribution is appreciated. The goal is to replace the laptop, but anything raised will help Stan and Jen tremendously. I'm horrified that their home and way of life was violated like this. Join me in helping get them back on track, and moving forward again. Spread the word, and share this campaign!

Thank you.

story:
Find your misplaced keys and phone in seconds.

No one plans on losing things. It just happens. The average person spends two full days per year looking for their misplaced phone. Add on time spent looking for keys... That's a lot of time!

Thankfully, you don't have to rely on yourself anymore. With the new Pebblebee Finder - the longest lasting Bluetooth tracker - you can't lose!

   "IN A CLASS OF ITS OWN"

 

The Finder utilizes a surgical grade stainless steel ring to provide a classy look with durability second to none.

The loud beeping alert and flashing red LED light allows you to quickly track and find your important items.

From the get-go we knew we wanted a sleek, sexy design that was pleasing to the eye and felt great in the hands. It was important that our Finder looked as if it was meant to be there.

Perfect for keys, luggage, or anything you take on the go.

Classy additions to a purse or your expensive equipment.

 

The Pebblebee® Finder and our new app are so easy to use. Open the app, press Find and instantly find your valuables. Or, squeeze the Finder to ring your phone even if it's on silent mode. Lost is found.

The Pebblebee® Finder may be small but its speaker gives off a loud alarm that can be heard up to 200 feet away at 85 decibels!

LEADING THE WAY. Our new technology gave us the ability to stretch tracking capabilities up to the 200 foot mark.

THE MOMENT OF REALIZATION. The feeling that hits you when you realize you've left your keys or other valuable items behind in a public place causes that quick spike in adrenaline we have all felt. With the Pebblebee® Finder it's a calm storm as you pull out your phone, open the proximity map and see where they were last recorded. Now go get those "lost" but not so "lost" items and continue on with your bar hopping extravaganza!

THE BUILD. There were absolutely ZERO corners cut with these bad boys. The attention to details is what separates our brand new Bluetooth tracking device from all the others. Little details like a replaceable battery, high grade stainless steel protection, and increased tracking distances take the Pebblebee® Finder to a league of its own!  

 

Don't be selfish!  Grab one for a friend or spouse as well while the discounts are alive. These prices are discounted Indiegogo prices and will adjust to our full retail pricing after the campaign is over. As you bump up each tier, your savings increase. If you decide to get a bunch of birthday or Christmas gifts out of the way and grab our 10 pack, you will save a whopping total of $65.00.  

 

 

 

MEET THE TEAM.  Nick and Dan were the Lead Engineers at Boeing upgrading wireless communication of commercial jets for the military. When BLE 4.0 (Bluetooth low-energy) came out, they saw a new application for the technology—both their toddlers delighted in playing hide and seek with their parents’ belongings, wreaking havoc. Nick and Dan found a solution and made one of the world’s first Bluetooth item trackers in 2013.  Three years later and here we are with an agile and experienced professional engineering firm filled with mechanical engineers and software developers.

Pebblebee® has now perfected the Bluetooth tracking experience and is ready to launch our Finder into the world.  The durablility, connectivity, ease of use and build quality of the new Finder is second to none. 

Dan Daoura - CEO

Nick Pearson-Franks - CTO

Gabe Rowe - CIO

JT Rantaniitty - Marketing Advisor

Charles Harris - VP Marketing

THE LAB.  This is where the magic happens. This is where our ideas and technology are born. Our state-of-the-art electronic testing equipment allows us to perform some serious and intense R&D on our technology products. The new Pebblebee® Finder may be small but it's packed with amazing features that were created in our very own lab.

It was important that our Finder looked as if it was meant to be there.Perfect for keys, luggage, or anything you take on the go.Classy additions to a purse or your expensive equipment.

story:
Parkset : For all outdoor events


Parkset’s main feature is a folding frame. The dynamics of a tabletop connected to a base (the case) in this way creates a very stable table, compared to the rickety fold-up camp tables currently available.

A standard extendable handle is included along with ‘all terrain’ outdoor wheels. 
Case dividers are used to hold contents in place and prevent interference with folding legs. US PATENT – 12/972.895

The goal is to develop a fully-functional and stylish prototype. 
It is 90% completed. It is the final 10% of the design process that requires the engagement of an industrial engineer and designer. 
I lack the qualifications and funds to develop Parkset to this final stage.

All images of the product are computer generated.


The working prototype pictured above is made out of cardboard and spare parts from luggage and a shopping trolley. Computer imaging is used to show what the case should look like when produced from the preferred materials like polycarbon. My background in fashion has taught me that aesthetics are important. Only a completed prototype would be the best selling tool to attract investors or companies with commercializing capabilities.

I have tried everything from Government grants, which are extremely difficult to apply for and nearly impossible to win. Small business start-up services like so-called incubators or business angels, have proved to be a waste of time. I even attended business seminars for product developers and manufacturers where a Chinese producer actually told me, “we only deal with business men,
not housewives or sole traders”.

I am comparing Parkset to wheeled luggage.

There is no doubting the success and popularity of wheeled luggage in past 10 years. 

Therefore the potential for this very practical product to also be a  huge success
is very real.

If anyone can provide a good reason why Parkset should not be compared to wheeled luggage, please email me your reason at purdy_products@hotmail.com.

I need to confirm that I am not deluding myself. Please do not use this email address to communicate your support. Your contribution will articulate this loud and clear. Also if you know any investors, distributors, buyers, licensee or product scouts, please alert them to this campaign.

Concerts at local wineries.

An average of 5,000 people per event. Several events per year.

The market research is overwhelming and maybe Melbourne is the picnic capital of the world with all of our parks and gardens. Almost every local council has several organized events every year. I’m sure it’s similar in other countries. Thanks to the availability of camp chairs in recent years, there is no doubting their comfort and convenience has made these outdoor events even more popular.


Major Horse racing carnival in Melbourne.

100,000 people on the public lawn over the 4 day carnival.

The idea of Parkset actually came to me on Melbourne cup day at Flemington. One of the 25,000 people who enjoyed a picnic on the public lawn. I pulled a muscle in my arm while carrying a fold-up table and chair in one hand, a food hamper and drinks bag In the other. And thought, there has got to be a better way.

Other council events include carols by candlelight, opera in the park, country race picnics … the list goes on and on.

YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS
will go directly to:

  • Consultation with an industrial designer for the appropriate materials and moulds for production. A high impact polymer (currently used for luggage) would most likely be used for the case, and of course to get the colours right. 
    Approximate professional fees: $7,800

  • Engaging an engineer who is well-versed in design for manufacturing. The aim is a design that makes the most of manufacturing techniques available in china. But also engineering to international standards to insure quality and safety standards. 
    Approximate professional fees: $9,700

  • Final Technical Drawings for tooling. All manufacturers require these to be of a certain standard.
    Approximate professional fees: $4,500

All funds raised will still be used in the pursuit of commercializing and developing Parkset, regardless if funding goal is not achieved. 

Project Timeline

Risks & Challenges

I will research and investigate thoroughly for primary manufacturers that are capable of mass-production of high quality consumer products. But there is always the risk the chosen manufacturers will not be able to start production immediately. Hence the generous lead-time. 

There is however, no risk of the chosen manufacturer not honoring or redeeming the Parkset vouchers. It will be one of my priorities to stipulate this in any contract that I sign.

All images of the Parkset prototype are computer generated.  

Music: The Four Seasons (Vivaldi), performed by John Harrison with the Wichita State University Chamber Players.

3D Visualisation of the Parkset provided by Reel Pictures, Melbourne.

story:
What do earphones, laptop chargers and power cables all have in common? They knot and tangle at the most inconvenient times!

Cable tidies exist, yes. But they can take too long to use and are fiddly too, so most people don't bother using them.

Introducing Mobu - The world’s most versatile cable clip. Mobu does away with cable tangling with speed and style. Snap together to store, pull apart to use. It's that simple!

 

 

Designed to combat Möbius energy

Did you know, loose earphones and cables can form up to 120 different knots in your bag or pocket?! What's more, the odds are about 50/50 that a knot will form for many loose earphones each time they're put away. Mobu, the World's most versatile cable clip puts an end to this. It stops cable tangles in style.

 

No need to coil or wrap cables

Use Mobu to snap the loose ends of your cables together before storing. It's as easy as that. Using Mobu is much quicker than winding your cables up and unwinding them. Great if you're in a hurry! In fact, it's almost as quick as putting away your earphones away loose, but it stops them tangling too.

 

Mobu will fit any cable up to 4mm in diameter

Mobu’s patent-pending design means it can be attached to almost any cable size, whether it's thin earphones or thicker braided phone charging cables. So no worrying about picking a large, medium or small. It's a one-size-fits-all design! All you have to change is the way you clip Mobu onto different cable sizes.

 

How many do I need?

Earphones - 3 Mobu clips
Charger cables on the move - 2 Mobu clips
Charger cables at your desk - 1 Mobu clip (attached to Mobu Connect)

 

Lasts longer than cables

Mobu has been tested to live up to the rigors of use and will probably outlast your cables. Fortunately it is strong too, so when you go in for an upgrade, Mobu can clip straight onto your new gear.

 

Mobu is super easy to use

1. Open Mobu by lifting the catch.
2. Fix cables in place. Methods depend on cable size.
3. Snap Mobu closed around the cable. Hold the cable in place if necessary.

 

Mobu Connect

Supercharge your Mobu cable organising powers with Mobu Connect and stop letting your
cables from falling out of reach.

 

What is Mobu Connect for?

Mobu Connect works with our Mobu cable clips to ensure your charger cables are always within easy reach. Have you ever unplugged a cable to have it fall out of sight? Have you ever searched around on the floor for a charger cable when your phone needed charging? Mobu Connect can help keep cables organised at your desk, at your bedside table, on your dresser, on the wall, and more!

 

How to use Mobu Connect

Mobu Connect is installed using special double side tape which is suitable to most surfaces. It's removeable too! To use Mobu Connect, clip cables onto it using mobu cable clips (not included). One Mobu Connect can hold up to 3 cables, 6 if you stack two together!

 

Mobu Connect is super easy to use!

1. Tear off the tape strip and stick Mobu Connect to a flat surface of your choice.
2. Clip Mobu to your cables and you're now ready to keep your cables tidy!

 

Creating Mobu

The final design for Mobu was perfected after dozens of prototypes of different shapes, gripping methods and materials had been made and tested. A few of our favourites are shown below.

We used our handy 3D printer (and lots of trial an error!) to reach a design we think does the job juuuuust right.

Fast forward a year after prototyping, and we're now at the end of production and ready to ship orders live!

 

About the Makers

At Version 22, we make functional gift and home products which solve REAL everyday problems in way that make you smile :)

We have successfully launched three different brands through crowdfunding platforms (Kickstarter and Indiegogo), and our product ideas have collected a bunch of national and international design awards between them, and have featured heavily in national and international press too.

We love making things, and will continue doing so... until someone stops us! Thanks for joining us on our latest journey, and we hope to see you stick around for more.

Simon Lyons
Director
Version 22 Team

Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | YouTube | Media Kit | Contact

 

Shipping Details

We will dispatch your order within 7 days. Mobu will be shipping from the UK, so you should expect the following delivery times from dispatch:

UK: 3-5 business days

EU: 5-10 business days

INT: 7-20 business days

 

Return & Refund Policy

At Version 22, design and quality come first and we are committed to delivering the highest standard of product.

If you're looking to return a faulty or incorrect item, please get in touch by sending an email to indiegogo@version22.com so we can get this sorted for you. Please quote your Order Number, Full Name, a description of the issue, and include any photos that will help us help you. We will then take it from there.

If the product is being returned because it is faulty or because it has arrived with the packaging damaged, then it is eligible for a refund. We will ask you to return your order back to our office in the UK, and the refund will be determined through product testing. When the returned product is received and tested, a refund for both the product and return shipping will then be issued if appropriate.

If you change your mind about the product, you are welcome to return it but at your own cost and in the condition in which you received it, complete with original, intact packaging. We do not offer exchanges for different items.

We will only accept refunds within 28 business days of purchase, and if accepted, your refund will be processed within 7 business days.

story:
Bye Bye Selfie Stick

Why bring a selfie-stick when you're already holding a stick? The SELFSKIE is the world’s best all-in-one mount that allows you to use your Smartphone and GoPro on the stick you’re already using – such as your ski pole, golf club, umbrella or your fishing rod. Be creative. You'll never need a selfie-stick again! 

Order now and for the first backers we'll make sure you'll receive your SELFSKIE perfectly in time for the holiday season!

Smart & Durable Engineering

The SELFSKIE is cleverly engineered and designed for easy use. This means you can leave it attached to your stick during your whole trip or vacation and simply decide when you want to use it. 

To take a picture, simply flip up the grabbing arm and mount your Smartphone to your stick in one easy motion. The included Bluetooth Remote (BT) will make it even easier to snap your shot. Of course, you can also use the self-timer on your smartphone.

 

Going Extreme

We know that conditions can get a little rough when you’re engaged in outdoor activity such as skiing. That’s why we designed the SELFSKIE as a very sturdy device, using only durable, top quality materials. 

Action Cam

We designed a mechanism that firmly attaches itself to your stick for a perfect, fixed grip. The SELFSKIE can be used even when you're wearing (ski) gloves. If you prefer to use an action camera, we've got you covered. The grabbing arm can be easily removed so you can attach any action camera compatible with the GoPro mount. We also made sure the SELFSKIE can withstand the most extreme weather temperatures.

Colors

We all need al little distance sometimes

Take perfect group pictures from a distance using your SELFSKIE on a (ski) pole as a camera stand or simply mount it on a tree. The included Bluetooth Remote allows you to take pictures from a distance of up to 32 feet (10 meters). You’ll never have to bother bystanders again. Now you can take as long as you want to capture your perfect smile!

 

 

What’s in the box

1x SELFSKIE  

1x Small Strap (for objects such as a Ski Pole or Golfclub) 

1x Long Strap (for larger objects, up to 9 cm in diameter) 

1x Bluetooth Remote including battery

Why buy a Selfskie?

The best all-in-one lightweight mount that allows you to use your Smartphone and GoPro on a stick you're already using

Leave it attached to your pole during your whole trip or vacation 

Never again bother others to take your picture

Works with all Smartphones and standard GoPro's or Action-Cam compatible mounts

Bluetooth Remote included

Smart & Durable Engineering 

Also perfect for your Flog or FaceBook Live Stream

The Team

Emelie - CEO - Founder

Sam - Design - Co–founder

Teun - Creative - Co–founder

Otto - Product - Co–founder

Emelie explains her motivation for SELFSKIE:

For the last 10 years I've worked in TV advertising and I was always intrigued by smart, easy, time-saving solutions. I was surprised when I saw skiers struggle to get out their clunky selfie-stick and take a group photo. I wondered... Why bring a selfie-stick when you’re already using a ski pole? I couldn't believe there wasn't a clever, simple tool on the market that addressed this issue. I decided to quit my job and pursue my lifelong dream of creating a product myself. Luckily, some of the smartest people I know joined me. Sam is the best industrial designer I know. Teun's creative mind is constantly overflowing with ideas. Otto keeps a steady eye on the product and financing. Together we will make this dream come true!
