The included Bluetooth Remote allows you to take pictures from a distance of up to 32 feet (10 meters). You’ll never have to bother bystanders again. Now you can take as long as you want to capture your perfect smile!  What’s in the box1x SELFSKIE  1x Small Strap (for objects such as a Ski Pole or Golfclub) 1x Long Strap (for larger objects, up to 9 cm in diameter) 1x Bluetooth Remote including batteryWhy buy a Selfskie?The best all-in-one lightweight mount that allows you to use your Smartphone and GoPro on a stick you're already usingLeave it attached to your pole during your whole trip or vacation Never again bother others to take your pictureWorks with all Smartphones and standard GoPro's or Action-Cam compatible mountsBluetooth Remote includedSmart & Durable Engineering Also perfect for your Flog or FaceBook Live StreamThe TeamEmelie - CEO - FounderSam - Design - Co–founderTeun - Creative - Co–founderOtto - Product - Co–founderEmelie explains her motivation for SELFSKIE:For the last 10 years I've worked in TV advertising and I was always intrigued by smart, easy, time-saving solutions. I was surprised when I saw skiers struggle to get out their clunky selfie-stick and take a group photo. I wondered... Why bring a selfie-stick when you’re already using a ski pole? I couldn't believe there wasn't a clever, simple tool on the market that addressed this issue. I decided to quit my job and pursue my lifelong dream of creating a product myself. Luckily, some of the smartest people I know joined me. Sam is the best industrial designer I know. Teun's creative mind is constantly overflowing with ideas. Otto keeps a steady eye on the product and financing. Together we will make this dream come true!

story:
We are developing a signal boosting case for the iPhone. We currently are designing for the iPhone 4/4s/5/5s/5c and samsung galaxy models. Right now, we are testing a prototype on all phone models listed above. 

Here's a video to show how helpful "Air" can be. This was a real scenario and proves that our case works to gain service. 

The above video was our product reveal video. Beginning at 0:51 you can see a prototype of our case, and just after that real side by side testings are performed to show the increase in signal.        

The money we gain from this project will go towards perfecting our current design (testing and creating a conductive and thin material) and the customization process. At Thompson Creations, we believe that beauty exists in elements that are simple, yet incredibly useful. We have crafted a simple design that improves the quality of signal that iPhones receive and, with the customization option, brings the intimacy level of owner and iPhone to a whole new level. We started from the ground up with this project and looked at the actual purpose of a cell phone. The answer, of course, is to make phone calls and to communicate with others. To be able to do this, signal must be at an optimal level. When traveling during bad weather and other sub-optimal settings, signal may be reduced. This can cause problems, which is actually how this idea was formed. The founders of Thompson Creations were faced with this problem awhile back and, with no technology or other quick fixes, engineered a solution. Once they returned to a location where they could develop a more practical concept, they formed a complex design to figure out how they could produce an attachment to a phone to enhance signal. After many attempts, the signal boosting case was finally born.

Here we have a video that shows the core values to our existence, and how and why we design our products. We hope you enjoy it!

Here is a picture of a side by side comparison between a phone with our case and a phone with no case.

Here is our samsung galaxy case.

Here is a commercial that also displays what our case is all about.

story:
Short Summary

Here's a short, eagle-eye view of our campaign:

Our tour will consist of hosting events at venues and college campuses. Venue marketing events will consist of a nightlife party and attendee giveaways. College campus marketing events will consist of an entrepreneur speaker series for the students. This will help them learn the ins and outs of starting up their own company or working for a startup. 

  1. The Product/Service
    • Party On Mobile app/Social media based event marketing 
  2. Problems that our app fixes
    • Currently there are poor “real-time” marketing tools for events. Specifically for media and event exposure. **WE FIX THAT**
    • People are able to share media from an event all in one place. No more hunting pictures down on Facebook or asking people to send them to you.
  3. The Long-Term Goal
    • To create a new social network that allows all event related business (media, details, ticketing, etc.) to be on a single platform. This platform will save time and money for both event attendees and event coordinators. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • $10,000 goal helps:
    • Launch tour expenses
      • Travel (Hotels, gas, reimbursements, Uber rides, food, etc)
      • Hiring Brand Ambassadors
      • special guests
      • marketing for events
  • Check out the awesome perks/packages we have to offer in return for your donation! 

The Impact

We’ve worked with over 100 venues and event coordinators of all types over the past 1.5 years. This includes coordinating successful events with them and marketing events for them to drive higher attendance rates. Doing this allowed us to pinpoint all of the marketing needs of the event industry first hand, both professionally and as an event attendee, and incorporate them into a one of a kind mobile application. 

Now we are collaborating with these venues and coordinators to schedule a one of a kind launch tour starting in California and Arizona!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! 

If you would like to help us out, please share our campaign link online and by word of mouth to friends and family. 

Live Happy. Live Fearless. Live |on|!

story:
Dear friends! Due to the fact that the last time we did not get the amount needed, however we received a lot of positive feedback, therefore we decided to extend the campaign to be able to raise funds needed.

Please, visit our relaunched project!

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/wisebutton/x/4720890

Therefore, we have to postpone the delivery up to June 2014. Nevertheless, all our supporters will receive their orders retaining offers in which they were purchased.

We understand that the delivery date moved significantly and if you are not willing to wait, please, feel free to write us a letter, indicating your purchase, we will check all the details and make a refund. Please note, to make up for the wait - the delivery would be free of charge!!! ( applicable to supporters of our first campaign only!!!)

story:
As an EVdriver, I have personally been in a situation where I needed to use a charger plug that was already occupied by another driver. On several occasions, the other car was fully charged, but still using the charger… The current EV driver protocol dictates that it is wholly unacceptable to unplug someone else’s EV to plug in your own (not that electric car drivers are known for bouts of violence, but still), which leaves the problem: How do you communicate with the other driver?

As I sat cursing the other EV driver who was hogging the plug…  I figured it out.

A QR code system, on a small sticker in the window of your EV, can allow for safe, anonymous communications between two EV drivers. Simply scan the QR code on a car, and a URL opens up with that car’s unique seven digit hexcode. If you are also a registered user, you can submit that code and a message will be generated either via email or SMS (user preference) to the owner of that car. The other driver can then respond by similarly following a URL with a simple yes/no form. The result of that choice is then transmitted back to the original questioner. Whether it is a yes or no, you’ll know for sure.

When a user responds in the positive, a post is made to either Facebook or Twitter indicating that they’ve just been a good citizen and, “Shared The Plug”.

 

 

This is what it looks like to send a request:

 

This is what it looks like to receive a request:

 

What We Need...

Basically, to completely design and flesh out the site, I will require roughly $5,000. This is for design, testing, hosting, and refinements.

If for some reason we do not meet the funding goal, we will try to make up the shortfall out of pocket, such is our desire to see the project through.

The Impact

Today, this is not a terribly huge problem; but soon it will be. Every day, more and more EV's are rolling off the lot, and the number of chargers is not keeping pace!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot help finanically, sharing this page is very much appreciated!

story:
Plug Your Electronic Devices Into Our 100% GRID FREE Outdoor SOLAR POWERED SMART TABLE WITH USB & AC POWER OUTLETS!

Stop Fighting For Power Outlets Inside of Campus Study Halls and Libraries and Get Outdoors Under The Sun!

Imagine going outdoors to work on your laptop or tablet for hours, while keeping your smartphone, mp3 player, and ebook reader charged - completely off the grid with 100% clean solar power! With the Solar Powered SolGreen Smart Table you can study outside, while enjoying the aroma of the freshly cut campus greens! Get out of that cramped study hall and stop fighting for AC outlets to charge your tablets, phones, and laptops!  

The innovative SolGreen Smart Table is an all-in-one table, shelter, and seating unit with an off-grid solar system. The SolGreen Smart Table provides 110VAC via 6 standard AC outlets, as well as 5VDC via 4 USB power outlets, allowing multiple users to power or recharge their portable electronic devices from 100% clean solar energy! while on-the-go at a college, public library or state and local park.

With such features as extended power storage for after-hours usage, LED lighting, and a water safety system, the SolGreen Smart Table is safe, durable, and efficient.

The Patent pending SolGreen Smart Table provides a new green power source to directly meet the energy needs of over 5 BILLION consumers (worldwide) using today's portable electronic devices, such as: laptops, tablets, smartphones, iPods, digital cameras, gaming devices, and more!

This technologically advanced renewable power source is a perfect fit for many colleges and universities, businesses, consumers, state and local governments, hospitals, and more!

THE SOLGREEN SMART TABLE GIVES YOU THE ENERGY TO GET OUTDOORS!!!

Features of the SolGreen Smart Table:

  • Supports recharging and powering of all laptops, mobile phones, tablets, e-readers, cameras, portable media players, handheld gaming devices, and more!
  • Energy storage allows for extended after hours usage
  • Includes a total of six 110V AC power outlets, plus four 5V DC USB outlets
  • Provides continuous power with virtually no down time (with typical usage)
  • Dual photovoltaic modules
  • Multiple battery configuration
  • Solar charging system regulates, maintains, and stores collected solar energy
  • Optional water safety system automatically shuts off power if unsafe moisture levels are detected, such as rain or flooding
  • Attached, movable seating for up to 8, plus 2 wheelchairs
  • American Disability Association (ADA) compliant
  • Made in the USA
  • Steel and fiberglass construction for extreme strength, quality, and durability
  • Many options available including but not limited to – seating and size, extended performance, LED lighting, custom colors, custom logos, tamper resistant hardware, and more!

This avant-garde unit was developed by SolGreen Solutions LLC, a solar research, design and engineering company.

Although we have already funded and tested the development of our SolGreen Smart Table prototype, we are in need of additional funding to begin our marketing efforts and ramp up production.

Help us make this 100% Grid Free Solar Smart Table and shelter available to college students and other users of electronic devices at campuses across the nation so we can all stop fighting for AC outlets in cramped indoor study halls and libraries!

Why Help?

Your contributions will help us to further production-ready development and begin an aggressive marketing campaign!

We want all of you to be able to use a SolGreen Smart Table at your local colleges and universities, libraries, parks and recreational areas, business campuses, schools, hotels and resorts, coffee shops, theme parks, and more!

Any and all funds raised will go 100% toward advertising, marketing, and developing additional models of our SolGreen Smart Table.

By investing in our green products, our clients will lessen their dependence on traditional energy sources, further promote environmental protection and energy conservation - all while making clean solar power available to the masses!

Your contribution to help make this product available will:

  • Prime the US economy with the introduction of a new green technology that will heavily be in demand
  • Deliver a viable renewable energy source from which over 5 billion users of electronic devices can benefit
  • Support an American made product
  • Invest in US green job growth
  • Lesson the nation's dependence on fossil fuel energy sources on our college campuses and myriad other locations
  • Provide an alternate clean energy source to allow students and consumers to take advantage of the great outdoors while working or studying with their electronic devices

 

 What You Get

$5 – Our heartfelt appreciation for your selfless support, plus a personal ‘Thank You’ txt or email from the developers of the SolGreen Smart Table

$20 – All of the above, plus a limited edition SolGreen Solutions logo embossed Triple Function Pen with LED light and Capacitive Stylus

$50 – All of the above, plus a limited edition SolGreen Solutions logo embossed 100% cotton T-Shirt (men sizes S-2XL, ladies sizes 3-19)

$100 – All of the above, plus a limited edition SolGreen Solutions logo embossed Auto-Open Compact Vented Umbrella with Matching Sleeve AND a 25-oz BPA Free Aluminum Sports Bottle

$200 – All of the above, plus a limited edition Color Changing Solar Wind Chime

$500- All of the above plus an Energizer Solar Charging Flashlight

$1,000 – All of the above, plus 10% off your first SolGreen Smart Table order (up to 3 units) Plus a Raptor Solar Charge Radio- Multipurpose Digital Weather Radio with USB Phone Charger

$5,000- All of the above plus 15% off your first SolGreen Smart Table orders (up to three), a SolGreen Solutions logo embossed Backpack

 

$10,000 – All the above, plus a complete standard SolGreen Smart Table (additional options, shipping, and installation not included)

 

 

Thank You for Viewing Our Campaign!

We look forward to and thank you in advance for your support! Remember to like us on Facebook and share the SolGreen Smart Table with all of your friends and loved ones!

story:
We are a group of Electro Magnetically sensitive people, living in a world where we can't live.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/x2ay83leyishfgr/aaFFc6cgjI/EMF%20-%20021314.mp3

Hear Audio by Kim Goldberg, an award winning author, who talks about Refuges on our radio show...(starts about 5 mins time).............

We are looking for funding to create alternative community places where we can set-up places to live in the United States, (and abroad), that have a limited amount of wireless technologies in the air. These affect our emotional and physical well being.

We are looking to start creating different housing areas, about 5-10 acres of land, and housing, and do experimental type living in these places, before we expand and get larger areas that will work for us, where we feel safe and EMF free.

Please see our website, www.occupyemfharm.org... and see the different areas of expertise we have accumulated; physicians, researchers, scientists, engineers, activists and a growing amound of people who are becoming sensitive to the wireless technologies. We need this housing and we intend to have engineers and environmental physicians work with those who are sensitive, to help bring them relief. 

 I am Sandra Fields, the host of a weekly tele-conference (for the last year and 1/2), on the dangers of the wireless technologies. I am also electro sensitive and feel all the symptoms - heart palpitations, extruciating burning sensations, and twitches and spasms on a daily basis.

I feel these types of communities will grow in kind, and we want to provide a safe haven for our group and others, to start the process of healing from the same technology that seems to be advancing our society... at the cost of killing and maiming us.

Your kind contribution will help us find and fund off grid housing - we ideally would say about $1900.00 per month would house about 10 of us per month. We think it is a good idea to start with existing - rural and out of the way houses, that do not have cell towers near them.- and build upon this concept as we get larger and can house people in different cities/states.

Your kind contribution will help us research areas that would best service our needs and if we get a larger contribution, there are places to buy in rural areas, where we can set-up communities for our sensitives.

What we really need is to start small, say rent approximately 20 places in different cities, for a few months each, and then buy land and build "small safe houses",on purchased land. We would then set up communities where people can recover and live in a healthier lifestyle. 

* We hope you will visit us and participate in our weekly tele-conferences on the dangers of the Electro Magnetic frequencies and wireless technologies. Here is the  link to get a call in number for our calls every Thursday at 2:00pm (Eastern time)

To get a call in number, and join the conferences; here is the link: 

http://myaccount.maestroconference.com/conference/register/B64AE3FZ0MUSBRGI

If you cannot contribute, please tell others of this unpublisized devastating issue. We need you to spread the word.

Please also listen to our other, past conferences to get better education on how the wireless technologies are adversely effecting people.

Also your contributions will help us keep our website up and running; we need $175.00 for the year to help us spread the word.

Also we have a toll- free (hot line) number where those affected by EMF's can call us. We have specialists standing by to answer their questions, or provide reassurances about their illnessness. Your contribution will help us keep this hot-line active, and allow us to spend the time for volunteers to redirect the hotline calls to the proper authorities. 1-800-967-3070

We thank you for your contribution. We will be setting up a non-profit 501 C shortly, and will inform you on our progress towards our goals.

Thank you very much.

Sandy Fields

We need this housing and we intend to have engineers and environmental physicians work with those who are sensitive, to help bring them relief.  I am Sandra Fields, the host of a weekly tele-conference (for the last year and 1/2), on the dangers of the wireless technologies. I am also electro sensitive and feel all the symptoms - heart palpitations, extruciating burning sensations, and twitches and spasms on a daily basis.I feel these types of communities will grow in kind, and we want to provide a safe haven for our group and others, to start the process of healing from the same technology that seems to be advancing our society... at the cost of killing and maiming us.Your kind contribution will help us find and fund off grid housing - we ideally would say about $1900.00 per month would house about 10 of us per month. We think it is a good idea to start with existing - rural and out of the way houses, that do not have cell towers near them.- and build upon this concept as we get larger and can house people in different cities/states.Your kind contribution will help us research areas that would best service our needs and if we get a larger contribution, there are places to buy in rural areas, where we can set-up communities for our sensitives.What we really need is to start small, say rent approximately 20 places in different cities, for a few months each, and then buy land and build "small safe houses",on purchased land. We would then set up communities where people can recover and live in a healthier lifestyle. * We hope you will visit us and participate in our weekly tele-conferences on the dangers of the Electro Magnetic frequencies and wireless technologies. Here is the  link to get a call in number for our calls every Thursday at 2:00pm (Eastern time)To get a call in number, and join the conferences; here is the link: http://myaccount.maestroconference.com/conference/register/B64AE3FZ0MUSBRGI
If you cannot contribute, please tell others of this unpublisized devastating issue. We need you to spread the word.Please also listen to our other, past conferences to get better education on how the wireless technologies are adversely effecting people.Also your contributions will help us keep our website up and running; we need $175.00 for the year to help us spread the word.Also we have a toll- free (hot line) number where those affected by EMF's can call us. We have specialists standing by to answer their questions, or provide reassurances about their illnessness. Your contribution will help us keep this hot-line active, and allow us to spend the time for volunteers to redirect the hotline calls to the proper authorities. 1-800-967-3070We thank you for your contribution. We will be setting up a non-profit 501 C shortly, and will inform you on our progress towards our goals.Thank you very much.Sandy Fields

story:
"CORE” ---- An Amazing Wireless Pocket-Sized Device

Turn your regular HDTV into a smart TV, Computer, & Media Center without paying the smart TV price!

Have you ever wished you could display your laptop on a bigger screen… or have you ever been frustrated & tired of killing your eyes trying to browse the internet on a tiny cell phone screen…well, you’re not alone?

About two years ago, we decided that enough is enough and we started working on a solution.

I must admit it was not an easy task, but finally, here it is. We call it the Core and it is the heart of our system. It’s a tiny device that you can simply plug into any HDMI port in your TV, projector, or monitor. You are now ready to stream information to your large screen TV in Full HD and show the same content that is on your PC, or cell phone in real time.

We support Full HD and sound...And - all of it is done with no wires.

You can show any content, on any screen, at any time. It can be personal content, movies, games, internet or anything else. That’s why we've worked so hard to get to this point and we will continue to work hard because the future possibilities are endless. 



                                                              It cost less too!


So Why Not Get Started – It’s as easy as using your android phone or tablet…but on your TV!


*Screenshot of CORE

Click for large image (right click to open in new tab)


If you have ever used a smartphone, tablet, or computer, it basically the same! Watch online videos via browsers or applications just like what you do everyday, but on your HDTV....and, it's healthier for your eyes! No more worries about dying batteries in the middle of a movie while watching on a small screen. 



Just plug it in and your ready to go…

1.  Plug your CORE into the HDMI port of your TV or monitor.

2.  Connect the USB cable for power source.

3.  Turn on the TV or monitor.

4.  Enjoy!




Supports many more features

Duplicate your screen

Duplicate your computer screen on any TV in full HD, Projector, or Monitor without cables.  Show family pictures, the latest movies, play games or browse the web.




Extend your desktop

With CORE, you can view, edit, or create different types of documents using you large TV screen giving you more room to work.

Create Word documents,PowerPoint, Excel…..etc



CORE might be small, but it can do mostly everything a computer can do.

CORE allows you to operate files and documents from many inputs on a large screen.

You may also share or view files via local networks! Just like a real computer! 


Google Chrome Browser

Forget about Chromebook,  Chrome Box or Chromecast! CORE uses Google chrome as it’s browser, which will enable you to access your Google cloud or just about any website you like! 

Want to chat with your friends on Facebook? No problem! 


Want to check out what’s going on around the world? No problem!

Want to watch YouTube videos, or play games?

Absolutely no problem!


Google Play Store

Since CORE has Google Play Store, you can acess your google acount to download and play almost any game in Google Play Store


Smart TV for Everyone

Did you miss a TV show? Is it only available online? No problem! With Core, you can watch videos online,or download them. And you don’t EVER have to watch them on your small tablet or computer screen again!




Media Sharing Center

Core allows you to share your media through your prefered Wifi connection. NO CABLES required.

You can share your music, pictures, and videos from multiple devices to CORE immediately!

In addition, if you have personal cloud storage such as Western Digital Inc.’s MY BOOK LIVE, you would be able to stream and play all the files on CORE using local network!

In the following examples, we’ve used some popular mobile devices for demonstration purposes. All trademarks and logos reserves full rights to their respective company.


Sony Xperia Z1S, by using our bulit-in media sharing app, you would be able to watch an online movie while texting your friends!


The media sharing feature is also available with iPhones and iPads.


Image of an iPad sharing Photo




Watch movies in any room of your house.

Here’s the how you do it. After you set up a personal cloud storage. CORE will create a receiving server and automatically search your device and display an icon on your HDTV.



­

Then, just click on the icon to open you folders.



You can then search for and click the file name to play, just like using your file manager.



Enjoy!



Mirror display

CORE can not only support mirror display from your mobile device, but also your laptops/macbook and PC/MAC! Unfortunately the mobile device mirror display feature only works on Android so far; however, we are developing the software for iPhones and iPads. Please like us on our facebook page to receive the latest update!
The mirror display is a feature for new generation phones (Android 4.2.2 or up). Picture tells more than words, here are some examples



LG G2


HTC ONE



Kindle Fire HDX



PC/Mac screen mirroring feature


CORE’s mirror display is compatible with Win XP, Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1
You no longer needs to upgrade your Win8 to Win8.1 for their miracast feature. Even my grandma’s Window XP can mirror to CORE!


CORE also supports macbook mirror display



Use Cases


No More Straining your eyes 

Ever have trouble reading your phone messages, surfing the internet, or watching videos on a tiny screen? Well now you just need to mirror your phone's screen and display it on your HDTV!



See you Grandchildren in real time

For example, if you want to see your grandchildren, or speak to them live on Skype in real time, no matter how far away they may be, you can easily do that on your big screen TV.  It’s almost like having them in your living room live



Enjoy the moment with others

Just like other TV Boxes (Roku, Apple TV...etc), CORE allows you to watch online movies and videos. However we NEVER limit your choices of channels!



Conference

If you’re In a conference room, company meeting, classroom, or sales presentation with a HD projector or HD Monitor, you can use multiple cores to simply connect to the projector or monitor, and display the presenter’s information directly from your laptop to the projector/monitor wirelessly.



Presentation

Or if you need to make a presentation yourself, you no longer need to carry around a heavy laptop or worry about problem set ups. Just pop the core into your pocket before you leave home, and easily connect to the presentation projector with no worry about compatibility, or cables. It’s quick and easy.





We have many more features than any other systems.

We have added many features to the CORE that we know you’re going to love. Let’s face it. With the internet you can watch movies; play games, locate information, send emails and more. All those features have been built into the core. With the simple click of a mouse on one of the icons below… you can watch thousands of movies…, or click a different icon and gain access to thousands of games…all on your big screen in Full HD... And yes, you can even send and receive emails right from your TV. 

For those of you familiar with Google play store, there are thousands of different applications you can choose to download with just a click of the mouse using your Google account.

What makes these scenarios possible?  The Core! 


Every CORE package comes with a special mouse.


Convertible Mouse

Our mouse is a folding mouse, which makes it lightweight and self protecting against dirt and dust.


1)  A decent 2000 dpi

2)  Convertible

3)  Portable


It also has a special magnetized place to store the receiver so it never gets lost.






Here is the Compare Sheet with other similar products.



Connectivity


CORE contains 2 USB port, and it can cooperate with multiple plug-ins





Add on perk


CORE wireless Keyboard


For those who want to do a lot of texting, this keyboard is portable with a size of 8 x 2.5 inch.

CORE contains computer features that enable you to type articles, create Powerpoints, and edit Excel documents using this keyboard.

It’s slightly smaller than your TV remote, so you can probably fit both CORE and this keyboard in the same pocket and carry them with you.

*The CORE mouse is included in every CORE packages, keyboard is optional.



CORE Convertible Mouse

If you like the design of CORE’s convertible mouse, you may purchase addtional CORE mouse packages. 








CORE Development

Our location is in Southern California. This product was designed and assembled in United States.

You might have seen similar products online, such as ‘Android mini pc’ or ‘Android TV stick’ from Chinese’s factories.We can guarantee that CORE has the best quality components and the latest technology. 



*Product would be delivered by May, first come first serve.


Please like us on Facebook to receive the latest news about CORE!

https://www.facebook.com/eDataTech.core

story:
Overview:

WizardToo's Vision is to develop and build the first digital publishing platform for Tarot cards featuring an easy-to-use interface that simulates real, printed cards and allow users to do Readings, Explore, Collect and Maintain a Library of digital Tarot cards that will work on any digital device. We are currently finishing the development of a proprietary application (Tarot eCards(tm)) and Web Store (www.tarotecards.com), and are preparing to launch the App module for the Apple iOS devices (iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch) next month. We are seeking funding to help us complete the development for the App modules for the Android, Mac and PC computers. 

Background

The first Tarot cards date back to the 1400's and continue to have worldwide appeal. Millions of Tarot cards are still sold annually to a global market and Google reports over 11 million searches monthly for Tarot. Thousands of Tarot decks with different theming and artwork have been published since the 1400's and new Tarot titles continue to be published today, mostly by large publishers to the millions of Tarot buffs and professional readers around the world.

Tarot decks, similar to books and magazines have traditionally been published as printed cards. Accompanying the card decks are guidebooks called Little White Books that contain background information and card meanings. The Little White Books serve as the basic guide for understanding each Tarot deck but because of their small form factor they are a fussy tool for finding and reading information. For most people, the user experience is far from ideal and this is further complicated by the shrinking number of retail outlets carrying Tarot cards making it increasingly difficult to locate and buy new titles.

Market Opportunity

With advances in digital technology and mobile devices, there are a growing set of digital tools that can be applied to improving the user experience for Tarot cards. The opportunity is to leverage these advances to develop applications and tools that can facilitate the use of Tarot cards on digital devices. Similar to iBooks, digital editions of Tarot cards could be collected and stored in a personal digital library and then accessed anywhere, anytime on any digital device. And because of the global access to the Internet and digital devices, Tarot eCards could make available any of its Tarot decks to virtually any Tarot buff through an Online Web Store, in any region around the world.

The Company: WizardToo

Backed by months of research and due diligence, we were able to confirm the potential for this unique market opportunity and a company was formed, WizardToo, with the mission of tackling this challenge. The company was founded by Ron Leong, a marketing executive with experience managing major consumer products, games and eCommerce brands. Minimal initial funding was provided by family members and the company was launched this past January. The core of the company is a small but dedicated group of experienced business and technology people teamed with experts from the Tarot community. Our Tech team has experience building interactive products for companies such as Hasbro, Milton Bradley and Disney, and our Tarot experts have created some of the most popular Tarot decks in the market. We are confident that WizardToo has the skill set to successfully deliver on this vision.

The Campaign: Tarot eCards(tm)

Over the past months, we have designed and built an infrastructure coupled with a well conceived business plan for this publishing platform called Tarot eCards (tm). This proprietary application will facilitate Exploring, Readings and Collections on digital devices and offer digital editions of Tarot cards that can be collected  from an online Web Store and maintained in a format similar to iBooks, enabling the user to access their Library of Tarot cards anywhere, anytime on any device.

We are now completing the first phase of development with the build-out of the App module for the Apple iOS mobile devices (iPad, iPhone and iPod touch) which is now in beta testing. Plus the framework is in place for the App modules for the Android devices, the Mac and PC computers. The design and development of the Web Store (www.tarotecards.com)  is completed and ready to go LIVE. We have successfully transitioned beyond the concept stage and now have a fully functioning application in beta testing. To date, our beta has been testing bug-free and we are preparing to launch the Tarot eCards Apple iOS App and Web Store next month.

                               

Through our proprietary publishing platform, Tarot eCards can publish and distribute digital editions of Tarot cards coupled with an easy-to-use App that provides functionality similar to a printed tarot deck for Readings, Exploring and Collecting digital Tarot cards through an intuitive interface. It is designed for easy retrieval of information and has functions such as a custom spread design tool, an option to use major or reversed cards and a Significator selection tool, plus the Exploring function unlocks information about the creator and deck. The basic App allows Users to purchase and add new decks to their personal library from our Large Selection of Tarot eCards in the Web Store (www.tarotecards.com). All of these functions are accomplished through a single App that will allow secure access to a User's Library anytime, anywhere on any of their digital devices. For the Store Content, we have secured and will be offering a selection of popular Tarot decks that we have licensed from noted Tarot artists, and new Tarot titles will be added to the Store monthly. Here are some display images from the Tarot eCards App:

                                                   The Tarot eCards App Button

 

Sample User's Library Collection and Bookshelf

Sample Spread Card Layout 

Sample Card Selection with Meaning

Share Our Vision

With our Tarot eCards App for the Apple iOS devices  (iPad, iPhone and iPod touch) in the final testing stages and our Web Store ready to go LIVE, we plan to launch this initial phase for Tarot eCards next month. With our proprietary application, users will be able to Expore the World of Tarot through collecting and building a personal Library of digital Tarot cards from our large online Collection, and Explore and do Readings anywhere, anytime by using our intuitive, interactive tool that can be accessed from any digital device.

To complete our Vision, we are in need of additional funding to complete the Tarot eCards platform with the build-out for the Android, Mac and PC Apps. We are reaching out to INDIEGOGO to assist us with this effort. We believe that we have developed a market changing concept that will bring a sea change to the Tarot community. We will be competing against several large publishers and believe that with your support, we can level the playing field in this market. We would welcome your backing to complete this Vision.

We've assembled some noteworthy Perks that will reward those who join us on this journey. Also, you can opt to use the cost of your Perks to HELP AL's ANGELS support its Sandy Toy Drives and Holiday Parties for kids.

Thanks for taking the time to review our campaign. We hope you find merit in our proposal and we appreciate any level or support you might find appropriate. And if you can't help us financially, visit us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/TAROTeCards) and pass this information on to a friend who might be interested in our vision and help spread the word. 

ABOUT AL'S ANGELS

Al's Angels is a non-profit, charitable organization whose mission is to provide assistance to children and families suffering hardship due to life-threatening illnesses or poverty.  (www.alsangels.org)

The Campaign: Tarot eCards(tm)
Over the past months, we have designed and built an infrastructure coupled with a well conceived business plan for this publishing platform called Tarot eCards (tm). This proprietary application will facilitate Exploring, Readings and Collections on digital devices and offer digital editions of Tarot cards that can be collected  from an online Web Store and maintained in a format similar to iBooks, enabling the user to access their Library of Tarot cards anywhere, anytime on any device.
We are now completing the first phase of development with the build-out of the App module for the Apple iOS mobile devices (iPad, iPhone and iPod touch) which is now in beta testing. Plus the framework is in place for the App modules for the Android devices, the Mac and PC computers. The design and development of the Web Store (www.tarotecards.com)  is completed and ready to go LIVE. We have successfully transitioned beyond the concept stage and now have a fully functioning application in beta testing. To date, our beta has been testing bug-free and we are preparing to launch the Tarot eCards Apple iOS App and Web Store next month.
                               
Through our proprietary publishing platform, Tarot eCards can publish and distribute digital editions of Tarot cards coupled with an easy-to-use App that provides functionality similar to a printed tarot deck for Readings, Exploring and Collecting digital Tarot cards through an intuitive interface. It is designed for easy retrieval of information and has functions such as a custom spread design tool, an option to use major or reversed cards and a Significator selection tool, plus the Exploring function unlocks information about the creator and deck. The basic App allows Users to purchase and add new decks to their personal library from our Large Selection of Tarot eCards in the Web Store (www.tarotecards.com). All of these functions are accomplished through a single App that will allow secure access to a User's Library anytime, anywhere on any of their digital devices. For the Store Content, we have secured and will be offering a selection of popular Tarot decks that we have licensed from noted Tarot artists, and new Tarot titles will be added to the Store monthly. Here are some display images from the Tarot eCards App:
                                                   The Tarot eCards App Button
 
Sample User's Library Collection and Bookshelf

Sample Spread Card Layout 

Sample Card Selection with Meaning

Share Our Vision
With our Tarot eCards App for the Apple iOS devices  (iPad, iPhone and iPod touch) in the final testing stages and our Web Store ready to go LIVE, we plan to launch this initial phase for Tarot eCards next month. With our proprietary application, users will be able to Expore the World of Tarot through collecting and building a personal Library of digital Tarot cards from our large online Collection, and Explore and do Readings anywhere, anytime by using our intuitive, interactive tool that can be accessed from any digital device.
To complete our Vision, we are in need of additional funding to complete the Tarot eCards platform with the build-out for the Android, Mac and PC Apps. We are reaching out to INDIEGOGO to assist us with this effort. We believe that we have developed a market changing concept that will bring a sea change to the Tarot community. We will be competing against several large publishers and believe that with your support, we can level the playing field in this market. We would welcome your backing to complete this Vision.
We've assembled some noteworthy Perks that will reward those who join us on this journey. Also, you can opt to use the cost of your Perks to HELP AL's ANGELS support its Sandy Toy Drives and Holiday Parties for kids.
Thanks for taking the time to review our campaign. We hope you find merit in our proposal and we appreciate any level or support you might find appropriate. And if you can't help us financially, visit us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/TAROTeCards) and pass this information on to a friend who might be interested in our vision and help spread the word. 
ABOUT AL'S ANGELS
Al's Angels is a non-profit, charitable organization whose mission is to provide assistance to children and families suffering hardship due to life-threatening illnesses or poverty.  (www.alsangels.org)

story:
My passion for inventing goes back to hearing stories of my grandpa who had filed several patents and was a classified genius for the early Special Ops group.

When I was 8 years old I submitted my own first patent.  It was granted but my family didn't have the money for patent attorney fees.

My idea was a heated camping/folding chair. Today, you can now find "seat heaters" - a heated folding chair with a patent pending.

My latest idea started when learning to snowboard at the age of 12. I would ride a ski bus alone for over an hour to Mount Ashland every week, 

While riding the bus to the mountain early one morning, with lots of time to think, I had the dream of inventing a new snow sport.

I envisioned a device easier to learn then skiing and snowboarding but also much safer as well.

I came up with a 5 piece sled, Snosoot, that you can steer/carve, wear and walk that gives you an enhanced perspective of the snow you've never experienced before.

Snosoot is ridden lying down, requiring minimal balance to operate lowering the chance of injury dramatically.

story:
You must have heard about a lot of magnetic charging cable, and possibly used one of them before. They make life much easier when you don't have to plug in and out the cable every time you want charging or transferring.

But they also works only one-way, which means there's still half of the job left.

Plus, what if you want to use it as HDMI cable as well? They are notoriously hard to install between your monitors.

 

Dual-magnetic attachment, charging/data/HDMI all-in-one

It's always 50% fuss left when you are using current magnetic charging cables with one side in magic and one side in traditional port, especially it's often tricky to plug in---like moniters' back, or charger's ports.  

 

Simplelink has a 20-pin magnetic tip to attach the cable safe and firm onto the devices on both ways, making connections faster and more convenient than ever before.

 To demonstrate how two way magnetic cable works, here's a short video:

 

Safety pins for safe & stable connection

 

The industry's first-ever black safety pins makes the point-to-point magnetic connection more stable and accurate than any other magnetic cable on market.

HDMI cable is always a pain when you want to plug it in onto the back of your monitor--think about all those times when you search in the dark just to get the wire connected! Want to switch the cable between different monitors/TVs? God bless you didn't put them near the wall.

 

Normal cable VS. Simplelink​

 

With Simplelink, you can now plug in the cable into any display device in just a few seconds on both ways. No searching, no fumbling, one clicking sound and all is done. 

But convenience doesn't sacrifice any function. You can transfer a crisp & bright 4K signal @ 60FPS through the cable to get all your content displayed perfectly on your screens across different sizes.

A second screen for your iPad Pro

 

Why not? You can also connect your tablets or laptops to your screen via the Type-C port to switch to bigger-sized display with zero compromise in pixels!

 

Simplelink also has super high-speed data transfer function. Portable SSD? No problem. You can always enjoy the fastest speed possible with the fastest installment ever.

 

Apart from data transferring, the beauty of Type-C cable also enables quick-charging at up to 60W---where most QC standards(3.0/4.0) is capable of.

 

Steady 60W Charging on MBP in real time

 

Steady iPad Pro charging at 30W

 

You can take it anywhere, start charging your devices in seconds, get the juice at the fastest pace, and leave with no hassle in getting the cable out!

For the magnetic tips, Simplelink uses NdFeB magnet (N52) for better magnetic force & durability, the 18K-gold plated pins for better transfer stability, and finally, an aluminum shield to protect every component from tests of nature. We also designed a small LED indicator to tell the status of your connection, and an anti-fray neck to make sure the cable stay safe from potential fraying or bending after years of using.

We use cotton wire inside the cable along with 4-braids of nylon wires for better pulling resistance, and Kevlar material on the outside to endure all the daily bends and twists, making Simplelink one of the best cable in terms of built quality.

 

Safe, easy and snappy magnetic connection

 

Attention: We have been asked a lot about Thunderbolt 3 cable, now here it is:)

The extension of cable length is a pound-for-pound business, longer cable costs significantly more to produce, but we managed to make Simplelink+ the most affordable duo-way magnetic TB3 cable you would ever find on all platforms, with reasonable price for unlimited performance. 

The dedicated 24-pin design takes one step further to endure super-fast transferring of data and power, while keeping the magnetic tip cool and stable.

We will also attach a free tip remover for every package, so that you get to clip the tip out safe and easy. 

Want to expand your docks but hate the plug-in design that are a pain to remove? Here comes Simplelink magnetic hub! Easy on, easy off, with essential docks and the most compact body possible. 

It works perfectly with our 20-pin magnetic port. Anytime you want to get a presentation, or transfer a huge file, one snug is all you need.

 

World's smallest hub with magnetic attachment

It also works as stable as any hub that connects through physical tip with a ±9° tilt allowance, and the reinforced magnetic dock provides even better stability when connected.

 

Seamless switch from cable to hub

 

The preparation for this product has already begun. We have been working with the factory tirelessly ever since the relief from coronavirus situation in China. With complete design and full materials in the houseware, we got to react to all situations quickly and smoothly.  

What you see is what you can actually get. With all the testings and QC process being finished as we speak, we will start shipping right from the factory as soon as the campaign is over.

We also offer add-ons for accessories for you to complete your own shopping list. Don't worry, they are all set just like other earlybirds to make sure you get them at the best price!


 

We are a team dedicated to bringing the Magnetic connection to people's daily digital life, making products easier to use, more durable to last the test of time, and more fulfilled in life with their power.

We have a mature production supply chain to make things happen and delivered.  We always think before we produce, because that's the best way possible for a brand to grow and be better.

With full preparation and dedication, we set out to building a whole magnetic connection system that helps everyone with worry-free, hassle-less user-experience.

PROJECT IS VERY SIMPLE AND WILL HELP YOU TO CHANGE YOUR WAY OF USING REMOTE CONTROL.

ALL YOU NEED IS AN IPHONE IPAD OR ANY ANDROID PHONE.

YOU PLUG THE IREMOTE IN THE HEADSET JACK PLUG AND DOWNLOAD THE CONTROLLING APP THAT YOU CAN PARAMETER AS LIKE.

THERE ARE SOME OTHER DEVICES LIKE THIS ONE BUT ANY OF THEM IS USING THE SIMPLE JACK PLUG.

USING THE JACK PLUG WILL LET US TO OFFER THIS PRODUCT AT A VERY LOW PRICE NOT EXCEEDING 40 USD .

THE APPLICATION WILL BE FREE OF CHARGE .

WE NEED YOU HELP AND SUPPORT .

ALL DONATION EXCEEDING 30 USD WILL RECIEVE ONE IREMOTE FOR FREE.

 

FOR EACH PORTION OF 30 USD YOU WILL GET AN EQUIVALENT NUMBER OF IREMOTES.

story:
Zeekly is a startup company competing against multi-billion dollar corporations (Google, Microsoft, etc) to protect your privacy. We need your help to support our site & help it grow. If you care about internet privacy, please donate today and help us bring private secure web search to everyone.

Update- Nice article Sunday, September 23rd in the Tampa Bay Times: http://www.tampabay.com/news/business/new-zeekly-search-engine-offers-privacy-when-using-the-web/2142944


Zeekly.com - How It Started

At the beginning of June when the story leaked out that all of our big tech companies where under court orders to give the government all of our internet search data, my wife and I were frustrated. We understand that there are legitimate reasons to collect data on "bad people" to keep us safe (and we are supportive of our government in these scenarios), but certainly we felt that normal people who aren't doing anything wrong shouldn't have their privacy violated in this way. What you search for on the internet is private information. We use the web to solve problems, explore our interests, purchase things, & connect with like minded people around the world. You should be able to do these things without somebody else recording a history of your activities. We decided to do something about it, and Zeekly.com was born. (This has been a big news story about government spying, but in case you missed it, the details are here: http://www.theguardian.com/world/the-nsa-files). 

Zeekly is a search engine that protects your privacy. First, we do not store the keywords you search, or the sites you visit (commonly called metadata). Secondly, Zeekly is running on 2048-bit SSL encryption, so when your computer/phone/tablet is connected to our site, nobody can see what you're doing on our site because it's encrypted. This keeps your internet provider and/or phone provider from capturing your search data when using our site, also.

Within 3 weeks of launching the site on August 1st, users are now viewing over 1,000,000 web pages per week, and this continues to grow rapidly. Zeekly is a well established company with a bright future, and so far we have had excellent support from the media. Here are a couple of recent stories-

http://gadgets.tmcnet.com/news/2013/09/06/7392440.htm

http://www.wnd.com/2013/08/new-search-engine-protects-you-from-nsa/?cat_orig=us 

http://www.wnd.com/2013/08/wnd-readers-flood-secure-website/?cat_orig=diversions 

http://opensearchnews.com/2013/08/a-search-engine-that-hides-you-from-the-nsa/ 

http://canadafreepress.com/index.php/article/56940

http://www.ghacks.net/2013/08/28/zeekly-another-privacy-based-search-engine/ 

http://www.blograzzi.net/zeekly-one-more-privacy-focused-search-engine-website.html

http://www.freerepublic.com/focus/f-news/3053602/posts

http://browse.feedreader.com/c/Christian_Downloads/556818383

http://conservativebyte.com/2013/08/new-search-engine-protects-you-from-nsa/

http://joemiller.us/2013/08/google-says-users-of-gmail-should-expect-that-others-will-have-access-to-their-email/

How Can You Help?

We need your donations to pay for upgrades to web servers as we grow, web programmers to help us make the site better, and marketing to get the word out about our site to the world. Here are some of the specific things we will do with your donations-

  • We are launching an internet portal soon as part of Zeekly and need to cover the costs of programming. You will be able to have a Zeekly home page that has internet search, news, weather, information etc.
  • We are launching an online email service where you can have a zeekly.com email address (similar to gmail/hotmail). Your donations will help launch this service. We want to do this also in a secure way, and this will definitely cost more money to explore those possibilities.
  • We have spidering technology that runs on Hypertable (a BigTable data format similar to what Google uses for their web indexes) that launches this week. This is what separates us from others, and puts us in the category with the other more well known search engines. Because Zeekly is building it's own web indexes (in contrast to other "privacy" sites out there), it is a true search engine that is being setup to have a big impact on the market.
  • We want to market Zeekly to everyone. We think everyone deserves high quality private web search. Marketing is expensive. However, we have carefully researched this and found where we will get the best return on investment for marketing.

We have already put $20,000 of our own funds into this, and look where we are today after one month. We will use your money wisely and effectively. And, although we put an "goal" amount on this campaign on Indiegogo, the more money we raise, the bigger and better Zeekly will be! So, we hope to raise much more than $25,000 so we can compete with the big tech companies in the market (google, bing, etc).

The Impact

America (and the world) needs solid new companies to step forward and provide high quality services while still protecting your privacy. Zeekly is leading the way. By supporting us, you are making a big statement that your privacy is important (and yes, people are watching to see what happens here). Zeekly's very unique story is truly a "David and Goliath" story of the little guys going up against the big guys and winning. You can help us make that happen!

Ultimately, Zeekly.com is your search engine, and it's future is in your hands. Zeekly can be the next Google or Yahoo, but only if you support it. We sincerely hope you will donate to our cause and help us bring private & secure web search to the world!

Other Ways You Can Help

Go to https://www.zeekly.com and check out our site.. you'll love it!

Tell others about Zeekly and this campaign. Social networks like Facebook have been very successful so far in spreading the word!.

So, we hope to raise much more than $25,000 so we can compete with the big tech companies in the market (google, bing, etc).

By supporting us, you are making a big statement that your privacy is important (and yes, people are watching to see what happens here). Zeekly's very unique story is truly a "David and Goliath" story of the little guys going up against the big guys and winning. You can help us make that happen!

story:
Hi! thanks for checking out our project. With your help we would love to make our idea a reality and turn your laptop into a desktop.

Laptops have become remarkably portable over the years. While we enjoy the mobility of laptop, some of us still use desktops to work efficiently and comfortably.

Hand made with fine natural basswood, Desktop Chair simply holds your Apple laptop and turns it into a desktop with an external display, a keyboard and a mouse, allowing you to work comfortably by raising your eye level for better posture, less strain on your eyes, neck and back.

 

'Laptop on the go, Desktop at home'.




How does it work?

Simply connect your Apple laptop with an external display, a keyboard and a mouse. Your laptop will run with the lid closed (cable adaptor may be needed). Apple calls it "Closed Clamshell Mode". Visit the Apple support page for complete step-by-step instructions. It's super easy!



Fits all current (and recent) Apple laptops

Desktop Chair is one-size-fits-all design. It fits virtually all Apple laptops with a height of 1.2" (30mm) or less, regardless of the shape, with or without a cover, now and the future. 


Compatible Apple laptops includes:


  • All MacBook Pro models
  • All MacBook models
  • All MacBook Air models
  • All PowerBook G4 models
  • and probably all models in the future :)
  • yes, of course iPads!



Fine furniture

Desktop Chair will be made of a five-layer ply of quality natural basswood for structural strength and fine texture. It will be hand-made in the same factory that produces furniture for European brands.


Our story

MOKU is a Japan-based atelier run by Masayuki & Hideyuki (son & pop), a dynamic duo combining the expertise in modern industrial design and traditional woodcrafting.


The idea of Desktop Chair, our first project, came from our own genuine need for something which we feel comfortable putting our laptop on while working on a large screen.


After making two for ourselves, people kept asking us to make the same thing. It was so many that we couldn't keep up with the requests! Making custom-made woodcrafts is something of our speciality, but making them in a batch and delivering to many others is a whole new story...


Please visit our website!


So here is where you come in...

Luckily, with a help of our partner furniture factory, we managed to develop a way to produce in a fairly large quantity while maintaining the quality. But we still need funding for production and for setting up a distribution system in North America.


So we decided to put the Desktop Chair's fate into the hands of people of the global village and start a project at IndieGoGo, a social funding platform that is truly open to and supportive for international projects. Please pledge and make this happen!


Thank you!
story_txt:
Hi! thanks for checking out our project. With your help we would love to make our idea a reality and turn your laptop into a desktop.
Laptops have become remarkably portable over the years. While we enjoy the mobility of laptop, some of us still use desktops to work efficiently and comfortably.

Hand made with fine natural basswood, Desktop Chair simply holds your Apple laptop and turns it into a desktop with an external display, a keyboard and a mouse, allowing you to work comfortably by raising your eye level for better posture, less strain on your eyes, neck and back.
 
'Laptop on the go, Desktop at home'.





How does it work?
Simply connect your Apple laptop with an external display, a keyboard and a mouse. Your laptop will run with the lid closed (cable adaptor may be needed). Apple calls it "Closed Clamshell Mode". Visit the Apple support page for complete step-by-step instructions. It's super easy!






Fits all current (and recent) Apple laptops

Desktop Chair is one-size-fits-all design. It fits virtually all Apple laptops with a height of 1.2" (30mm) or less, regardless of the shape, with or without a cover, now and the future. 


Compatible Apple laptops includes:



All MacBook Pro models
All MacBook models

All MacBook Air models

All PowerBook G4 models

and probably all models in the future :)

yes, of course iPads!







Fine furniture

Desktop Chair will be made of a five-layer ply of quality natural basswood for structural strength and fine texture. It will be hand-made in the same factory that produces furniture for European brands.



Our story


MOKU is a Japan-based atelier run by Masayuki & Hideyuki (son & pop), a dynamic duo combining the expertise in modern industrial design and traditional woodcrafting.

The idea of Desktop Chair, our first project, came from our own genuine need for something which we feel comfortable putting our laptop on while working on a large screen.

After making two for ourselves, people kept asking us to make the same thing. It was so many that we couldn't keep up with the requests! Making custom-made woodcrafts is something of our speciality, but making them in a batch and delivering to many others is a whole new story...

Please visit our website!

So here is where you come in...

Luckily, with a help of our partner furniture factory, we managed to develop a way to produce in a fairly large quantity while maintaining the quality. But we still need funding for production and for setting up a distribution system in North America.

So we decided to put the Desktop Chair's fate into the hands of people of the global village and start a project at IndieGoGo, a social funding platform that is truly open to and supportive for international projects. Please pledge and make this happen!

Thank you!

story:
Discover a new way to Braille

 

Every year thousands of people are affected by several degrees of blindness due to many different reasons. We have developed FingerTipss in order to give a social response to this community that need it so much, as well as, to help the different associations that carry out supporting and adaptation works. FingerTipss will greatly improve the Braille learning process.

 

Currently modern technology allows blind people to read easier through hearing, but there does not exist anything to increase tactile sensitivity and in this way facilitate the reading of Braille, giving to blind people a good and effective tool to read, write, have access to education, culture and information.


Why FingerTipss?

FingerTipss has been created specially for people who became blind suddenly or for children that are in the process of Braille learning. Although FingerTipss can be used by any blind person without taking into account their condition. That is because it is a helping tool that does not have any contraindication.

FingerTipss is specially indicated for people who are in the process of breaille learning and suffer from: 

- Excessive sweat in their hands

- Low touch sensitivity

- Finger pain

- Learning slowness

Also FingerTipss is recommended to preserve the braille books better, because of its very thin material, sliding smoothly, and prevents the sweat of the hands to spoil the piece of paper. And so you can save money in braille book repairs! 

How FingerTipss works?

FingerTipss should be put in one or more fingers of both hands depending on what is more comfortable for each person, and then while they move them through a Braille text, the perception of the dots will be increased and that will happen thanks to the materials with which it has been designed.

 

Technical specs

FingerTipss is a sophisticated technical solution based on the combination of materials to improve  tactile feeling. The Fingertipps is based in the self exploration solution Sensifemme.

A selection of finely engineered materials, a technical plastic and a mineral oil, provide a three to eight times increased touch sensitivity.

Both the technical plastic and the mineral oil are hypoallergenic, so children can also use FingerTipss safely.

 

Reward tiers


A journey to improvement

In Kavisha Pharma we have already developed the foundation technology of the FingerTipss. The underliying research that makes the FingerTipss possible has been already deployed in Sensifemme, a breast self-examination glove that increases the tactile sensitivity in order to detect any small lump. Sensifemme can be found in several countries around the world.

We know that this technology has a huge potential in other applications. We would like to help the whole visually impaired community developing a thimble to make Braille easier with FingerTipss.

 

Current status

We have already produced several prototypes at our facilities  and we have contacted with associations that support visually impaired and blind people from every country around the world. We are going to use their feedback to further improve the final product.

We need your help to improve the touch sensitivity of the thimble and its durability, as Braille reading will produce a higher wear than the use we give at the moment to the self-examination glove.

Use of funds

We need your support in order to improve the technology that we use for Sensifemme and apply it to the FingerTipss development . Your support is the key to make FingerTipss happen and help to improve the life of Braille reading people.

 

Timeline

 

Estimate delivery

March of 2017

 

Know the team

FingerTipss is the brain child of Juan Ramón García, Kavisha Pharma General Director. Kavisha Pharma is a small company bringing innovative products for the health and wellness sector. A dedicated team of engineers, product development, marketing and support people is working hard behind FingerTipss to make this dream happen.

 

Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING

Tooling & Molding is a key and delicate step. Creating the molds and tools is an expensive process that can take some time even with our extensive experience in this field.

There can be also incidences in the material procurement that may impact the production schedule.


PRODUCT REFINEMENT

FingerTipss has to be as sensitive as possible so we need to conduct extensive tests and Q&A controls and tests to meet the sensitivity, responsivity and durability levels we aim for. This is one of the most challenging stages of the project.


FULFILLMENT

Sometimes the unexpected happens, and there are many things beyond our control. Suppliers may miss a deadline, a machine may start malfunctioning or a shipment can get lost. Those things can cause delays. Nevertheless, to minimize any setbacks and inconveniences, we work with the most reliable suppliers and manufacturing partners to ensure you get your FingerTipss as soon as possible.

 

FAQ

How is FingerTipss used?

Follow the next steps in order to use FingerTipss:

1.     Please introduce the forefinger and the middle finger in FingerTipss, in the space between the layers, leaving the layer that contains the oil between the fingers and the piece of paper.

2.   You can introduce just one finger  but if you use two, the thimble may give more pressure. The main objective is to produce an appropriate movement of FingerTipss through the piece of paper.

3.    Glide smoothly  FingerTipss through the Braille text.

Why learning braille with FingerTipss is quicker?

Learn Braille takes different times depending on different factors, among them the skill of everyone to learn how to distinguish the dots and identify the letters that form the words. FingerTipss improves the identification and  interpretation of braille dots and for this reason the learning time is reduced.

How can I check the efficacy of FingerTipss?

Please leave a hair or a bit of sugar (very few grains) on a flat surface. Then touch them with your finger doing circular movements, first touch it with your naked finger and after that do the same with FingerTipss. What a surprise! You will feel the hair bigger and you will be able to distinguish perfectly each grain of sugar separately.

Can it be used by kids?

Yes, FingerTipss can be used by people whatever their age that are learning braille because it does not have small pieces or harmful and toxic elements.

What is the FingerTipss use time?

FingerTipss has a period of use of 3 years. Due to its use it seems that the product can wear away a bit, but it is made of a very thin and resistant material so FingerTipss is not less effective because it produces the same increase of touch sensitivity.

Why are we offering FingerTipss in packs of 2 units?  

We offer FingerTipss in packs of 2 units because there are different ways to learn braille, for example using both hands.

Can I buy a bigger quantity of FingerTipss and take advantage of it with higher discounts, for instance if I am part of a blind association?

Yes, you can. If you are interested, you just need to send us an email to info@fingertipss.org and we will explain you how to get them.

 

Help us with your donation to finish FingerTipss

Blind people will benefit from this

story:
Three years ago, my brother and I were looking for a wallet we couldn't find so we decided to join forces and our passion for quality goods to make what we believed to be the best products on the market.

 

Help people be more productive and feel more comfortable by making super functional top quality products they would be proud to use.

ARE COLORS EXACTLY AS THEY APPEAR HERE?

It‘s very hard to represent the exact color of the real product, specially considering that every screen shows colors differently. However, we tried to show the colors as accurate as possible.

HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?

We offer free worldwide shipping. However, please keep in mind that import fees or any other carrier fees are not included. Depending on your country's custom's regulations, you will have to pay for them upon arrival.

CAN I PAY WITH CASH ON DELIVERY? 

No, unfortunately it‘s not possible for us to receive payments on cash. The
purchase must be made with a credit card on Indiegogo.


HOW MUCH ARE IMPORT TAXES TO MY COUNTRY?

No extra charges at delivery for the following countries:

If your country is not on this list you may be charged for import taxes and carrier fees. 

 

WHERE DO YOU SHIP EVERYTHING FROM?

We manufacture and ship all of our products from Colombia, South America.

I HAVE A PROBLEM/NEED TO SPEAK TO SOMEONE! CAN I CALL YOU? 

We don't offer international phone call service at the moment. Please contact us at support@thefrenchieco.com We'll be more than happy to help you.
