story:
TL;DR: Microbot Push is a wireless robotic finger that makes ordinary buttons smart.

Look around. Notice how many buttons surround you? You press them regularly: to turn something on or off, to play or pause, to send or receive, to answer or dismiss. Buttons and switches are the simplest forms of user interfaces. So simple that about every device will have one. We created Microbot Push to connect these buttons and switches to the Internet. We all know, once you connect something to the Internet — magic happens.

Microbot Push is a wireless robotic finger that can push most ordinary buttons just like a human finger does. The idea is simple: Microbot Push attaches on buttons that operate particular features on a device. Since then, you can control these functions remotely using your smartphone or computer.

Wirelessely

Push any button wirelessly from anywhere at anytime.

Or automate when they get pushed using our companion hub - Prota Box.

Manually

Microbot also has a capacitive touch button, so you can always manually push it if it is within reach.



Simply add Microbot on a legacy device with an adhesive foam tape that comes included with every unit.

And don't worry if you want to reuse it later. You easily remove Push without damaging walls or appliances. Then attach it again on a different device.

Install easily on tumbler light switch.

Install easily on coffee maker's rocker switch.

Microbot Push, just like a human finger, can push various buttons in several spots & ways.

We made a device for you to experiment with numerous different buttons, switches, & devices!

Prota Specifications

Control away from home

When Push connects to its companion hub, Prota Box, you will get the freedom to control multiple Microbots from anywhere. All you will need is an Internet-connected device with a web browser.

Microbots connect to Prota Box via Bluetooth, while Prota Box itself connects to your home network over WiFi.

Create powerful home automation stories

Push to turns on a coffee maker just before you wake up or switches on the lights on sunset. These are just a few of many home automation stories when Push connects to Prota.

Integrate with existing smart devices

Thanks to Prota you can merge features from your existing smart devices into a single automation story together with Push.

Let's look at what's possible:

Use Prota apps

Hue, WeMo, Pebble, Netamo are just a handful of free apps available for Push on Prota Box. Plus we continuously expand our App Library.

Connect to IFTTT

If you’re an IFTTT user, then you can combine Push with any IFTTT end point via the Maker channel.

From day 1 automate like a pro!

Not sure where to start your automation story? Just start writing what your devices should do for you and the Prota web app will suggest you available opinions automatically.

Prota Box is not an ordinary smart hub

Prota Box is a small personal server computer, a smart hub, that accompanies Microbot Push. Prota Box comes in handy if you have multiple Microbots, want to automate how do you use them together with other smart devices, and access your automation stories remotely.

Prota TV cast app: use TV as a wireless display for all your mobile devices

With this additional Prota Box application you can wirelessly mirror the entire screen of your tablet or smartphone directly to your TV. You can watch Netflix, Hulu and Youtube without the trouble of using wires and adapters.

The app supports both AirPlay mirroring for iOS devices and Miracast for Android & Windows 10 users.

As this piece of software is enabled by one of our partners, please add $10 to your pledge, if you find it useful!

To learn more about Prota Box see FAQs at the bottom of the page.

Most of our devices, especially  appliances, lack the Internet connectivity or remote control interface. Simply adding Microbot Push opens remarkable home automation possibilities to everything you bought before. 

Bellow are just a handful of many feasible examples of how you can upgrade your appliances using Microbots. These examples also include our estimates how much  will save by upgrading & re-using your equipment instead of buying  new items to join the Internet of Things bandwagon, not to mention the sustainability aspect.


Upgrade your light switches



Auto-prepare coffee before you wake up



Turn your kettle into a smart kettle



Control your air conditioner remotely from anywhere



Turn heat up your room automatically as temperature drops

Beyond being a fun and versatile home automation gadget for everyone, Microbot Push has a potential to do good for millions of people with special needs.

Did you know how many disabled people are there in the world? Before starting the campaign, we didn’t know the exact number either. The answer, according to the UN, is 1 billion. It may be shocking to learn that around 15% of the world’s population experience some form of disability. But more unexpectedly to us was to discover that as many as 1/4th of people with disabilities reported that they often don’t have a choice and control over their daily lives.

Here's how Microbot Push can help:

  • Easy plug & play installation enables unparalleled remote control on every household appliance.
  • Microbots can be placed on devices temporarily and removed when patient's condition improves.
  • Or can be kept there permanently.
  • Multi-user & multi-device support allows equipment to be controlled by both the patient and caregivers independently.
We are sincerely moved by all the messages and comments where people applaud our project saying that our product will improve their lives dramatically.


We have just partnered with the National Rehabilitation Center in Korea so that together we can explore and bring even more awesome home automation and remote control experiences especially to people with special needs.

When we imagined Microbot Push, we saw a general purpose tool that improves lives of thousands of people as it comes in handy in many common home improvement scenarios.

Moreover, as we went along with the project, we got surprised by how many small niches Push can cover. Many of these niches would be otherwise overlooked by big IoT companies.

As our fan suggests, Push could start an external car heater in Sweden! Deploy Microbots to help your loved one to recover from an unfortunate skiing trip.



We really need your support to cover tooling and initial manufacturing costs. With what’s left we will start making a brand new Microbot! Let’s make smarter smart homes that work as you want them to work!

At this point, we have already partnered with INTOPS, which is an experienced and high-quality hardware manufacturer in South Korea. In fact, those are the same guys who help one of the biggest electronics makers in South Korea to bring their products into the hands of millions of customers.

Our factory in Korea. Help us to make your Microbots here!

You’ll get your hands on Microbot Push & Prota Box ahead of anyone else.

You’ll explore what it means to live in the connected future by altering your items even before other startups, and established firms will make their versions commercially available.

You’ll be able to join an exclusive Slack channel where we will discuss how one can create mesmerizing smart home experiences.

Also, as we crossed $50,000 in pledges, Indiegogo supporters will be able to choose from two additional colors: candy red and fancy gold. Beautiful red and gold Microbots will be exclusively reserved to backers and won't show up in retail.

Here's a glimpse inside the box if you order Push without Prota Box:


Here's a glimpse inside the box if you order Push in combination with Prota Box:

We take privacy seriously. It is true that despite connected devices are pitched as good for consumers, a few companies exploit them for their benefit by tracking and infinitely accumulating your usage patterns.

It’s a rhetorical question, but do you want more targeted advertising based on your private data from a product that you already paid? For us it doesn’t feel like a fair tradeoff; that’s why we will never track where you attached your Microbots or how frequently do you use them.

Innovations

From the outside, Microbot Push is aesthetically very simple, yet we have spent long hours engineering its internals. To efficiently perform the pushing action to real life use cases, we had to attain enough torque in such a small form factor. To do so we custom built our high-performance micro motor — still there are no existing market alternatives with just enough RPM.

Also, we had to create unique seven gear precision mechanism that would efficiently translate all this torque from the motor into a linear force applied to the buttons. We also used PC and ABS type materials to achieve the best wireless connectivity and to reduce Microbot’s weight.

Ultimately, we chose high capacity rechargeable batteries. From the point of usability, it is critical for Microbot Push to operate long enough on a single charge. We strive for six months of usage time (approx. 1-minute per day).

Design

Microbot Push is designed to be as small as possible to fit practically on many legacy devices and walls. Its ascetic form is intentional. Push seamlessly blends with many interiors and at the same time it doesn't distract people from their typical usage patterns.

We created an ambient control experience where household gadgets and apps work in a stealth mode responding naturally to users' lives. That is also why Push has a capacitive button on its top: for convenience and common sense, users can always push manually if the button is within their hand's reach.

Sustainability

Connecting stuff to the Internet is valuable. It helps to save time, energy and it unlocks new features. Also it feels futuristic, most of us especially from the want to live in the future, right? But let’s look at average lifespans for home appliances.

Ordinary home appliances can last for years. Wise up existing items with Push instead of buying new ones.

Expected lifespan of home appliances

The average refrigerator will last for 13-19 years depending on its type. Washers and dryers should work at least 10+ years while dishwashers tend to wear faster and hold up for about nine years. The list goes on. Despite the fact that product life cycles are getting shorter, it is clearly not sustainable to change equipment frequently (most of the times perfectly well-working equipment). Don’t get us wrong. We believe in the Internet of things, and we think that most dumb items today will have a silicon chip in the future. But in the interim period the stage belongs to smart add-ons — such as Microbot Push.

Not only you can wise up and extend the lifetime of existing devices, but you can also experiment and find out new unique ways of using it. With Prota automation engine, the possibilities to experiment are nearly endless.

Future Microbots

Push is just the beginning of the Microbot series. We already have clear plans for the next five Microbots in addition to Push: Microbot Twist, a wireless robotic hand than can twist knobs; IR bridge, an infrared control station; Microbot Sense, a multi-sensor station; Microbot View, a wireless camera; and Microbot Scan, a wireless fingerprint reader.

Our team began to develop an operating system for home entertainment and automation all the way back in 2009. The term Internet of Things did not even exist back then! With the support of Seoul City government, we had a cozy office and minimal funds to live in the city. We knew we needed more reserves to make what we imagined possible, so we immediately started looking for qualified investors. However, we failed. Startup ecosystem in Korea back then was almost non-existent. In order to adapt we changed the course of the company for a few years.

Naran started consulting big-name companies in Korea related to what we did, personal cloud computing and Internet of Things. Korea Telecom, KT R&D Center and Korea Electric Power Corporation were our major customers. We developed and deployed many of their services, and one of them had about 10M registered users and is still running for well over three years.

After we stabilized the business, the whole team decided to stop accepting new contracts in 2012 and did not renew any of our existing ones. One year later we became completely free from big conglomerates, and the team could focus on solely on Prota. Finally doing what all of us believed lead us to meet great partners who later also turned out to be great investors. With their guidance, we were able to stay focused on our vision and arrived here where we ask you to validate our idea and help to bring Microbots to mass production!

We've been through a lot together as a team. All these experiences and technologies we developed are ending up with Prota and Microbots!

Disclaimer: ‘Delivery of perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.’

We are making a genuinely unique product from the ground up. Therefore, we are aware that there might be some production delays outside of our control. To dodge the risk as much as possible, we already identified an experienced producer in South Korea way prior to this campaign. This factory understands well what it takes to go from an ambitious concept to getting a real product into the hands of millions of happy customers. In fact, they are the same guys that one of the biggest electronics company relies on to produce their products.

The biggest challenge for us left is to be able to finish the software part on time. We comprise of a team of experienced software engineers that previously worked for Microsoft and Google. We believe that we have all things necessary to complete this project timely, however in an unlikely event that threatens the deadline we promise fast and transparent communication with our backers.

  1. PROTA BOX
  2. PURCHASING & SETUP (quantity, options, setup, etc)
  3. BUYING & SHIPPING (shipping costs, international shipping, timeline)
  4. TECHNICAL (multiple devices, power & voltage)
  5. PRIVACY & SECURITY
  6. COMPATIBILITY (will it work with..)
  7. USABILITY (can it be used like this..)
  8. OTHER
  1. PROTA BOX
    • What is Prota Box?
      Prota Box is a hub for Microbots. It is fundamentally a mini personal server computer where apps are being executed. Prota Box can manage and control multiple microbots at the same time, and users can access Prota Box anywhere, anytime through its web-based interface.
    • How does Microbot Push connect to Prota Box?
      Prota Box has both WiFi & Bluetooth. It uses Bluetooth LE to connect to multiple Microbots at once, and it uses WiFi to connect to your home WiFi network and your existing smart devices.
    • How do I operate my Prota Box?
      Prota Box provides its native user interface via web. There's also a mobile app available for iOS and Android.
    • Why do I need Prota Box to automate my Microbots? Can I automate Push just with using my smartphone?
      Imagine this. If you used your smartphone to run all the automation rules, those rules would stop functioning as soon as you would step out of your house. There must be a hub that always stays at your home or office and is connected both to the Internet and your smart devices at the same time.

      If Microbots were controlled via some cloud services, it would be insecure and vulnerable as well as more power-hungry (Wi-Fi consumes a lot more power than Bluetooth Low Energy).
    • How does Prota integrate my existing smart devices?
      We use open APIs to build Prota apps that link the functionality from your current smart gadgets to Prota. From there you can combine all these different devices, their features into powerful automation stories.
    • How does Prota get contextual information from web services (time of the day, weather conditions, etc.)?
      We also use open APIs to link Prota popular web services, so you can use them in your automation stories. Such as Gmail, weather service, Volumio, etc.).
    • Can I get new apps for Prota?
      Yes. We are continually publishing news apps on our Prota app repository.
    • How can I mirror my device's screen to an HDTV using Prota?
      Screen mirroring can be roughly explained as HDMI over WiFi. Essentially this Prota app replaces cables that you would normally need to connect your smartphone, tablet or computer to your television set.

      To use the mirroring feature you have to connect Prota to your TV using an HDMI cable, but once you did that, you can simply add your TV as a wireless display from your smartphone's, tablet's or computer's settings menu.

      iOS, Windows 10 and Android devices use different protocols to connect to wireless displays. However, Prota Box supports both protocols: AirPlay for Apple & Miracast for Android/ Windows 10. This way you can enjoy having a wireless screen for all your devices!
    • Can I develop on Prota?
      Prota SDK early next year. If you want to participate in the program, please let us know here!
  2. PURCHASING & SETUP
    • How many Microbot Push devices do I need at my home?
      For 1/2/3 bedroom apartments, we would recommend purchasing 1 Prota with 3 or 11 Microbots. This way you’ll be able to automate at least one light switch and one other device. Also, you’ll be able to experiment and find new ways by placing microbots on new equipment. Think of this as a beginners smart home Lego kit.

      For mansion/ estate/ large office, we recommend buying several Prota Boxes.
    • What is the maximum number of Microbots that I can connect at once?
      In theory hundreds, however, we tested 1 Prota with 20 Microbots at once, and it worked perfectly well.
    • Can I buy one for my office or my second home and still control all from the same smartphone (or computer)?
      Yes and Yes! You can access Prota using a web browser from any Internet-connected device that has a web browser (smartphones, computers, tablets).
    • What colors can I choose?
      For now Microbot Push comes in two colors: white and grey.
    • Will I need help installing Push? What about Prota.
      We hope you won’t need any help. Push and Prota Box are designed to be used straight out of the box.
  3. BUYING & SHIPPING
    • What are the shipping costs?
      Shipping costs $30. Some extra fees may occur due to customs procedures that depend on your country.
    • What is the estimated delivery date?
      We will start shipping Microbots and Prota Box in March 2016. We already have our manufacturing partner lined up and prepared to scale production to meet any demand for Microbot Push and Prota Box.
  4. SOME MORE TECHNICAL QUESTIONS
    • Can I control Microbots and Prota OS from multiple smartphones?
      Yes. Because Prota OS, and, therefore, the Push app within Prota OS, can be accessed via a web browser, multiple people in a household or an office simultaneously can be primary users on their devices.
    • How does Prota OS know when I leave or enter my home?
      If you have a smartphone with GPS capability once you enter or exit a particular area, your phone can notify Prota OS. You can also make use of IFTTT.
    • Can I still push my buttons manually or do I always have to use Push?
      Yes. Every Microbot Push has a capacitive button on its top that triggers the motor to activate manually when someone touches it.
    • When I push manually, does Prota advertise that event?
      Yes. Since it is important for your automation Stories to always know the exact status of a button (on or off).
    • How is Microbot Push powered? What happens if the power goes out?
      Microbot Push has a rechargeable battery, however if the power in your house or office out, Prota Box won’t be able to perform home automation tasks until the power is back.
    • What happens if the Internet goes down?
      If the Internet goes down, you won’t be able to access Prota Box outside of your home network. Home automation tasks that don’t require 3rd party information from the Internet will be working (e.g. pushing buttons on particular time would still work, but tasks based on weather conditions would not).
    • What voltage does Prota Box support?
      Prota Box comes with a standard AC power adapter plugs into 100V ~ 200V 50/60Hz power outlet.
    • Is there an SDK or API for developers?
      We are working on SDK and very soon 3rd party developers will be able to create new awesome apps for Prota OS.

      Prota already has the Webhook app that can be used to connect to open web APIs.
  5. PRIVACY & SECURITY
    • How secure is Prota?
      Your data is kept locally. It means your personal information does not spill over to the cloud and is never accessible to third party companies.

      Also, Prota can only be accessed from a device that at least once accessed Prota from inside of your home network.
    • Is it connect to the cloud?
      No. Prota is a not a cloud-based operating system.
    • Will my private data will be available to anyone (including your company)?
      No. We are not accumulating your usage patterns or how many and what devices connect to Prota.
  6. COMPATIBILITY
    • Will Microbot Push/ Prota OS work with my iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows, Mac?
      Yes. Prota OS is accessible via a web app. A native app for accessing Prota will be available for iOS and Android.
    • Will it work with my other smart devices (August, Philps Hue, etc.)?
      It depends. If your smart device has an open API, then you can use the Webhook app to use it with Prota OS. Alternatively, if your smart device has its IFTTT channel, you can connect it to Prota with maker.ifttt.com. Follow the instructions here

      Philips Hue has its Prota OS app and does not need any tinkering to be connected. We will keep adding more products and services that we like as we go.
  7. USABILITY
    • Can I place Microbot Push on walls or ceiling?
      Yes. It is very easy to attach Push on flat surfaces like walls and ceiling using an included double sided foam tape. Watch here.
    • Can I use Microbot Push as a macro button since it has a capacitive touch sensor on its top?
      Yes, when you pair Microbot Push with Prota Box, you can determine what will happen once you touch the sensor in addition to pressing the button beneath the Microbot (e.g. “when Push sensor is touched, play music”).
  8. OTHER
    • OK, so exactly on what kind of buttons can I attach Microbot Push?
      On buttons that have a travel distance of 6 mm or less (most buttons). If it happens to be more, it is always possible to add additional padding on the button, though it is probably less aesthetically pleasing, it will do the job.
    • I’m still unsure if I can use Push in my case. What can I do?
      Send us an email or tweet us here with a picture. We’ll answer shortly!

Here's how Microbot Push can help:



Easy plug & play installation enables unparalleled remote control on every household appliance.


Microbots can be placed on devices temporarily and removed when patient's condition improves.


Or can be kept there permanently.

Multi-user & multi-device support allows equipment to be controlled by both the patient and caregivers independently.

We are sincerely moved by all the messages and comments where people applaud our project saying that our product will improve their lives dramatically.




We have just partnered with the National Rehabilitation Center in Korea so that together we can explore and bring even more awesome home automation and remote control experiences especially to people with special needs.


When we imagined Microbot Push, we saw a general purpose tool that improves lives of thousands of people as it comes in handy in many common home improvement scenarios.


Moreover, as we went along with the project, we got surprised by how many small niches Push can cover. Many of these niches would be otherwise overlooked by big IoT companies.
As our fan suggests, Push could start an external car heater in Sweden! Deploy Microbots to help your loved one to recover from an unfortunate skiing trip.



We really need your support to cover tooling and initial manufacturing costs. With what’s left we will start making a brand new Microbot! Let’s make smarter smart homes that work as you want them to work!


At this point, we have already partnered with INTOPS, which is an experienced and high-quality hardware manufacturer in South Korea. In fact, those are the same guys who help one of the biggest electronics makers in South Korea to bring their products into the hands of millions of customers.



Our factory in Korea. Help us to make your Microbots here!



You’ll get your hands on Microbot Push & Prota Box ahead of anyone else.
You’ll explore what it means to live in the connected future by altering your items even before other startups, and established firms will make their versions commercially available.
You’ll be able to join an exclusive Slack channel where we will discuss how one can create mesmerizing smart home experiences.
Also, as we crossed $50,000 in pledges, Indiegogo supporters will be able to choose from two additional colors: candy red and fancy gold. Beautiful red and gold Microbots will be exclusively reserved to backers and won't show up in retail.





Here's a glimpse inside the box if you order Push without Prota Box:


Here's a glimpse inside the box if you order Push in combination with Prota Box:











We take privacy seriously. It is true that despite connected devices are pitched as good for consumers, a few companies exploit them for their benefit by tracking and infinitely accumulating your usage patterns.
It’s a rhetorical question, but do you want more targeted advertising based on your private data from a product that you already paid? For us it doesn’t feel like a fair tradeoff; that’s why we will never track where you attached your Microbots or how frequently do you use them.





 Innovations
From the outside, Microbot Push is aesthetically very simple, yet we have spent long hours engineering its internals. To efficiently perform the pushing action to real life use cases, we had to attain enough torque in such a small form factor. To do so we custom built our high-performance micro motor — still there are no existing market alternatives with just enough RPM.
Also, we had to create unique seven gear precision mechanism that would efficiently translate all this torque from the motor into a linear force applied to the buttons. We also used PC and ABS type materials to achieve the best wireless connectivity and to reduce Microbot’s weight.
Ultimately, we chose high capacity rechargeable batteries. From the point of usability, it is critical for Microbot Push to operate long enough on a single charge. We strive for six months of usage time (approx. 1-minute per day).


 Design
Microbot Push is designed to be as small as possible to fit practically on many legacy devices and walls. Its ascetic form is intentional. Push seamlessly blends with many interiors and at the same time it doesn't distract people from their typical usage patterns.
We created an ambient control experience where household gadgets and apps work in a stealth mode responding naturally to users' lives. That is also why Push has a capacitive button on its top: for convenience and common sense, users can always push manually if the button is within their hand's reach.


 Sustainability
Connecting stuff to the Internet is valuable. It helps to save time, energy and it unlocks new features. Also it feels futuristic, most of us especially from the want to live in the future, right? But let’s look at average lifespans for home appliances.


Ordinary home appliances can last for years. Wise up existing items with Push instead of buying new ones.

 Expected lifespan of home appliances

The average refrigerator will last for 13-19 years depending on its type. Washers and dryers should work at least 10+ years while dishwashers tend to wear faster and hold up for about nine years. The list goes on. Despite the fact that product life cycles are getting shorter, it is clearly not sustainable to change equipment frequently (most of the times perfectly well-working equipment). Don’t get us wrong. We believe in the Internet of things, and we think that most dumb items today will have a silicon chip in the future. But in the interim period the stage belongs to smart add-ons — such as Microbot Push.
Not only you can wise up and extend the lifetime of existing devices, but you can also experiment and find out new unique ways of using it. With Prota automation engine, the possibilities to experiment are nearly endless.

 Future Microbots
Push is just the beginning of the Microbot series. We already have clear plans for the next five Microbots in addition to Push: Microbot Twist, a wireless robotic hand than can twist knobs; IR bridge, an infrared control station; Microbot Sense, a multi-sensor station; Microbot View, a wireless camera; and Microbot Scan, a wireless fingerprint reader.



Our team began to develop an operating system for home entertainment and automation all the way back in 2009. The term Internet of Things did not even exist back then! With the support of Seoul City government, we had a cozy office and minimal funds to live in the city. We knew we needed more reserves to make what we imagined possible, so we immediately started looking for qualified investors. However, we failed. Startup ecosystem in Korea back then was almost non-existent. In order to adapt we changed the course of the company for a few years.
Naran started consulting big-name companies in Korea related to what we did, personal cloud computing and Internet of Things. Korea Telecom, KT R&D Center and Korea Electric Power Corporation were our major customers. We developed and deployed many of their services, and one of them had about 10M registered users and is still running for well over three years.
After we stabilized the business, the whole team decided to stop accepting new contracts in 2012 and did not renew any of our existing ones. One year later we became completely free from big conglomerates, and the team could focus on solely on Prota. Finally doing what all of us believed lead us to meet great partners who later also turned out to be great investors. With their guidance, we were able to stay focused on our vision and arrived here where we ask you to validate our idea and help to bring Microbots to mass production!

We've been through a lot together as a team. All these experiences and technologies we developed are ending up with Prota and Microbots!





Disclaimer: ‘Delivery of perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.’
We are making a genuinely unique product from the ground up. Therefore, we are aware that there might be some production delays outside of our control. To dodge the risk as much as possible, we already identified an experienced producer in South Korea way prior to this campaign. This factory understands well what it takes to go from an ambitious concept to getting a real product into the hands of millions of happy customers. In fact, they are the same guys that one of the biggest electronics company relies on to produce their products.
The biggest challenge for us left is to be able to finish the software part on time. We comprise of a team of experienced software engineers that previously worked for Microsoft and Google. We believe that we have all things necessary to complete this project timely, however in an unlikely event that threatens the deadline we promise fast and transparent communication with our backers.





PROTA BOX
PURCHASING & SETUP  (quantity, options, setup, etc)

BUYING & SHIPPING  (shipping costs, international shipping, timeline)

TECHNICAL  (multiple devices, power & voltage)

PRIVACY & SECURITY
COMPATIBILITY  (will it work with..)

USABILITY  (can it be used like this..)

OTHER




PROTA BOX
What is Prota Box?Prota Box is a hub for Microbots. It is fundamentally a mini personal server computer where apps are being executed. Prota Box can manage and control multiple microbots at the same time, and users can access Prota Box anywhere, anytime through its web-based interface.

How does Microbot Push connect to Prota Box?Prota Box has both WiFi & Bluetooth. It uses Bluetooth LE to connect to multiple Microbots at once, and it uses WiFi to connect to your home WiFi network and your existing smart devices.

How do I operate my Prota Box?Prota Box provides its native user interface via web. There's also a mobile app available for iOS and Android.

Why do I need Prota Box to automate my Microbots? Can I automate Push just with using my smartphone?Imagine this. If you used your smartphone to run all the automation rules, those rules would stop functioning as soon as you would step out of your house. There must be a hub that always stays at your home or office and is connected both to the Internet and your smart devices at the same time.If Microbots were controlled via some cloud services, it would be insecure and vulnerable as well as more power-hungry (Wi-Fi consumes a lot more power than Bluetooth Low Energy).

How does Prota integrate my existing smart devices?We use open APIs to build Prota apps that link the functionality from your current smart gadgets to Prota. From there you can combine all these different devices, their features into powerful automation stories.

How does Prota get contextual information from web services (time of the day, weather conditions, etc.)?We also use open APIs to link Prota popular web services, so you can use them in your automation stories. Such as Gmail, weather service, Volumio, etc.).

Can I get new apps for Prota?Yes. We are continually publishing news apps on our Prota app repository.

How can I mirror my device's screen to an HDTV using Prota?Screen mirroring can be roughly explained as HDMI over WiFi. Essentially this Prota app replaces cables that you would normally need to connect your smartphone, tablet or computer to your television set.To use the mirroring feature you have to connect Prota to your TV using an HDMI cable, but once you did that, you can simply add your TV as a wireless display from your smartphone's, tablet's or computer's settings menu.iOS, Windows 10 and Android devices use different protocols to connect to wireless displays. However, Prota Box supports both protocols: AirPlay for Apple & Miracast for Android/ Windows 10. This way you can enjoy having a wireless screen for all your devices!

Can I develop on Prota?Prota SDK early next year. If you want to participate in the program, please let us know here!



PURCHASING & SETUP
How many Microbot Push devices do I need at my home?For 1/2/3 bedroom apartments, we would recommend purchasing 1 Prota with 3 or 11 Microbots. This way you’ll be able to automate at least one light switch and one other device. Also, you’ll be able to experiment and find new ways by placing microbots on new equipment. Think of this as a beginners smart home Lego kit.For mansion/ estate/ large office, we recommend buying several Prota Boxes.

What is the maximum number of Microbots that I can connect at once?In theory hundreds, however, we tested 1 Prota with 20 Microbots at once, and it worked perfectly well.

Can I buy one for my office or my second home and still control all from the same smartphone (or computer)?Yes and Yes! You can access Prota using a web browser from any Internet-connected device that has a web browser (smartphones, computers, tablets).

What colors can I choose?For now Microbot Push comes in two colors: white and grey.

Will I need help installing Push? What about Prota.We hope you won’t need any help. Push and Prota Box are designed to be used straight out of the box.



BUYING & SHIPPING
What are the shipping costs?Shipping costs $30. Some extra fees may occur due to customs procedures that depend on your country.

What is the estimated delivery date?We will start shipping Microbots and Prota Box in March 2016. We already have our manufacturing partner lined up and prepared to scale production to meet any demand for Microbot Push and Prota Box.



SOME MORE TECHNICAL QUESTIONS
Can I control Microbots and Prota OS from multiple smartphones?Yes. Because Prota OS, and, therefore, the Push app within Prota OS, can be accessed via a web browser, multiple people in a household or an office simultaneously can be primary users on their devices.

How does Prota OS know when I leave or enter my home?If you have a smartphone with GPS capability once you enter or exit a particular area, your phone can notify Prota OS. You can also make use of IFTTT.

Can I still push my buttons manually or do I always have to use Push?Yes. Every Microbot Push has a capacitive button on its top that triggers the motor to activate manually when someone touches it.

When I push manually, does Prota advertise that event?Yes. Since it is important for your automation Stories to always know the exact status of a button (on or off).

How is Microbot Push powered? What happens if the power goes out?Microbot Push has a rechargeable battery, however if the power in your house or office out, Prota Box won’t be able to perform home automation tasks until the power is back.

What happens if the Internet goes down?If the Internet goes down, you won’t be able to access Prota Box outside of your home network. Home automation tasks that don’t require 3rd party information from the Internet will be working (e.g. pushing buttons on particular time would still work, but tasks based on weather conditions would not).

What voltage does Prota Box support?Prota Box comes with a standard AC power adapter plugs into 100V ~ 200V 50/60Hz power outlet.

Is there an SDK or API for developers?We are working on SDK and very soon 3rd party developers will be able to create new awesome apps for Prota OS.Prota already has the Webhook app that can be used to connect to open web APIs.



PRIVACY & SECURITY
How secure is Prota?Your data is kept locally. It means your personal information does not spill over to the cloud and is never accessible to third party companies.Also, Prota can only be accessed from a device that at least once accessed Prota from inside of your home network.

Is it connect to the cloud?No. Prota is a not a cloud-based operating system.

Will my private data will be available to anyone (including your company)?No. We are not accumulating your usage patterns or how many and what devices connect to Prota.



COMPATIBILITY
Will Microbot Push/ Prota OS work with my iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows, Mac?Yes. Prota OS is accessible via a web app. A native app for accessing Prota will be available for iOS and Android.

Will it work with my other smart devices (August, Philps Hue, etc.)?It depends. If your smart device has an open API, then you can use the Webhook app to use it with Prota OS. Alternatively, if your smart device has its IFTTT channel, you can connect it to Prota with maker.ifttt.com. Follow the instructions here Philips Hue has its Prota OS app and does not need any tinkering to be connected. We will keep adding more products and services that we like as we go.



USABILITY
Can I place Microbot Push on walls or ceiling?Yes. It is very easy to attach Push on flat surfaces like walls and ceiling using an included double sided foam tape. Watch here.

Can I use Microbot Push as a macro button since it has a capacitive touch sensor on its top?Yes, when you pair Microbot Push with Prota Box, you can determine what will happen once you touch the sensor in addition to pressing the button beneath the Microbot (e.g. “when Push sensor is touched, play music”).



OTHER
OK, so exactly on what kind of buttons can I attach Microbot Push?On buttons that have a travel distance of 6 mm or less (most buttons). If it happens to be more, it is always possible to add additional padding on the button, though it is probably less aesthetically pleasing, it will do the job.

I’m still unsure if I can use Push in my case. What can I do?Send us an email or tweet us here with a picture. We’ll answer shortly!

story:
Pushulu.com breakthrough app for iPhone Call recorder :-)

Hello my name is Eran Simtob, and I am married with two beautiful children.

I worked at Intel for 5 years, until I decide no longer.

I established a business to execute ideas into a mobile app.

Many people approached me with very good ideas.

Now I'm working on a project for  ”iPhone call recording”, I own an iPhone device for more than 5 years.

And  wondering for more than 3 years, why there is no call recording app for iPhone that can record and save the calls to the device.

I researched the subject and checked every possible angle.

When finally i got to the point that is was possible, I realized it could be done only on jail-broken devices, and then i got back to researching  until I found out that apple was  blocking the recording option in the hardware, but on the iPhone 5 they stopped blocking it.

I found this app in jail-break store, but only very experienced users with jail-breaking can install and use it.

I wanted to do something, as simple as Apple would do, if they were doing it.

I'm working on a simple software designed, and most importantly one that will be easy to install,one that anyone can easily install and use, But Apple is not willing to bring it to Apple Store.

You are welcome to visit my website and see my progress.



iPhoneCallRecorder.com

Pushulu.com



Every dollar is important to the project even if you don’t have iPhone.

If you have an idea for good application Contact me.

My original site is:

AskForApp.com

story:
Turn your phone into an awesome music player!



What's wrong with my phone?

You like going places and listening to music. You pack lightly when you travel, because it’s all about the experience and ease. You don't want to carry a separate music player for two reasons -- first, they are expensive, and second, you already have your phone! So, you load your music onto your phone, pack your favorite headphones and go!

But, something’s not right. The music sounds caged-in. It lacks impact, clarity, and emotion. Your music doesn't sound alive. The sound is not what you're used to because your phone is not an audiophile device! It was designed with the average consumer in mind, so it includes mid-grade parts to save costs.

Most people wouldn't hear the sonic difference because they grew up listening to MP3s, and they don’t know any better. But you hear the difference, and this gets frustrating. Fortunately, there is an answer!

It’s called HiFi-Skÿn and it comes from CEntrance, a leader in personal audio. For the last 15 years we've built equipment for recording studios, performance stages and broadcast facilities worldwide. We've designed mixing consoles, recording equipment, and home stereo systems for music professionals – the most demanding ears out there.

HiFi-Skÿn is the answer to the phone sound blues. We used our years of experience in designing quality audio products and packaged an awesome playback system inside of a phone case! Now you can carry the phone with you, do your work AND listen to music in a whole new way. Leave the expensive music player behind. You no longer need it. Your iPhone is now a work-and-play device with great sound quality and a longer battery life.


Jump to Frequently Asked Questions



Thank you for helping us reach the stretch goals!

You voted for these additions and we are working hard to make them happen. Thank you for helping us meet these goals and add to what's already shaping up to be and incredible product! Share this campaign with friends and family!

We reached the first four goals and made tons of improvements. We redesigned HiFi-Skÿn's headphone amplifier. We redesigned the power supply and gave you an easier charging method -- use any USB charger (however iPad charger is preferred due to higher power.) We've worked hard to deliver even better sound quality via an upgraded D/A converter. We are giving you three colors to choose from! Next, we have a custom high-resolution playback app! Help us make these goals a success! Donate to the campaign now!



Update: Editor's Choice Award!

Look what just happened! The Absolute Sound Magazine has given our HiFi-M8 the coveted editor's choice award for 2015! As some of you may know, HiFi-Skyn is largely based on HiFi-M8 design, which means that you will not be disappointed. We are planning to make HiFi-Skÿn sound even better than HiFi-M8! 




Update: Amp Extreme

Earlier on in the product design cycle, we felt that 130 mW of output power would be sufficient to drive the majority of headphones, so we designed that into the product. But during the campaign we got a lot of useful customer feedback, and one of the more persistent requests was for hotter output. 

So, we upgraded the Classic Amp to Super Amp, to deliver 210 mW of power. Yet, somehow that still didn't feel like a breakthrough, so we pushed further and also upgraded the power supply to deliver a total of over 300 mW! This covers pretty much all headphones on the market, making HiFi-Skyn an extremely versatile DAC/Amp that gives you extra dynamic range, lowers the distortion and helps control the noise floor, so that music is the only thing reaching your ears.  

This new amp plus power supply combo is called "Amp Extreme". It will be standard on all units that will retail at $499



So why do I need a HiFi-Skÿn?


Problem 1: Your iPhone is no match for your cool headphones

The smartphone is a great digital music player, but its audio quality sucks! You may have awesome headphones, but your iPhone won’t get the best out of them—the sound will be muddy, lack clarity and punch, to say nothing about feeble bass.

If you are into audio quality, these headphones are the real deal. Your iPhone doesn't support these headphones. That's the first problem we decided to solve.


Problem 2: Audiophiles have to put up with an ugly setup 

Today's headphone enthusiasts have to carry several devices with them, because no one device does everything right. But given the choice, which option would you prefer—an ugly stack of boxes or a slick handheld? We think it's the slick handheld.



Experience the "Before and after"! From an ugly stack of devices to an elegant phone case that does it all! 

Who wants to carry several devices on a trip, on a long flight, or even on the commute to work? They can get lost, your luggage gets heavy, and what if one cable or component goes bad? You would  lose the entire setup!

Leave the component stereo system at home. The days of mixing and matching a portable amplifier to the DAC, to the battery, to the player are gone. We let you use what you already have in your pocket and add what's missing. Your iPhone offers a great, reliable user interface and what we add is a superb-sounding DAC and Amp. 

Plus, we are adding an internal battery, which powers the DAC/Amp independently, but can also deliver power to your phone, if needed. We have engineered it all to fit inside the phone case, so you truly carry one device only -- no cables, no bulky pieces, no fuss!


We designed HiFi-Skÿn to solve all of these problems.

We engineered HiFi-Skÿn to take the digital signal out of your phone, process it using the same technology found in our award-winning audiophile products, and amplify it to a powerful, crystal-clear signal that will drive any headphones, with pristine highs and powerful bass. With HiFi-Skÿn, you can have a world-class music player in your pocket, occupying little more space than your iPhone!


A smart case for your smart phone




The CEntrance HiFi-Skÿn is a sound card inside the phone case. It delivers your music in pristine audio fidelity and on top of that, packs a long-lasting battery to charge your phone while playing!  Besides audiophile sound quality, it features a powerful amp that works with most sophisticated headphones on the market. HiFi-Skÿn is perfect for those extended shifts at work, on long flights, or at home, when you need some quality tunes but the phone's buzzy sound just wouldn't cut it. 
No more compromises. Leave your music player at home. Carry one device that's perfect for both music and communication—your phone wrapped in a HiFi-Skÿn.

No bulk, no extra components, no unsightly rubber bands holding things together! Your phone will slide right into HiFi-Skÿn, and the built-in battery can recharge your phone, or allow you to listen for up to 10 hours! Besides that, HiFi-Skÿn acts as a shock-absorbing case for your valuable phone.

Turn your iPhone into an audiophile music player—TODAY! 


Who we are

CEntrance owes its reputation to thousands of users and owners of our products, all around the world. Starting out as designers behind today's famous audio brands, CEntrance now  has many of its own products on the market. Our products are endorsed by Hollywood's famous producers, mastering engineers and musicians: people who demand quality— just like you do!—and whose livelihoods depend upon our products. 


Our list of endorsers includes Harry Shearer from This is Spinal Tap, John Kapelos from Law and Order, David Bryson from Counting Crows, Richard Fortus, who plays with Guns and Roses, Rihanna, and Britney Spears; David Hampton, recording engineer for Prince and many others!


CEntrance recording products are used by the following famous broadcasters: 


With CEntrance, you can rely on audio quality, build quality and value. 


CEntrance in the Media

We've been profiled in numerous media publications. Here is a small sampling.



Our motto is "Making Audio Personal™" and we believe that you don't need to pay thousands of dollars for a great sounding system.  Over the years we have perfected portable audio technology and learned how to shrink an audiophile system down in size. All these years spent refining portable audio gear resulted in the HiFi-Skÿn—the ultimate Audiophile System for your iPhone!


Proof of our quality

We're CEntrance:  A world leader in digital audio. You’ll see our professional products in recording and broadcast studios all over the world. Our personal audio products are killer, too: CNET called our HiFi-M8 “The best-sounding headphone amp ever tested.” 

Our DACmini was featured on the cover of Stereophile magazine!

Just look at the industry awards given to CEntrance over the years:


Industry Awards for CEntrance


Given our background, you wouldn't expect us to settle for mediocre sound quality—and we didn’t! We used our expertise with audiophile products to transform the audio system of your phone and dramatically improve you music enjoyment.


What does HiFi-Skÿn do?

HiFi-Skÿn does three things:


It plays hi-res music: Your iPhone can store high-resolution music, but you won't hear it with the ear buds. To access your phone's true playback potential, you need an external DAC and a headphone amplifier. HiFi-Skÿn  supports asynchronous digital streaming and mastering-level sound up to 24-bit / 192 kHz resolution, dramatically improving sound quality compared to your iPhone's audio jack.

It charges your phone: We've built in a powerful, 1-Amp charging circuit that will recharge your phone TWICE AS FAST as a typical USB port. When on the go, HiFi-Skÿn  can use its own battery to power-boost your phone, saving you in a bind.

It protects your investment:  We've chosen attractive, impact-resistant poly-carbonate plastic to make a phone case that is both stylish and tough under everyday use. The elegant enclosure protects the battery, audio electronics and controls inside—and keeps your investment safe.



HiFi-Skÿn features at a glance

Borrowing from our DACmini Desktop DAC and HiFi-M8 portable DAC, we used expensive, audiophile-grade components such as D/A converters, amplifiers and power supplies to dramatically raise the bar on sound quality. HiFi-Skÿn makes it possible to listen to hi-res files on your phone. Here are the main features:


Now your iPhone can play better, longer, while staying safer!


Impressions from CES 2015

Several audio journalists and early adopters came up to our booth at CES 2015 to experience the product. Everyone loved the sound, portability and features of the HiFi-Skÿn. There was a lot of excitement in the air. People cannot wait to get this product!



Who is HiFi-Skÿn for?

You may have invested in awesome headphones, but when you plug them into the phone, something's missing from your music. It just doesn't sound the same as it does on your home system or your desktop system... It just isn't ALIVE. If this is painfully familiar, then HiFi-Skÿn is for you. It'll breathe LIFE into your music.

A quick checklist:

  • Not ready to give up your iPhone 5 yet? Add hi-res sound and an extra battery, and get awesome audio playback quality that is future-proof with DSD support!
  • Planning to upgrade to iPhone 6? Your old iPhone 5 can now become a music player with extended battery life!
  • Have an iPod Touch 5G with lots of music on it? HiFi-Skÿn will fit it perfectly, and is a great way to get a hi-res music player with a familiar interface, for less.


The HiFi-Skyn story

HiFi-Skÿn has been in development for well over a year. The design goal was always simple -- improve sound quality of the most popular phones in the world. But making the product so small was a challenge: components reserved for audiophiles are typically larger than consumer-grade parts. But nevertheless, we kept trying. 

First, we released HiFi-M8, a portable iPhone DAC/amp, which was extremely popular, but just a bit big. Then we released Mini-M8, which was 30% thinner, but STILL a little big for everyday use. 



We kept pushing the boundaries and eventually packed all circuitry into something as tiny as a phone case. We are finally happy with what we've got and cannot wait to bring this product to you!


Miniaturizing HiFi-Skÿn required modern SMT technology and precision assembly equipment. Today we already have a network of reliable production suppliers. When planning this project,  we worked to minimize any cost, logistics and quality risks. This reduces the "gotchas" and speeds up the delivery to you.



As of today, we have fully functional samples and design is ready for production. The technology used in HiFi-Skÿn is already proven -- it comes from our award-winning HiFi-M8, Mini-M8 and other products.

We showed HiFi-Skÿn prototypes at the Rocky Mountain Audio Fest in Denver in October 2014, and the hardcore headphone enthusiasts at CanJam loved it!  We made more tweaks and will be showing the updated product at CES, January 2015.


What will I get?

Until now, high-end sound carried a high price tag. We know—our own award-winning HiFi-M8 and Mini-M8 cost $700 each. That's because we make them in smaller quantities to satisfy the needs of audiophiles. This product is different. We are going to reduce the cost due to larger production volumes and pass the savings on to you.

HiFi-Skÿn's retail price will be $399. But Indiegogo contributors such as yourself will have access to a limited number of attractive perks. These deals won't last, so act now to take advantage of exceptional savings! But it gets even better—you can make money by simply sharing this campaign with your friends  across all of your social media channels (facebook, twitter, instagram, reddit, head-fi, etc.)

Share and get free gear!

"Get a Free Skyn for referring 10 contributors!"

If you send your campaign link to your friends and ten of them contribute, we will give you a free Skyn! You don't need to contribute yourself.

Important: Use the sharing tool at the top of the campaign. Your sharing link is unique -- that's the link you need to send to your friends. That's how we will know how many contributors you have referred. Your link will look something like this:

http://igg.me/at/hifi-skyn/x/111111

Note: 111111 is a bogus number, your own number will be different.


Selecting the model to match your phone
Selecting the model that fits your phone is simple—just let us know which phone you have and we will send you the correct HiFi-Skÿn model. After you contribute, we will contact you to clarify your phone's model. But if you change your phone in the meantime—don't worry—until we start shipping you can still change your mind.
We currently support iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, and iPod Touch 5th Generation. We plan to add more phones, including android phones, as we reach campaign milestones. Stay tuned for more info on that!
Regarding the colors, we will start with black and will be adding new colors as campaign milestones are met. We will ask about your preference now and will give you a chance to change your pick, as more colors may become available later.

Product Specifications

DIMENSIONS: 172 mm x 64 mm x 20 mm (LxWxH) *
CASE MATERIAL: Impact-resistant PC plastic, colors TBD
POWER: AC adapter & rechargeable battery
BATTERY LIFE: 10 hrs on full charge (estimated)
AUDIO TRANSFER: Lightning jack, asynch digital audio
OUTPUT JACK: 3.5 mm headphone plug
THD+N: .001% (estimated for Amp Extreme)
FREQ. RESPONSE:   20Hz...40kHz (Amp Extreme)
OUTPUT POWER: 300 mW per channel (32 Ohm load, est for Amp Extreme)
COMPATIBILITY:     iPhone 5, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPod Touch 5G
* Dimensions listed for the Phone 5 model


Why did we pick that name?

In many Scandinavian languages, the word "Skyn" means "sensation". As audiophiles ourselves, we know what it feels like when the music fidelity is so good, it seems like the band is playing right in front of you in the room. That true sensation of "being there" is what this product is designed to deliver. Users of our products are amazed with the audio quality that lets them rediscover their entire music collections. We want you to have the same experience, on the go. Try it and you will be a believer. You won't go back to iPhone's headphone jack ever again!


Let's work together!

We are obsessed with sound quality, but we don't develop products in isolation -- we prefer to include the user in the process. This is your chance to shape what's next. HiFi-Skÿn is our fourth crowd-sourcing effort. Previous projects, co-developed with the community went extremely well. We listen to your feedback, stay in a dialog, and implement your requests when selecting features and design.

By pledging your support, you can help us increase the amount of product we can order from the factory, as well as accelerate the speed, with which we can get it into your hands. This in turn lowers production costs and helps us make the product more affordable. Your support will be a vital spark in growing a company obsessed with creating the best sounding, most liberating audio devices in the world.

Please support us today and help us fight bad sound on this planet!


Risks & Challenges

This is not our first product. We already have many products on the market, so the risks are minimized due to our experience.

We have a goal of shipping units in March 2015. Your support will help us speed up mass-production, acquire parts and tooling, and hire additional manpower to get units shipping asap.  If we don't meet the funding goal, we will still continue with the project and will bring this revolutionary product to market. We believe in this product concept and will make it happen. We've done this on our own with DACport, DACmini, HiFi-M8, and  other products, but here we are looking to speed things up via crowd-funding. So speed the main risk, which you can help mitigate by contributing today. Help us deliver the product as fast as possible!


Other Ways You Can Help

Frequently Asked Questions
- Will HiFi-Skÿn bypass the internal iPhone DAC?
- What can you say about the HiFi-Skÿn sound signature?
- Will there be enough power to drive demanding headphones?
- Does it output a digital signal to leverage an outboard DAC?
- I live in a foreign country. Can you ship to my address?
- Is there a gain switch to accomodate different headphones?
- Is it also possible to have the Skyn as a pure DAC to a desktop amp?
- Is the phone easy to remove with little wear to the case?
- When do I select the phone model? What happens if I change my phone later?
- Will streaming from TIDAL be supported? What other means are there for playing hi-res FLAC or DSD files?
- Why does an established company such as CEntrance need crowdfunding?


Will HiFi-Skÿn bypass the internal iPhone DAC?

Yes. HiFi-Skÿn bypasses the iPhone sound system and uses our award-winning technology and audiophile-grade components to dramatically improve the audio quality over the stock iPhone. It's our mission to upgrade the sound quality of the phone, and we will work hard to make sure you are not disappointed!


Back to FAQ

What can you say about the HiFi-Skÿn sound signature?

The CEntrance "House Sound" is described as clean and natural. Our award-winning HiFi-M8 was called "The Best Amp/DAC ever tested" by CNET. Our DACmini CX was featured on the cover of Stereophile magazine. You should expect HiFi-Skÿn to sound similar to those two products.


Back to FAQ

Will there be enough power to drive demanding headphones?

Initial amplifier was rated at 160mW per channel, which is very impressive. But you demanded more power and once the stretch goal is met, we will upgrade the amp to what's used in HiFi-M8 or DACmini CX. Those two products are known to drive almost any headphones with clean, pitch-black noise floor.


Back to FAQ

Does it output a digital signal to leverage an outboard DAC?

As a "Made-for-iPhone" certified vendor, we are not allowed to provide digital output for copyright reasons. But rest assured, the DAC inside the DACmini CX, which got us on the cover of Stereophile, is the same DAC you will get with the HiFi-Skÿn. You will not be disappointed!


Back to FAQ

I live in a foreign country. Can you ship to my address?

We will ship worldwide. We use FedEx and provide the tracking number as soon as the unit is shipped. We still need to estimate the overall weight of the package. When it's close to shipping time, we will contact you separately about the shipping fee.


Back to FAQ

Is there a gain switch to accommodate different headphones?

Yes, the gain switch is included. It controls the output level and has three positions: IEMs, Line out, Overhead headphones.


Back to FAQ

Is it also possible to have the Skÿn as a pure DAC to a desktop amp?

Yes. The 3.5mm headphone jack also functions as a line level output, so you can feed that to powered speakers or a larger amp. Just make sure you move the gain switch to the middle position to ensure line-level output.


Back to FAQ

Is the phone easy to remove with little wear to the case?

We are working with poly-carbonate plastic, which is both strong and flexible. We have designed the cover to be easy to remove and replace.


Back to FAQ

When do I select the phone model? What happens if I change my phone later?

Your contribution covers all listed phone models. We will ask you about your phone model and preferred color when we are ready to ship. 


Back to FAQ

Will streaming from TIDAL be supported? What other means are there for playing hi-res FLAC or DSD files?

Streaming from Tidal and many other services is supported. Several applications already support high-res files, including Onkyo. We are considering our own application and may feature that as a stretch goal later.


Back to FAQ

Why does an established company such as CEntrance need crowdfunding?

Great question. We use crowdfunding because it is also crowdsourcing, a way to connect with our customers and discuss features of a new product. This helps us make sure we design products that people enjoy using.


Back to FAQ 
With CEntrance, you can rely on audio quality, build quality and value. We've been profiled in numerous media publications. Here is a small sampling.
story_txt:
Turn your phone into an awesome music player!
What's wrong with my phone?
You like going places and listening to music. You pack
lightly when you travel, because it’s all about the experience and ease. You don't want to carry a
separate music player for two reasons -- first, they are expensive, and second, you already have your phone! So, you
load your music onto your phone, pack your favorite headphones and go!
But, something’s not right. The music sounds caged-in. It
lacks impact, clarity, and emotion. Your music doesn't sound alive. The
sound is not what you're used to because your phone is not an audiophile
device! It was designed with the average consumer in mind, so it includes mid-grade parts
to save costs. 
Most people wouldn't hear the sonic difference because they grew up
listening to MP3s, and they don’t know any better. But you hear the difference, and this gets frustrating. Fortunately, there is an answer!
It’s called HiFi-Skÿn and it
comes from CEntrance, a leader in personal audio. For the last 15 years we've built equipment for recording studios, performance stages and broadcast facilities
worldwide. We've designed mixing consoles, recording equipment, and home stereo
systems for music professionals – the most demanding ears out there.
HiFi-Skÿn is the answer to the phone sound blues. We used our years of experience in designing quality audio products and packaged an awesome
playback system inside of a phone case! Now you can carry the phone with you, do
your work AND listen to music in a whole new way. Leave the expensive music player behind. You no longer
need it. Your iPhone is now a work-and-play device with great sound quality
and a longer battery life.

Jump to Frequently Asked Questions




Thank you for helping us reach the stretch goals!You voted for these additions and we are working hard to make them happen. Thank you for helping us meet these goals and add to what's already shaping up to be and incredible product! Share this campaign with friends and family!We reached the first four goals and made tons of improvements. We redesigned HiFi-Skÿn's headphone amplifier. We redesigned the power supply and gave you an easier charging method -- use any USB charger (however iPad charger is preferred due to higher power.) We've worked hard to deliver even better sound quality via an upgraded D/A converter. We are giving you three colors to choose from! Next, we have a custom high-resolution playback app! Help us make these goals a success! Donate to the campaign now!Update: Editor's Choice Award!

Look what just happened! The Absolute Sound Magazine has given our HiFi-M8 the coveted editor's choice award for 2015! As some of you may know, HiFi-Skyn is largely based on HiFi-M8 design, which means that you will not be disappointed. We are planning to make HiFi-Skÿn sound even better than HiFi-M8! 





Update: Amp Extreme
Earlier on in the product design cycle, we felt that 130 mW of output power would be sufficient to drive the majority of headphones, so we designed that into the product. But during the campaign we got a lot of useful customer feedback, and one of the more persistent requests was for hotter output. So, we upgraded the Classic Amp to Super Amp, to deliver 210 mW of power. Yet, somehow that still didn't feel like a breakthrough, so we pushed further and also upgraded the power supply to deliver a total of over 300 mW! This covers pretty much all headphones on the market, making HiFi-Skyn an extremely versatile DAC/Amp that gives you extra dynamic range, lowers the distortion and helps control the noise floor, so that music is the only thing reaching your ears.  This new amp plus power supply combo is called "Amp Extreme". It will be standard on all units that will retail at $499




So why do I need a HiFi-Skÿn?



Problem 1: Your iPhone is no match for your cool headphones
The smartphone is a great digital music player, but its audio quality sucks! You may have awesome headphones, but your iPhone won’t get the best out of them—the sound will be muddy, lack clarity and punch, to say nothing about feeble bass.



If you are into audio quality, these headphones are the real deal. Your iPhone doesn't support these headphones. That's the first problem we decided to solve.

Problem 2: Audiophiles have to put up with an ugly setup 
Today's headphone enthusiasts have to carry several devices with them, because no one device does everything right. But given the choice, which option would you prefer—an ugly stack of boxes or a slick handheld? We think it's the slick handheld.





Experience the "Before and after"! From an ugly stack of devices to an elegant phone case that does it all! 
Who wants to carry several devices on a trip, on a long flight, or even on the commute to work? They can get lost, your luggage gets heavy, and what if one cable or component goes bad? You would  lose the entire setup!
Leave the component stereo system at home. The days of mixing and matching a portable amplifier to the DAC, to the battery, to the player are gone. We let you use what you already have in your pocket and add what's missing. Your iPhone offers a great, reliable user interface and what we add is a superb-sounding DAC and Amp. 
Plus, we are adding an internal battery, which powers the DAC/Amp independently, but can also deliver power to your phone, if needed. We have engineered it all to fit inside the phone case, so you truly carry one device only -- no cables, no bulky pieces, no fuss!
We designed HiFi-Skÿn to solve all of these problems.
We engineered HiFi-Skÿn to take the digital signal out of your phone, process it using the same technology found in our award-winning audiophile products, and amplify it to a powerful, crystal-clear signal that will drive any headphones, with pristine highs and powerful bass. With HiFi-Skÿn, you can have a world-class music player in your pocket, occupying little more space than your iPhone!


A smart case for your smart phone
The CEntrance HiFi-Skÿn is a sound card inside the phone case. It delivers your music in pristine audio fidelity and on top of that, packs a long-lasting battery to charge your phone while playing!  Besides audiophile sound quality, it features a powerful amp that works with most sophisticated headphones on the market. HiFi-Skÿn is perfect for those extended shifts at work, on long flights, or at home, when you need some quality tunes but the phone's buzzy sound just wouldn't cut it. No more compromises. Leave your music player at home. Carry one device that's perfect for both music and communication—your phone wrapped in a HiFi-Skÿn.
No bulk, no extra components, no unsightly rubber bands holding things together! Your phone will slide right into HiFi-Skÿn, and the built-in battery can recharge your phone, or allow you to listen for up to 10 hours! Besides that, HiFi-Skÿn acts as a shock-absorbing case for your valuable phone.
Turn your iPhone into an audiophile music player—TODAY! 






Who we are
CEntrance owes its reputation to thousands of users and owners of our products, all around the world. Starting out as designers behind today's famous audio brands, CEntrance now  has many of its own products on the market. Our products are endorsed by Hollywood's famous producers, mastering engineers and musicians: people who demand quality— just like you do!—and whose livelihoods depend upon our products. 

Our list of endorsers includes Harry Shearer from This is Spinal Tap, John Kapelos from Law and Order, David Bryson from Counting Crows, Richard Fortus, who plays with Guns and Roses, Rihanna, and Britney Spears; David Hampton, recording engineer for Prince and many others!

CEntrance recording products are used by the following famous broadcasters: 




With CEntrance, you can rely on audio quality, build quality and value. 

CEntrance in the Media
We've been profiled in numerous media publications. Here is a small sampling.



Our motto is "Making Audio Personal™" and we believe that you don't need to pay thousands of dollars for a great sounding system.  Over the years we have perfected portable audio technology and learned how to shrink an audiophile system down in size. All these years spent refining portable audio gear resulted in the HiFi-Skÿn—the ultimate Audiophile System for your iPhone!

Proof of our quality
We're CEntrance:  A world leader in digital audio. You’ll see our professional products in recording and broadcast studios all over the world. Our personal audio products are killer, too: CNET called our HiFi-M8 “The best-sounding headphone amp ever tested.” 

Our DACmini was featured on the cover of Stereophile magazine!
Just look at the industry awards given to CEntrance over the years:
Industry Awards for CEntrance

Given our background, you wouldn't expect us to settle for mediocre sound quality—and we didn’t! We used our expertise with audiophile products to transform the audio system of your phone and dramatically improve you music enjoyment.




What does HiFi-Skÿn do?


HiFi-Skÿn does three things:
It plays hi-res music: Your iPhone can store high-resolution music, but you won't hear it with the ear buds. To access your phone's true playback potential, you need an external DAC and a headphone amplifier. HiFi-Skÿn  supports asynchronous digital streaming and mastering-level sound up to 24-bit / 192 kHz resolution, dramatically improving sound quality compared to your iPhone's audio jack.
It charges your phone: We've built in a powerful, 1-Amp charging circuit that will recharge your phone TWICE AS FAST as a typical USB port. When on the go, HiFi-Skÿn  can use its own battery to power-boost your phone, saving you in a bind.
It protects your investment:  We've chosen attractive, impact-resistant poly-carbonate plastic to make a phone case that is both stylish and tough under everyday use. The elegant enclosure protects the battery, audio electronics and controls inside—and keeps your investment safe.







HiFi-Skÿn features at a glance
Borrowing from our DACmini Desktop DAC and HiFi-M8 portable DAC, we used expensive, audiophile-grade components such as D/A converters, amplifiers and power supplies to dramatically raise the bar on sound quality. HiFi-Skÿn makes it possible to listen to hi-res files on your phone. Here are the main features:

Now your iPhone can play better, longer, while staying safer!

Impressions from CES 2015
Several audio journalists and early adopters came up to our booth at CES 2015 to experience the product. Everyone loved the sound, portability and features of the HiFi-Skÿn. There was a lot of excitement in the air. People cannot wait to get this product!


Who is HiFi-Skÿn for?
You may have invested in awesome headphones, but when you plug them into the phone, something's missing from your music. It just doesn't sound the same as it does on your home system or your desktop system... It just isn't ALIVE. If this is painfully familiar, then HiFi-Skÿn is for you. It'll breathe LIFE into your music.
A quick checklist:
Not ready to give up your iPhone 5 yet? Add hi-res sound and an extra battery, and get awesome audio playback quality that is future-proof with DSD support!
Planning to upgrade to iPhone 6? Your old iPhone 5 can now become a music player with extended battery life!

Have an iPod Touch 5G with lots of music on it? HiFi-Skÿn will fit it perfectly, and is a great way to get a hi-res music player with a familiar interface, for less.



The HiFi-Skyn story

HiFi-Skÿn has been in development for well over a year. The design goal was always simple -- improve sound quality of the most popular phones in the world. But making the product so small was a challenge: components reserved for audiophiles are typically larger than consumer-grade parts. But nevertheless, we kept trying. 
First, we released HiFi-M8, a portable iPhone DAC/amp, which was extremely popular, but just a bit big. Then we released Mini-M8, which was 30% thinner, but STILL a little big for everyday use. 




We kept pushing the boundaries and eventually packed all circuitry into something as tiny as a phone case. We are finally happy with what we've got and cannot wait to bring this product to you!



Miniaturizing HiFi-Skÿn required modern SMT technology and precision assembly equipment. Today we already have a network of reliable production suppliers. When planning this project,  we worked to minimize any cost, logistics and quality risks. This reduces the "gotchas" and speeds up the delivery to you.



As of today, we have fully functional samples and design is ready for production. The technology used in HiFi-Skÿn is already proven -- it comes from our award-winning HiFi-M8, Mini-M8 and other products.
We showed HiFi-Skÿn prototypes at the Rocky Mountain Audio Fest in Denver in October 2014, and the hardcore headphone enthusiasts at CanJam loved it!  We made more tweaks and will be showing the updated product at CES, January 2015.




What will I get?Until now, high-end sound carried a high price tag. We know—our own award-winning HiFi-M8 and Mini-M8 cost $700 each. That's because we make them in smaller quantities to satisfy the needs of audiophiles. This product is different. We are going to reduce the cost due to larger production volumes and pass the savings on to you.

HiFi-Skÿn's retail price will be $399. But Indiegogo contributors such as yourself will have access to a limited number of attractive perks. These deals won't last, so act now to take advantage of exceptional savings! But it gets even better—you can make money by simply sharing this campaign with your friends  across all of your social media channels (facebook, twitter, instagram, reddit, head-fi, etc.)
