Back to FAQ 



With CEntrance, you can rely on audio quality, build quality and value. We've been profiled in numerous media publications. Here is a small sampling.

story:
Stuck on YEG 

You love Edmonton. We love Edmonton. We also love emojis — so we wanted to make some inspired by the people, places and preferences of our city. 

We’ve already designed a bunch of EDMOjis — including the Talus Dome, green onion cakes, the Gretzky statue, sad Don Iveson — and a rough draft of our app. 

We’d like to bring more than 60 of them to life … and to your iPhones. We’re hoping to raise $1,000 to finish our designs and the app. Complete with keyboard. 

Our goal? To sell the app for a very affordable price. (As in less than three bucks.) With the possibility of free updates to add new EDMOjis, of course! We'd love to hear your suggestions. 

 

Personalize your texts 

Have you always wanted your own emoji?

You're in luck! For some of our perks, we're offering to design an EDMOji (or two) for you — of you, your dog, your band, your company, your favourite YEG landmark ... you get the picture. 

We'll include your EDMOji in our app ... and we'll give you a copy of the app, so you can text your personalized image to all your friends (and foes).  

If that's too over-the-top for you, most of our perks just offer a copy of the app (or two). Oh ... and did someone say BUTTONS? 

 

Other app-tions

Don't like texting? Don't own an iPhone? That's OK, you can still help.

Spread the word as far and wide as you can — through Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, your weekly call to Gran. We know you're inundated with requests and we appreciate all the support we can get.

THANK YOU.

 

Behind the screen

EDMOjis are the brainchild of two friends who share a love of sports and crazy ideas.

Sandra Sperounes is a former Edmonton Journal writer and a lifelong #YEG booster. As a kid, she was an avid sticker collector, so it’s no wonder she’s passionate about emojis and EDMOjis. Her next goal? Scratch ’n’ sniff EDMOjis. 

Lucas Timmons is a digital guru and former Edmonton Journal staffer. He now works for Canadian Press. He cheers for the San Francisco Giants and likes to taunt Sandra with Kimojis. She grins and bears it because without Lucas, there would be no EDMOjis.

story:
Our Story

Hi, we are team STATUS, and thanks for checking out our project. With your help, we would love to make our idea a reality and revolutionize social communication.

We have always been intrigued by the parallels between colors and relationship statuses, our goal is to bring this to your everyday life in a discreet, yet easily recognizable medium.

Status is a lifestyle brand that allows self-expression in a whole new way. Inspired by the social media phenomenon, Status is a range of products that communicates through color and a social awareness of what these colours indicate.


Statusâ€™ range of mobile phone cases for iPhone 4 and 4S allow users to express their relationship status through this everyday product. 


Since the introduction of social media our relationship status has become public information for all to see. Translating this into an accessory that you constantly flash, makes these products a fun way to communicate without speaking and more importantly a clever conversation starter.


The Impact

Our goal is take the self-expression that the glorious internet has enabled us with and apply it in an tangible manner that are also fashion accessories. Increasing the ability for one to self express though a medium where social understanding and awareness is essential for its success.


With many more products on the way, our goal is for people to showcase their personality and STATUS to the people around them with STATUS products. We want our range of lifestyle products to change the way social interaction takes place and essentially taking the guess work out of your night out.


How Does it Work?


STATUS keeps it simple, with three statuses to suit any individuals personal situation.


AVAILABLE â€“ this vibrant shade of green is for those who are single and looking for love.


TAKEN â€“ the strong red styling of the TAKEN indicates you are in a relationship, off bounds and happily taken.


UNDECIDED â€“ the zesty orange color is directed at those who are neither here nor there. Not sure of their own STATUS and could be up for anything!


www.statuscase.com


What We Need & What You Get


We have poured all our money into prototypes, samples, packaging, photo shoots and marketing. 


Now, we need funding from you, just enough to start manufacturing these cases and other products for sale online and in retail stores.


Take a look at our funding perks to see what you are rewarded with for funding this fun and exciting project.


Please remember to specify the STATUS colour you want at time of order.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this funding project with all your friends and family, also, 'like' our Facebook page and follow us on Twitter!

story:
QUIC is the best super slim Qi wireless charger and powerbank designed for your iPhone 8/X, Samsung. Simply put your phone on the top of QUIC and it will soon recognize it and start charging immediately. The Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 will save you hours of time on recharging and charging. Get Quic & Quic Pad to go wireless at your home, office or while on the go, power your phone at Full-Speed anywhere, anytime.

 

The Astronautic High Density Li-Polymer battery, provides larger capacity with smaller size.

With the extra USB-C/USB ports, Quic can charge 3 devices at the same time.

The most compatible Qi wireless charging standard allows you to charge both iPhone and any Qi devices.

In the car
Charge your phone easily while driving, pick up anytime without worrying about cables.

In the office
Use Quic Pad to charge various devices on the table, take Quic with you to join a meeting and continue on your emails/messages.

At home
Put your phone on Quic Pad at night, pick it up in the morning with full power.

On the go
Cannot find a power outlet? Take out your Quic to charge the phone while using Google Maps.

ChargeLabs is a team of designers and engineers with a mission to bring the best portable charging products to everyone. Fun, breakthrough, and innovation are our tags. The team has won Reddot Design Award and a series of other design awards during the past few years. Our engineering expertise and supply chain efficiency ensured that we can create best in-class products that everyone can enjoy.

While we have been manufacturing best-selling electronic products for years, we also helped designed and manufactured a number of products for other brands. Quic is the first product we launched on Indiegogo thus far. We believe that the wireless charging should be comfortable and convenient with stylish design that matches your expensive new iPhone.

We have spent months developing, testing and prototyping, even completed the molding before the campaign started. We need your support to start the mass production and get the CE/FCC/RoHS certified.

Statements

 

All the molds needed has been produced and fully tested. We only need your order to start the first mass production batch.

Product specifications may change during the crowdfunding process to ensure the product is made as best as possible. If any specifications are changed, we will notify everyone in the “Update” section of the crowdfunding page.

The product will provide CE, RoHS, FCC and other international certification.

We will try our best to meet our targeted release timing. However, due to supply chain, quality control or other issues may arise which can cause delays to the delivery of the product. We hope to have your understanding in those circumstances. Thank you!

 

FAQ：

 

Q: Will the wireless charging pad work with a phone case on?

A: Yes, it works with any phone case less than 2mm thick.

 

Q: How long will it takes to fully recharge Quic powerbank?

A: The max input is 9V/2A 18W, so with a fast charger, it may take 2~2.5 to fully charge the Quic. It's up to 4 times faster than 5V/1A charging.

 

Q: Are you guys ready and 100% on March delivery?

A: Yes, we are ready for the March delivery. The molds are ready and we've completed small batches production as test. These produced Quic products have been sent to our clients as samples. We will keep you posted.

story:
WIRELESS CHARGER

 

WE PRESENTED TO ZEUZ THE ONLY WIRELESS POWER TRANSMITTER AT DISTANCE IN THE WORLD... WITH ZEUZ YOU WILL LIVE A NEW EXPERIENCE OF LIBERTY AND MOVEMENT

 

             

 

 

 ZEUZ IS POWER OVER THE DISTANCE WITH THE COMPLETE FREEDOM OF MOBILITY AND THE CONVENIENCE OF CONTINUING USING YOUR DEVICES WHILE THEY CHARGE.

WITH ZEUZ ENJOY THE TRUE WIRELESS CHARGING WITH A REACH OF UP TO 80 FEET.

 
ZEUZ'S TECHNOLOGY MAKES THE WIRELESS CHARGE, OF ANY DEVICE EITHER AT HOME, IN AN OFFICE OR IN A PUBLIC PLACE AS EASY AND SIMPLE AS CONNECTING TO THE INTERNET.
 
 
  
 
 
 
 

WITH ZEUZ...
 NO MORE TANGLES

 
 

​NO MORE CONTACT BASES OR CHARGING PADS

 

WITH ZEUZ.... NEVER MORE WILL HAPPEN THIS.

WITH ZEUZ THE CHARGE WILL BE CARRIED OUT EVEN WHEN THERE IS NO DIRECT VIEW LINE   BETWEEN THE TRANSMITTER AND THE RECEIVER, SO IT COULD BE ABLE TO CHARGE THE PHONE IN THE POCKET, THE BACKPACK, THE BAG OR STORED IN A DRAWER.

THE ZEUZ TECHNOLOGY MAKES IT POSSIBLE FOR A PERSON TO MOVE FREELY IN A ROOM, A HOUSE, AN OFFICE OR A BUILDING AND CAN BRING WITH HIM A DEVICE THAT IS CHARGING WIRELESSLY.

WITH A ZEUZ TRANSMITTER IN YOUR HOME YOU CAN SIT ON YOUR PREFERRED SOFA TO REST BY KEEPING YOUR PHONE OR ANY OTHER DEVICE CLOSE WHILE YOU ARE CHARGING WITHOUT THE BOTHERSOME CABLES, OR YOU MAY BE IN YOUR GARDEN OR TERRACE VIEWING YOUR PREFERRED VIDEOS OR PLAYING ANY GAME ON YOUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET AND YOU WILL NEVER NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THE FACT THAT YOUR BATTERY WILL RUN OUT. IMAGINE YOURSELF IN YOUR BEDROOM NOW ABLE TO SLEEP, YOU CAN LEAVE CHARGING YOUR SMARTPHONE OR DEVICE WITHOUT ENTLANGLEMENTS OR COMPLICATIONS, ALSO WITH THE SECURITY THAT THE SMART CHARGING SYSTEM OF ZEUZ WILL STOP THE CHARGE WHEN THE BATTERY OF YOUR DEVICE HAS ACHIEVED TOTAL GHARGE GIVING YOU TOTAL SAFETY AND PROTECTION AGAINST ACCIDENTS AND EXTENDING THE USEFUL LIFE OF YOUR BATTERY.

 

 WITH A ZEUZ TRANSMITTER IN YOUR OFFICE, YOUR TELEPHONE WILL BE CONSTANTLY CHARGING WHILE YOU WORK. EVEN WHEN IT IS HIDDEN IN YOUR SUIT POCKET OR SAVED IN YOUR BAG, PORTFOLIO OR BACK PACK, WITHOUT TANGLED CABLES, OR LIMITATIONS.

ZEUZ PORTATIL ... POWER WITHOUT CABLES THAT GOES WITH YOU

ZEUZ HAS A PORTABLE VERSION SO YOU CAN TAKE IT ANYWHERE... AND YOU CAN ENJOY THE TRUE WIRELESS CHARGING TECHNOLOGY.

ITS REACH IS UP TO 6.5 FEET AND LIKE THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM, IT CAN ALSO WIRELESSLY CHARGE ALL TYPES OF LOW CONSUMPTION DEVICES, HAVING THE ADDITIONAL FABULOUS ADVANTAGE OF BEING TOTALLY PORTABLE

     

WITHOUT CABLES AND WITHOUT CHARGING PADS

GREAT CHARGE POWER

CHARGE 2 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME IN A TRULY WIRELESS WAY

 

 

CHARGING CAPACITY

PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGER

THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGE SYSTEM ALLOWS YOU TO CHARGE UP TO 3 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME

SYSTEM OF CHARGING FOR ALL THE LIFE

WE HAVE DESIGNED BOTH TRANSMITTERS (SYSTEM PORTABLE OF  CHARGE WIRELESS, SYSTEM OF CHARGE WITH BACK UP BATTERY GL2) SO THAT THEY ARE NOT DISPOSABLE, LIKE ALL THE CHARGING DEVICES THAT USE BATTERIES AND ARE CURRENTLY ON THE MARKET, THE CHANGE OF BATTERIES CAN BE MADE IN THE EASIEST WAY.

 CHARGING SYSTEM INTELLIGENT

THE RECEIVERS HAVE AN INTELLIGENT CHARGING SYSTEM IN SUCH A WAY THAT AT THE TIME OF BATTERY CHARGING, THE CHARGING PROCESS IS CUT, PROTECTING AND EXTENDING THE USEFUL LIFE OF THE BATTERY.

THE CABLE CHARGERS AND THE CONTACT BASES CONSUME ENERGY CONTINUOUSLY AS THEY ARE PERMANENTLY CONNECTED. ZEUZ'S INTELLIGENT CHARGING SYSTEM HIBERNATES WHEN NOT IN USE.

THANKS TO THIS TRUE WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY, YOUR SMARTPHONE, TABLET OR OTHER DEVICE WILL START TO CHARGE IMMEDIATELY. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT WHERE OR TO WHAT DISTANCE HAS IT, WITH THE CHARGE SYSTEM ZEUZ WILL NOT NECESSARY PLACE’S YOUR DEVICE ON ANY CONTACT BASE, NOR WILL IT BE NECESSARY TO PUT A SPECIAL COVER FOR CHARGE AND MUCH LESS SPEND A FORTUNE ON BUYING DIFFERENT COVERS FOR EACH OF YOUR DEVICES, WITH THE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM ZEUZ NOT NEED TO BE AT A DISTANCE NEAR THE TRANSMITTER, IT IS MORE NEITHER NECESSARY TO KNOW WHERE THE ENERGY TRANSMITTER IS. SIMPLY BY PLACING THE RECEIVER ON YOUR SMARTPHONE, TABLET OR ANY OTHER DEVICE, YOU WILL IMMEDIATELY BEGIN CHARGING AND YOU CAN CONTINUE USING IT.

IT'S THAT SIMPLE, IT'S THAT EASY.

ZEUZ AT HOME

ZEUZ IN THE OFFICE

IS IT POSSIBLE TO CHARGE A DEVICE THROUGH RF?

THE CHARGING OF OUR DEVICES WIRELESSLY AT LONG DISTANCE, IS NOT AND WILL NOT BE POSSIBLE, BY MEANS OF THE INDUCTIVE LOAD OR THE MAGNETIC RESONANCE. (CHARGING PADS, CONTACT BASES)


THERE ARE CURRENTLY 4 TECHNOLOGY COMPANIES, WHICH ALREADY SUCCESSFULLY MARKET RADIO FREQUENCY (RF) TECHNOLOGY FOR THE TRANSMISSION OF ENERGY SAFELY AND EFFICIENTLY, THESE COMPANIES ARE: ENERGOUS, OSSIA AND POWERCAST AND THE STARTUP ZEUZ AG.

SO REAL IS THIS TECHNOLOGY THAT SOME OF THESE COMPANIES ARE ALREADY LISTED ON THE STOCK EXCHANGE IN THE UNITED STATES.

THE FIRST COMPANIES, ITS COMMERCIAL FOCUS IS AIMED AT DEVICE MANUFACTURERS, ONLY THE STARTUP ZEUZ, IS ABOUT TO START COMMERCIALIZING, THE FIRST REMOTE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM, DIRECTLY TO THE CONSUMER.

 

http://www.ossia.com

http://www.powercastco.com

http://www.energous.com

http://zeuzwirelesspower.com

COMPATIBILITY WITH MULTIPLE DEVICES

ZEUS IS REALLY THE ONLY WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY WITH WHICH YOU CAN CHARGE SMARTPHONES, TABLETS, ACTION CAMERAS, DRONES AND ANY OTHER DEVICE TO DISTANCE OF UP TO 80 FEET.

 

THE CONNECTORS THAT WILL BE INSTALLED IN THE RECEIVERS ARE THE MOST USED BY THE DEVICE MANUFACTURERS, WE ASK THAT AS SOON AS YOU HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY, CONTACT US AT EMAIL: powerwirelesschargezeuz@gmail.com
GIVE US YOUR SUPPORT DATA; TELL US WHAT REWARD YOU SUPPORTED AND WHAT KIND OF CONNECTOR OR CONNECTORS YOU NEED TO BE SENT.

 

 
 

APPLICATION (APP)

WE THINK ABOUT MAKING AN APPLICATION TO COMPLETELY CONTROL THE ZEUZ SYSTEM, BUT WE QUITLY ASKED OURSELVES.

WHAT IF OUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET DOES NOT HAVE A BATTERY?

¿HOW DO WE OPEN THE APPLICATION TO CHARGE OUR DEVICES?

¿HOW WILL WE CHARGE DEVICES TO WHICH THE APPLICATION CAN NOT BE DOWNLOADED, SUCH AS DRONES, CAMERAS, HEADPHONES, SPEAKERS, ETC, ETC?

ANALYZING THESE POINTS WE DECIDED THAT THE APPLICATION THAT WE WILL UPLOAD WILL BE ABLE TO ONLY GIVE INFORMATION OF THE CHARGING SYSTEM AND TO CONTROL CERTAIN CHARACTERISTICS.

THE APP CAN BE DOWNLOADED IN SMARTPHONES AND TABLETS THAT HAVE ANDROID AND IOS OPERATIONAL SYSTEM.

WE WANT ZEUZ TO BE THE EASIEST TO USE… SIMPLY CONNECT IT TO YOUR DEVICE AND DONE.

 

 

TECHNOLOGY AND FEATURES

 

HOW DOES THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM WORK?

TRANSMITTER / RECEIVER

THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER EMITS OF RF SIGNALS DIRECTED TO THE PLACE WHERE THE RECEIVER HAS BEEN DETECTED IN ADVANCE, THESE RF SIGNALS ARE CAPTURED BY THE HUNDREDS OF MICRO RECTENNAS THAT ARE LOCATED WITHIN THE ZEUZ RECEIVER, THROUGH AN ADVANCED PROCESS, THE RECEIVER CONVERTS THESE SIGNALS INTO THE ENERGY THAT YOUR DEVICE WILL USE TO BE CHARGED.

SIGNAL REPEATER

SO THAT THE SIGNAL EMITTED BY THE TRANSMITTER, IS ALWAYS OPTIMAL AND THE RECEIVER IS ABLE TO DELIVER THE MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY OF ENERGY, DURING THE CHARGING PROCESS, UP TO DISTANCES OF 80 FEET OR THROUGH WALLS AND OBSTACLES, IT IS REQUIRED TO USE SIGNAL REPEATERS, HAVING THIS DEVICE 2 MAIN FUNCTIONS THAT WOULD BE: REGENERATE THE SIGNAL IF IT HAS WEAKENED AND AMPLIFY THE SIGNAL AGAIN.

IT IS RECOMMENDED TO HAVE A MINIMUM OF 3 REPEATERS IN ORDER TO ALWAYS OBTAIN THE HIGHEST EFFICIENCY OF SIGNAL RECEPTION AND THUS ACHIEVE A FAST AND EFFECTIVE CHARGE ON THE DEVICES YOU WANT TO CHARGE.

THIS PROCESS IS A MUCH MORE COMPLEX CARRIES WITH IT A DELICATE SOFTWARE WITH VERY DETAILED ALGORITHMS, VERY COMPLICATED ELECTRONIC CIRCUITS AND NEW COMPONENTS THAT HAD TO BE CREATED BOTH FOR THE TRANSMITTER AND FOR THE RECEIVER, BEING IN THIS LAST WHERE MOST OF THE NEW TECHNOLOGY IS CONCENTRATED.

DESCRIPTION AND COMPONENTS OF THE ZEUZ SYSTEM

THE ZEUZ WIRELESS DISTANCE CHARGING SYSTEM HAS 2 VERSIONS:

THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM FOR HOME, OFFICE, WAREHOUSE, WORKSHOP, ETC.

THE PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM. FOR CARRY IT TO ANY ANYWHERE.

THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGING FIXED BASE SYSTEM IS COMPOSED OF THREE DEVICES: 1 TRANSMITTER, 1 REPEATER AND 1 RECEIVER. 

OF THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM THERE ARE 2 TRANSMITTERS MODELS: THE GL-1 MODEL WITH ITS POWER TRANSMISSION FUNCTION AND THE GL-2 MODEL WHICH HAS AN INTEGRATED UPS-APS TYPE SYSTEM, WITH 2 POWERFUL BATTERIES OF 36,000 mAh AUTO RECHARGEABLE FOR SUPPORT.

THE ZEUZ PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM IS COMPOSED ONLY BY 2 DEVICES: 1 TRANSMITTER AND 1 RECEIVER, ITS REACH IS UP TO 6.5 FEET AND LIKE THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM, IT CAN ALSO WIRELESSLY CHARGE ALL TYPES OF LOW CONSUMPTION DEVICES, HAVING THE ADDITIONAL FABULOUS ADVANTAGE OF BEING TOTALLY PORTABLE.

FOR ITS FUNCTIONING THE PORTABLE SYSTEM HAS A RECHARGEABLE BATTERY OF 30,000 mAh OF LONG DURATION.

EFFICIENCY OF THE CHARGING SYSTEM WIRELESS

THE CHARGING EFFICIENCY MAY VARY DUE TO THE OBSTACLES ENCOUNTERED BY THE SIGNAL OF THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER, ON ITS WAY TO THE RECEIVER. GENERALLY IN CLEAR AREAS THE CHARGING EFFECTIVENESS IS EXPECTED TO BE UP TO 80%. THIS EFFICIENCY VARIES AS THE DISTANCE IS INCREASING BETWEEN THE TRANSMITTER-RECEIVER OR WHEN THE SIGNAL HAS TO PASS THROUGH SEVERAL WALLS TO ARRIVE TO THE RECEIVER. TO ACHIEVE THE MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGINGING AT DISTANCE OR THROUGH WALLS SIGNAL REPEATERS ARE REQUIRED, AS A BASIC RULE IF IT COUNTS WITH 3 OR MORE REPEATERS WITHIN THE RANGE OF THE TRANSMITTER (80 FEET OF RANK) IT WILL ALWAYS MAINTAIN THE MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY OF CHARGING.

 

TESTS

 

       

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

MY SMARTPHONE HAS A “QI” CHARGE SYSTEM; CAN IT BE CHARGED WITH THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER?

NO, THEY ARE NOT COMPLETELY DIFFERENT SYSTEMS.

CAN I USE THE ZEUZ RECEIVER TO CHARGE WITH THE “QI” CHARGE SYSTEM?

NO, THEY ARE COMPLETELY DIFFERENT SYSTEMS.

CAN ONE ZEUZ RECEIVER BE USED TO CHARGE IN THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM AS IN THE PORTABLE SYSTEM?

YES, YOU CAN USE IT, ZEUZ RECEIVERS WORK WITH BOTH TRANSMISSION SYSTEMS, WHETHER FIXED OR PORTABLE, WHENEVER AND WHEN YOU ARE LINKED TO THE TRANSMITTER.

WHAT IS THE EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGING THE ZEUZ SYSTEM?

AS IT IS COMMENTED IN THE SPECIFICATIONS, THE EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGING CAN VARY ACCORDING TO THE OBSTACLES THAT ARE ON THE SIGNAL PATH OF THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER, GENERALLY IN CLEAR AREAS THE CHARGING EFFECTIVENESS IS EXPECTED TO BE UP TO 80%  THIS VARIABLE EFFICIENCY AS THE DISTANCE IS INCREASED BETWEEN THE TRANSMITTER-RECEIVER OR WHEN THE SIGNAL HAS TO PASS THROUGH SEVERAL WALLS TO ARRIVE TO THE RECEIVER. TO ACHIEVE THE MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGINGING AT DISTANCE OR THROUGH WALLS SIGNAL REPEATERS ARE REQUIRED, AS A BASIC RULE IF IT COUNTS WITH 3 OR MORE REPEATERS WITHIN THE RANGE OF THE TRANSMITTER (80 FEET OF RANK) IT WILL ALWAYS MAINTAIN THE MAXIMUM CHARGE EFFICIENCY.

CAN I PLACE SEVERAL ZEUZ REPEATERS AND EXTEND THE SIGNAL RANGE BEYOND THE 80 FEET?

NO, SIGNAL REPEATERS ARE ONLY TO IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF THE SIGNAL AS MENTIONED IN THE CHARACTERISTICS THE REPEATER FUNCTION IS TO: RENEW THE SIGNAL SO IT MAINTAIN THE CHARGE EFFECTIVENESS AS IF IT WAS NEAR THE TRANSMITTER.

WHAT CAN I DO IF I REQUIRE EXTENDING THE SIGNAL REACH RANGE?

TO EXTEND THE RANGE OF MORE THAN 80 FEET AND THE EFFICIENCY OF THE CHARGE IS ALWAYS EFFICIENT, IT IS NECESSARY TO ACQUIRE ANOTHER TRANSMITTER.

CAN I LOAD MORE THAN 3 DEVICES WITH A ZEUZ FIXED BASE TRANSMITTER?

NO, EACH TRANSMITTER HAS AN INTELLIGENT SYSTEM OF EMISSION OVERVOLTAGE PROTECTION THAT ONLY ALLOWS THE LOADING OF UP TO 3 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME; THIS LOAD CAPACITY IS LIMITED TO BE ABLE TO COMPLY WITH THE INTERNATIONAL RF TRANSMISSION SAFETY STANDARDS DICTATED BY ORGANIZATIONS REGULATORS (FCC, ETSI, CDRH, UL, ETC.).

CAN YOU ALSO CHARGE 3 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME WITH THE PORTABLE TRANSMISSION SYSTEM?

WE INCREASE THE LOADING POWER, OF THE PORTABLE DEVICE, NOW YOU CAN LOAD 2 DEVICES, AT THE SAME TIME FULLY WIRELESS.

CAN ANY ZEUZ RECEIVER TAKE ENERGY FROM MY TRANSMITTER?

YES, IF AND WHEN YOU ARE LINKED WITH THE TRANSMITTER. TO LINK A RECEIVER TO A ZEUZ TRANSMITTER, IT IS NECESSARY TO PLACE IT IN THE TRANSMITTER LOGO PART, FOR APPROXIMATELY 10 SECONDS, SO THAT THE RECEIVER CAN BE LINKED AND BE ABLE TO RECEIVE THE SIGNAL, ALSO WITH THE APP YOU CAN MONITOR THE DEVICES LINKED AND IF YOU WANT TO BLOCK ANY YOU CAN USE THE APP.

WITH THIS WIRELESS LOADING SYSTEM CAN I BE IN MOTION WHILE CHARGING MY DEVICE?

YES, IT IS ONE OF THE MAIN ADVANTAGES THAT OFFERS THIS ADVANCED WIRELESS LOAD SYSTEM THAT GIVES YOU TOTAL FREEDOM OF MOVEMENT. EITHER WITH THE FIXED BASE TRANSMISSION SYSTEM OR WITH THE PORTABLE SYSTEM ALWAYS AND WHEN IT IS WITHIN THE REACH AREA.

WITH THIS NEW CHARGE SYSTEM CAN I CONTINUE USING MY DEVICE WHILE IT IS CHARGING?

THIS IS ANOTHER OF ITS GREAT ADVANTAGES YOU WILL BE ABLE TO CONTINUE USING YOUR DEVICE TO SPEAK, SEE YOUR PREFERRED VIDEOS, PLAY, LISTEN TO MUSIC, TAKE PHOTOS OR VIDEOS AT THE SAME TIME THAT IT IS CHARGING.

RECEIVERS ARE AGAINST WATER?

NO AT THE MOMENT NO, BUT WE HAVE PLANS TO MAKE SOME WATERPROOF VERSIONS IN THE FUTURE.

DOES THE ZEUZ CHARGE SYSTEM REQUIRE ANY TYPE OF MAINTENANCE?

NO ONLY BASIC CLEANING WHAT IS RECOMMENDED BE DRY

WHAT IS THE POWER OF THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGE SYSTEM?

IN OPTIMAL CONDITIONS OF OPERATION UP TO 10 W

CAN THE BATTERIES OF THE PORTABLE SYSTEM AND THE TRANSMITTER BE CHANGED WITH A UPS-APS SYSTEM?

IF WE HAVE DESIGNED BOTH TRANSMITTERS SO THAT THEY ARE NOT DISPOSABLE, LIKE ALL THE PORTABLE CHARGING DEVICES THAT USE BATTERIES AND ARE CURRENTLY ON THE MARKET, THE CHANGE OF BATTERIES IS MADE IN A VERY SIMPLE WAY.

WHERE CAN I OBTAIN THE REPLACEMENT BATTERIES OF THESE DEVICES?

WHETHER YOU ARE SPONSORING THE PORTABLE DEVICE OR THE TRANSMITTER WITH UPS-APS SYSTEM MODEL GL-2. EACH OF THEM HAS AN EXTRA BATTERY KIT OF GIFT, YOU CAN ALSO PURCHASE BATTERY KIT THROUGH THE MARKETPLACE OF INDIEGOGO.

HOW IS THE PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGE SYSTEM RECHARGED?

THE PORTABLE DEVICE CAN BE CHARGED WIRELESSLY ONLY REQUIRES YOU TO PLACE A ZEUZ RECEIVER WITH USB-B INPUT

OF WHAT OTHER WAY CAN I LOAD MY ZEUZ PORTABLE DEVICE IN CASE OF NOT HAVING A WIRELESS TRANSMISSION SYSTEM OF FIXED BASE?

THE ZEUZ PORTABLE DEVICE HAS A USB-B TYPE INPUT IN WHICH A COMMON CHARGER WITH A USB-B CONNECTOR CAN BE CONNECTED.

HOW DOES THE GL-2 MODEL WIRELESS CHARGE SYSTEM WORK?

THE GL-2 MODEL WIRELESS POWER TRANSMITTER, BRINGS INTEGRATED A UPS-APS TYPE SYSTEM THAT IS ACTIVATED IN SECONDS AT THE TIME OF AN ELECTRICAL POWER CUTTING, SO THAT YOU CAN CONTINUE CHARGING ANY DEVICE.

YOUR SUPPORT POWER SYSTEM IS INTEGRATED BY 2 POWERFUL BATTERIES OF 36,000 MAH EACH. WHICH WILL SELF RECHARGE AS SOON AS THE ENERGY OF THE NETWORK RETURNS, TO BE ALWAYS AVAILABLE.

WILL THE APP HAVE ANY COST?

NO, IT WILL BE COMPLETELY FREE

WHEN WILL THE APP BE AVAILABLE ONLINE?

THE APP WILL BE AVAILABLE ONLINE WHEN WE START TO SEND THE PRODUCTS.

WITH WHAT OPERATING SYSTEMS WILL THE APP WORK?

THE APP CAN BE DOWNLOADED IN SMARTPHONES AND TABLETS THAT HAVE ANDROID AND IOS OPERATIONAL SYSTEM.

DOES THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGE SYSTEM HAVE A WARRANTY?

YES, BOTH SYSTEMS INCLUDING ALL OF ITS COMPONENTS HAVE 1 YEAR WARRANTY WITH DIRECT CHANGE WITHIN THE FIRST 6 MONTHS. (Certain restrictions apply)

WHERE CAN I APPLY FOR THE WARRANTY?

WE WILL THANK YOU TO SEND US A MAIL TO customerservice@zeuzwirelesspower.com WITH ALL YOUR PURCHASING DATA AND WE WILL GIVE YOU INDICATIONS.

IS THERE ANY DANGER OR DAMAGE IF THE BATTERY OF THE DEVICE HAS BEEN COMPLETELY CHARGED AND I FORGOT TO REMOVE THE DEVICE RECEIVER?

THERE IS NO DANGER SINCE THE RECEIVERS HAVE AN INTELLIGENT CHARGING SYSTEM IN SUCH A WAY THAT WHEN THE BATTERY IS CHARGED, IT CUTS THE CHARGING PROCESS, PROTECTING AND LENGTHENING THE LIFE OF THE BATTERY.

For more information Please send an email to the following emails:

powerwirelesschargezeuz@gmail.com

zeuzwirelessenergy@gmail.com

THANK YOU.......
story_txt:
WIRELESS CHARGER
 

WE PRESENTED TO ZEUZ THE ONLY WIRELESS POWER TRANSMITTER AT DISTANCE IN THE WORLD... WITH ZEUZ YOU WILL LIVE A NEW EXPERIENCE OF LIBERTY AND MOVEMENT

  
             
 

 
 ZEUZ IS POWER OVER THE DISTANCE WITH THE COMPLETE FREEDOM OF MOBILITY AND THE CONVENIENCE OF CONTINUING USING YOUR DEVICES WHILE THEY CHARGE. 
WITH ZEUZ ENJOY THE TRUE WIRELESS CHARGING WITH A REACH OF UP TO 80 FEET.
 

 
ZEUZ'S TECHNOLOGY MAKES THE WIRELESS CHARGE, OF ANY DEVICE EITHER AT HOME, IN AN OFFICE OR IN A PUBLIC PLACE AS EASY AND SIMPLE AS CONNECTING TO THE INTERNET. 
  
 
  

 
  
 
 
 
WITH ZEUZ... NO MORE TANGLES

 

 
​NO MORE CONTACT BASES OR CHARGING PADS

 
WITH ZEUZ.... NEVER MORE WILL HAPPEN THIS.


WITH ZEUZ THE CHARGE WILL BE CARRIED OUT EVEN WHEN THERE IS NO DIRECT VIEW LINE   BETWEEN THE TRANSMITTER AND THE RECEIVER, SO IT COULD BE ABLE TO CHARGE THE PHONE IN THE POCKET, THE BACKPACK, THE BAG OR STORED IN A DRAWER.
 
 
THE ZEUZ TECHNOLOGY MAKES IT POSSIBLE FOR A PERSON TO MOVE FREELY IN A ROOM, A HOUSE, AN OFFICE OR A BUILDING AND CAN BRING WITH HIM A DEVICE THAT IS CHARGING WIRELESSLY. 
 
WITH A ZEUZ TRANSMITTER IN YOUR HOME YOU CAN SIT ON YOUR PREFERRED SOFA TO REST BY KEEPING YOUR PHONE OR ANY OTHER DEVICE CLOSE WHILE YOU ARE CHARGING WITHOUT THE BOTHERSOME CABLES, OR YOU MAY BE IN YOUR GARDEN OR TERRACE VIEWING YOUR PREFERRED VIDEOS OR PLAYING ANY GAME ON YOUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET AND YOU WILL NEVER NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THE FACT THAT YOUR BATTERY WILL RUN OUT. IMAGINE YOURSELF IN YOUR BEDROOM NOW ABLE TO SLEEP, YOU CAN LEAVE CHARGING YOUR SMARTPHONE OR DEVICE WITHOUT ENTLANGLEMENTS OR COMPLICATIONS, ALSO WITH THE SECURITY THAT THE SMART CHARGING SYSTEM OF ZEUZ WILL STOP THE CHARGE WHEN THE BATTERY OF YOUR DEVICE HAS ACHIEVED TOTAL GHARGE GIVING YOU TOTAL SAFETY AND PROTECTION AGAINST ACCIDENTS AND EXTENDING THE USEFUL LIFE OF YOUR BATTERY. 
 
 
 WITH A ZEUZ TRANSMITTER IN YOUR OFFICE, YOUR TELEPHONE WILL BE CONSTANTLY CHARGING WHILE YOU WORK. EVEN WHEN IT IS HIDDEN IN YOUR SUIT POCKET OR SAVED IN YOUR BAG, PORTFOLIO OR BACK PACK, WITHOUT TANGLED CABLES, OR LIMITATIONS. 

ZEUZ PORTATIL ... POWER WITHOUT CABLES THAT GOES WITH YOU

ZEUZ HAS A PORTABLE VERSION SO YOU CAN TAKE IT ANYWHERE... AND YOU CAN ENJOY THE TRUE WIRELESS CHARGING TECHNOLOGY.
ITS REACH IS UP TO 6.5 FEET AND LIKE THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM, IT CAN ALSO WIRELESSLY CHARGE ALL TYPES OF LOW CONSUMPTION DEVICES, HAVING THE ADDITIONAL FABULOUS ADVANTAGE OF BEING TOTALLY PORTABLE
     
WITHOUT CABLES AND WITHOUT CHARGING PADS
GREAT CHARGE POWER
CHARGE 2 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME IN A TRULY WIRELESS WAY
 

 
CHARGING CAPACITY
PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGER


THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGE SYSTEM ALLOWS YOU TO CHARGE UP TO 3 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME 


SYSTEM OF CHARGING FOR ALL THE LIFE
WE HAVE DESIGNED BOTH TRANSMITTERS (SYSTEM PORTABLE OF  CHARGE WIRELESS, SYSTEM OF CHARGE WITH BACK UP BATTERY GL2) SO THAT THEY ARE NOT DISPOSABLE, LIKE ALL THE CHARGING DEVICES THAT USE BATTERIES AND ARE CURRENTLY ON THE MARKET, THE CHANGE OF BATTERIES CAN BE MADE IN THE EASIEST WAY.
 CHARGING SYSTEM INTELLIGENT

THE RECEIVERS HAVE AN INTELLIGENT CHARGING SYSTEM IN SUCH A WAY THAT AT THE TIME OF BATTERY CHARGING, THE CHARGING PROCESS IS CUT, PROTECTING AND EXTENDING THE USEFUL LIFE OF THE BATTERY.
THE CABLE CHARGERS AND THE CONTACT BASES CONSUME ENERGY CONTINUOUSLY AS THEY ARE PERMANENTLY CONNECTED. ZEUZ'S INTELLIGENT CHARGING SYSTEM HIBERNATES WHEN NOT IN USE.

THANKS TO THIS TRUE WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY, YOUR SMARTPHONE, TABLET OR OTHER DEVICE WILL START TO CHARGE IMMEDIATELY. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT WHERE OR TO WHAT DISTANCE HAS IT, WITH THE CHARGE SYSTEM ZEUZ WILL NOT NECESSARY PLACE’S YOUR DEVICE ON ANY CONTACT BASE, NOR WILL IT BE NECESSARY TO PUT A SPECIAL COVER FOR CHARGE AND MUCH LESS SPEND A FORTUNE ON BUYING DIFFERENT COVERS FOR EACH OF YOUR DEVICES, WITH THE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM ZEUZ NOT NEED TO BE AT A DISTANCE NEAR THE TRANSMITTER, IT IS MORE NEITHER NECESSARY TO KNOW WHERE THE ENERGY TRANSMITTER IS. SIMPLY BY PLACING THE RECEIVER ON YOUR SMARTPHONE, TABLET OR ANY OTHER DEVICE, YOU WILL IMMEDIATELY BEGIN CHARGING AND YOU CAN CONTINUE USING IT.
IT'S THAT SIMPLE, IT'S THAT EASY.
ZEUZ AT HOME
 
ZEUZ IN THE OFFICE  
IS IT POSSIBLE TO CHARGE A DEVICE THROUGH RF?
THE CHARGING OF OUR DEVICES WIRELESSLY AT LONG DISTANCE, IS NOT AND WILL NOT BE POSSIBLE, BY MEANS OF THE INDUCTIVE LOAD OR THE MAGNETIC RESONANCE. (CHARGING PADS, CONTACT BASES)
THERE ARE CURRENTLY 4 TECHNOLOGY COMPANIES, WHICH ALREADY SUCCESSFULLY MARKET RADIO FREQUENCY (RF) TECHNOLOGY FOR THE TRANSMISSION OF ENERGY SAFELY AND EFFICIENTLY, THESE COMPANIES ARE: ENERGOUS, OSSIA AND POWERCAST AND THE STARTUP ZEUZ AG.
SO REAL IS THIS TECHNOLOGY THAT SOME OF THESE COMPANIES ARE ALREADY LISTED ON THE STOCK EXCHANGE IN THE UNITED STATES.
THE FIRST COMPANIES, ITS COMMERCIAL FOCUS IS AIMED AT DEVICE MANUFACTURERS, ONLY THE STARTUP ZEUZ, IS ABOUT TO START COMMERCIALIZING, THE FIRST REMOTE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM, DIRECTLY TO THE CONSUMER.
 
http://www.ossia.com
http://www.powercastco.com
http://www.energous.com
http://zeuzwirelesspower.com
 
COMPATIBILITY WITH MULTIPLE DEVICES
ZEUS IS REALLY THE ONLY WIRELESS TECHNOLOGY WITH WHICH YOU CAN CHARGE SMARTPHONES, TABLETS, ACTION CAMERAS, DRONES AND ANY OTHER DEVICE TO DISTANCE OF UP TO 80 FEET.
 


THE CONNECTORS THAT WILL BE INSTALLED IN THE RECEIVERS ARE THE MOST USED BY THE DEVICE MANUFACTURERS, WE ASK THAT AS SOON AS YOU HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY, CONTACT US AT EMAIL: powerwirelesschargezeuz@gmail.comGIVE US YOUR SUPPORT DATA; TELL US WHAT REWARD YOU SUPPORTED AND WHAT KIND OF CONNECTOR OR CONNECTORS YOU NEED TO BE SENT. 



 
 




 
APPLICATION (APP)
WE THINK ABOUT MAKING AN APPLICATION TO COMPLETELY CONTROL THE ZEUZ SYSTEM, BUT WE QUITLY ASKED OURSELVES.
WHAT IF OUR SMARTPHONE OR TABLET DOES NOT HAVE A BATTERY?
¿HOW DO WE OPEN THE APPLICATION TO CHARGE OUR DEVICES?
¿HOW WILL WE CHARGE DEVICES TO WHICH THE APPLICATION CAN NOT BE DOWNLOADED, SUCH AS DRONES, CAMERAS, HEADPHONES, SPEAKERS, ETC, ETC?
ANALYZING THESE POINTS WE DECIDED THAT THE APPLICATION THAT WE WILL UPLOAD WILL BE ABLE TO ONLY GIVE INFORMATION OF THE CHARGING SYSTEM AND TO CONTROL CERTAIN CHARACTERISTICS.
THE APP CAN BE DOWNLOADED IN SMARTPHONES AND TABLETS THAT HAVE ANDROID AND IOS OPERATIONAL SYSTEM.
WE WANT ZEUZ TO BE THE EASIEST TO USE… SIMPLY CONNECT IT TO YOUR DEVICE AND DONE.
 


 
TECHNOLOGY AND FEATURES
 
HOW DOES THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM WORK?
TRANSMITTER / RECEIVER
THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER EMITS OF RF SIGNALS DIRECTED TO THE PLACE WHERE THE RECEIVER HAS BEEN DETECTED IN ADVANCE, THESE RF SIGNALS ARE CAPTURED BY THE HUNDREDS OF MICRO RECTENNAS THAT ARE LOCATED WITHIN THE ZEUZ RECEIVER, THROUGH AN ADVANCED PROCESS, THE RECEIVER CONVERTS THESE SIGNALS INTO THE ENERGY THAT YOUR DEVICE WILL USE TO BE CHARGED.


SIGNAL REPEATER
SO THAT THE SIGNAL EMITTED BY THE TRANSMITTER, IS ALWAYS OPTIMAL AND THE RECEIVER IS ABLE TO DELIVER THE MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY OF ENERGY, DURING THE CHARGING PROCESS, UP TO DISTANCES OF 80 FEET OR THROUGH WALLS AND OBSTACLES, IT IS REQUIRED TO USE SIGNAL REPEATERS, HAVING THIS DEVICE 2 MAIN FUNCTIONS THAT WOULD BE: REGENERATE THE SIGNAL IF IT HAS WEAKENED AND AMPLIFY THE SIGNAL AGAIN.
IT IS RECOMMENDED TO HAVE A MINIMUM OF 3 REPEATERS IN ORDER TO ALWAYS OBTAIN THE HIGHEST EFFICIENCY OF SIGNAL RECEPTION AND THUS ACHIEVE A FAST AND EFFECTIVE CHARGE ON THE DEVICES YOU WANT TO CHARGE.

THIS PROCESS IS A MUCH MORE COMPLEX CARRIES WITH IT A DELICATE SOFTWARE WITH VERY DETAILED ALGORITHMS, VERY COMPLICATED ELECTRONIC CIRCUITS AND NEW COMPONENTS THAT HAD TO BE CREATED BOTH FOR THE TRANSMITTER AND FOR THE RECEIVER, BEING IN THIS LAST WHERE MOST OF THE NEW TECHNOLOGY IS CONCENTRATED.
DESCRIPTION AND COMPONENTS OF THE ZEUZ SYSTEM
THE ZEUZ WIRELESS DISTANCE CHARGING SYSTEM HAS 2 VERSIONS:
THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM FOR HOME, OFFICE, WAREHOUSE, WORKSHOP, ETC.
THE PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM. FOR CARRY IT TO ANY ANYWHERE.
THE ZEUZ WIRELESS CHARGING FIXED BASE SYSTEM IS COMPOSED OF THREE DEVICES: 1 TRANSMITTER, 1 REPEATER AND 1 RECEIVER. 
OF THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM THERE ARE 2 TRANSMITTERS MODELS: THE GL-1 MODEL WITH ITS POWER TRANSMISSION FUNCTION AND THE GL-2 MODEL WHICH HAS AN INTEGRATED UPS-APS TYPE SYSTEM, WITH 2 POWERFUL BATTERIES OF 36,000 mAh AUTO RECHARGEABLE FOR SUPPORT.

THE ZEUZ PORTABLE WIRELESS CHARGING SYSTEM IS COMPOSED ONLY BY 2 DEVICES: 1 TRANSMITTER AND 1 RECEIVER, ITS REACH IS UP TO 6.5 FEET AND LIKE THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM, IT CAN ALSO WIRELESSLY CHARGE ALL TYPES OF LOW CONSUMPTION DEVICES, HAVING THE ADDITIONAL FABULOUS ADVANTAGE OF BEING TOTALLY PORTABLE.
FOR ITS FUNCTIONING THE PORTABLE SYSTEM HAS A RECHARGEABLE BATTERY OF 30,000 mAh OF LONG DURATION.

EFFICIENCY OF THE CHARGING SYSTEM WIRELESS
THE CHARGING EFFICIENCY MAY VARY DUE TO THE OBSTACLES ENCOUNTERED BY THE SIGNAL OF THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER, ON ITS WAY TO THE RECEIVER. GENERALLY IN CLEAR AREAS THE CHARGING EFFECTIVENESS IS EXPECTED TO BE UP TO 80%. THIS EFFICIENCY VARIES AS THE DISTANCE IS INCREASING BETWEEN THE TRANSMITTER-RECEIVER OR WHEN THE SIGNAL HAS TO PASS THROUGH SEVERAL WALLS TO ARRIVE TO THE RECEIVER. TO ACHIEVE THE MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGINGING AT DISTANCE OR THROUGH WALLS SIGNAL REPEATERS ARE REQUIRED, AS A BASIC RULE IF IT COUNTS WITH 3 OR MORE REPEATERS WITHIN THE RANGE OF THE TRANSMITTER (80 FEET OF RANK) IT WILL ALWAYS MAINTAIN THE MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY OF CHARGING.

 
TESTS

 

         FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS MY SMARTPHONE HAS A “QI” CHARGE SYSTEM; CAN IT BE CHARGED WITH THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER?NO, THEY ARE NOT COMPLETELY DIFFERENT SYSTEMS.CAN I USE THE ZEUZ RECEIVER TO CHARGE WITH THE “QI” CHARGE SYSTEM?NO, THEY ARE COMPLETELY DIFFERENT SYSTEMS.CAN ONE ZEUZ RECEIVER BE USED TO CHARGE IN THE FIXED BASE SYSTEM AS IN THE PORTABLE SYSTEM?YES, YOU CAN USE IT, ZEUZ RECEIVERS WORK WITH BOTH TRANSMISSION SYSTEMS, WHETHER FIXED OR PORTABLE, WHENEVER AND WHEN YOU ARE LINKED TO THE TRANSMITTER.WHAT IS THE EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGING THE ZEUZ SYSTEM?AS IT IS COMMENTED IN THE SPECIFICATIONS, THE EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGING CAN VARY ACCORDING TO THE OBSTACLES THAT ARE ON THE SIGNAL PATH OF THE ZEUZ TRANSMITTER, GENERALLY IN CLEAR AREAS THE CHARGING EFFECTIVENESS IS EXPECTED TO BE UP TO 80%  THIS VARIABLE EFFICIENCY AS THE DISTANCE IS INCREASED BETWEEN THE TRANSMITTER-RECEIVER OR WHEN THE SIGNAL HAS TO PASS THROUGH SEVERAL WALLS TO ARRIVE TO THE RECEIVER. TO ACHIEVE THE MAXIMUM EFFECTIVENESS OF CHARGINGING AT DISTANCE OR THROUGH WALLS SIGNAL REPEATERS ARE REQUIRED, AS A BASIC RULE IF IT COUNTS WITH 3 OR MORE REPEATERS WITHIN THE RANGE OF THE TRANSMITTER (80 FEET OF RANK) IT WILL ALWAYS MAINTAIN THE MAXIMUM CHARGE EFFICIENCY.CAN I PLACE SEVERAL ZEUZ REPEATERS AND EXTEND THE SIGNAL RANGE BEYOND THE 80 FEET?NO, SIGNAL REPEATERS ARE ONLY TO IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF THE SIGNAL AS MENTIONED IN THE CHARACTERISTICS THE REPEATER FUNCTION IS TO: RENEW THE SIGNAL SO IT MAINTAIN THE CHARGE EFFECTIVENESS AS IF IT WAS NEAR THE TRANSMITTER.WHAT CAN I DO IF I REQUIRE EXTENDING THE SIGNAL REACH RANGE?TO EXTEND THE RANGE OF MORE THAN 80 FEET AND THE EFFICIENCY OF THE CHARGE IS ALWAYS EFFICIENT, IT IS NECESSARY TO ACQUIRE ANOTHER TRANSMITTER.CAN I LOAD MORE THAN 3 DEVICES WITH A ZEUZ FIXED BASE TRANSMITTER?NO, EACH TRANSMITTER HAS AN INTELLIGENT SYSTEM OF EMISSION OVERVOLTAGE PROTECTION THAT ONLY ALLOWS THE LOADING OF UP TO 3 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME; THIS LOAD CAPACITY IS LIMITED TO BE ABLE TO COMPLY WITH THE INTERNATIONAL RF TRANSMISSION SAFETY STANDARDS DICTATED BY ORGANIZATIONS REGULATORS (FCC, ETSI, CDRH, UL, ETC.).CAN YOU ALSO CHARGE 3 DEVICES AT THE SAME TIME WITH THE PORTABLE TRANSMISSION SYSTEM?WE INCREASE THE LOADING POWER, OF THE PORTABLE DEVICE, NOW YOU CAN LOAD 2 DEVICES, AT THE SAME TIME FULLY WIRELESS.CAN ANY ZEUZ RECEIVER TAKE ENERGY FROM MY TRANSMITTER?YES, IF AND WHEN YOU ARE LINKED WITH THE TRANSMITTER. (Certain restrictions apply)WHERE CAN I APPLY FOR THE WARRANTY?WE WILL THANK YOU TO SEND US A MAIL TO customerservice@zeuzwirelesspower.com WITH ALL YOUR PURCHASING DATA AND WE WILL GIVE YOU INDICATIONS.IS THERE ANY DANGER OR DAMAGE IF THE BATTERY OF THE DEVICE HAS BEEN COMPLETELY CHARGED AND I FORGOT TO REMOVE THE DEVICE RECEIVER?THERE IS NO DANGER SINCE THE RECEIVERS HAVE AN INTELLIGENT CHARGING SYSTEM IN SUCH A WAY THAT WHEN THE BATTERY IS CHARGED, IT CUTS THE CHARGING PROCESS, PROTECTING AND LENGTHENING THE LIFE OF THE BATTERY.For more information Please send an email to the following emails:powerwirelesschargezeuz@gmail.comzeuzwirelessenergy@gmail.comTHANK YOU.......

story:
Outfone Encrypted Earbuds

 

Outfone encrypted earbuds are designed for encrypting end-to-end phone callings and other voice messages on your smartphone.

Outfone is a simple, safe and secure way to protect your audio communication from secret surveillance.

 

As Seen On

 

Your Smartphone Is Eavesdropped,
Time For An Upgrade

 

The recent data scandals have shown again, that it is too often very easy to break into a private conversation with just a little effort. Spying equipment is easily available on the internet and criminal or government data collection is virtually impossible to dismantle. While it is possible to make sure that the information collected is useless.

 

Meet Outfone Encrypted Earbuds

 

The Outfone encrypted earbuds are the first truly secure and private earbuds for the smartphone without any compromises. Your phone callings and audio messages sent via text are end-to-end encrypted. It doesn’t influence by carriers, OS, internet. With Outfone encrypted earbuds, you can stay calm knowing that your callings are from secret surveillance, hackers or virus.

 

 

On-the-fly Encryption For Phone Calling

 

The cryptography used in phone calling encryption is OTP(One-Time Pad) encryption key. OTP is automatically generated on-the-fly by digit encryption algorithms from the group encryption keys. It will self-destroyed at both Outfone encrypted earbuds when the phone ends, without being stored or recorded by anybody, including yourselves. And any other Outfone earbuds can not eavesdrop or insert the conversation once the two parties are paired in a phone call.

 

Voice Messaging Applications

 

The incorporated encryption chips ensured your private communications with major voice messaging apps including iMessage, Whatsapp, etc. Nothing to install. All encrypted content can only be decrypted with Outfone encrypted earbuds. One security chip for microphone signal encryption, one security chip for headset decryption. The encryption and decryption of audio are realized with dynamic frequency shifting in analog audio signals. 

 

Scenario

 

 

 

Why We Need Outfone

 

1.Stop Illegal Recording
Distorting the recording with background noise to block illegal recording, viruses, worms,etc. Have important conversations, meetings, or phone calls at ease with your partners with paired Outfone encrypted earbuds. 

 

2.Stop Important Information Tapping

Protect users' audio data from secret surveillance, hackers or virus.

 

3.Stop Electronic Reconnaissance

Electronic reconnaissance collects and cracks wireless signal and positions keywords to find out skeptical audio and records by manual. The audio data through Outfone earbuds would be encrypted among the massive amount of data and couldn't be detected.

 

 

One Click Solution

 

Using Outfone encrypted earbuds, you can easily protect your privacy by just pushing the encryption button on the earbuds.  During a phone call, if both sides use Outfone encrypted earbuds, either side can simply click the button to secure the conversation.

 

Uncompromised Hi-Fi Sound Quality

 

Featuring Hi-Fi acoustic design, Outfone encrypted earbuds offer uncompromised sound quality for clear phone callings and voice messages. Noise filtering design ensures crystal clear call quality.

 

Snug Comfort & Fit

 

Outfone encrypted earbuds are engineered designed for improved in-ear stability and a long-term comfort. The snug and hanging design offers the most ergonomic wearing comfort and come with no additional pressure to the conch and ear canal areas. And the seek and secure shell can effectively avoid the sound leak.

 

3-Step Easy Process To Use

 

1. The two parties have their Outfone encrypted earbuds plugged into their smartphone.

2. Usual phone callings without encryption until you click the encryption button on Outfone earbuds.

3. Secure your phone line by pushing the encryption button on the earbuds from either side, Both parties will receive a notification from your earbuds that you're under ”secure communication”.

 

Under the encryption communication, your audio communication is safeguarded from wiretapping by distorting the audio with background noise. Recording from any sides is noise.

 

How It Works

 

Specifications

 

 

As a Gift to Your Friends

 

Outfone Encrypted headphones use the United States CML encryption chip, which has a strong authority in the industry，Outfone end-to-end encrypted earbuds use sophisticated data transfer algorithm to secure your phone callings, voice messages private, anywhere. Exquisite gift wrapping is the best choice for family and friends.

 

 

 

 

Timeline

 

 

FAQ

 

1. Can I use this headset with my phone?

This headset is 3.5mm fully compatible plug and it is compatible with all brands with 3.5MM interface mobile phones on the market and other devices.

 

2. Can the encrypted headset be used to listen to songs without power?


Whether it is in the built-in lithium battery with or without power, the headset can normally listen to music and answer the phone.

 

3. Why do I hear a noise when I use an encrypted call?

When an encrypted call is initiated, if one of the parties does not push the encryption button on the earbuds, both parties' calls become noises. If you turn off encryption button, the call will change to normal mode. Both parties will turn on the encryption button to enter the standard confidential call.

 

4. The sound is abnormal when listening to radio and music.

Please check whether the encryption button is turned on. After it is turned on, the voice you heard has been encrypted. Please turn off the encryption button.

 

5. How to charge the headset?

Please refer to the product instruction manual.

 

6. What are operators supported when using encryption?

In principle, the operators are not limited, but in the use of CDMA system, the effect will be slightly worse.

 

7. Why does the headset say "Failed to enter advanced mode?"

It may be due to bad mobile phone signals, unstable mobile network, and other reasons that cause encrypted communications to fail. First, you can press the encryption key again and test again, so that the other party can try to identify again. Before you try again, you can try to increase the volume of the local headset so that the headset can more easily recognize the encrypted signal. If the retry still fails, both parties can use the fixed-frequency encryption mode to talk, and the encrypted call can also be achieved.

 

8. In the advanced encryption mode, I heard a "click" sound.

This is a process that enhances the strength of encryption. Calls can be performed normally, and they will not appear when fixed-frequency encryption is used.

While it is possible to make sure that the information collected is useless. Meet Outfone Encrypted Earbuds The Outfone encrypted earbuds are the first truly secure and private earbuds for the smartphone without any compromises. With Outfone encrypted earbuds, you can stay calm knowing that your callings are from secret surveillance, hackers or virus.  On-the-fly Encryption For Phone Calling The cryptography used in phone calling encryption is OTP(One-Time Pad) encryption key. OTP is automatically generated on-the-fly by digit encryption algorithms from the group encryption keys. It will self-destroyed at both Outfone encrypted earbuds when the phone ends, without being stored or recorded by anybody, including yourselves. And any other Outfone earbuds can not eavesdrop or insert the conversation once the two parties are paired in a phone call. Voice Messaging Applications The incorporated encryption chips ensured your private communications with major voice messaging apps including iMessage, Whatsapp, etc. Nothing to install. The snug and hanging design offers the most ergonomic wearing comfort and come with no additional pressure to the conch and ear canal areas. And the seek and secure shell can effectively avoid the sound leak. 3-Step Easy Process To Use 1. The two parties have their Outfone encrypted earbuds plugged into their smartphone.2. Usual phone callings without encryption until you click the encryption button on Outfone earbuds.3. Secure your phone line by pushing the encryption button on the earbuds from either side, Both parties will receive a notification from your earbuds that you're under ”secure communication”. Under the encryption communication, your audio communication is safeguarded from wiretapping by distorting the audio with background noise. Recording from any sides is noise. How It Works Specifications  As a Gift to Your Friends Outfone Encrypted headphones use the United States CML encryption chip, which has a strong authority in the industry，Outfone end-to-end encrypted earbuds use sophisticated data transfer algorithm to secure your phone callings, voice messages private, anywhere. Exquisite gift wrapping is the best choice for family and friends.    Timeline  FAQ 1. story:
Bolt Survey is a smart phone app that allows students to have a greater say in their schools and community. Bolt Survey will be a user generated app in which users can post questions for other Bolt Survey users to answer.

My name is Alex Ahn, and I am a rising senior at Northfield Mount Hermon High School. I first came up with the concept of this app when I saw how difficult it was to engage students in the important issues of my school. I have watched my own school conduct countless surveys to try to capture student feedback, but most of the time, the school had trouble getting responses from a lot of students. I realized then this was part of a bigger problem, where students have difficulty voicing their thoughts. Thus, I wanted to create a simple survey App that made it easy and fun for students to share their thoughts about everything from net neutrality to school uniforms.

In order to make my idea a reality, I teamed up with K-Survey, a Korean-based app developer, during my summer vacation. Together, we have designed an app that focuses on simplicity, precision, and speed in collecting and processing answers to increase student participation. In short, we believe Bolt Survey is a powerful tool that will bring students closer to one another, their schools, and their communities.

We are running and IndieGoGo campaign because we need your help to fund the remaining stages of development.

Through Bolt Survey, users can answer and submit questions on a wide-range of issues that interest and affect students.

Once students answer a question, they can immediately see how other students answered as well as links to related questions and topics.

Our goal with Bolt Survey is to motivate students to have a say in their school and the world around them. To encourage participation, we have structured the app so that students gain experience points by completing questions. These experience points can be traded in for incentives and prizes.

This IndieGoGo campaign will fund the development of an early version of the app in which questions are open to all student users. However, in later versions we plan to create school-specific sections so that the app can be used within local communities to increase student engagement. 

All money received through this IndieGoGo goes directly to creating the Bolt Survey application and your perks. Bolt Survey is already working with K-Survey to design and develop the app, and your money ensures we can afford professional designers and developers and a reliable server.

  • K-Survey App Developers: $400
  • K-Survey App Designer: $315
  • Server Fees: $500
  • Perks: $150
  • IndieGoGo Fee: $135

Any money that we raise above our goal, we will put back into the app. Specifically, we will invest additional funding in the development of school-specific surveys so that the app can be used by local school communities to engage students.

Timeline for Development

We are committed to delivering Bolt Survey and your perks when we say that we will. We have tried to create a realistic timeline, and we hope to deliver the app and perks ahead of schedule. At the very latest, you can count on the application and perks by these dates.

  • Aug. 27 - campaign launches 
  • Oct. 23 - campaign finishes
  • Dec. 1 - early version of the app released to IndieGoGo supporters
  • Feb. 1 - T-shirt and Sweatshirt pledges delivered, 
  • Spring 2015 - Official version of Bolt Survey App released for iPhone and Android

Risks and Challenges

Bolt Survey is designed by students for students, and we are working with professional app developers who specialize in survey apps. So we are really confident that we can build an application that students will love and use.

However, the biggest challenge we foresee is getting students to use this application, especially in the early stages. And that is why, even more than your donations, we need your help. If you believe that students need more of a voice, then share this campaign by clicking the link below to Tweet the campaign or by sharing the link to our campaign: igg.me/at/boltsurvey. 

Tweet
Facebook


FAQ

1)  How are you going to motivate students to use the app?

A.  We have two strategies for motivating students. First, when students answer a question, they are then able to see how other students have answered. We hope this piques their curiosity and motivates them to use the application. Second, as students answer the questions, they will gain experience points which can be spent on incentives and prizes within the application.

2)  How will you moderate content to ensure the content is appropriate?

A.  As part of Bolt Survey's terms and conditions, we will list clear guidelines for using the application and submitting appropriate content. We will not tolerate offensive or indecent language or content that is inappropriate for high school students, and we will ban users who violate the terms and conditions of the application. To ensure our content is student-appropriate, when someone submits a question, the content will be screened for inappropriate content. If inappropriate content is found, the user will be warned. Repeated warnings will lead to users being blocked from the application. Additionally, users can flag questions as inappropriate, and those flags will be reviewed by Bolt Survey. Inappropriate content will be taken down, and users will be warned and, in some cases, blocked.

3)  How will you verify the users are students?

A.  We are big fans of the honor system. When users first download the app, we will ask them to confirm that they are a student. Additionally, we will monitor the application and content and anyone we find violating our terms & conditions will be removed.

4)  What will you do if you don’t reach your goal?

A.  We have set $1500 as our goal because that is the amount we need to build our ideal application. However, if we do not receive our full funding, we have registered for Flexible funding. We will take the amount we receive from IndieGoGo and use it to build the best application possible within that budget.

5)  Will Bolt Survey be available for both iPhone and Android users?

A.  Yes! We plan on developing an iPhone and Android app simultaneously.

story:
The First Apple licensed dual connector

1 key for all your devices

The Evolution of the Cable



As Featured on:

Introducing the World's first dual charge key for all of your electronic devices

The Echo Connect Plus is every Apple lightning and micro-USB cable you could ever want condensed down to one small key-sized connector. Today we have many electronic devices, tablets, phones, cameras, power banks and a mix match of tangled cables to match. This is the only fully licensed and MFI certified charger on the market that is built for both lightning and micro-USB, and you can get yours now before for up to HALF the RRP!

Choose from a selection of 3 launch colours and our special personalisation perk!



"One side for my iPhone, and the other to charge my power bank! Genius!" Cressida from Bath

  

Small, light-weight and flexible, this handy phone accessory is an essential for any mobile phone user. 


Strength and design: built to last

The design has considered multiple factors including, usage, wear-and-tear, accessibility, size, materials, and more.

                  




Treat the whole family and save $85!



How else can you help?

Spread the word!
Share the campaign on Facebook, Tweet about us, and follow us on Instagram!
Instagram: EchoConnect
Twitter: @EchoProducts
Facebook: Echo Connect

Great to have support from Chart smashing producers/DJ's Blonde with the Echo Key "saving lives" whilst on tour



QUESTIONS?? Contact us
T: +44(0)1344 746 640
E: sales@byecho.com

So, now it's up to us all....

story:
EasyCall VoIP converts your phone calls into data that zips through your high-speed Internet connection just like email. It comes out the other end just like a regular phone call. Your callers will never know that it’s any different since it sounds just like a regular phone call.

Our project: EasyCall PINless Mobile Dialer

The EasyCall PINless mobile dialer app deliver competitive PINless calling service to our customers mobile devices without the need for a data plan or WiFi connection.

Available for iPhone, Android, Blackberry (BB10) and Windows 8 phones.

Using the EasyCall PINless Dialer, you can conveniently access your PINless service from your mobile device and call your friends and family simply by selecting a contact from the in-app contact list–there is no need to remember the access number.

With attractive in-app features such as balance display, the EasyCall PINless Dialer is designed to provide you with a smooth and convenient experience.

No Need for a Data or WiFi Connection

With the EasyCall PINless Dialer, customers can access PINless service from their mobile devices without having to use their data plan or access a WiFi connection to make calls.

The EasyCall PINless Mobile Dialer includes the following features.

  • Ability to Make Calls
  • Balance, Destination and Rate Display
  • Call History Display with Time and Call Status
  • Contact List
  • In-app Registration
  • Recharge Through Credit Card
  • Redial

*Exact feature list varies by operating system and device


What's next?

We already have trusted software partners with vast experience in voip and mobile apps ready to help us get Easycall Dialer to market.

November '14: Spread the word and fund our project!

December '14: software custom develpoment and testing.

Jan '15: Delivery to our customers!

story:
Who we are : 

Here at Enigma, we strive for innovation and excellence. From a young age, our team were computer enthusiasts, and as time went on, we saw a possibility.
This possibility was the Enigma. A small, wallet sized computer that is fast, powerful, and efficient. Our goal is to build a revolutionary machine able to push the industry forward into a new age of computing.

With intel's revolutionary new 14nm atom processors, Enigma is able to provide a game changing new product for the living room and life on the go.

What We Need & What You Get

Basically we need funds for our initial order to our manufacturer. We've got the logistics and planning all worked out and the parts designed ready to be made so now all we need is you.

In exchange for this you can pre-order your own enigma mini right here on IndieGoGo and be part of that first run of units that we produce. You'll get your Mini before they go on sale to everyone else and you get too say you helped build the next revolution in computers.

The Enigma Mini :

Technology has moved from big, bulky valve driven computers, to ATX sized computers and finally to mini-ITX systems. The enigma mini is the next natural evolution. With a quad-core Intel 14nm Cherry trail processor, and Intel HD graphics, Enigma is able to run Windows 10 or XBMC with ease, play games and streamline your entertainment and computing experience. With a universal IR receiver at the front, you'll be able to reuse your remote controls from your old bulky systems.
 

The Enigma is Fast :

Enigma works for productivity too. Just bigger then a wallet, it comes with 16+ GB of high Speed eMMC flash storage, as fast as an SSD. Not only can you place it down and plug it into almost any monitor out there, you can use it for projectors, conferences and workplaces. With the same device wherever you need it, you'll have all your preferences and doccuments at the tip of your fingers.


The Enigma is Efficient :

Only needing to be powered by an MHL HDMI port or a mini USB port, at just under 2.5W, the Enigma can save you money on your electricity bill. Not only that, but you can afford to keep it on all day. The enigma is 100 times more efficient then your standard desktop PC.

Specifications :

What you see is what you get. No marketing BS.

- 1 x HDMI

- 3 x USB 3.0

- 1 x Micro USB

1 x 3.5mm Gold plated headphone jack

1 x 1.6ghz-2.4gHz(burst) Intel® Atom™ x7-Z8700 Quad Core Processor (2M Cache)

802.11 wireless AC connectivity

Bluetooth

Windows 10 with Bing

Intel HD Graphics

Options of :

2GB of LPDDR3 RAM/16GB eMMC flash

4GB of LPDDR3 RAM/32GB eMMC flash

8GB of LPDDR3 RAM/64GB eMMC flash

Other Ways You Can Help :

If you can't help us with money, we still value you:

  • Word of mouth is extremely important. We aim to help and make a device so user friendly even your grandma could use it. Spread the word!
  • Share this on social media! The more enigma spreads, the better we can make it.

Risks And Challenges :

Like all new innovation there are risks with our project the biggest being production. We're running razor thin margins here based on what early costing say the device will cost us to produce(hence why shipping is separate) here in order to get this product out at the lowest price possible and as such have very little runway if things go wrong having already invested a decent chunk of our own money in getting this far, 

As such we feel it necessary to advise you all that yes there is a chance that this could fail for all of us, If it does we will endeavor to get as much of the money as we have left back to the contributors but here are no guarantees that we will have any left when its all said and done as our primary goal is to get a product to market and then hopefully deliver the first units to you those who believed in us.

Its also important to note that the delivery dates are complete estimates and that should the campaigns popularity get too large or there be delays these dates may be changed.


~ Team Enigma
story_txt:
Who we are : 
 
Here at Enigma, we strive for innovation and excellence. From a young age, our team were computer enthusiasts, and as time went on, we saw a possibility.
This possibility was the Enigma. A small, wallet sized computer that is fast, powerful, and efficient. Our goal is to build a revolutionary machine able to push the industry forward into a new age of computing. With intel's revolutionary new 14nm atom processors, Enigma is able to provide a game changing new product for the living room and life on the go.   What We Need & What You Get Basically we need funds for our initial order to our manufacturer. We've got the logistics and planning all worked out and the parts designed ready to be made so now all we need is you.
In exchange for this you can pre-order your own enigma mini right here on IndieGoGo and be part of that first run of units that we produce. You'll get your Mini before they go on sale to everyone else and you get too say you helped build the next revolution in computers.
    The Enigma Mini : Technology has moved from big, bulky valve driven computers, to ATX sized computers and finally to mini-ITX systems. The enigma mini is the next natural evolution. With a quad-core Intel 14nm Cherry trail processor, and Intel HD graphics, Enigma is able to run Windows 10 or XBMC with ease, play games and streamline your entertainment and computing experience. With a universal IR receiver at the front, you'll be able to reuse your remote controls from your old bulky systems.
  
The Enigma is Fast :
Enigma works for productivity too. Just bigger then a wallet, it comes with 16+ GB of high Speed eMMC flash storage, as fast as an SSD. Not only can you place it down and plug it into almost any monitor out there, you can use it for projectors, conferences and workplaces. With the same device wherever you need it, you'll have all your preferences and doccuments at the tip of your fingers.



The Enigma is Efficient :
Only needing to be powered by an MHL HDMI port or a mini USB port, at just under 2.5W, the Enigma can save you money on your electricity bill. Not only that, but you can afford to keep it on all day. The enigma is 100 times more efficient then your standard desktop PC.



Specifications :
What you see is what you get. No marketing BS.

- 1 x HDMI
- 3 x USB 3.0
- 1 x Micro USB
1 x 3.5mm Gold plated headphone jack
1 x 1.6ghz-2.4gHz(burst) Intel® Atom™ x7-Z8700 Quad Core Processor (2M Cache)
802.11 wireless AC connectivity
Bluetooth
Windows 10 with Bing
Intel HD Graphics
Options of :
2GB of LPDDR3 RAM/16GB eMMC flash
4GB of LPDDR3 RAM/32GB eMMC flash
8GB of LPDDR3 RAM/64GB eMMC flash
    Other Ways You Can Help : If you can't help us with money, we still value you:  Word of mouth is extremely important. We aim to help and make a device so user friendly even your grandma could use it. Spread the word! Share this on social media! The more enigma spreads, the better we can make it.   Risks And Challenges :Like all new innovation there are risks with our project the biggest being production. We're running razor thin margins here based on what early costing say the device will cost us to produce(hence why shipping is separate) here in order to get this product out at the lowest price possible and as such have very little runway if things go wrong having already invested a decent chunk of our own money in getting this far, As such we feel it necessary to advise you all that yes there is a chance that this could fail for all of us, If it does we will endeavor to get as much of the money as we have left back to the contributors but here are no guarantees that we will have any left when its all said and done as our primary goal is to get a product to market and then hopefully deliver the first units to you those who believed in us.Its also important to note that the delivery dates are complete estimates and that should the campaigns popularity get too large or there be delays these dates may be changed.~ Team Enigma

story:
No touchpad. No Mouse. Just Gesture.
Experience new dimensions of convenience by using a keyboard as a large invisible touchpad! No more carrying around Keyboard/mouse/touchpad separately!

TYPE+DRAG

Type with the keyboard presenting touch sensibility and control the mouse at that point. You don’t have to move your hands further to hold the mouse. 


DRAG+TAP

You can select and execute the objects by slightly tapping the surface of the keyboard. 


DRAG+CLICK

The left-click button and the right-click button immediately below the keyboard will enrich the experience of the touchpad user much more.


MULTI-TOUCH

Pinch out or pinch in with two fingers to zoom in or out. Scrolling is also available.



Invisible Touch-pad

Thin and safe sensor generates a  large touch-pad on the surface of the keyboard at the exact moment you want to use it. 

Pantograph Keyboard

 You can’t type fast enough with virtual keyboard or pressure sensitive keyboard. However, Moky uses pantograph keyboard, which allows you the best typing experience and fast response. At least 8 national keyboard layouts will be provided as explained below. We will survey at the end of campaign, or you can leave comment including Moky colors. The default layout is English (US international) and Moky red.   

Communication: Bluetooth 4.0

Bluetooth 4.0 technology will extend the battery life. We are targeting the battery life of 2 weeks for one recharge. (50~100 hours)

Connectivity 

Moky has 3 bluetooth connection 1 USB connection, and you can easily switch which device you want to use. 


Moky Orange

Moky Blue

Moky Black

* Choose colors at the end of the campaign : Moky Orange or Moky Blue

Orange

Blue

Black

* We will provide at least 8 keyboard layouts as below. We will try our best to support more layouts. Please leave a comment for your preference and help us to make better layouts.  (*ENGLISH = US international)

* We have Moky referral program for free Moky. Please get your unique URL and share as much as you can. (see details)

At the end of campaign we will survey what you want for reward with your Moky points.


Prototype Images




Please note that our product is still in development. We have a fully functional working prototypes which will be significantly improved for the mass production.

To fit all the components into the current design, we are working very closely with our very experienced manufacturer to minimize any impact on appearance.

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

If you want partnership with us please contact to inno@innopresso.com

story:
Rugged phones come and go, but we’ve built our smartphones to last using the strongest Gorilla glass screen on the market. At GetNord, we pride ourselves as one of the leading pioneers in the rugged smartphone industry, and we’re here to bring you our latest smartphone - LYNX.

After years of feedback and comments from our users, we’ve designed the most robust and durable phone for the most extreme. A no-nonsense smartphone to withstand the elements, a compact but extremely tough phone with the strongest screen on the market, long-lasting battery with no bells and whistles, clean Android interface with various accessories from our partners RAM Mounts.

The "No-worries" Smartphone

 

 

Will LYNX work with my service provider?

We’ve made several versions of LYNX with different sets of cellular frequencies for different locations across the world. Have a look below to see if our phones will work on your service, but if you’re still unsure email us at: support1@getnord.com . If your service provider gives you a working GSM SIM card (ask for Nano SIM size), we will ship you the right model according to your address.

 

PRESS

 

Here you can download Getnord Lynx press pack. Just click this link to receive (1GB) your press pack, including official press release, some imagery and video!

 

MADE FOR WORK AND ADVENTURES

 

 

STRONGEST SCREEN

LYNX has the thicket screen on the market, our screens measure at 1.8mm in thickness. Built to last and withstand and unexpected drops and accidents. We don’t believe in any special technology when it comes to strength, the thickness is essential for an unbreakable screen.

 

POWERED TO LAST

The LYNX battery capacity can last for days without charging with normal usage of the phone making it perfect to use for long journeys and for the times you have no access to electricity. With a 6000mAh battery, even the most consuming task will use the smallest amount of power.

 

WIRELESS CHARGING

Like most modern smartphones, we’ve made the LYNX Qi certified and added the capability to wireless charge your device. Our magnetic mount works as a wireless charger. You can purchase genuine GetNord charging pad accessories from our campaign page or use a Qi-certified charging device with no less than a 2A output.

 

TAP, PAY, DONE- NFC

Contactless payment makes purchases on the go easier. Paying in stores with Google Pay or any Bank application on your phone must work with NFC (Near-field communication) and software on your phone has to be Play Protect certified.

But don’t worry, we’ve done both for you.

 

CLEAN OS

The majority of manufacturers and carriers often load phones with their own apps. If you don’t use them, they clutter your system and can even drain your battery in the background.

At GetNord, we know how to make phones, not apps. With LYNX you will get a virgin Android Oreo OS with basic applications and Google packages. Everything in Google Play is ready for download in a matter of seconds - Why should we push apps that the majority don’t need.

 

LOCK & ROLL  / MAGNETIC MOUNT

 

Wireless charging cradle with magnetic lock. Patented RAM ball and socket system.

Tough and Waterproof. Can be used for offroad, ATV and UTV.

 

DESIGNED IN BARCELONA

We believe that beauty and aesthetics are always relevant to people no matter whether for work or pleasure. Beautiful things make people happy.   

Knowing the importance of aesthetics and understanding that we are just a pragmatic engineers we asked for a help from those who know the best.

EUIPO Design Registration Certificate No 005802782-0001

 

Partnership with RAM Mounts

We do what we do best so we’ve partnered up with those that know best, RAM mounts. RAM is the revolutionary and leading universal ball and socket mounting system that allows you to mount anything, anywhere. RAM’s family of more than 900 interchangeable accessories will no doubt have a solution to any problem. Recognized and accepted by the U.S. Patent Office, RAM is the only universal ball-and-socket SYSTEM that will hold tremendous amounts of weight in high vibration applications for military, commercial and private use. Just RAM It!

Our perks will come with RAM Mounts so you can mount your LYNX and use it as a dash cam, sat nav, body camera and more.

 

Perks

 

Project timeline

Specifications

 

Meet The Team

 

 

Albertas Zidonis - CEO

GetNord Lynx is my idea. Here are the most important people from our team who made this idea real and will take care of you before, during and after you purchase your new Getnord Lynx phone.
 

Zydrune Mitruleviciute - Process Manager

I will coordinate day-to-day execution of the process. To ship you the right model in right parameters in the right time is my task.
 

Vincent Xue - Technical Director

These guys are great but I think I am the most important here :) They just created and I made this phone! Literally.

 

Ryan Wang - Process Manager CN

I am coordinating all processes in China where we assemble our phones. My task is to make sure that all production is made in time and shipped in time to our hubs in USA and Europe for further distribution.
 

Diego Quiroga - CEO, Anima Barcelona

I was a part of this project from the very first steps. Our design studio in Barcelona was involved in this project at the beginning and I am proud to say the great idea has begun here in Anima.
  Jaume Boniquet - Industrial Designer
 

Donatas Linartas - Warranty Support
  Ruta Augiene - Customer Support
      

and

Tomas - Our Symbol


 

Tomas Gurksnys races Yamaha Ski Jet in our Getnord Motorsport team. He is a 1st place winner of European Jet Ski Cup 2017. Tomas uses Getnord Lynx. Be like Tomas!


Challenges and potential hurdles

Our phones are ready to go after this campaign, though we’ve added a buffer in the delivery timeline and have to put into considerations various factors often outside of our control, such as any unexpected delays, the phone is ready for components procurement and assembly. More than 100 pieces have been used by us and our tested and other 100 pieces from the testing production have been destroyed in different testing machines in order to reveal any weak points to the robust build.

We need you! We want the LYNX to be the most successful GetNord model so far. We’ve invested over €1 Million in testing, development, and marketing, we want to make Getnord LYNX available worldwide.

Special thanks

Special thanks to everyone who helped and contributed to making this project go live and Nuuk Digital who gave us valuable advice preparing Getnord Lynx campaign with us. 

If you are planning to launch crowdfunding project - get in touch with them, they are great.

story:
The Possibilities 

You’ve got an iPad loaded with amazing synthesizer & music creation apps, but connecting your controller creates a tangled mess and your mobile device isn't so mobile anymore. PUC makes MIDI connectivity easy. Simply plug your controller into PUC’s MIDI port, establish your WiFi link, and get on with your business – making music. PUC also connects to your Mac for Wireless CoreMIDI control. 

The PUC has a suggested MSRP of $129, which when you think of it is a lot cheaper than what it costs when your $69 black dongle-thingy drags your iPad to the floor and does a number on bezel and screen. That's what makes this Indiegogo campaign so awesome for you - you can save a bunch on the PUC and spare yourself the screen repair!




Do you have a MIDI keyboard controller, home digital piano, synthesizer, or computer controller? Connect it to the PUC and put your instrument apps under familiar control. 

Use PUC to patch your iOS device as a drum machine, or sequencer.

PUC also makes connecting your keyboard to your iPad simple and convenient if you have a keyboard you bought for piano lessons and wanted to try out a piano instruction app as an alternative. 


                



The PUC is a wireless MIDI interface designed specifically for iOS devices. The PUC allows you to wirelessly connect any MIDI device (keyboard, DJ controller, drum pad, floor pedal controllers, etc.) directly to your iPad. PUC can also work with any platform that supports a MIDI connection over WiFi. 


The Vision

When Zivix was developing the proprietary wireless MIDI technology for their award winning JamStik™, we saw the need for "legacy" MIDI gear screaming for the ability to connect wirelessly to iOS apps. Sure, there are a number of gadgets with more wires to tether your gear down with, but "mobile" devices should be just that - mobile. After a couple of hardware and software tweaks, the extracted design’s container got a mobile makeover and the PUC was born! Now everything that has a MIDI port can easily connect to your iPad, iPhone, Mac, and compatible PC.



Where you can help 

We are a small company bringing a new type of product to market in a competitive consumer electronics space. While we are confident in our ability to engineer a high quality music interface and ramp it into volume manufacturing, you are the indicator of market demand. 

A successful Indiegogo campaign will allow us to fund production tooling and purchase materials in quantities that keep costs down. 



Production Plan 

Getting the PUC manufactured in mass quantities isn't as easy as sending a CAD-file and schematics off to some widget-maker. We anticipate an initial production run here in the US to maintain quick control over the process to ensure all of the details are managed properly, and are currently in discussions with a number of US vendors for the job. Once we're confident all of the manufacturing related specifics are solved we'll investigate what manufacturing solution is best for the PUC. 



The People Behind PUC 

Minneapolis based Zivix is known for developing music related technology to enrich the experience of creating and learning music by using today’s most popular devices including iPads, iPhones, Macs and any compatible PCs. Zivix builds products for professional musicians, people who want to become musicians, or people who just want to have fun with musical tools. Zivix developed the award winning JamStik, which has entered its first phase of production, shipping in late December. Additionally the JamStik includes a suite of apps from learning to play guitar, to just having fun remixing music. The team has been actively developing software/apps for across multiple platforms including iOS and Android since 2010.



Risks and Challenges

Zivix has a passionate and experienced team that have built working prototypes of the PUC and extensively tested all of its key technologies. We have relationships with experienced DFM (designed for manufacture) manufacturing partners and the PUC is ready for production. In addition to our engineering expertise, our partners have experienced staff specifically dedicated to managing our supply chain.

At the same time, unexpected challenges will invariably happen, and one or more of these have the potential to negatively impact our shipping schedule: 
• Many of our custom parts will initially be sole sourced, which is always a risk 
• Manufacturing issues could arise with particular parts 
• Natural (or manmade) disasters could impact our supply chain 
• Extended reliability and environmental testing could require design changes, as well as the needed certifications (FCC, TUV, UL, etc.) could take longer than expected and/or require design changes 
• Dialing in and stabilizing a cosmetic process (anodizing or laser etching) could take longer than expected.
