story:
Thank you for checking out the launch of my very first skincare product, Cell Quench.

Who am I?

My name is Mary Schook. Since 2005 I have been working as a licensed esthetician on lab rats, I mean clients, at my alternative anti-aging center in New York City, Beauty By Mary Schook, LLC. Prior to treating the countless faces that make pilgrimages to us from across the globe, I was one of the most sought after fashion makeup artists and image makers in the industry.

I naturally gravitated toward skincare after pioneering lash extensions in the US because customers were going to professionals that would burn, heat and peel the skin. I noticed that initially they all looked great, but through time their skin looked thinner and older. It was important for me to figure out why and fix it!

I wasn't the only person to make this observation. In 2008 Estee Lauder's Chief Scientific Officer announced that we have been treating skin entirely wrong. Skincare of the future is about nurturing the skin and feeding the cells what they need, not creating damage to produce temporary effects and brittle collagen.

A NEW PRODUCT IS BORN

Because I am also now one of the leaders in stem cell growth factors in the skincare industry, I was introduced to a very special plant stem cell culture by a raw materials company. I eventually tested it on hundreds of clients. EVERY single person reported satisfactory results with my formulation and told me their skin was hydrated, softer, firmer, brighter and overall happier! There is nothing they would change about the product and they all wanted it IMMEDIATELY. In all of my years as a skinspert and product tester I have never had a unanimous response quite like this.

INVESTMENT STORY

I decided to take Cell Quench to several investors (and was introduced to many others), but no one seemed to have the vision that I did. I didn't want to make a cream. The particles in creams are too big and they generally don't work. Others wanted me to put my name on it or create an entire line just to create a line, but for me the customer comes first and creating a product just to creat a product is silly. That's why there are so many lines out there with average products and one or two all-stars. Putting my name on something also just seems strange to me right now.  Other products will certainly follow, but for now dry skin has been our customer's #1 complaint aside from jowls and hyperpigmentation. Cell Quench seems to help alleviate the appearance of all of those things.

I can't say for sure, but the second product I will most likely introduce will be an anti-acne product, which will help relieve the more that 80% of people that suffer with this problem at some point in their lives. For now I want to focus on what has been extensively tested and what works.

CELL QUENCH DETAILS

WHAT IS CELL QUENCH?

Cell Quench is a light nourishing serum comprised of the most advanced plant stem cell culture technology available on the market.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

The plant stem cell cultures boost the antioxidant levels in the cells, which helps to calm inflammation (a leading cause of aging) and protect the skin from free radicals, which can come from sun, pollution and many other sources. 

MORE INFORMATION ON PLANT CELLS

http://www.slideshare.net/IntelligentNutrients/horsts-keynote-stem-cell-science


ARE THERE CHEMICALS IN CELL QUENCH?

Cell Quench is ALL-NATURAL! We don't have to mix a bunch of preservatives in our products. One reason Cell Quench is well preserved is because it is packaged in Violet Glass. Violet glass not only protects ingredients, but enhances them as demonstrated in the tomato experiment in the video and the attached photos.


AREN'T THERE ALREADY STEM CELL PRODUCTS ON THE MARKET?

Plant stem cells were first introduced around 2008 with the Swiss Apple Stem Cell. Cell Quench is the most effective plant stem cell technology available on the market. In addition many cosmetic companies will put ingredients in their products at super small percentages for marketing. I want the consumer to get the most bang for their buck!

 WHEN WILL I GET THE PRODUCT?

My goal is to get Cell Quench out to market as soon as possible once we reach our funding goal. It takes eight weeks to get the raw material upon ordering and another two to fill it and ship it.

HOW MUCH DO I GET AND HOW LONG DOES IT LAST?

Each full size serum is 10ml. Because the serum is packaged using a glass roller ball there is no excess or wasted serum. One can easily get 1-2 months use out of each bottle depending on your desired use and results.


WHAT SKIN TYPES DOES CELL QUENCH WORK WITH?

Everyone! We've seen the most dramatic changes from people with sun damage and dehydration. What made me happiest is that it was also gentle on sensitive skin and even the dryest of clients that can't seem to get hydrated. Most testers reported that they didn't need a cream after using Cell Quench.


A LITTLE SIDE NOTE

Remember there is no miracle in a bottle. Cell Quench is an amazing tool in the battle of aging, but anti-aging and age prevention begins from within. As I always say 'Eat a Cheeto, look like a Cheeto'.


MORE INFORMATION

To find out more about me and many of my anti-aging secrets make sure you check out www.tuesdaytips.blogspot.com

WHAT DOES THE MONEY GO TOWARDS?

Packaging, filling, raw materials, sampling, labels, soup to nuts. No payday for me for now!

THANK YOU, THANK YOU! I can't wait to bring this amazing product to market. It has already made so many people very, very happy!! Please help us get to our goal by spreading the word!

Warmest wishes,

Mary Schook

 

 

P.S. Video coming soon. If I didn't launch this right now I was about to be eaten alive by some testers!!!
story_txt:
Thank you for checking out the launch of my very first skincare product, Cell Quench.
Who am I?
My name is Mary Schook. Since 2005 I have been working as a licensed esthetician on lab rats, I mean clients, at my alternative anti-aging center in New York City, Beauty By Mary Schook, LLC. Prior to treating the countless faces that make pilgrimages to us from across the globe, I was one of the most sought after fashion makeup artists and image makers in the industry. 
I naturally gravitated toward skincare after pioneering lash extensions in the US because customers were going to professionals that would burn, heat and peel the skin. I noticed that initially they all looked great, but through time their skin looked thinner and older. It was important for me to figure out why and fix it!
I wasn't the only person to make this observation. In 2008 Estee Lauder's Chief Scientific Officer announced that we have been treating skin entirely wrong. Skincare of the future is about nurturing the skin and feeding the cells what they need, not creating damage to produce temporary effects and brittle collagen. 
A NEW PRODUCT IS BORN
Because I am also now one of the leaders in stem cell growth factors in the skincare industry, I was introduced to a very special plant stem cell culture by a raw materials company. I eventually tested it on hundreds of clients. EVERY single person reported satisfactory results with my formulation and told me their skin was hydrated, softer, firmer, brighter and overall happier! There is nothing they would change about the product and they all wanted it IMMEDIATELY. In all of my years as a skinspert and product tester I have never had a unanimous response quite like this. 
INVESTMENT STORY
I decided to take Cell Quench to several investors (and was introduced to many others), but no one seemed to have the vision that I did. I didn't want to make a cream. The particles in creams are too big and they generally don't work. story:
Short Summary

WHO AM I?

My name is Tracey Rodriguez.  My background has been in business development, customer service, sales and the fitness industry for the past 15 years.  I trained and became a certified fitness trainer in 2003 and is certified through NESTA.  I Founded Fitness Lady 30 Minute Fitness Centers.  The first location opened in 2004 and a second location in 2005.  Both locations have since been sold to take the BOOT CAMPS to the next level.  I was a key note speaker for the City of Phoenix in health and fitness.   I am the author of 22 books in the health and fitness industry.  I am the founder and creator of the NEW 3 Phase dietDECK.  I am featured in Robert Kiyosaki's book "Rich Dad Success Stories" published in October of 2003.  A quote from this book says it all "we never lost our dreams, we just found a way to make them come true".  This is what I have done and the passion I have with all my business projects.  =))

WHY HELP THIS PROJECT?

Firstly, I want to thank all of you for checking out my Indiegogo project! You have already contributed to the project just by visiting my page.

3 Phase dietDECK is a current product that I had developed a few years back to help my clients signed up in my Ladies Fitness Boot Camp classes have a easy & fun diet plan.  I have sold over 4000 copies since September of 2008.In the intro video I have shared with you what the cards look like.  I now want to take this concept and make into a "Online App" to bring to the world!
 

Here are a few testimonials from past clients:

The Phase 3-Phase diet plan is great! .....  The plan is so easy to follow and takes the guesswork out of what I should be eating daily.  It provides you with just the right amount of food to keep you energized through-out the day and I can honestly say that I am never hungry.  All I do is design my meals around the list of foods provided in the plan, and there is such a variety of options, that I am never bored.  The best part of being on the 3-Phase diet plan ....is that when I put on my black suit in preparation for my interview last Friday, my pants slide on with ease.  I cannot tell you how thrilled I was because I really wanted to wear that suit and be comfortable in it.  I believe I was able to achieve this by sticking to the plan.  ----Margie W

I have been working out for the last several months and have seen results but not like I wanted.  I can tell you that without the help of the 3 Phase dietDECK I would not have been able to keep going.  I am now getting the results that I want and I do not have to think about it.  This plan has imprinted on my brain exaclty what I need to do each day.   ----- Nai

I have been in the boot camp program for 2 years now and have had amazing results. I was at a platue for a few months and decided to do the case study for the new 3 Phase dietDECK. In the 8 weeks I felt amazing and was never hungry. I ended up losing 13 inches and 9 pounds in the study. I am going to remain on the plan to finish reaching my fitness goals. I love this product. Very easy to use and I was never hungry, EVER. -------Sandy

What We Need & What You Get

YOUR FUNDS WILL HELP GO TOWARDS:

Every dollar you donate will give me the freedom to pursue this passion of helping people get healthy.

  • Cost of the programmer that will develop the ICON and 3 Phase dietDECK Application
  • Updating the current website that will also be interactive.  (I am not a computer designer and I did this on my own…lol  you can check out at http://www.3phasedietdeck.com)
  •  Cost of the registering as a Developer on all 3 major mobile app sights (Apple, Android & Blackberry)
  • Updated graphics for the logo
  • All fees for protecting my idea
  • Marketing materials
  • Indiegogo, Amazon fees, and shipping costs. Boring, but still important.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?

The awesome gift of knowing that you put a smile on my face... and some super awesome rewards of course!  All of my rewards are listed below:

  • PLEDGE $1 OR MORE: You will be an awesome person. My appreciation will be publicly announced on my newsletter and Facebook page!
  • PLEDGE $10 OR MORE: You will be an awesome person. My appreciation will be publicly announced on my newsletter and Facebook page! PLUS you will receive advanced access to the new 3 Phase dietDECK App prior to it being released to the public once it is completed.
  • PLEDGE $25 OR MORE: You will be an awesome person. My appreciation will be publicly announced on my newsletter and Facebook page! You will receive advanced access to the new 3 Phase dietDECK App prior to it being released to the public once it is completed. PLUS you will receive a physical deck of the 3 Phase dietDECK cards!!
  • PLEDGE $50 OR MORE: You will be an awesome person. My appreciation will be publicly announced on my newsletter and Facebook page! You will receive advanced access to the new 3 Phase dietDECK App prior to it being released to the public once it is completed. You will receive 5 physical decks of the 3 Phase dietDECK cards to give out to your friends and family and pick any 2 of my ebooks: 3 Day Detox, 30 Day Meal Plan & Weight Loss Guide or HCG Diet Plan. (all ebooks are current for sell on Amazon Kindle)
  • PLEDGE $100 OR MORE: You will be an awesome person. My appreciation will be publicly announced on my newsletter and Facebook page! You will receive advanced access to the new 3 Phase dietDECK App prior to it being released to the public once it is completed. You will receive 25 physical decks of the 3 Phase dietDECK cards to give out to your friends and family and ALL of my ebooks: 3 Day Detox, 30 Day Meal Plan & Weight Loss Guide or HCG Diet Plan. (all ebooks are current for sell on Amazon Kindle)
 

The Impact

MY GOAL!

My goal is to create a 3 phase dietDECK app that is accessible to the world via all mobile app stores! I want to help make losing weight fun & interactive.  Up-to-date I have funded everything on my own, and I am now ready to share my project with the world. I would love your support to help my idea grow!

Other Ways You Can Help

You are now apart of something special whether you like it or not. Even if you can't pledge please pass on my Indiegogo page to all of your friends and family... Your mail man might want to check it out too!

  • Thanks =))
  • Your awesome, thanks =))
  • Thank you so much, you’re more than awesome =))
  • Thank you kindly =))
  • I don't know how to thank you =))
  • I can't thank you enough...Thanks again for all your help, I am forever grateful! =))
  • Remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

Tracey =)))

story:
PicDevUSB is a USB enabled PIC microcontroller development board.

it can be directly programmed with its on board USB (without needing external programmer)

it is complete tiny yet powerful PIC microcontroller development board.

Specification:  

  • USB power or External power 
  • 28-Pin, High-Performance 
  • 21-I/O pins 
  • Flash memory 32k 
  • On-Board USB V2.0 
  • 3 External Interrupts 
  • 4 Timer modules (Timer0 to Timer3) 
  • Up to 2 Capture/Compare/PWM (CCP) modules: 
  • Capture is 16-bit, max. resolution 5.2 ns (TCY/16)
  • Compare is 16-bit, max. resolution 83.3 ns (TCY) 
  • Enhanced Capture/Compare/PWM (ECCP) module: 
    Multiple output modes 
    Selectable polarity 
    Programmable dead time 
    Auto-shutdown and auto-restart 
  • Enhanced USART module: 
    Master Synchronous Serial Port (MSSP) module 
    Supporting 3-Wire SPI (all 4 modes) and I2C 
  • 10-Bit, Up to 13-Channel Analog-to-Digital Converter 
    Dual Analog Comparators with Input Multiplexing

PWM output: PWM resolution is 1 to 10-bit 

Interactive course 

  • The interactive course is included within the "Learning Kit" and "Educators Kit" reward tiers.

Designed for Education

The course takes you step by step through building 11 different circuits 

(Bonus Tutorial: "Secure PC Login by PICDEVUSB" uploaded to instructables http://bit.ly/1oL1PQX )

1. Blinking LEDs and creating different colors on an RGB LED.

2. Toggle LED by Reading a Push Switch. 

3. Analog Read ( LM35 Based Thermostat )

4. Analog Read ( LDR based day night switch )

5. Controlling AC Appliances ( FAN LIGHTS Etc ) using relays

6. Simple Traffic Light Control

7. Making voice using PWM

8. Bricks Breaker Game Using Color LCD

9. Remote control Devices using Infrared Remote control

10. Controlling devices via computer

11. Connecting devices via mobile phone ( Wifi )

  • Below is a snapshot from LED blinking learning course

Reward tires

Educators Kit

Teaching Material + Interactive Course + 10x learning Kits  +

A 3.5 inch TFT LCD Shield ( with Sample code )

mini Educators Kit
Teaching Material + Interactive Course + 2x learning Kits  +

A 3.5 inch TFT LCD Shield ( with Sample code ) 

Learning Kit

Learning Kit Interactive course + course parts kit   £60

it includes

  • PicDevUSB
  • Solder less Breadboard 
  • Transistors
  • Diodes
  • 5v relays
  • Lm35 temperature sensor
  • Jumper wires
  • LDR Light Dependent Resistor
  • Tri Color LED
  • Red, Yellow, Green LEDs
  • Push Buttons
  • Speaker
  • Trim pot
  • Resistors
  • Wifi Sheild


  • Bluetooth Shield

  • Infrared Remote control and Receiver

  • Color LCD Shield

Shipping

price does not include the customs fees, duties and/or taxes you might incur when importing products into your state or country.

story:
About 247Shouts

247Shouts Limited was founded on the principle that access to internet and technology drives innovation and economic growth. The purpose of this company is to provide wireless internet accessible across remote areas of Jamaica.

"I had to give up on a few mobile application ideas because it was not feasible with current cost and state of mobile internet in Jamaica. While in my 3rd year of university, I did my research and pumped all my savings and part-time earnings into a pilot project to create a wireless internet mesh. I strongly believe that increasing mobility and lowering the cost of internet will boost economic growth in the country" — CEO, Kirk Williams (www.williamskirk.com)

  • The company has already recouped 50% of its start-up costs.
  • The company only operates in a 7 miles radius with an average of 30 customers.
  • There are 1.2 million people without internet access in Jamaica.
  • Your contribution to this campaign will provide the capital needed to expand the current radius of distribution to create a mesh across the island.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $50,000 to create a wireless internet mesh across Jamaica. The capital raised will be used to purchase equipment to broadcast and to interconnect:

  • Establishing a base station in each parish, this will consist of 3 ubiquiti 120 degrees sector antennas + additional 2 spare in the event of device failure — $16800 + $9600 = $26400.
  • 32 Strategically placed Ubiquiti omnidirectional antennas for rebroadcasting — $10000
  • Ubiquiti airfiber backbone to interconnect all parishes —  $8500

Benefits to contributors:

  • Public acknowledgement - we will share your twitter handler to our network.
  • You will receive our once in a life time 247Shouts — the real founders —  t-shirt
  • You will receive monthly access equivalent to your contribution. Additionally, you will receive a number of daily access codes to give to friends and family
  • 14 contributors will have permanent logos in the partners section of our websites

The Impact

Creating a stable wireless internet mesh infrastructure will greatly reduce the cost of internet, thereby increasing its accessibility and affordability to low income families. This stable infrastructure will drive innovations in:

  • Mobile technology and mobile application development
  • Deployment of many modern anti-crime technology, this will increase investor confidence in the island
  • Interconnecting schools to promote e-learning and knowledge dissemination
  • Creating jobs and more sources of income for low income families


Faces Behind the Project


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't afford to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Sharing this link (http://igg.me/at/247shouts) on your social media network
  • Sharing our twitter handle @247shouts (https://twitter.com/247shouts)
  • Like our facebook page ( https://www.facebook.com/247shouts)
  • Hiring our web/app development department on your next project
  • Make use the Indiegogo share tools!

247Shouts Limited was founded on the principle that access to internet 
and technology drives innovation and economic 
growth. The purpose of this company is to provide wireless 
internet accessible across remote areas of Jamaica."I had to give up on a few mobile application ideas because it was not feasible with current cost and state of mobile internet in Jamaica. While in my 3rd year of university, I did my research and pumped all my savings and part-time earnings into a pilot project to create a wireless internet mesh. I strongly believe that increasing mobility and lowering the cost of internet will boost economic growth in the country" — CEO, Kirk Williams (www.williamskirk.com)
The company has already recouped 50% of its start-up costs.
The company only operates in a 7 miles radius with an average of 30 customers.

There are 1.2 million people without internet access in Jamaica.
Your contribution to this campaign will provide the capital needed to expand the current radius of distribution to create a mesh across the island.
What We Need & What You GetWe are raising $50,000 to create a wireless internet mesh across Jamaica. The capital raised will be used to purchase equipment to broadcast and to interconnect:
Establishing a base station in each parish, this will consist of 3 ubiquiti 120 degrees sector antennas + additional 2 spare in the event of device failure — $16800 + $9600 = $26400.
32 Strategically placed Ubiquiti omnidirectional antennas for rebroadcasting — $10000

Ubiquiti airfiber backbone to interconnect all parishes —   $8500
Benefits to contributors:
Public acknowledgement - we will share your twitter handler to our network.
You will receive our once in a life time 247Shouts  — the real founders  —  t-shirt
You will receive monthly access equivalent to your contribution. Additionally, you will receive a number of daily access codes to give to friends and family

14 contributors will have permanent logos in the partners section of our websites

The ImpactCreating a stable wireless internet mesh infrastructure will greatly reduce the cost of internet, thereby increasing its accessibility and affordability to low income families. This stable infrastructure will drive innovations in:
Mobile technology and mobile application development

Deployment of many modern anti-crime technology, this will increase investor confidence in the island
Interconnecting schools to promote e-learning and knowledge dissemination
Creating jobs and more sources of income for low income families
Faces Behind the ProjectOther Ways You Can HelpWe understand if you can't afford to contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
Sharing this link (http://igg.me/at/247shouts) on your social media network 

Sharing our twitter handle @247shouts (https://twitter.com/247shouts) 

Like our facebook page ( https://www.facebook.com/247shouts)

Hiring our web/app development department on your next project
Make use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Take a closer look at the new additions to the Python Family of Cables featuring Rebel, Vivid & Prism.

World's 1st Certified Tri-Connector Charging Cable

Python is the world’s first charging cable with Tough Reinforced Braided PVC Skin for superior strength and a lifetime warranty. Python is Universal, Certified, Strong, Fast, Durable, Reliable and Lasting. Python cables are available in several dynamic lengths. Python is the world’s longest Apple MFi certified cable. We stand behind our product 100% and back it with a lifetime warranty. Not the least expensive, not the most but far better than other cables costing a lot more and simply delivers lasting value. Over 10,000-user tested and recommended .

PLEASE NOTE THAT ALL OUR CABLES ARE CHARGE AND SYNC CABLES SO THEY ARE BOTH POWER AND DATA.

The Python Family of Cables: 

Python USB-A to Single or Dual Connector

Prism a USB-A to Single connector is available in silver or gold​

USB-IF Certified USB-C Cable QC 3.1 with Thunderbolt 3 Support​

USB-A to single connector in two beautiful patterns​

World's 1st Certified Tri-Connector Charging Cable​

Stop wasting your money on weak flimsy and gimmicky uncertified cables that don’t last. Meet the Python Charging Cable, the world’s first dual charging cable with Tough Reinforced Braided PVC Skin for superior strength and a lifetime warranty.

We have put together a host of amazing perks with a flat shipping fees of only $10 for any reward anywhere in the world. So please make a pledge with just a few clicks then share with all of your friends and join our mission to create the strongest, fastest, most durable, most reliable and lasting Charging Cable Ever.

PLEASE NOTE THAT ALL OUR CABLES ARE CHARGE AND SYNC CABLES SO THEY ARE BOTH POWER AND DATA.

This Certified cable works with 99.999% of all devices

Last June, having been fed up with wasting money on weak flimsy and gimmicky uncertified cables that don’t last, we launched the Python cable, the world’s first charging cable with Tough Reinforced Braided PVC Skin for superior strength and backed it with a lifetime warranty.

Then we followed with the Python USB-C Quick Charge 3.1 IF-Certified with Thunderbolt-3 support cable to a rave review. 

USB-IF QC 3.1 Generation-2 USB-C cable with Thunderbolt 3 Support​

 

When we developed the Python reinforced charging cables last year and backed it with a lifetime warranty, we had no idea that so many would copy our ideas  in their cables. But there is more to what makes Python the superior cable that it is. A lot more! We have also learned a lot in the past many months and have made great changes to the Python cable. The result is strength, resistance and durability in a charging cable to last a lifetime.

Python cables are the fastest cables ever and are the world’s longest MFi and USB-IF certified cables and all are backed with our stunning customer service too.

What makes Python so strong is the Reinforced braided PVC throughout the cable. What is Kevlar®? It's the stuff that bulletproof vests are made of. It is the most powerful and strongest material in the world.

We know you don’t always have a lot of time to charge your devices that’s why we engineered Python cables to charge your devices at the speed of light. It is up to twice as fast as regular charging cables, which allows you to top-off your battery quickly during those times you’re away from the wall.

Twice the speed of a regular cable

Many cheaper cables go with thinner wires to cut cost, and they can’t handle enough current to charge newer, power-hungry devices at full speed. A cheaply made cable can also hamper data-transfer speeds. The many leading brands cables we tested had 19% slower data-read speeds than Python, and the slowest-charging cable conducted 41% less current than the Python cable.

Buying after market USB cables will pretty much always result in getting cheap quality 30/30 cables and your device will barely break 500mAh when it charges, maybe even less. This isn't the only issue though. After you use a cable for a while it eventually stress near the plugs and causes poor connectivity between your device and the wire.

Python cables Use 18AWG silver-plated copper cables for lower resistance and faster charging than any other cable out there and offer high speed charging at 3.1A, 3.2v - 20v & 18W and data sync up to 10Gbps and our new Python USB-IF Certified USB-C to USB-C Quick Charge 3.1 Generation 2 cable with up to 40 gigabits per second and 100 watts of power, gain support for Thunderbolt 3, and benefit from the ability to simultaneously connect to two 4K 60 Hertz display or one 5K 60 Hertz display. , which would save you a lot of time to do other things...

Python was born out of the necessity for a reliable and efficient charging solution, to de-clutter and to de-stress your life! The tough 3M braiding material keep the Python Cable inherently tangle-free. 

Apple, the Apple logo, MFi & iTunes are trademarks of Apple Computer, Inc.

Kevlar® and Kevlar® Fiber are trademarks of E. I. du Pont de Nemours and Company or its affiliates.

Risks and challenges

We’ve worked hard over the last year to get the Python cable to this point and we've successfully built and delivered beautiful, reliable fast cables to backers. We have also learnt a lot. Found mistakes, improved on all fronts and are proud to have delivered on our promises for reliable solid products and great customer service. As we continue this journey we are introducing new additions to the Python Family of Cables and we have completed critical milestones with the help of many knowledgeable people. We are continuing with our very reputable manufacturer who offers great engineering support and development tools. What remains is completing the manufacturing phase and so we're confident that manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

We are almost ready to push the green button and start production with our manufacturer. We have done our testing and certification and cannot wait to put it into your hands. We anticipate a manufacturing period of 6 weeks from the end of the campaign to start shipping Python to you. This is possible because we’ve already completed our R&D, obtained our Apple MFi, USB-IF and Quick Charge certification, have a massive order of connectors on the way and the rest we can complete with your help and have the cables shipped to you 6 weeks after the end of this campaign and no later than October 30th, 2017.

As we continue this journey we are introducing new additions to the Python Family of Cables and we have completed critical milestones with the help of many knowledgeable people. story:
If you love to listen to music wherever you go and are tired of carrying cables around, the Speaker Pod is for you!  Join the Pod People!

Speaker Pod represents big sound in a small package. With its innovative acoustic mechanism, Speaker Pod delivers sound that is crisp, clear, and full-bodied. Sound emanates from your phone's speakers and envelops your ears, with no need for wires, cables or Bluetooth!

Our Speaker Pods, which come in snazzy green or basic black, have a starting cost of just $24!

Unlike our first iteration of this technology - the Boom Bx - Speaker Pod is powered by a rechargeable battery. Not having to buy batteries equals a savings cost to the consumer, and is of course a benefit to the environment.

All the user has to do is use a mini USB (included) to charge their Speaker Pod,

The Speaker Pod

has a simple on/off switch, which is much better than a push button when it comes to quality. (We discovered this with our Boom Bx, which had a push button. We quickly learned that an on/off switch is much more reliable.)

Simply turn the Speaker Pod on. Then, turn on your smartphone or MP3 player  and start playing music. Place this device on the Speaker Pod, and immediately the music, crisp, and clear, will soar out into the room.

How Donations From Pod People Will Be Used

Your donations will help us market the Speaker Pod. In addition, we'll be able to develop additional products and promote our brand. Ideas for Speaker Pod 2 are already in the works but we need your help to make it happen!

 If you'll place your trust in us and our product, you'll receive our commitment to each and every one of you to deliver the best product possible, on time. We can't do it without your help.

Experience Brings Excellence

Our first foray into amplifying sound from a mobile phone or MP3 player was the Boom BX, and we learned a great deal from that project. We learned what worked and what didn't, and this enabled us to build the new and improved Speaker Pod.

Thanks to our innovative mass production ideas, we are able to offer the Speaker Pod at a very affordable cost.

With your help, we can finalize our mass production and marketing plans. Everything is completed and we just need that final influx of funds to bring the Speaker Pod to the world...and start recruiting Pod People!

Who We Are

I am Mike Reeves.

My experience in technology spans over 30 years. Among other positions, I served as the  Vice President of Engineering for Ameritech, and was the the CEO of Comguard Inc.  When I was with US Sprint as Director of Engineering, I was responsible for construction of the first fiber optic cable laid between Chicago and St Louis.  

I have invented and patented four different products. I marketed one of these, a holiday light tester, myself, on the QVC shopping channel. for 13 years.  I've also offered an  8-wheel stunt car remote control car, a climbing remote control car,  spinning ball multi-led lights, a mini classic remote control car and a 911 alert device for home

And last but not least, I'm very proud to say I'm a  US Navy vet.

I am Nick Robinson.

I will soon graduate from the prestigious Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago. My time there has allowed me to run projects and bring fun into many lives with Speaker Pod.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in becoming one of the Pod People, but can't help us out financially at this time, there's still lots you can do to help.

Please make some noise (or should we say, music?) on Youtube Twitter, Facebook or other Social Media accounts to let folks know about this great project.

Visit our webpage, and subscribe to our Youtube, Facebook and Twitter accounts

THANKS!!!!

story:
Access your home mobile service

 without roaming charges.


MobiRoam works by placing your home SIM card inside our SmartBox before you travel and connecting the SmartBox to your home Internet router. Then using our app on a smartphone you access the SmartBox through the Internet anywhere in the world and make available all the services (talk and SMS text) associated with your SIM card.  

The benefits are:

  • You keep your mobile number for talk/SMS text and eliminate roaming costs.
  • MobiRoam works worldwide.
  • Internet access means home mobile service access.
  • One-off purchase price of the SmartBox gives you FREE lifetime use                                                                                             
                                       No annual fees or other hidden fees. 

This is how MobiRoam works:


So as far as your mobile service provider is concerned you're still at "home" because your SIM is at home, but you are using your service by remote control through the Internet. So as long as you have a SmartBox, our phone app and an Internet connection when you travel (for example, using WiFi hot spots at cafes, restaurants, airports, hotels, trains, and public places or by having a 3G data connection by using a local SIM card) you can talk and text as if you were right at home.

The best thing with MobiRoam is you totally keep your identity (mobile number) while you travel. When you call or text people, its your name that pops up on their screen, not some weird overseas number where they will most likely do what I do - not answer. They will know its you calling or texting. And when they contact you on your same home number, you will see who's calling or texting you.

The next best thing with MobiRoam is as long as you have an Internet connection, there are ZERO ongoing additional fees to use the service. Use it for free and without limit and it wont cost you any more than if you were using the service from home.

We have personally been operating the MobiRooam service for 10 months using the Android and IOS  apps (check them out here…iOS app Android ). We have tried it in USA, UK, France, Germany, Italy, Bali, Thailand, Malaysia, Hong Kong, Singapore, India, China, Australia and Moscow. We even tried it on a plane that offered Internet access 36,000ft in the air! The point is it doesn't matter where, as long as you have a reasonable internet connection, it will just work.  The project has been derisked as we have done extensive testing and we have been continully refining the service to the point where it is  ready for widespread public use.

Development of all MobiRoam hardware and software is complete but to keep the price of the SmartBox low we need to reach our target and manufacture in quantity; so your backing and order for a SmartBox will make this happen.

story:
Get ready for our latest, most advanced case ever to walk this earth. 

SPECTRE is our new light up case for iPhone, with the next generation lighting technology. It allows you to be on top of your notifications with unique, lighting design, providing the possibilities to personalize your device according to your personality. Please, meet SPECTRE.

• Italiano • 국어 • 中文 • Pyсский • 日本語 •

Our Spectre line-up is available for the following iPhone models: iPhone 5/5S/SE/6/6S/7 and iPhone 6/6S/7 Plus. You can pre order SPECTRE now saving 50% its retail price.

Imaginative and inspiring were our goals.​

Our result: a new range of case designs that we’ve developed in partnership with industry giants Jean Baptiste and Jama Jurabaev.

Introducing designs of Andrew Bond.

All business and no frills. No messing around here. Simply put, what you see is what you get.

Fierce, motivated and powerful. The dragon inspired this SPECTRE to breathe its fiery glow. Open up your imagination and attach a piece of the mysterious to your everyday life.

Delicate, feminine and the embodiment of class. The organic nature of this case pays tribute to the natural beauty found on Earth, accented against the force that brings life to all: light. This SPECTRE will awaken your senses.

Majestic, graceful and downright beautiful. Butterfly motifs dominate this design and are accented by the central feature of SPECTRE: light. Think reality with a dash of magic! Sincere sensuality is expressed through floral prints on the backs of butterfly wings. This combination creates a luminous touch and with raised metallic threads that contrast against stripes, triangles and geometric shapes, this SPECTRE gracefully flutters to life.

Six sides of simplicity and genius. The high-tech world is chalk full of clean lines and perfectly crafted shapes, much like this Hexagon SPECTRE. Whether you’re in the tech industry or you’re someone who appreciates its beauty, this SPECTRE is for you.

Noticeably unnoticeable. When you want to turn heads but don’t want anyone to see your phone. This SPECTRE is inspired by the rugged armour that protects servicemen and women around the world. Get tough and get camouflaged.

Meet designs of Jean Baptiste PetricoulI.

If you want to see what living and working in over a dozen different countries does to an artist’s influence, look no further than the designs of Jean Baptiste PetricoulI. This up and comer has some significant impact already under his belt and what you see is just the tip of the iceberg.

This tropical treat is a super-sweet way to give your iPhone the Hawaiian experience. The classic pineapple is given a fresh look with contemporary lines and SPECTRE’s glow will have anyone and everyone nearby yearning for the tropics.

Not everyone looks good in a pair of leather pants, but just about every iPhone looks better in a Prince SPECTRE. This SPECTRE pays homage to the great musician with a subdued yet stately design. Rock ‘n roll.

Pop icon. Musical genius. The great, David Bowie. The signature Bowie shock of hair and strike of lightning will surge new life into your iPhone and is perfect for any lover of music.

This SPECTRE is not your father but it is really cool nevertheless. Here, the Dark Side meets the light and when you attach SPECTRE to your iPhone, you’ll instantly know that the force is strong in this one

Concept artist. Illustrator. Matte painter. Meet Jama Jurabaev.

Jama took a break from the grind in London where he’s been working the movie and game industry to create this exclusive design.

How do you light up a room full of people without shedding a drop of blood? Attach the SPECTRE G.I. Combat ready and fully armed.

These are some of the fab features and changes you can expect:

- Rock-solid construction: SPECTRE is made for people that value protection.

- Materials: our unique blend of ingredients makes SPECTRE incredibly protective.

- Screen protection: SPECTRE keeps your screen safe.

- Much thinner: At only 2.7mm, you’ll hardly notice that SPECTRE is attached to your iPhone.

- More vibrant illumination.

- Increased duration the illumination takes place.

- Design: we’ve got the right look for everyone.  

How do I use it?  

- Press the “S” button on the front bottom side of the case.  

- Turn on Bluetooth on your iPhone.  

- Choose Spectre in the list of active Bluetooth devices and pair them.  

- Put the case on your iPhone.  

- Enjoy your case glowing when you get a call or message.  

P.S. Our case works with all popular messengers such as: WhatsApp, Skype, iMessage, FB Mesenger, WeChat and many others.

Fab features and changes you can expect:

Rock-solid construction: SPECTRE is made for people that value protection.

Materials: our unique blend of PC + TPU ingredients makes SPECTRE incredibly protective.

TPU(Thermoplastic Polyurethane). TPU material provides rock solid protection for the edges of the iPhone and make it simple to apply and remove the case.  

PC(Polycarbonate). The combination of brightness and a new materials blend gave us the possibility to display an image on the back of the case, and also make the image more vibrant. Having examined more than 50 combinations of materials, we came up with the best solution.

Screen protection: SPECTRE keeps your screen safe.

The new construction keeps safe your screen from surface scratches when your iPhone is lying face down.

Much thinner: At only 2.7mm, you’ll hardly notice that SPECTRE is attached to your iPhone.

More vibrant illumination.

We increased the brightness of the lighting element by 40%.

Increased duration illumination takes place.

The lighting element glows 5 times when you get a call and 3 times when you get a message.

The SPECTRE is connected to your iPhone via Low Energy 4.0 Bluetooth – the Bluetooth itself will nibble away approximately 5% of the iPhone’s battery.

Case controlling. You don't need to use any additional software. All of our cases are compatible with your phone's built-in settings. You will have the option to choose the applications (apps) in the Apple Notification Center which control the case.

Our case has a powerful built-in power supply with a 2-year lifespan so there is no need to charge it or replace the battery.

Where we're at.

We’ve been working on smart cases for over 3 years now. The Spectre that you see in the video and prototype gallery is a real, working prototype. With your support, we can bring Spectre worldwide.

Your contribution will help fund:  

- Production tooling  

- Large components order  

- Broaden Spectre’s line-up

Our goal.

SPECTRE is ready for mass production. Our product consists of two main components: hardware and software and both are fully developed and ready to go. We are ready for mass production. We've performed all of the required tests and selected the materials and manufacturer. All of the technical data is ready as well. We have developed necessary connections with the industry's best logistics company. We have calculated the initial shipping dates. Right now, all we need to do is to manufacture the injection molds and start the mass production. Our previous project gave us the needed experience to bring this project to life. We are planning on shipping our first production run in January, 2017.

Anyone that has ever tried to create something new will know that the road isn’t always easy. Successes, setbacks and everything in between. We have overcome hurdle after hurdle because of one thing. Your support. This is the part where we take out the Kleenex and get a little teary-eyed. We have come so far and we are now at the final hurdle. We can see the finish line but need a little boost to get all the way there. Kickstarter family, you have put your trust in us before, and we created a great iPhone case. Let’s work together and make history, again. See you at the finish line!
story_txt: Get ready for our latest, most advanced case ever to walk this earth. SPECTRE is our new light up case for iPhone, with the next generation lighting technology. It allows you to be on top of your notifications with unique, lighting design, providing the possibilities to personalize your device according to your personality. Please, meet SPECTRE.• Italiano • 국어 • 中文 • Pyсский • 日本語 •Our Spectre line-up is available for the following iPhone models: iPhone 5/5S/SE/6/6S/7 and iPhone 6/6S/7 Plus. You can pre order SPECTRE now saving 50% its retail price.Imaginative and inspiring were our goals.​Our result: a new range of case designs that we’ve developed in partnership with industry giants Jean Baptiste and Jama Jurabaev.Introducing designs of Andrew Bond.All business and no frills. No messing around here. Simply put, what you see is what you get.Fierce, motivated and powerful. The dragon inspired this SPECTRE to breathe its fiery glow. Open up your imagination and attach a piece of the mysterious to your everyday life.Delicate, feminine and the embodiment of class. The organic nature of this case pays tribute to the natural beauty found on Earth, accented against the force that brings life to all: light. This SPECTRE will awaken your senses.Majestic, graceful and downright beautiful. Butterfly motifs dominate this design and are accented by the central feature of SPECTRE: light. Think reality with a dash of magic! Sincere sensuality is expressed through floral prints on the backs of butterfly wings. This combination creates a luminous touch and with raised metallic threads that contrast against stripes, triangles and geometric shapes, this SPECTRE gracefully flutters to life.Six sides of simplicity and genius. The high-tech world is chalk full of clean lines and perfectly crafted shapes, much like this Hexagon SPECTRE. Whether you’re in the tech industry or you’re someone who appreciates its beauty, this SPECTRE is for you.Noticeably unnoticeable. When you want to turn heads but don’t want anyone to see your phone. This SPECTRE is inspired by the rugged armour that protects servicemen and women around the world. Get tough and get camouflaged.Meet designs of Jean Baptiste PetricoulI.If you want to see what living and working in over a dozen different countries does to an artist’s influence, look no further than the designs of Jean Baptiste PetricoulI. This up and comer has some significant impact already under his belt and what you see is just the tip of the iceberg.This tropical treat is a super-sweet way to give your iPhone the Hawaiian experience. The classic pineapple is given a fresh look with contemporary lines and SPECTRE’s glow will have anyone and everyone nearby yearning for the tropics.Not everyone looks good in a pair of leather pants, but just about every iPhone looks better in a Prince SPECTRE. This SPECTRE pays homage to the great musician with a subdued yet stately design. Rock ‘n roll.Pop icon. Musical genius. The great, David Bowie. The signature Bowie shock of hair and strike of lightning will surge new life into your iPhone and is perfect for any lover of music.This SPECTRE is not your father but it is really cool nevertheless. Here, the Dark Side meets the light and when you attach SPECTRE to your iPhone, you’ll instantly know that the force is strong in this oneConcept artist. Illustrator. Matte painter. Meet Jama Jurabaev.Jama took a break from the grind in London where he’s been working the movie and game industry to create this exclusive design.How do you light up a room full of people without shedding a drop of blood? Attach the SPECTRE G.I. story:
EDIT:

The campaign is over, and all goals were reached!

This post on outlines the current status, and will be updated as work progresses.

If you'd still like to pitch in, there's a Donate button on my homepage -- I will honor perks for donations made before Monday 5th of September 2011, should you request them.

Cheers, and Thank You Everyone,

 -- Nikodemus

Goal #7 reached, big compiler lock removal is go!

Goal #6 reached, Madeira is go!

Goal #5 reached, threading API refactoring is go!

Goal #4 reached, semaphore notification objects are go!

Goal #3 reached, read/write locks are go!

Goal #2 reached, timeouts across the threading API are go!

Goal #1 reached: locking improvements are go!

Hi!

I'm Nikodemus Siivola, an SBCL developer self-employed via Steel Bank Studio Ltd. I've been working on SBCL for about 8 years, and have around 1400 commits in the current tree.

My goal is to make SBCL the number one open source Common Lisp implementation.

Maybe 30% of my work on SBCL has been funded more-or-less-directly by my customers, and the rest I've essentially funded out of my own pocket. During the past couple of years -- since the mortgage crises, pretty much -- consulting gigs have been getting thinner on the ground, and I'm looking for a better way to fund future SBCL development.

This is my first experiment in crowdfunding: if it succeeds, there are other SBCL projects that I plan to fund in the same way -- hopefully involving other SBCL developers as well.


Everyone Loves or Hates Threads


SBCL has native threads on several POSIX platforms, but they aren't quite as robust as they should be outside Linux, and even on Linux the threading API is few pieces short of what I'd like to see there.


Individual platforms have issues of their own, but the major problem shared by most non-Linux platforms is our implementation of mutexes, and their misbehaviour when it comes to interrupt safety. 


The API is missing timeout arguments from several functions, read/write locks, and notification objects on semaphores... to start with.


Introducing Fair Spinlocks


I plan to improve things on non-Linux platforms by:

  • Replacing SBCL's mutexes on non-Linux platforms with a ones based on fair spinlocks. My proof of concept implementation shows that this is viable: in my tests fair spinlocks incorporating a backoff consistently outperform POSIX mutexes on Darwin.
  • Implementing a userspace solution for semaphores and condition variables for non-Linux platforms.

Futexes will remain in use on Linux: while it would be nice to use identical code on both Linux and elsewhere, futexes are simply too good for our purposes to not to use them.

The initial funding goal is enough to get this done. The results will be incorporated into SBCL and released into Public Domain as usual. (I have already developed the necessary extensions to ticket spinlock algorithm, allowing threads waiting for a spinlock to be interrupted without holding up the queue. What remains is integrating the work with SBCL, and dealing with semaphores and condition variables.)

The Missing Bits and Pieces

Even if you only use SBCL only on Linux, please consider participating. If I exceed the initial goal, I will also be able to work on:

  • At $4,000: adding timeout arguments to all blocking functions in the threading API.
  • At $5,000: implementing read/write locks.
  • At $6,000: implementing semaphore notification objects.
  • At $8,000: generally refactoring the threading API (while of course retaining backwards compatibility.)
  • At $12,000: new library called MADEIRA will be implemented, which is to be a compatibility library for Common Lisp implementations focused on threading and bits not covered by either CFFI or USOCKET. (Basic things like access to command-line arguments, environment, EXIT, etc. Bordeaux-Threads -like functionality, but better defined, with sharper edges. CAS. Remains to be seen how general I can make the support, though. Running external programs -- probably somewhere between TRIVIAL-SHELL and SBCL's RUN-PROGRAM in functionality.)
  • At $16,000: scope of the "big compiler lock" in SBCL will be curtailed, so that it will be possible to compile things in parallel. (What is the big compiler lock? SBCL grabs a lock when it compiles anything. The same lock is also used for some non-compiler activities like modifying the class graph. This lock prevents parallel compilation. Even if you don't care about parallel compilation as such, there are other unfortunate consequences: CLOS dispatch (before caches settle down) can involve compiling code. Most of the time BCL is a tiny annoyance, but sometimes it can be a real headache. Sometimes it is an insurmountable barrier. )

Spread the Word!


Tell people about this campaign!


Tell people about Steel Bank Studio Ltd.


Tell people about SBCL.


Tell people about Common Lisp.


Let Me Know What You Think!

Even should you choose not to chip in this time, don't hesitate to contact me at nikodemus@random-state.net: I would very much like to hear what you think of this, and what sort of SBCL projects you would be willing to participate in crowdfunding!

Thank you, and Happy Hacking!

 -- Nikodemus

PS. Due to high (and variable!) shipping costs I decided not to offer any material perks of note. If you're after t-shirts or mugs, check out my CafePress shop for some Lisp or SBCL swag -- 50% of the sale-prices there go towards supporting my work on SBCL.

story:
A new, universal interface for computer programs

Easy Function Keys uses keyboard function keys to select menu titles and drop down menu commands.

Use keyboard function keys in dialogue boxes to select options, and adjust values up and down.

When used with a text to speech engine, blind users can use all parts of the interface.

UK Patent applied for no. GB 1416410.7.

About me

My name is Adam Bond. I have been using computers for over 35 years, and during that time I have come across many programs which were difficult to use because of their interfaces. I decided to see if I could create something better.

I invented Easy Function Keys to create an interface which would be much easier to learn for inexperienced computer users, but also much quicker to use for experienced users. It enables virtually all people to use their computer:

Disabled users no longer have to deal with multiple simultaneous key keyboard shortcuts, because in Easy Function Keys, you only press one key at a time.
Stroke victims who only have the use of one arm can still use my interface.
Disabled users who can't use a keyboard can still use it, because it works just as well with a mouse, touchscreen, eyetracking device, or any other pointing device, as with a keyboard.
Blind users can use my interface because it can be used with keyboard only, and a text to speech engine.
Laptop users can access commands more quickly with keyboard function keys, than with a trackpad (or mouse).

There is no need to implement a different, or altered, interface, to accommodate all users, with Easy Function Keys.

My campaign

I am campaigning to raise £10,000 to pay my developer, CLR Software, to create a program suite which uses my new user interface.

My developer Chris is the owner of a growing business, CLRSoftware.co.uk. He graduated in the year 2000 with a first class honours degree in Computing and Mathematics, and has built up an extensive experience in developing software solutions in a variety of technologies across desktop, mobile and web.

Development timeline

The campaign will end mid-February 2015, but I will be paying my developer from the beginning of the campaign, as soon as Paypal pledges reach £200. (I can access Paypal pledges immediately, card payments are held by Indiegogo until the end of the campaign.)

Early builds of the software will be made available on this campaign page, as soon as they are created, so users can try them out. I hope to be able to release new builds every few days, beginning with the Program Picker.

Text to speech engine for Blind Mode

For the Blind Mode version of the software suite, I will be using the CereProc text to speech engine. You can test out this text to speech engine for yourself, by entering text into the CereProc website, and choosing the voice you want to hear the text spoken with. The Blind Mode version will come with four voices which the user can choose from. Please use the comments link above this campaign to let me know which voices you prefer. (I have to pay a licence fee for each voice I use in the software. Initially it will come with four voices, two male and two female. Please bear in mind that Blind Mode needs to use two different voices, one to read out menu bar title text, and the other to read out pull down menu commands, and dialogue box commands, so that the user always knows which they are listening to.)

The Easy Function Keys Software Suite:

Desktop Launcher:

A permanent menu bar (or bars) at the top of your desktop, from which you can launch any program or file, by just pressing two function keys. The Desktop Launcher will enable multiple menu bars, so you can have more than 144 programs and files. The Desktop Launcher will enable 'Quick Command Bars', which allow you to open a program or file with just one function key press.
Click here to view Desktop Launcher slideshow



Program Picker:

 

A dialogue box which opens whenever you press your Escape key. This displays all the open programs on your computer, and you can switch to any of them by pressing one function key. Unlike the conventional Windows Task Switcher (Alt-Tab), Program Picker stays open and doesn't require you to constantly hold down a key. You can alternate between the two most recently accessed programs by just pressing Esc F1 each time you want to switch - ideal for copying and pasting between two programs. Access Win X commands (Task Manager, Command Prompt, etc.) by pressing Esc F11. Access the desktop by pressing Esc F12. Access Quick Snap (see below) by press Esc F11 F11. Please view the video at the top of this campaign for a brief demo of the alpha version of the Program Picker. 
Click here to view Program Picker slideshow.



Quick Snap

Use function keys to resize the current program window to the right or left half of the screen, top or bottom of the screen, etc. Once you have resized the current program window, a list of other open programs is displayed, which you can resize to the other half (third, quarter, etc.) of the window, by pressing a function key. Very quick to use - just press F11 F11 to access within EFK compatible programs, or Esc F11 F11 within non-EFK compatible programs.
Click here to view Quick Snap slideshow.



Blind Mode:

A text to speech engine reads out commands as function keys are pressed. In Blind Mode, the user presses the same function key again to run that command, or presses other function keys to hear their commands. All parts of the Easy Function Keys interface have been designed to be accessible by blind and visually impaired users. 
Click here to view Blind Mode slideshow.

Quick Command Bars:

Quick Command Bars (QCBs) are displayed below the main menu bar in programs in the Easy Function Keys program suite, and allow the user to run commands with just one function key. Move between QCBs with F12 and Esc keys. Press Esc to move up, F12 to move down. Press Esc until you move back up to the main menu bar. Create your own custom QCBs containing your favourite commands.
Click here to view Quick Command Bars slideshow.



Dialogue Boxes

Use keyboard function keys to select all dialogue box options, and adjust values up and down. Much quicker to use for repetitive tasks. Works with text to speech engine so blind users can use all dialogue boxes. Mouse and touchscreen can still be used.
Click here to view Dialogue Boxes slideshow.



File Manager:

Use keyboard function keys to select files, and to perform operations on them. Works with text to speech engine so blind users can perform file operations. Hold down a function key to hear the full path of a file read out. Mouse and touchscreen can still be used. All your old keyboard shortcuts can still be used. (CTRL-X for cut, etc.)
Click here to view File Manager slideshow.

£20,000 Stretch Goal: Microsoft Office Add-in

(No screenshot available).
If I reach £20,000 in pledges, my developer will also be producing an Easy Function Keys Add-in for Microsoft Office, which will enable you to use your keyboard function keys to select pull down menus and commands, which will save most users a lot of time, as they will no longer have to use the mouse. It will also use the CereProc text to speech engine, so blind and visually impaired users can use Microsoft Office. My developer is still investigating the possibilities available with Microsoft Add-ins, we will try to implement as many parts of the Easy Function Keys interface as possible.

I am charging only £5 for the final program suite, and £10 for the Blind Mode version. I want to keep the price as low as possible, so the largest number of people can benefit from my new interface.


What happens if I don't reach my target?

My developer will create as many programs from the suite as the amount raised allows, in the following order:

1: Program Picker

2: Quick Snap

3: Desktop Launcher

4: File Manager (the Desktop Launcher will contain its own file manager interface, so most of this work will already have been done.)

Stretch goal: if £20,000 is pledged:

Microsoft Office Add-ins

My developer has already created a very basic version of the Program Picker, (only 10% completed), which you can view in the introduction video at the top of this page.

As soon as new builds of the software are available, I will add them to the top of this campaign page, so you can download and test out the latest version.

THE CAMPAIGN:

l need to raise £10,000 to pay my programmer, Chris of CLRSoftware.co.uk, to create the Easy Function Keys program suite.

I will be paying Chris £200 - £500 at a time. He will produce as much code as I have paid him for, then send me the latest build of the software, and I will upload it to this campaign page, so you can test it out. I will then pay Chris the next £200 - £500 to continue coding, as the (Paypal) pledges come in, and so on.

Early birds get a 20% discount on the final sale price.

If I don't raise all of the £10,000, I will use however much I have raised to pay Chris to write as much of the software suite as he can.

Why Indiegogo?

How your pledge will help:

For the first time, there is a universal computer interface which can be used by virtually all people. I want to make my interface cheap and available everywhere.

As I am not a programmer, I am unable to create the program suite myself. Indiegogo gives me a chance to let interested people help me create the program suite they want, with a new interface that will save them time.

My interface will allow blind and visually impaired users to control their computers much more easily, with pleasant, human-sounding text to speech.

Risks & Challenges

If I fail to raise sufficient funds to have all four programs created, I will use whatever money has been raised to have as many of the four programs created as possible, and all pledgers will still be covered by my 90 day money back guarantee, so you can ask for a full refund. The 90 day money back guarantee starts from when the finished version of each program has been installed on your computer, so you have 90 days to try out the final versions.

Use keyboard function keys in dialogue boxes to select options, and adjust values up and down.

Development timeline
The campaign will end mid-February 2015, but I will be paying my developer from the beginning of the campaign, as soon as Paypal pledges reach £200. (I can access Paypal pledges immediately, card payments are held by Indiegogo until the end of the campaign.)
Early builds of the software will be made available on this campaign page, as soon as they are created, so users can try them out. I hope to be able to release new builds every few days, beginning with the Program Picker.

Text to speech engine for Blind Mode
For the Blind Mode version of the software suite, I will be using the CereProc text to speech engine. You can test out this text to speech engine for yourself, by entering text into the CereProc website, and choosing the voice you want to hear the text spoken with. The Blind Mode version will come with four voices which the user can choose from. Please use the comments link above this campaign to let me know which voices you prefer. (I have to pay a licence fee for each voice I use in the software. Initially it will come with four voices, two male and two female. Please bear in mind that Blind Mode needs to use two different voices, one to read out menu bar title text, and the other to read out pull down menu commands, and dialogue box commands, so that the user always knows which they are listening to.)

The Easy Function Keys Software Suite:
Desktop Launcher: 
A permanent menu bar (or bars) at the top of your desktop, from which you can launch any program or file, by just pressing two function keys. The Desktop Launcher will enable multiple menu bars, so you can have more than 144 programs and files. The Desktop Launcher will enable 'Quick Command Bars', which allow you to open a program or file with just one function key press. Click here to view Desktop Launcher slideshow

 
Program Picker: A dialogue box which opens whenever you press your Escape key. This displays all the open programs on your computer, and you can switch to any of them by pressing one function key. Unlike the conventional Windows Task Switcher (Alt-Tab), Program Picker stays open and doesn't require you to constantly hold down a key. You can alternate between the two most recently accessed programs by just pressing Esc F1 each time you want to switch - ideal for copying and pasting between two programs. Access Win X commands (Task Manager, Command Prompt, etc.) by pressing Esc F11. Access the desktop by pressing Esc F12. Access Quick Snap (see below) by press Esc F11 F11. Please view the video at the top of this campaign for a brief demo of the alpha version of the Program Picker.  Click here to view Program Picker slideshow.

Quick Snap
Use function keys to resize the current program window to the right or left half of the screen, top or bottom of the screen, etc. Once you have resized the current program window, a list of other open programs is displayed, which you can resize to the other half (third, quarter, etc.) of the window, by pressing a function key. Very quick to use - just press F11 F11 to access within EFK compatible programs, or Esc F11 F11 within non-EFK compatible programs. Click here to view Quick Snap slideshow.

Blind Mode:
A text to speech engine reads out commands as function keys are pressed. In Blind Mode, the user presses the same function key again to run that command, or presses other function keys to hear their commands. All parts of the Easy Function Keys interface have been designed to be accessible by blind and visually impaired users.  
Click here to view Blind Mode slideshow.


Quick Command Bars:


Quick Command Bars (QCBs) are displayed below the main menu bar in programs in the Easy Function Keys program suite, and allow the user to run commands with just one function key. Move between QCBs with F12 and Esc keys. Press Esc to move up, F12 to move down. Press Esc until you move back up to the main menu bar. Create your own custom QCBs containing your favourite commands. 
Click here to view Quick Command Bars slideshow.


Dialogue Boxes
Use keyboard function keys to select all dialogue box options, and adjust values up and down. Much quicker to use for repetitive tasks. Works with text to speech engine so blind users can use all dialogue boxes. Mouse and touchscreen can still be used. 
Click here to view Dialogue Boxes slideshow.


File Manager:
Use keyboard function keys to select files, and to perform operations on them. Works with text to speech engine so blind users can perform file operations. Hold down a function key to hear the full path of a file read out. Mouse and touchscreen can still be used. All your old keyboard shortcuts can still be used. (CTRL-X for cut, etc.) 
Click here to view File Manager slideshow.


£20,000 Stretch Goal: Microsoft Office Add-in

(No screenshot available).
If I reach £20,000 in pledges, my developer will also be producing an Easy Function Keys Add-in for Microsoft Office, which will enable you to use your keyboard function keys to select pull down menus and commands, which will save most users a lot of time, as they will no longer have to use the mouse. It will also use the CereProc text to speech engine, so blind and visually impaired users can use Microsoft Office. My developer is still investigating the possibilities available with Microsoft Add-ins, we will try to implement as many parts of the Easy Function Keys interface as possible.
I am charging only £5 for the final program suite, and £10 for the Blind Mode version. I want to keep the price as low as possible, so the largest number of people can benefit from my new interface.


What happens if I don't reach my target?
My developer will create as many programs from the suite as the amount raised allows, in the following order:
1: Program Picker
2: Quick Snap
3: Desktop Launcher
4: File Manager (the Desktop Launcher will contain its own file manager interface, so most of this work will already have been done.)

Stretch goal: if £20,000 is pledged:
Microsoft Office Add-ins
My developer has already created a very basic version of the Program Picker, (only 10% completed), which you can view in the introduction video at the top of this page.
As soon as new builds of the software are available, I will add them to the top of this campaign page, so you can download and test out the latest version.

THE CAMPAIGN:
l need to raise £10,000 to pay my programmer, Chris of CLRSoftware.co.uk, to create the Easy Function Keys program suite.
I will be paying Chris £200 - £500 at a time. He will produce as much code as I have paid him for, then send me the latest build of the software, and I will upload it to this campaign page, so you can test it out. I will then pay Chris the next £200 - £500 to continue coding, as the (Paypal) pledges come in, and so on. 
Early birds get a 20% discount on the final sale price.
If I don't raise all of the £10,000, I will use however much I have raised to pay Chris to write as much of the software suite as he can.

Why Indiegogo? How your pledge will help:
For the first time, there is a universal computer interface which can be used by virtually all people. I want to make my interface cheap and available everywhere.
As I am not a programmer, I am unable to create the program suite myself. Indiegogo gives me a chance to let interested people help me create the program suite they want, with a new interface that will save them time.
My interface will allow blind and visually impaired users to control their computers much more easily, with pleasant, human-sounding text to speech.

Risks & Challenges
If I fail to raise sufficient funds to have all four programs created, I will use whatever money has been raised to have as many of the four programs created as possible, and all pledgers will still be covered by my 90 day money back guarantee, so you can ask for a full refund. The 90 day money back guarantee starts from when the finished version of each program has been installed on your computer, so you have 90 days to try out the final versions.

story:
Who am I ?

Hi ! I'm Gabriel Juchault, and i am a webdeveloper. I'm 18 years-old and i come from France. I'm currently studying to become an engineer. I love Javascript, and here is my new project : Fly.js.

What is Fly.js ?

Fly.js is a Javascript library. Simply, it’s a set of features destined to make the developing on applications easier which could be complex sometimes. To quote only theses, “Prototype” and “jQuery” are two of the most used library today.

Fly.js is a lightweight library. Its code is simple, within the reach of anyone, commented and structured. It’s cut in different modules : you take only what you need. Nothing superfluous. Each module is not required : when you download Fly.js, you just check those that will be useful, and let those you won’t need for your application.

What’s more, Fly.js is brought under GNU/GPL3 license. This license, known as “libre”, allows you to use Fly.js in all your project, to hack it, to redistribute it - under the only condition you keep this same license.

Why another library ?

This library was created for many reasons. First of all, the code quality of other libraries. By dint of getting always a more optimized code to decrease the file size and boost performance, the other libraries have tented to skimp on this point. I have wanted to know how worked some of their included features, and that took a long time. Everybody, especially if you're new in javascript programming, couldn't understand and use them

jQuery has recently launched a new version which don’t support Internet Explorer 6 anymore. Indeed, every navigator, through their updates, add some new fresh features, and by the way they don’t support others. Moreover, all the Javascript engines don’t do the same thing, with the same code.
Mootools extends natives objects, which is not appreciated by the whole Javascript developers community.
That’s why i wanted to create my own library, lightweight and easy to understand, and intended to be compatible with all browsers (Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, Opera, etc.).

Who is concerned ?

For everybody ! For developers who want to progress in Javascript programming watching how do work some resources, for developers who need this library to their websites, and for the curious people who just want to test it. This libraries can also be used by the programmers who have no particular knowledge about Javascript but who want to develop in a easier way a website.

In concrete terms, which are the advantages ? How could it effect my way of coding ?

Obviously, there is a huge amount of available fonctions, of animations. Your code will be more concised and more explanatory : minimum of “magic” arguments (where the setting’s meaning is variable), a separation among the differents modules : getElementById foreshortening selector is $, and the quick way for CSS3 selector engine is $$ - Effects are seperated from DOM module (noticely for hide and show).

Fly.js remains a full librarie, lightweight and fun to use : chaining (avoidable), number of fonctions to improve developing...
And, of course, a browser support (Firefox, Opera, Safari, Chrome, and Internet Explorer since the version 6).

Exemples

Here are some examples to show you how simple Flyjs is. This is an slider. It takes less than 15 lines of Javascript code. Isn't that awesome ? Check the full example here http://jsfiddle.net/Extaze/wVLFd/

Here is the Javascript source :

Do you love Ajax ? Me too. Let's see how do you use it in Fly.js :

 

Where the project is standing ?

The project is much more in an advanced stage than an idea : a version more or less steady is upkeeping. The whole modules are finished, nevertheless several bugs are remaining, especially in direct link with browsers, but i have made some improvement in the comments or in the code intelligibility.
Concerning the website, it is absolutely not finished. The structure is ready, the design too. But the documentation is remaining and it’s a long and tedious work to do.

Why should i be involved in such a project ?

As you can notice, this project comprises almost 3000 code lines (excepted tiers libraries) and more of 100 functions. That is to say that the project makes progress. However, until nowadays, I focus on the developing part and not on the visibility (unless some posts on forums of developers) among people who is likely able to use it. The work is to write a very long documentation for each functions, thus its hosting and the code - in all its versions. As a result, i have to pay this hosting - which is not enable with my student spending limit.

I’m aware that my project can’t be compared with a report or with arts funding. But in financing Fly.js, you will allow my project to fly on its own wings, to be discovered and - I hope so - to be used by other programmers, who will see their works considerably simplified, without any loss of readability or of performance.

Other ways to help

Of course, all of your comments are a precious help; even more if you are a developer : Fly.js is open-source. You can grab the code (in the actual version) and to take a look from top to bottom, test it, and if you want, use it for your next project. My benefit is to get back your impressions, comments and critics to balance my creator and developer point of view - which is everything but subjective. It allows me to offer you a more advanced and complete content in order to answer your expectations, as the whole users’ one. And obviously, you could talk about it to your friends.

It allows me to offer you a more advanced and complete content in order to answer your expectations, as the whole users’ one. And obviously, you could talk about it to your friends.

story:
What is a Stuckon?

Stuckons are custom repositionable labels that stick on the back of iPhones and iPhone cases. Stuckons fit all iPhones, including the iPhone 5. Stuckons can be printed with photos, logos, text, and even QR codes.

What is the Minimum Custom Order?

The minimum custom order of Stuckons is 25 Stuckons for $25.00 U.S. shipping included. At the end of the campaign we email you simple instructions of how to submit your artwork for your custom Stuckons.

Full Color and Photo Printing

At the $5.00 reward level you get these three preprinted Stuckons

Stuckons for Business

Why put a Stuckon label on the back of an iPhone?

iPhone users are everywhere. There are more than 74 million iPhones in use.

Stuckons help you apply your custom image to iPhones. Think about when people take pictures, send text messages, browse the web, and make calls on their iPhones. During those very common tasks, the back of the phone is facing away from its user. This very simple and common occurrence can translate into thousands of impressions for your image.

The use of a Stuckon with your logo or image constitutes a strong personal endorsement.

Stuckons and QR Codes

Stuckons can use the power of QR codes to increase ROI and drive potential customers to your website, Facebook page, online store, or your PayPal checkout or donation page.

Stuckons and Text Message Campaigns

Stuckons can be used with text messaging campaigns to publicize your text message short code and keyword.

 

Price Point

Stuckons are inexpensive enough to use as giveaways for business promotion, weddings, special events, and parties. Stuckons can also be manufactured for resale.

Where are Stuckons Made?

Stuckons are made in the USA.

What Does Stuckons Plan To Do With Indiegogo Funds?

To drive online sales, Stuckons needs a website where the purchaser can upload, modify, and configure their own artwork prior to purchasing. Additionally, the website needs to save the orders, so reorders can be made quickly and easily. The cost to program and implement the website is approximately $9,700.

Copyrighted Material

Like other companies that provide custom printing, Stuckons cannot print copyrighted material without permission. By submitting material to Stuckons for printing you are certifying that the material is not copyrighted or that you have permission to print the copyrighted material.
