story:
From the Founder

Hello, My name is Dr. Eli Talmor, I am co-founder and CEO of SentryCom.  After years of Research, Development, Testing and Market Validation - we are about to launch Sentrycs - our Software-as-a-Service. Sentrycs is an innovative Security Service for the masses! And as such- it is crucial that our early adopters will help us to spread the word…

Can we trust the Internet? Are we sure about the Identity of the people we are encountering on the Web? Are we sure that nobody is peeking into our secrets -confidential files we share with others? Are we sure that our credit-card transactions and third-party money transfers are safe? Of course – many people ask the same question – but we honestly believe that we’ve got the right answer: secure, inexpensive and easy to use.

Don't bet that bad guys are not after you... Better - think  what will happen to your Identity, your secrets and your reputation if they are...

With your contribution and your involvement – we hope to cross the chasm...This will allow us to scale up our Production Platform to serve more people. Thank you !

Sentrycs for everybody

Sentrycs is for ordinary folks who use their PCs and carry mobile phones. Almost daily they are prompted to prove their Identity online , either for social networking or opening business accounts. Almost daily they share something private with others  - document , picture , etc. Almost daily they do some sort of business  transactions that is potentially vulnerable to fraud. If you one of these folks - Sentrycs is designed for you.

Sentrycs delivers 1-2-3-4

- you pick what you need

  • 1 Identity
  • 2 platforms
  • 3 services
  • 4 service plans

Identity-as-a-service:

  • Prove your Identity Online to anyone - for opening business account , in Online Chat room or on Dating Site.
  • Prove your Identity with any form of Online Payment - credit card , PayPal or eWallet.

Identity-as-a-service Mobile App:

Data-Confidentiality-as-a-Service:

  • Share confidential files of any type with any one using any way you prefer
  • Confidential Files created using Sentrycs are accessible only by authorized persons (you or the persons you designated). Specifically neither your Internet Service Provider nor Internet Applications Provider (Email, Storage or File-Sharing Site) have access to this confidential file.

Digital-Signature-as-a-Service :

  • Sign and Time-stamp any file or document (Proof-of-intent)
  • Sign and Time-Stamp any online transaction receipt (Proof-of-purchase)

Data-Confidentiality and Digital-Signature Services :  PC App.

Sentrycs Technology Validation

"SentryCom commissioned The Standards Institution of Israel -an affiliate of US eTesting Labs a Ziff Davies media company -to validate the overall functionality of VoiceShield by simulating a real-life typical usage scenario ..."

"We will feel safer to add security measures to the site such as VoiceShield", Analyst Online Trading Site, Israel

"As a part of ACE investigation of secure remote access to quality data - the testing and demonstration proved that SentryCom products are equal to this task", Advanced Center of Excellence (ACE) , Rolls Royce , UK

"VoiceProof-a system for encryption and file protection to securely exchange documents and files , protected by Strong (Voice) Authentication successfully concluded pilot project", Department XIII, Rome Municipality, Italy.

Sentrycs Technology Review

Sentrycs Innovation Award

Sentrycs Innovation - based on IP

Sentrycs innovation is based on technology developed in-house and protected by following  US patents : 5913196 , 6510415, 7689832 . Additional US patent - pending.

Sentrycs - See for yourself

See how easy it is . Get your hands-on experience and subscribe for Free Trial .

Join our Distribution Program.

Learn more about our viral distribution  program.

.

story:
HSP Marine

                           "we put the pro in protection"

 

We are a new marine company emphasizing on products geared to protect your boat.

Our first product we are indroducing is the Marine Pro Guard or MPG. Its a hard shell 

lower unit guard designed to slide on with a locking cover to prevent prop theft. With 

the high cost of your boats motor, it makes sense to protect your investment.

From road side mishaps while trailering your boat like pot holes, to forgetting to 

trim your motor at the landing, the MPG offers you real protection. Being made from 

a polystyrene base material it'll also offer insulation while in storage by helping 

prevent any water that may get into the lower unit from freezing and expanding the 

cast until it cracks open. For extreme conditions we will offer a low trickle charge 

thermostat that operates when neccesary for the boat owner that stores next to his 

house.

 

                                       The FUN Part

 

We will launch our product in colors that will match the big marine motors 

manufactures colors, a nice stylish option for sure but we dont stop there, we 

will also offer the case with the option of using shrink wrap technology that

can utilize endless graphic options, because when the boat is fully covered 

the lower unit case will be all anyone sees. From matching the case to a

favorite Pro's colorful tourney shirt, to a favorite fishing scene, to even your 

grandbaby's picture on the back, the consumer will be able to customize

their case to personal taste.

         

                                      Our Journey

 

We have bootstrapped this project to the extent of our abilities and we now 

humbly present our project to the public to help us raise the minimun money

neccesary to launch this product. HSP Marine wants to bring never seen

products to life!

prevent any water that may get into the lower unit from freezing and expanding the 
cast until it cracks open. For extreme conditions we will offer a low trickle charge 
thermostat that operates when neccesary for the boat owner that stores next to his 
house.
 
                                       The FUN Part
 
We will launch our product in colors that will match the big marine motors 
manufactures colors, a nice stylish option for sure but we dont stop there, we 
will also offer the case with the option of using shrink wrap technology that
can utilize endless graphic options, because when the boat is fully covered 
the lower unit case will be all anyone sees. From matching the case to a
favorite Pro's colorful tourney shirt, to a favorite fishing scene, to even your 
grandbaby's picture on the back, the consumer will be able to customize
their case to personal taste.
         
                                      Our Journey
 
We have bootstrapped this project to the extent of our abilities and we now 
humbly present our project to the public to help us raise the minimun money
neccesary to launch this product. HSP Marine wants to bring never seen
products to life!

story:
Hello & Welcome!

I am the  LGNDRYCREATIVE Daniel Joseph Design. I make free intros for all of the YouTube community. In the past year I've given away over 200 free video intros, helped grow dozens of small channels and worked with a few larger YouTubers.  Now I need all of your help! I created this campaign to help raise funds for a laptop and software to make all of you more free intros faster.

My channel: www.youtube.com/user/DanielJosephDesign


What We Need & What You Get

I am asking for a total of $1,000 in donations to be put towards and laptop and software. In truth I need more than $1,000, but I don't want to come off greedy. If you guys can help get to $1,000, I can handle to the rest. :) 


  • If I don't reach my goal, the funds I do gather will be saved until I have enough money to buy the laptop and software at a later date. 


The Impact

As mentioned above and in the video. I make all of my free intros on my lunch break at work.  How busy work is affects how many intros I can make. This laptop and software would allow me to make intros for more channels faster. 

This would also allow me to:

  • Make intros on the weekends
  • Make tutorial videos showing all of you how to design and create intros for yourselves along with other graphic design projects such as: branding, banners, logos, outros...etc
  • Help all of you


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Share this video with as many people as you can. I offer a free service to anyone and everyone on YouTube. I enjoy helping others and this campaign would allow me to do so on a much larger scale.


    Share my channel: www.youtube.com/user/DanielJosephDesign

    Share this campaign: http://bit.ly/FreeIntrosFaster


    Whether or not we meet our goal, or if this fails miserably, I just want to thank all of you for your continued support.  I hope I will be able to keep this up for a LONG time and help as many people as I can.  :D

    ~Daniel

story:
Join our Blog  www.fidelyswatch.com

FiDELYS is by IriTech, Inc. www.iritech.com

 

***Check out more details here

____________________________________________________________

FiDELYS is for anyone who is keen on wearable technology and personal data security. 

Convenience and Security had a trade-off. With FiDELYS, you get both!

Experience convenient access to the digital world and a secure access through iris recognition. Check out what FiDELYS can do with the iris recognition technology!

Iris Verification will,

SPEED UP YOUR SIGN-IN PROCESS by eliminating the need to remember passwords. Capture your iris and automatically fill in the credentials within a second.

SECURE YOUR DEVICES AND PERSONAL INFORMATION through encryption and application launch control. 

AUTHENTICATE YOUR IDENTITY. There will be a myriad of applications for authentication. For example, payments, access control, time attendance management, IoT etc. Create your own app with our API and SDK!




Once you get hold of FiDELYS, you will be able to register your iris and begin to experience your life in a more secure and innovative way. By capturing your iris, you can:


In the past few months, we developed the first prototype of FiDELYS. A small iris camera module was embedded into a smartwatch with on-board matching functions. 

A ready-to-use application named FYIO is available on GooglePlay and compatible with all our iris cameras - IriShield MK is offered as a reward for a pledge over $150.



Session Tracking

You won't have to scan your iris every time you make an action. The buckle of FiDELYS will have either a heartbeat sensor or magnetic sensor to keep the session on as soon as you scan your iris when the watch is on. Single Sign-on, Access Control, Device Control will be available when session is on. If the heartbeat is off or the watch lost connection with your phone, the session will automatically end. 

Wireless charging

FiDELYS will have wireless Qi charging. 

Clicking Bezel for Navigation

Touchscreens are good but not for a form factor as small as a watch. To maximize the UX (user experience), we developed a clicking bezel for navigation.



               

         

       

     

Design is a significant aspect for devices these days. FiDELYS was designed to suit everyday looks. Whether you are in business attire or working out, FiDELYS will fit the purpose. 

What’s more, we’ll start with the two basic color options: black and white. However, we plan to give more colors to users so visit our website at www.fidelyswatch.com and vote for the next color you’d want to see!





Our wholehearted thanks 

and appreciation.



"PINS ARE OVER" - Digital Trends

"It's not too often Planet Biometrics' editors get excited by a new product..... but FiDELYS ticks many of the right boxes for us."  - Mark Lockie, Editor of Planet Biometrics

"Using your eyes as your password is the stuff of science fiction and spy movies, which is why this watch is so cool." - Technabob

"Fidelys wants to solve a bunch of 2014 tech problems, like managing your paswords or unlocking your devices with just one simple eye movement" - ShinyShiny

"The FiDELYS smartwatch has a role to play here..." - Ubergizmo

"There are a handful of smart watches available in the market that link with smart phones to show texts, email, caller ID but none that offer the extra authentication factor for online access." - SecureIDnews.com


FAQs

1. How does iris recognition work?

Primer on iris technology

2. I'm afraid people might start losing their eyes...

This was the biggest concern of iris recognition, a concern created by Hollywood films that I myself watched while growing up.

In reality, IriTech has a patented technology to detect fake or non-live eyes. We call it our "Liveness Detection" technology. After all, the point of biometrics is to keep worries related to security away.

3.  Is FiDELYS eye-safe?

Yes, FiDELYS is eye-safe. The technology meets IEC 62471 standard for eye-safe operation. Our IR LED is less than 2% of the standard.

4. Does it work outdoors? Or in the dark?

Yes, the red light on the watch is an IR-LED (Infra-red) which enables the iris camera to capture your iris image during day and night.

5. Do I need to scan my iris every time I make an action?

No, FiDELYS will have a magnetic sensor on the buckle that will track sessions of authentication. Meaning, scan your iris once after latching on your wrist and it will allow you actions that require authentication on your mobile devices, laptop, gateways, etc.  Once the buckle is unlatched, the watch will not authenticate any actions. However, you can set sensitive actions such as home door locks, safes, NFC creditcard payments, banking application sign on to require an additional scan. 

6. Does FiDELYS capture my iris if wearing glasses?

Yes. Operators can adjust the angle of the camera to minimize infrared LED reflection. Stella from our Demo video wears glasses and it works perfectly!

Of course it won't work for color lenses or cosmetic lenses that interferes recognition of the iris pattern.

7. How long does an iris capture take?

All you need to do is glance at the smartwatch making sure you put your eye in the focus range of the camera.

If you get used to it - which is very easy - it will take less than a second.

8. At what distance should FiDELYS be used to capture my iris?

The closer the better for image quality. However, for a smartwatch, the ideal distance is 15cm~20cm considering the User Experience (UX is key).

9. Will my iris template be exposed?

No, your iris template will never be exposed.

Your iris image is captured to do authentication locally (on your smartwatch). Then the watch will generate a key that will be sent to your phone, laptop, PC, gateway etc. to give you access to your actions.

10. How accurate is FiDELYS?

According to NIST, IriTech's matching algorithms were ranked #1 in the US government's IREX Test. With very challenging data sets of NIST, at FAR of 1e-6, our FRR is less than 0.2%, less than a half of the second winner.

IriTech has been in iris recognition for the past 15 years. We are well known in the industry for our accuracy.

11. Can multiple users use the same FiDELYS?

No, FiDELYS is FYIO (For Your Iris Only) so only one user can use it at a time. In order for someone else to use it, the existing iris will need to be de-rolled which requires authentication through a capture of the existing iris.

12. What can I do with FiDELYS?

There are a lot of things to you can do with your FiDELYS such as online shopping, banking transaction, access control, etc. Furthermore, we are looking into different aspects of life in order to develop more applications that best serve our daily lives.

13. Can I make an app that I specifically need?

Why not! We will provide our SDK for you to create your own app for FiDELYS!  

14.  Is FiDELYS waterproof?

It's a trend. So yes, FiDELYS will be IP-67 water-proof.

story:
The dangers of Electro Magnetic Fields (EMFs) may be one of the most pervasive ‘sleeping giants’ of the 21st century. Unfortunately, we face a ‘Wild West’ situation when it comes to wireless technology testing and standards.

Testing, which was designed by the telecom industry, is grossly inadequate in proving the safety of wireless technologies. Research shows that just exposing human cells to these harmful radio frequencies (EMFs) causes an immediate biological reaction.

There are more than six billion cell phones currently in use globally and that number continues to grow each month....a technology that has only been in heavy use for the last fifteen to twenty years.

Wireless technologies are an everyday part of our lives: besides cell phones, Bluetooth®, Wi-Fi, Wi-Max and cordless home/office phones are as ingrained in our lifestyle today as is using a fork and a spoon.

We take for granted that these technologies are adequately tested and safe.

But the truth is that these wireless technologies (that produce harmful EMFs-non-ionizing radiation) are not required to be tested for long term safety, and there are no global, nor North American testing standards for any of these products that adequately address the real risks! Additionally, the current testing protocol does not differentiate between testing a child and an adult. Radiation goes into the skull of a child three times deeper than an adult!

Wireless technological science is the same worldwide, yet government standards for allowable safe exposure differ widely from country to country. There is no consensus on what constitutes safe, allowable exposure.

This alone should cause pause for concern and catapult the world into adopting testing protocol and allowable levels in devices immediately. 


Harmful frequencies discharged by all cell phones-Image courtesy TUV SUD Canada


Cell phone technology has not been tested to determine the effects of long term exposure- not only on human beings, but on the biodiversity of our planet.


Trailer courtesy of James Russell's documentary "Resonance Beings of Frequency"

The Silvershield project is about bringing wide spread awareness of the EMF issue as it relates to wireless technology, and providing patented products featuring SILVER. It's not about abandoning your smart phone, or wireless devices. 


                  Data used in the simulation courtesy of Cetecom USA

This brief simulation shows how radio frequency radiation (EMF) spreads around a user’s head while using a cell phone. (This simulation used data derived from actual testing and the lighter the color, the higher the level of radiation.) Shockingly, in newer phones the signal is much stronger; North America is allowed to have some of the strongest exposure levels in the entire world when compared to other countries.

Up until recently it had been thought that the radiation produced by wireless technologies, specifically cell phones and their assorted accessories, cause absolutely no threat to human health.

For instance, the test designed by the telecom industry has been shown to be grossly inadequate in proving the safety of wireless technologies. Contrary to the standards used in Safety Code 6, determining if the flesh is heated or not does NOT determine safety. 

Chart courtesy of MicroWorlds Contents

Instead, independent, non-telecom industry funded testing shows that exposure can result in single and double strand DNA breaks. While single strand DNA breaks are repairable, double strand DNA breaks are usually a precursor for cancer. We now know that just exposing human cells to these radio frequencies causes an immediate biological reaction in the cells at the mitochondrial level.

This remarkable report aired on the Canadian Broadcast Corporation’s, The National.


Video clip courtesy of CBC, Canada

An important exposé by RT, the Russian-English news agency, features interviews with prominent thought leaders in the EMF field in relation to wireless technology. They relate it to the cigarette controversy in the 60s, and explain the implications in relation to health insurance, and more in this riveting clip:


Video clip courtesy of RT Television, Russia

Importantly, in 2011, the World Health Organization announced that non-ionizing radiation is now considered a 2B carcinogen (potential to cause cancer). Given the pervasive use of wireless technologies described above, it stands to reason that an ever increasing number of people worldwide are not only extremely sensitive to the ubiquitous exposure of radio frequencies, but are in danger of developing cancer because of it. 


Silver has the highest electrical and thermal conductivity of all metals. In fact, silver defines conductivity – all other metals are compared against it.

All SilverShield® products utilize two types of metallic fibers which, when woven together using our proprietary formula, create a textile material which is excellent at absorbing the harmful electromagnetic frequencies that produce non-ionizing radiation. We use silver and stainless steel because of their excellent ability to act as conductors and absorbers of energy, when combined. This is what allows our proprietary fiber formula and technology to be patented.


This expert technology is what makes SilverShield products the most highly effective against harmful wireless, electro- magnetic fields. Using the top industry-standard telecom testing protocol and carried out in accredited testing facilities, SilverShield® technology has consistently maintained at least an 80% reduction rate of electromagnetic radiation.

This embedded, ‘silver shield’ technology absorbs the electromagnetic radiation (EMFs) produced by the phone to reduce the harmful effects.

Silver is expertly woven into our fabrics

Our marketing efforts are focused primarily on the smart phone case because this product has the most positive impact on the more than 6 billion wireless phones currently in use around the world, but we offer two other excellent products!

• SilverShield Phone Case: Built-in, radiation-reduction technology protects while using a smart phone. 

                             

  

The cases are made from premium leather and are custom-designed for the most popular smart phone models. A plastic cradle holds the phone firmly in place. Our new generic cases designed to fit other popular brands utilize a revolutionary adhesive to hold the phone firmly in place, and allow the removal of the phone dozens of times as access is needed to the battery or the SIM card.                      

In France, we hand sew the patented SilverShield fabric technology to the front flap of an iPhone 5 custom case to create a protective barrier between the phone and the user.

All SilverShield Phone Cases reduce radiation exposure by a minimum of 80%. The rate of reduction varies by phone type and band used, yet is never less than 80%.

SilverShield technology is excellent at absorbing and dissipating the radiation produced by smart phones. Here are the original test results using the iphone 3, in 2011, the year we first filed our patent.

               

Interestingly as Smartphones have become more advanced and emit even more radiation, SilverShield technology has performed as good or better than our original results. New test results on all of our products will be available in 2015 .

• The SilverShield Pocket Card utilizes the same patented, silver technology found in our SilverShield Phone Cases and allows consumers to carry their Smartphone in a pocket or purse significantly reducing EMF radiation exposure.


SilverShield Pocket Card


• SilverShield Maternity Wrap is designed to limit radiation exposure to the developing fetus. Non-ionizing radiation (EMFs) has been linked to many types of fetal developmental issues. Our patented, fabric technology contains silver fibers woven into a soft, stretchable and durable fabric that shields and protects a woman's body when she is using wireless technology or in close proximity to others using wireless technology.


SilverShield Maternity wrap is comfortably worn during the full pregnancy and expands to fit.


We have developed and brought to reality exceptional products that are targeted to address the global epidemic of harmful EMFs. They are desperately needed by people around the world.

As a small start-up we have taken this project as far as we can.

We work with a legal team in order to ensure compliance with both the FDA in the USA, and Health Canada to assure that how we communicate the problem and our products is within regulation.

We are also committed to work with local suppliers to provide products and packaging – we are determined to limit our carbon footprint as much as possible.

We have assembled an exceptional team that manages all aspects of marketing SilverShield products throughout North America and internationally. This team has more than 30 years of experience in successfully launching products in a broad range of industries, as well as in the health and wellness industry. The team is focused on all aspects of marketing: trade shows, PR, advertising, social media, as well as packaging, etc.

Our biggest challenge is that the harmful EMF issue needs more visibility. We are poised to expose the issue, and position SilverShield as the answer to the problem. We will execute this via a nationwide Public Relations campaign, advertising, and through utilizing extreme social media by targeting and engaging top bloggers.

There is a multitude of so-called anti radiation products available, most of which don't work, don't have verifiable testing, nor are they patented. Unfortunately, these companies prey on naive consumers and cast a negative shadow on legitimate companies. The FTC keeps a close eye on these companies and quite often will shut them down.

Unlike one of our main competitors, we do not alter how a phone is originally designed to operate by the manufacturer. Doing so can be very dangerous. Products that alter the original functionality of how a phone emits radiation have the possibility to make the radiation exposure worse.  SilverShield technology places our ‘silver shield’ fabric technology between the phone and the user’s head to absorb and dissipate EMFs. It does not change how a phone works. In fact, it has no effect on phone operation at all. It does not affect battery life or restrict the phone’s signal in any way. We know this from our detailed test report conducted by Emitech in France. Emitech is an internationally accredited testing facility which utilizes the worldwide standards, the same standards which the FCC uses for SAR testing. (The testing video is available for viewing in the Attachment Gallery.)

The SilverShield phone case and pocket card allows your phone to operate exactly as the manufacturer intended it to with one exception…our embedded, silver technology absorbs and dissipates the electro-magnetic radiation produced by your phone. This creates less of a harmful impact on the user. 

We are looking for Indiegogo partners who share our vision. SilverShield patented technology drives our products, and by driving the products forward a greater awareness about this global health crisis will continue to surface. SilverShield products are our platform for awareness and ultimately, change.

We will continue to be on the leading edge of testing, promoting global standards in relation to the health of individuals and the health of the planet.

Please join us and be on the leading–edge of the next frontier in making wireless safe!

field in relation to wireless technology. They relate it to the cigarette
controversy in the 60s, and explain the implications in relation to health
insurance, and more in this riveting clip:
Video clip courtesy of RT Television, RussiaImportantly, in
2011, the World Health Organization announced that non-ionizing radiation is
now considered a 2B carcinogen (potential to cause cancer). Given the pervasive
use of wireless technologies described above, it stands to reason that an ever
increasing number of people worldwide are not only extremely sensitive to the
ubiquitous exposure of radio frequencies, but are in danger of developing
cancer because of it. Silver has
the highest electrical and thermal conductivity of all metals. In fact, silver
defines conductivity – all other metals are compared against it.
All
SilverShield® products utilize two types of metallic fibers which,
when woven together using our proprietary formula, create a textile material
which is excellent at absorbing the harmful electromagnetic frequencies that
produce non-ionizing radiation. We use silver and stainless steel because of
their excellent ability to act as conductors and absorbers of energy, when
combined. This is what allows our proprietary
fiber formula and technology to be patented. 
This
expert technology is what makes SilverShield products the most highly effective
against harmful wireless, electro- magnetic fields. Using the top industry-standard telecom testing protocol and carried
out in accredited testing facilities, SilverShield® technology has consistently
maintained at least an 80% reduction rate of electromagnetic radiation.
This embedded, ‘silver shield’ technology absorbs the
electromagnetic radiation (EMFs) produced by the phone to reduce the harmful
effects.
Silver is
expertly woven into our fabricsOur marketing
efforts are focused primarily on the smart phone case because this product has
the most positive impact on the more than 6 billion wireless phones currently
in use around the world, but we offer two other excellent products!
• SilverShield
Phone Case: Built-in, radiation-reduction technology protects while using a
smart phone.                                The cases are
made from premium leather and are custom-designed for the most popular smart
phone models. A plastic cradle holds the phone firmly in place. Our new generic
cases designed to fit other popular brands utilize a
revolutionary adhesive to hold the phone firmly in place, and allow the removal
of the phone dozens of times as access is needed to the battery or the SIM
card.                      

In France, we hand sew the patented SilverShield fabric technology to the front flap of an iPhone 5 custom case to create a protective barrier between the phone and the user.
All SilverShield
Phone Cases reduce radiation exposure by a minimum of 80%. The rate of
reduction varies by phone type and band used, yet is never less than 80%.
SilverShield
technology is excellent at absorbing and dissipating the radiation produced by
smart phones. Here are the original test results using the iphone 3, in 2011,
the year we first filed our patent.               

Interestingly as Smartphones have become more advanced and emit even more
radiation, SilverShield technology has performed as good or better than our
original results. New test results on all of our products will be available in
2015 .
• The SilverShield Pocket Card utilizes the same patented, silver technology found in our
SilverShield Phone Cases and allows consumers to carry their Smartphone in a pocket or purse significantly reducing EMF radiation exposure.

SilverShield
Pocket Card
• SilverShield Maternity Wrap is designed to limit radiation exposure to
the developing fetus. Non-ionizing radiation (EMFs) has been linked to many types of fetal developmental issues. Our patented, fabric technology contains silver fibers woven into a soft, stretchable and durable fabric that shields and protects a woman's body when she is using wireless technology or in close proximity to others using wireless technology.


SilverShield Maternity wrap is comfortably worn during the full pregnancy and
expands to fit.
We have
developed and brought to reality exceptional products that are targeted to
address the global epidemic of harmful EMFs. They are desperately needed by
people around the world. 
As a small start-up
we have taken this project as far as we can. 
We work with a
legal team in order to ensure compliance with both the FDA in the USA, and
Health Canada to assure that how we communicate the problem and our products is
within regulation. 
We are also committed
to work with local suppliers to provide products and packaging – we are
determined to limit our carbon footprint as much as possible.
We have
assembled an exceptional team that manages all aspects of marketing SilverShield
products throughout North America and internationally. This team has more than
30 years of experience in successfully launching products in a broad range of
industries, as well as in the health and wellness industry. The team is focused
on all aspects of marketing: trade shows, PR, advertising, social media, as
well as packaging, etc. 

Our biggest
challenge is that the harmful EMF issue needs more visibility. We are poised to
expose the issue, and position SilverShield as the answer to the problem. We
will execute this via a nationwide Public Relations campaign, advertising, and
through utilizing extreme social media by targeting and engaging top bloggers. 
There is a
multitude of so-called anti radiation products available, most of which don't
work, don't have verifiable testing, nor are they patented. Unfortunately,
these companies prey on naive consumers and cast a negative shadow on
legitimate companies. The FTC keeps a close eye on these companies and quite
often will shut them down.
Unlike one of
our main competitors, we do not alter how a phone is originally designed to
operate by the manufacturer. Doing so can be very dangerous. Products that
alter the original functionality of how a phone emits radiation have the
possibility to make the radiation exposure worse.  SilverShield technology places our ‘silver
shield’ fabric technology between the phone and the user’s head to absorb and dissipate EMFs. It does not change how a phone works. In fact, it has no effect
on phone operation at all. It does not affect battery life or restrict the
phone’s signal in any way. We know this from our detailed test report conducted
by Emitech in France. Emitech is an internationally accredited testing facility
which utilizes the worldwide standards, the same standards which the FCC uses
for SAR testing. (The testing video is available for viewing in the Attachment
Gallery.)
The SilverShield
phone case and pocket card allows your phone to operate exactly as the
manufacturer intended it to with one exception…our embedded, silver technology
absorbs and dissipates the electro-magnetic radiation produced by your phone.
This creates less of a harmful impact on the user. 

We are
looking for Indiegogo partners who share our vision. SilverShield patented
technology drives our products, and by driving the products forward a greater
awareness about this global health crisis will continue to surface.
SilverShield products are our platform for awareness and ultimately, change. 
We will
continue to be on the leading edge of testing, promoting global standards in
relation to the health of individuals and the health of the planet.
Please join
us and be on the leading–edge of the next frontier in making wireless safe!

story:
Now on general sale on our website!

 

What are we fundraising?

Robots, we all love robots. We want to help you start making budget Raspberry Pi robots using our kits for only £28.

A fully assembled kit + Raspberry Pi Model B (Not Included) + Power Bank (Not Included)

£28 Budget Robotics Kits

We are planning to make a £28 robotics kit for use with the Raspberry Pi, this includes:

  • One RTK-000-001 RPi Motor Controller Board Kit - This is our board we have designed to be able to drive motors using a Raspberry Pi
  • One Robot Kit - This is a laser cut out robot chassis including motors, wheels and screws. 
  • Wi-Fi Adapter - One USB Wi-Fi Adapter tested for the Raspberry Pi
  • Battery Box for the Robot - A 4xAA Battery holder that is used to power the motors.
  • Wires - 2 X 2 Wire cables, used to connect the motors to the RPi M.C.B
  • Documentation & Code - A set of online documentation and code that will guide you through making robots with the kit.

What you receive, electronics kit pre assembled only in the soldered version.

You require:

  • Raspberry Pi Model A or B - The software works on both.
  • An SD Card - A SD card that you can install Raspbian or our own SD Image on.
  • Power source for your Pi - You will need to use your own power source for the Raspberry Pi

The idea of this is to promote the use of Raspberry pi in schools in a fun and enjoyable way while still learning and teaching programming.

Why?

I love robots, the first project I made with my Raspberry Pi was a robot but required lots of soldering, hacking and wires to make it work and cost me a lot of money to make. Now using the budget RTK-000-001 Motor controller board all that is required is now a budget robot to go along with it.

Robots are one of the great things that everyone loves even if they are not fully interested in Raspberry Pi. They help teach the basic fundamentals of programming and can be extended by adding sensors on top or coding in extra functions or new software. 

Documentation & Code

One of the things that we are doing is creating unique documentation and code samples to use with your budget 'bots. 

Documentation - 

  • Assembly guide - How to assemble the robot chassis, where best to position the Pi and wiring instructions.
  • Plug and Play guide -  How to setup and configure the Plug and Play robot software, to start controlling it straight away.
  • Python Guide - a step by step guide to programming your robot in python to make it move .
  • Spacebrew Guide Part 1* - Python, a step by step guide to then taking the python code and adding in Spacebrew on the python side.
  • Spacebrew Guide Part 2* - Javascript, a step by step guide on then creating a basic robot controller in Javascript and then communicate to the robot using Spacebrew.
  • Scratch GPIO Guide - A lesson on moving the robot around using scratch and input from the keyboard. Also includes setting up a VNC server on your Raspberry Pi to be able to use Scratch.
  • Adding sound  - Robots are even more awesome when they make noises. This guide will show you how to add sound with a pair of off the shelf budget speakers. 

* The out come of these two guides will be the same as the Plug and Play guide, this is from where we use these software and code for the core of the Plug and Play software.

Do you have an idea for any documentation? Contact us @ Indiegogo@ryanteck.ltd.uk

Code - 

  • Plug and Play Robot Code - The python and HTML5 & JS code will be provided as plug and play robot code. All that is required is to put the python onto a Raspberry Pi, Configure Wi-Fi and then launch the client on the Javascript Side.
  • Plug and Play SD card image - this is a downloadable SD card image for the Raspberry Pi where all is required is your Wi-Fi details. After just connect to the client and configure spacebrew.
  • Scratch Example - A downloadable scratch project that can be used to show off what the robot will do after the end of the tutorial.

Open Source At Heart

We love open source software and use it day to day from running our websites to the software that powers our robots. That's why we are releasing the documentation and source code out into the public, as soon as its written via Github.

All documentation will be released under CC BY-SA allowing you to reproduce them, share them and edit them (as long as you release your changes under the same license and attribute us). The license has no restrictions on commercial use allowing schools to freely use the documentation as well.

All code will be released publicly, any code we write will be under GNU GPL V3 / LGPL V3 where possible. This can depend on if we use external libraries or software in our programs.

About Us

Who are we? 

We're Ryanteck LTD. A new start up based in the United Kingdom aiming to allow people to make awesome projects using a Raspberry Pi for a budget and with ease.

Currently it's just one person, Ryan Walmsley. A 17 year old student who is currently studying Information Technology at College by day but at night runs a company and creates awesome stuff. 

We currently make and manufacture a successful motor controller board which is designed to be an easy way to start controlling robots and making motors spin. We currently sell this for ~£11 including Postage and Packing and sold 130 kits in our Tindie Fundraiser. You can also just buy one of these during this fundraiser to help support us at a special price of £10.

Spread the word!

Even if you can't contribute to the fundraiser we still need your help to spread the word about our fundraiser. You can do this by using the share tools that can be found on the campaign at the bottom.

Fundraiser Information

Risks & Challenges

There is little risk by backing this project, this is from where half of the project has already been funded by us (The V2 RTK RPi M.C.Bs are all already brought). You are helping us raise funds so we can buy the robot bases, motors and accessories along with the documentation costs. We have already ordered sample units from the companies that are manufacturing these and they have performed well in our tests.

Timescale

We are expecting to be able to complete this fundraiser by the end of June, this is from where we have already funded and received half of the goods required. The final parts is ordering the Robotic parts and writing the documentation and then shipping them out.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: I don't live inside the United Kingdom!
A: We are hoping to allow the robot kits to be brought worldwide. We are currently evaluating how much to charge due to higher shipping costs. We should know this within 1 week of the campaign starting. This is looking at £10-15 PNP. (£38-43 in total).

Q: Why do you need the money?
A: From where we are a small business we need more funds to be able to buy all of this equipment, by running a fundraiser we also find out how many people want kits and if we do not raise enough money we know there is no market. Our current market research is strongly on the side of people wanting to buy a complete kit.

Q: Why do you not include a power source for the Raspberry Pi?
A: There is a couple of reasons for this and they are:

  • The first prototype of the controller board was designed to have a regulator on but this caused a few issues, the A RTK RPi M.C.B (UK)voltage regulator got extremely hot for use in schools which is one of our main target markets. The second is that we would require very expensive regulators that are either cooler and / or support low drop out voltages. Both of these factors made it easier to buy an off the shelf power bank for a mobile phone a better solution as the costs to manufacture a voltage regulator and sell them for the same prices was near impossible to do. 
  • The second main reason is that we have looked into selling an off the shelf power bank with the kit but this causes big issues on the postage side, doing this requires extra paperwork to be able to post inside the UK and is restricted to post outside of the UK. We will be contacting suppliers to find the best one we can recommend for you to buy a power bank from.

Q: What is your VAT Status?
A: All prices shown do not include VAT, This is from where we are currently not VAT Registered and do not have to charge VAT on top yet. This also means you cannot claim VAT back.

Q: Can I get the documentation pre-printed?
A: We won't be providing this as part of the Indiegogo campaign but it may be possible in the future to be brought separately.


Thank you

Thank you for participating in this Ryanteck LTD. campaign.

Ryanteck LTD. is an registered limited company in the UK (08750096)
